eng_prompt: In a world filled with challenges and uncertainties, the support and guidance of parents can be invaluable. Recognizing the sacrifices made for their well-being is essential for fostering appreciation and understanding.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde okusoomoozebwa n'obutali bukakafu, obuyambi n'obulagirizi bw'abazadde buyinza okuba obw'omuwendo ennyo. Okusiima okwefiiriza okukoleddwa ku lw'obulungi bwabwe kya mugaso mu kutumbula okusiima n'okutegeera.

teo_prompt: Amisiikin nuka angaleu naka aelo erai ibore yenepol noi kanejaas atumunak kotoma apakio nu idwe. Nukaiturur, akiro nuarokok epedorete ayangaun aitolitol ka aomisio nuarokok nuikamunitos eidicane keda aelo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ali o'baza ma dria 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru anzi zopi zozo 'diyi dri yini yi ma eli zozurisi. Drile onziru, e'yo onzi eyi eco fe 'ba eyini aa'zu e'yo eyi ma eselea azini e'yo ali o'baza ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza eby'amagara g'okuteerana n'eky'omugasho munonga aha minyeeto baaba bari omu myaka yaabo y'obwegyese. Eky'obusaasi, amakuru agatahikire nigabaasa kureetaho okubuzabuzibwa n'emiteekateekyere etari mirungi aha bikwatireine n'omukago hamwe n'okuteerana.

eng_prompt: Many young people are exposed to sexual content at an early age, yet they often lack the knowledge to navigate these experiences safely. Comprehensive sex education can empower them to make informed decisions about their bodies and relationships.
lug_prompt: Abavubuka bangi balaba eby'okwegatta ku myaka emito, naye emirundi egisinga tebalina kumanya ku ngeri y'okutambuzaamu ebintu bino awatali bulabe. Okusomesebwa okw'awamu ku by'okwegatta kusobola okubawa amaanyi okusalawo obulungi ku mibiri gyabwe n'enkolagana yaabwe n'abalala.
ach_prompt: Bulu mapol gineno jami makwako butu imit ma pud gitino, ento pol kare gi peke ki ngec me tic ki jami magi labongo lworo. Pwonyo jami weng makwako butu imit twero minigi kero me moko tam mabeco I kom kom komgi ki wat gi ki dano.
teo_prompt: Atumunak luipu ewanyunitos akiro nuka aelo eringa edisiak, konye emamiatatar kesi keda acoa naka aitodolikin akiro ngun ejok. Aisisianakino na akiro nuka aelo epedori aigangakin kes aitolomun aseununeta nuikamunitos akuan kec keda eidicane lo itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ba ode karakara eyi e'yo ali o'baza ma dria 'diyi esu de eyi ma eli nga were, te eyi vu onita e'yo 'dile 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru ri yo. Imbata dria e'yo ali o'baza ma dria 'diyi eco fe eyini okpo e'yo 'duzu eyi ma rua azini eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Eminyeeto emingi neetunga ebirikukwata ahashonga z'okuteerana bakiri bato, kwonka buriijo tibaine kumanya oku barikubaasa kukoresa ebintu ebi bataine kabi. Okwegyesa abantu ebirikukwata aha by'okuteerana, nikibaasa kubahwera kucwamu gye ebirikukwata aha mibiri yaabo hamwe n'emikago yaabo.

eng_prompt: Many factors contribute to the challenges faced by young people in rural communities, including limited access to education and healthcare. As a result, early teenage pregnancies have become increasingly prevalent in these regions.
lug_prompt: Ensonga nnyingi ziviirako okusoomoozebwa abavubuka kwe basanga mu byalo, omuli n'obutafuna buyigirize na bujjanjabi. N'ekivuddemu, embuto mu bawala abato zeeyongedde mu bitundu bino.
ach_prompt: Tye jami mapol ma kelo peko ma bulu nongo icaro, ma I kingi obedo peko me nongo pwony ki kony me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, yacu ikin anyira matino tye ka nyaa tutwal ikabedo magi.
teo_prompt: Ipu iboro lueyangaunete atiokisio nuetereikina keda atumunak luka ocaloi, aimoriarit amamus adumunun asioman keda amukian. Kanuka ngun, apolor apotunun na apesur nudidika kotoma aiboisio nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara eyi fe e'yo ewaru 'ba ode angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tualu e'yo eyini ecozu onita esuzu azini arojo eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo esizu ku 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, ezoanzi nyiri eyini ecazu okporovu ru drioru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tu angu 'da eyi ma alea tutu.
nyn_prompt: Hariho enshonga nyingi ezirikureetaho oburemeezi oburikushangwa eminyeeto omu byaro, otwariiremu oburemeezi bw'okutunga eby'obwegyese n'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, okutwara enda bakiri bato kweyongyeire omu byanga ebi.

eng_prompt: In an increasingly interconnected world, collaboration among educational institutions has become essential. One effective way to foster this collaboration is through academic exchange programs.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eyeeyongera okukwatagana, enkolagana wakati w'amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza efuuse ya mugaso. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutumbula enkolagana eno kwe kuyita mu nteekateeka z'okuwanyisiganya abayizi.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma kubbe tye kamede, ribbe ikin gangi kwan obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Yo acel maber loyo me tyelo kor winye man obedo yub me winye ikin lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naeringa arucokina, erai aiswamanara kiding isomeroi ibore yenepol noi. Epone ediope loajokan noi loka aitopolor aiswamanara kangin ngesi aitolot ainapeta nuka aijulakin esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani eyi ecizu eyi ma eselea tutu ri ma alea, ti ecita angu onita ni 'diyi ma eselea ri eca curu'do orodriru. Geri azi orodriru ti ecita 'di ma omgbo otuzuri geri otuta onita ma e'yo ojazu 'diyi vusi.

eng_prompt: To ensure the integrity of our financial operations, it is essential that all members adhere to established guidelines. By maintaining strict compliance, we can protect our resources and foster trust within the community.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obulungi bw'emirimu gyaffe egy'ensimbi, kikulu nnyo bammemba bonna okugoberera ebiragiro ebyateekebwawo. Bwe tugoberera amateeka, tusobola okukuuma eby'obugagga byaffe n'okutumbula obwesige mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic wa me lim tye maber, pire tek ni lumemba weng omyero gulub cik ma kiketo. Ka wabedo ka lubu cik, watwero gwoko jami ma watye kwede ki dongo gen ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna aswam wok naka ikapun, ejokuna itunga kere atupakinit aicoreta nu itolomunitai. Kowai lo aitup ikisila, ipedori oni ayuwar iboro wok ka aitopolor amunokina kotunga.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza amavile robia niri ma tambazu kililiru, eri orodriru 'ba dria memba ru 'diyi ma obi azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma vuti. E'yo azita vuti obiza okporu 'diyi ma ta mbaza si, ama eco afa amani 'diyi ma ta mba azini asi'baza eji ongulumu eyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'empiiha byaitu nibigyenda kurungi, ni kikuru ba memba boona kukuratira ebiragiro ebiteirweho. Twaguma nitukuratira ebiragiro, nitubaasa kurinda eby'obugaiga byaitu n'okureetaho obwesigye omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the government recognizes the importance of education as a fundamental pillar for national development. To ensure a brighter future for the nation, it is essential to uphold the rights of every child to access quality learning opportunities.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, gavumenti emanyi obukulu bw'ebyenjigiriza ng'empagi enkulu mu nkulaakulana y'eggwanga. Okukakasa ebiseera by'eggwanga eby'omu maaso ebitangaavu, kikulu nnyo okukuuma eddembe lya buli mwana okufuna emikisa gy'okusoma egy'omutindo.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, gamente ngeyo ber pa kwan macalo guti me dongo lobo. Pi anyim maber pi lobo, pire tek tutwal me gwoko twero pa lutino weng me nongo gum me kwan maber.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejeni apugan ajokis naka asioman kwape atutubet naepol noi naka apol naka akwap. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuka ingaren naka akwap, ejok aitigogong apedorosio nuka idwe adumunun asioman na abeit.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, gamete ni orodri onita niri 'du ekile azi okporu angu ezoma ni kari niri ru. Kari ma ewu drialeri ni aa'zu muke, eri orodriru drilemgbo anzi nyiri dria eyini ri ma tambazu onita muke ri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, gavumenti neetegyereza omugasho gw'eby'obwegyese nk'enkingi y'entunguuka y'eihanga. Okureeba ngu eihanga riine ebiro birungi by'omumaisho, niky'omugasho kurinda obugabe bwa buri mwana kutunga emigisha mirungi y'okwega.

eng_prompt: In any organization, the behavior and actions of those in leadership positions set the tone for the entire team. When leaders demonstrate integrity and commitment, they inspire trust and respect among their followers.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, enneeyisa n'ebikolwa by'abo abali mu bifo by'obukulembeze biteekawo eddoboozi eri ttiimu yonna. Abakulembeze bwe balaga obwesimbu n'obumalirivu, baleeta obwesige n'ekitiibwa mu bagoberezi baabwe.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, kit ki tic pa joo matye ki twero me tela nyutu kit ma dul tic gi tye kwede. Ka lutela gunyutu ni gin lugen dok gimiyo cwiny gi, ci gi kelo gen ki woro ikin lulub kor gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget ediokere, iponesio keda aswamisio nuka ngul luejaasi toma aiboisio nuka eingarenone kes itodunitos epone loebeitor etimu kere aswam. Arai itodunitos engarenok abeit ka ainakina, itolomunenete kesi amunokina keda ayongit kanejaas atupitokokec.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria ma alia, adriza azini e'yo 'ba driceza ma alia 'diyi ni 'diyi e'yo 'ye amuti dria ni. Drice'ba eyi ka e'da e'yo ada azini asi 'baza be, eyi asi'baza azini inzita eji 'ba eyini vuti obi 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona, emicwe n'ebikorwa by'abo abari omu myanya y'obwebembezi, nibyo byoreka tiimu yoona. Abeebembezi ku barikworeka obwesigwa n'okwehayo, nibareetaho obwesigye n'ekitiinisa omu bagyenzi baabo.

eng_prompt: Participating in student organizations fosters a sense of belonging and community on campus. These groups often bring together individuals with shared interests and goals.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu bibiina by'abayizi kitumbula enneewulira y'okubeera awamu n'ekitundu ku ssettendekero. Ebibiina bino bitera okugatta abantu abalina ebintu bye bafaanaganya n'ebiruubirirwa bye bafaanaganya.
ach_prompt: Bedo I dul pa lutino kwan weko lutino bedo ki winye I gang kwan. Gurup magi ipol kare ribo dano ma miti gi ki miti gi rom.
teo_prompt: Ajainikin toma atukona nuka esisiak eyangauni aomisioit naka aimorikikina keda itunga luko osomero. Etapit igurupun lu aimorikikin itunga luejaasi keda ipudesia keda apeleikinata.
lgg_prompt: E'yo fizu amuti sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi ma alea ri ni fe 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea tualu ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie angu onita ni 'diyi ma alea. Ongulumu 'diyi tutuni 'ba yi eji tualu e'yo yini le azini e'yo yini lele 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okwejumba omu bibiina by'abeegi nikureetaho enkoragana n'obuhangwa ahaishomero. Guruupu ezi nizikira kugarukanisa abantu abarikukwatanisa omu bigyendererwa n'ebigyendererwa.

eng_prompt: Many students face financial challenges while pursuing their education, making it essential to find innovative ways to save money. One effective approach is to leverage the resources and networks available through student associations.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa mu by'ensimbi nga basoma, ekireetera okuba eky'omugaso okunoonya engeri z'okutereka ssente. Engeri emu ennungi kwe kukozesa ebintu n'emikutu ebiriwo okuyita mu bibiina by'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol nongo peko me lim ka gitye ka kwan, man weko nongo yoo manyen me gwoko cente obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Yoo acel maber en aye me tic ki jami ki kubbe ma tye I dul pa lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Etereikina esisiak luipu keda atiokisio nuka ikapun kapak kana asioman kec, ido erai ibore yenepol noi adumun iponesio luitetiak luka aimono ikapun. Adiopet ewai lo iswamai ejok ngesi aitwasam iboro keda atukot naka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu eyini muzu sukulu'a risi, e'yo 'di fe eyini geri ndundu eyini ecozu robia ma tambazu 'diyi esuzu. Geri azi orodriru ni 'diyi ma azi eri afa ayuzaru azini amuti sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abaingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'esente baaba nibashoma, ekirikubareetera kuronda oburyo bw'okubiika sente. Omuringo gumwe murungi n'okukozesa ebintu n'emikutu ebiriho kurabira omu bibiina by'abeegi.

eng_prompt: The student association is dedicated to promoting hands-on learning experiences. As part of their initiatives, they encourage members to engage in various community projects.
lug_prompt: Ekibiina ky'abayizi kyewaddeyo okutumbula eby'enjigiriza eby'emikono. Ng'emu ku nteekateeka zaabwe, bakubiriza bammemba okwenyigira mu pulojekiti z'ekitundu ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Dul pa lutino kwan tye ki miti me tyelo kor tic me pwonyo lutino. Macalo but yub meggi, gicuku cwiny dano me donyo I yub mapat-pat me kabedo gi.

lgg_prompt: Amuti sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi fe eyi e'yo onita eyini aa'zu eyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu. Otita yini 'diyi ma azi ru, yi 'ba yi eka fizu otita ongulumu ni ndundu 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Ekibiina ky'abeegi kyehaireyo kutunguura eby'okwega. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka zaabo, nibahiga abantu okwejumba omu purogyekiti z'ekyanga ezitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In many communities, savings clubs play a crucial role in financial stability and support. However, without the wisdom and experience of elders, these groups may struggle to thrive.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, ebibiina ebiteresi by'ensimbi bikola omulimu omukulu mu kutebenkera mu byenfuna n'obuyambi. Newankubadde, awatali magezi na bumanyirivu bwa bakadde, ebibinja bino biyinza okulwana okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, dule ma gwoko lim konyo tutwal I kelo kuc ki kony me lim. Kadi bed kumeno, labongo ryeko ki ngec pa ludito, gurup magi twero nongo peko me dongo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, iswamaete ikilabun lu imonoete ikapun aswam naepol noi kanu aitogogong keda aigang ikapun. Konye, komamei acoa keda amisiarit naka itunga luapolok, etiono igurupun lu apol.

eng_prompt: Many students struggle to keep up with the demands of their coursework. To help them succeed, it's essential that they receive support and direction from their lecturers.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi balwana okutuukagana n'obwetaavu bw'emirimu gyabwe egy'omusomo. Okubayamba okutuuka ku buwanguzi, kikulu nnyo okufuna obuyambi n'obulagirizi okuva mu basomesa baabwe.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol nongo tek tutwal me timo jami ma mite pi kwan gi. Pi konyo gi me cobo miti gi, pire tek tutwal ni gunong kony ki tira ki bot lupwonye gi.
teo_prompt: Etionikinit esisiak luipu aitodolikin iboro lu ekotos kesi kosomerokec. Kanu aingarakin kes akerianar, ibusakinit kesi adumun agangat ka aicoreta kanejaas isisianakinak kec.

nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi nibarwana kuguma nibagyendera aha byetengo by'eishomo ryabo. Okubahwera kusingura, ni kikuru ngu batungye obuhwezi n'obuhabuzi kuruga omu bashomesa baabo.

eng_prompt: When communication breaks down and differing opinions arise, it can create a rift within the organization. If not addressed, these conflicts can escalate and threaten the club's unity and purpose.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya bw'egwa n'endowooza ez'enjawulo ne zijja, kisobola okuleetawo enjawukana mu kitongole. Singa obukuubagano buno tebukolebwako, busobola okweyongera n'okutabangula obumu n'ekigendererwa kya kiraabu.
ach_prompt: Ka lok orweny dok tam mapat-pat obino, man twero kelo apoka-poka I dul ne. Ka pe ki cobo peko magi, ci twero medde ki balo ribe ki miti pa dul tuku eni.
teo_prompt: Arai kibiroros einer kosodete aomisio nuegelegela alomun, epedori ngin ayangaun atiakatiaka kotoma atukot. Arai mam itemokitai, epedorete ingungeta lu aiyatakin kosodete aimusung aimorikikina keda alosikinet naka ekilabu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza ka e'de azini egata ndundu ka efu, eri eco esele coza eji amuti ma alia ra. Ba ka e'yo nde 'diyi ma aza ko ku, eyi eco tu ra dika eyi eco amuti 'da ma ti ecita azini e'yo eyi 'yezu ri eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuhurizagana kwahwaho, ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana bikabaho, nikibaasa kureetaho okwebaganisamu omu kitongore. Entongane ezi zaaba zitakozirweho, nizibaasa kweyongyera kandi ziteganisa okukwatanisa n'ekigyendererwa kya kiraabu.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, advancements in technology have transformed the way businesses operate and interact with consumers. As a result, sectors across the board are increasingly reliant on IT solutions to enhance efficiency and innovation.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya ekyusizza engeri bizinensi gye ziddukanyizibwamu n'engeri gye zikwataganamu n'abaguzi. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole okwetooloola eggwanga byeyongedde okwesigama ku tekinologiya w'eby'empuliziganya okutumbula enkola n'obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tic ki intanet, dongo pa tet manyen okelo aloka-loka I kom kit ma biacara tiyo kwede ki bene kubbe ki luwil. Macalo adwogi ne, tenge mapat-pat mapat-pat tye ka jenge I kom diro me kompyuta me medo rwom me tic ki diro manyen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, ejulakisi apolou naka etatai loakwana epone loiswamaere ibiasaran keda aiswamanar keda agwelak. Kanuka ngun, ekotosi iriongeta kere aitwasam etatai loakwana kanu aitojokar eswamae loajokan keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologianiri oja geri tujari yini azi ngazu azini yi ecizu 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi pie ri ra. E'yo 'disi, esele dria ma eselea 'diyi curu'do asi'ba geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'yezu kililiru azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, entunguuka omu tekinorogye ehindwire omuringo ogu bizinesi zikoreramu n'oku zikorengana n'abaguzi. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore byoona nibyeyongyera kwesiga eby'empurizagana kwenda kwongyera amaani n'okujumbura.

eng_prompt: Effective communication between students and administration is essential for fostering a positive school environment. By taking initiative, student leaders can play a crucial role in facilitating this dialogue.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi wakati w'abayizi n'abakulembeze ya mugaso mu kutumbula embeera ennungi mu ssomero. Abakulembeze b'abayizi basobola okukola omulimu omukulu mu kutumbula enteeseganya zino nga batwala obukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Lok maber ikin lutino kwan ki ludito me gang kwan pire tek tutwal me kelo ber bedo i gang kwan. Lutela pa lutino kwan twero timo tic mapire tek tutwal me kelo lok man kace gucako tic gi.
teo_prompt: Einer loajokan kiding esisiak keda eyaitene erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor ejautene loajokan kosomero. Kowai lo aitolot akiro, epedorete engarenok lu esisiak aswam naepol noi kanu aitodolikin aineranara na.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea driceza eyi pie ri eri orodriru e'yo muke sukulu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Drice'ba sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi eco azi okporu 'ye e'yo nzeza 'di ma aza ko ra eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu eyi ma eselea risi.
nyn_prompt: Okugamba kurungi ahagati y'abeegi n'abebembezi nikikuru munonga omukureetaho embeera nungi omu mashomero. Abeebembezi b'abeegi nibabaasa kukora omurimo muhango omukureetaho okuhanuura.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the market trends and potential future developments, the experts recommended a cautious approach. The couple listened intently as the financial advisor outlined the risks associated with selling at this time.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza enkulaakulana y'akatale n'eyinza okubaawo mu biseera eby'omu maaso, abakugu baakubiriza enkola ey'obwegendereza. Abafumbo baawuliriza n'obwegendereza ng'omuwi w'amagezi ku by'ensimbi annyonnyola akabi akali mu kutunda mu kiseera kino.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo ki diro jami matye katime I cuk ki jami ma twero time I kare me anyim, ludiro guwaco ni omyero wagwokke. Lunyom ne guwinyo ki cwinygi ducu I kare ma lamii tam I kom lim otito peko matye ka bino macalo adwogi me cato jami I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuka esokoni keda epone loepedoriata kesi apoloun koingaren, apotu ipirioitin kicorakisi aitwasam ejok. Apotu ekiliokit ngol keda akeberu kopuputu noi nealamikinit ecoran lo ikapun atiokisio nu agwelanar kotoma apak kana.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, several members expressed concerns about the security of our property. In light of these discussions, the chairman requested us to register our land.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, bammemba abawerako baalaga obweraliikirivu ku by'okwerinda kw'ebintu byaffe. Okusinziira ku kukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno, ssentebe yatusabye okuwandiisa ettaka lyaffe.

teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet, apotu imeban luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ayuwara naka iborokec. Katupitos ineresinei lu, abu apolon eicolong ilip iso aiwadika alupok wok.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo agei tema afa amavile 'diyi niri ma dria. E'yo onzeza 'diyi ma e'yosi, ogua e'i ai ama ama ma nyaku ma ru osizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, ba memba baingi bakoreka okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda kw'ebintu byaitu. Ahabw'okuhanuura oku, mukuru w'entebe akatushaba ngu tuhandiike eitaka ryaitu.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ennyo n'okulowooza ku bintu eby'enjawulo, akakiiko keesanga mu kattu. Wadde nga waaliwo emiganyulo, kyabazibuwalira okukkaanya ku biseera by'ekibanja eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki tam matut I kom jami mapat-pat ma kimiyo, dul ne gunongo ni pe gitwero timo gin mo. Kadi bed ni gunongo magoba mapol, gin onongo tek tutwal me winye i kom anyim pa jami ne.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and saving, they finally achieved their dream of purchasing property in Uganda's capital. The couple was excited to start a new chapter in their lives.

eng_prompt: The community has come together to address the lack of educational facilities in the area. With a shared vision for the future, they are organizing various events to gather support and resources.

ach_prompt: Lwak guribe kacel me tyeko peko me nok pa jami kwan I kabedo eni. Ki neno acel pi anyim, gitye ka yubu yub mapat-pat me nongo kony ki jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga imorikikinos kanu aitemokin amamus na isomeroi katutubet. Keda aomisioit adiope kanu oingaren, eutasi kesi aitemonokin iboro luegelegela kanu aituk agangat keda iboro.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect and decay, the city council finally decided it was time for a change. The community had long awaited the revitalization of the area, and the first step was to clear the space.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'okulagajjalirwa n'okuvunda, akakiiko k'ekibuga kasembye okusalawo nti kye kiseera wabeewo enkyukakyuka. Ekitundu kyali kilindiridde ebbanga ddene okuzzaawo ekitundu, era omutendera ogwasooka gwali gwa kugogola kifo.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me cayo ki bale pa jami, kancil me boma madit dong omoko tamgi ni kare dong oromo me kelo aloka loka. Lwak gubedo kakuru roco kabedo eni pi kare malac dok yoo me acel obedo tyeko kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka apalunit ka aibiror, abu ekansulo loka eibuga kitutub ebe erai apak naka aijulakin. Auta itunga aidar apak naepol noi kanu aisiteteun aiboisit ngin, ido aswam nasodit arai aitemokin aiboisit ngin.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani adizu azini e'dezu 'bori ma vutia, kanisulu aku ambu cityniri asizu asizu kini sawa 'di ojata ni. Ongulumu 'da te angu 'da ma edeta sa'wa ezu, dika e'yo okori lezu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ofuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura n'okuvunda, akakiiko k'orurembo kakaheza kusharaho ngu n'obwire bw'empinduka. Abantu bakaba batwire nibategyereza okugarurwa busya kw'ekyanga kandi omutendera gw'okubanza gukaba guri ogw'okutereeza omwanya.

eng_prompt: Despite being surrounded by traditions and customs, her actions often disregard the values that the community holds dear. Many have noticed her dismissive attitude towards the rituals that define their way of life.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yeetooloddwa eby'obuwangwa n'obulombolombo, ebikolwa bye tebitera kufaayo ku mpisa abantu ze batwala nga za muwendo. Bangi balabye engeri gy'anyoomaamu obulombolombo obufuga obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en orumuwa ki tekwaro ki tekwaro, tim megge ipol kare pe lubu cik ma lwak maro. Dano mapol guneno kit ma en cayo kwede tekwaro gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda inonosio keda inonosio luipu, etapit aswamisiokec apalunit iponesio lukajokak luka itunga. Apotu itunga luipu kowanyutu eipone lo mam ngesi epodokinit inonosio lu itodunitos epone loka aijarakec.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro aa'zu e'yo a'bini azini e'yo a'bini 'diyi ma kalasi ra ti, e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi tuni e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria ku. Ba karakara eyi esu e'yo erini e'yo 'yeta eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria ku ri ra.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe ayehinguririize eby'obuhangwa n'emigyenzo, ebikorwa bye tibirikuhikaana n'emitwarize y'abantu abu arikutuura nabo. Baingi bareebire emicwe ye y'okushoreka ekitiinisa aha migyenzo erikukwata aha mitwarize yaabo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent changes in school policies, it is important for families to ensure their children are attending classes regularly. Experts emphasize the significance of consistent school attendance for a child's academic success.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nkyukakyuka ezaakakolebwa mu mateeka g'essomero, kikulu nnyo amaka okukakasa nti abaana baago bagenda mu bibiina buli lunaku. Abakugu bakkaatiriza omugaso gw'abaana okugenda mu ssomero buli kiseera okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki aloka-loka ma otime cokcok-ki I cik me gang kwan, pire tek tutwal ki gangi me neno ni lutino gi tye I gang kwan kare ki kare. Ludiro giwaco ni pire tek tutwal ni lutino omyero gubed igangkwan kare ki kare pi cobo miti gi i gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aijulanakineta nueyapiete pac kotoma ainapeta nuka esomero, ejokuka nuka ikalia awanyun ebe elosete idwekec atukono duc. Apotu ipirioitin kitogogongoto ajokis naka esomero kanu akerianut naka idwe kotoma asiomanikec.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru familia eyini nezu ra kini anzi eyivile 'diyi mu kilasi eyi ma alea sa'wa driasi. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi 'ba okpo orodri anzi eyini muzu sukulua sa'wa driasi ri ma dria eyini ani ecozu drile suza sukulu'a ri esuzu.

eng_prompt: The community gathered to pay their respects, sharing stories of his kindness and dedication. After a heartfelt memorial service, they laid him to rest in the churchyard he loved so dearly.
lug_prompt: Abantu baakuŋŋaana okumujjukira n'okumubuulira ku kisa kye n'obumalirivu bwe. Oluvannyuma lw'okumuziika, baamuziika mu lujja lw'ekkanisa gye yali ayagala ennyo.
ach_prompt: Lwak gugure me miyo pwocgi, nywako lok kom kica ki tic matek ma en otimo. Ingee lega me kwero too ne, kiyike I gang lega ma en maro adada.

eng_prompt: We have been eagerly awaiting news about the upcoming announcement. It has just been confirmed that the president will address us tomorrow.

eng_prompt: I was just looking through my contacts and realized that we’ve only communicated online. It’s funny how we can share so much without ever being in the same room.

lgg_prompt: Ari de lu ma vile 'ba e'yo nzepi 'diyi ma ale andri azini ma ega kini ama lu e'yo nze geri oli aliasiri'i. Eri ndrizaru geri amani ecozu afa eyi awazu saaru aa'zu jo ale alu ma alea kokoru ri.

lgg_prompt: Ani ra kini ama econi ndra ama ma eselea oku ku. Eri ndrizaru geri amani ecozu aa'zu tualu te aa'zu 'ba 'bani nile ku 'diyi ru.

eng_prompt: Following a series of violent altercations in the downtown area, law enforcement launched an investigation. As a result of their efforts, some men were arrested today.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'obutabanguko obw'omuddiring'anwa mu kibuga wakati, abakuumaddembe baatandika okunoonyereza. Olw'okufuba kwabwe, abasajja abamu baakwatiddwa leero.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy trial filled with compelling evidence and witness testimonies, the prosecution presented a strong case against the defendants. The jury deliberated for several days before reaching their verdict.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira omusango okumala ebbanga eddene nga mulimu obujulizi obw'amaanyi n'obujulizi bw'abajulizi, oludda oluwaabi lwawa abawawabirwa omusango ogw'amaanyi. Abalamuzi baakubaganya ebirowoozo okumala ennaku eziwera nga tebannatuuka ku nsala yaabwe.

lgg_prompt: E'yo liza 'bori ma vutia, afa ecetaru azini 'ba sadiniru 'diyi pie, 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi eji kesi okporu 'ba 'bani to 'diyi ma rua. Ba e'yo lipi 'diyi 'du e'yo eyi ma dria o'du karakara eyi ma alea de nga po'di eyi awini e'yo li ku.

eng_prompt: After witnessing the suspicious activity in their neighborhood, the concerned residents gathered to discuss their observations. Realizing the potential danger, they decided it was time to take action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba ebikolwa ebiteeberezebwa mu kitundu kyabwe, abatuuze abakwatibwako baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bye baalaba. Bwe baamanya akabi akayinza okubaawo, baasalawo nti kye kiseera okubaako kye bakolawo.

nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okureeba ebikorwa ebitarikwetegyerezibwa omu kicweka kyabo, abatuuragye baketeerana kuhanuura aha bi bareebire. Ahabw'okumanya akabi akarikubaasa kubaho, bakasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okukora.

eng_prompt: I had heard so much about him from our mutual friends, and I was both excited and nervous about finally making his acquaintance. After weeks of anticipation, the moment had finally arrived.
lug_prompt: Nali mmuwuliddeko nnyo okuva mu mikwano gyaffe egy'awamu, era nnali musanyufu era nga ntya okusisinkana naye. Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga tulindirira, ekiseera kyali kituuse.

teo_prompt: Apupunit eong nuipu nuikamunitos ngesi kanejaas ipaperokosi, ido ajai eong aiyalama keda aiyalongong kanu airiamun keda ngesi. Akaulo naka isabitin lu eomitai ebe ebuni ngin atakanun.
lgg_prompt: Ma eri de eri ma dria e'yo karakara engazu ama ma agyipi tualu 'diyi vu, azini ma ovu ndra ayikosi azini asi otiza be e'yo eri nizu asizu ra ri ma dria. Sabiti 'bani te 'bori ma vutia, sawa 'da eca asizu ra.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the concerns raised by the team, we determined that the matter required higher-level attention. Consequently, we forwarded the issue to the district heads.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya okweraliikirira okwaleetebwa ttiimu, twasalawo nti ensonga yeetaaga okutunulwamu ku mutendera ogw'oku ntikko. N'ekyavaamu, ensonga twagiweereza eri abakulembeze ba disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo peko ma dul ne okelo, wamoko ni omyero ki tii I kom lok eni I rwom mamalo. Macalo adwogi ne, wacwalo lok eni bot ludito me district.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aiyalongongosi naka etimu, apotu sio ajenutu ebe ibusakinit aitemokin akirot ngin. Kanuka ngun, apotu sio ejukasi akirot ngin mama ejaasi engarenok luka idisitriktan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza amuti 'da ni fe 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ama 'du egata kini le 'ba ma 'ba asi e'yo nde ma dria uruleru. E'yo 'disi, ama edri e'yo 'da drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma okwerarikirira okwaretsirwe tiimu, tukasharamu ngu enshonga egi neeyetenga okureebererwa aha rurengo rw'ahaiguru. N'ekyarugiremu, enshonga tukagyohereza aha bakuru ba disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation and gathering of evidence, law enforcement officials identified the individual linked to the recent string of burglaries. A warrant was issued, leading to the suspect's apprehension.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okukung'aanya obujulizi, abakwasisa amateeka baazuula omuntu alina akakwate ku bubbi obwaliwo gye buvuddeko. Ekiragiro kyafulumizibwa ekyaviirako omutemu okukwatibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut ki coko caden, lutic ma gwoko cik gunongo ngat matye ki kubbe ki tim me turu ot ma otime cokcok-ki. Kimiyo waraga me mako dano ma oweko kimako ngat ma byek me timo bal tye I kome.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi n'okurundaana obujurizi, abarikukwatisa ebiragiro bakareeba omuntu owabaire aine akakwate n'obwibi obwabaireho. Ekiragiro kikaheebwa, ekyarugiremu okukwatwa kw'omuntu owabaire nateekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro.

eng_prompt: After months of meticulous planning and gathering supplies, she finally saw her chance. The guards were distracted, and the night was dark and quiet, perfect for her daring escape.

eng_prompt: In an increasingly interconnected world, understanding and respecting diverse cultural perspectives is essential. Education and awareness can help bridge gaps and foster mutual respect among different communities.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eyeeyongera okukwatagana, okutegeera n'okussa ekitiibwa mu ndowooza z'obuwangwa ez'enjawulo kya mugaso. Ebyenjigiriza n'okumanyisa bisobola okuyamba okuziba ebituli n'okutumbula okussa ekitiibwa mu bantu ab'ebitundu eby'enjawulo.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and coordination, we finally gathered everyone together. The agenda was packed, and everyone was eager to discuss the upcoming project.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga tuteekateeka n'okukwatagana, kyaddaaki twakungaanya buli omu. Ebigobererwa byali bijjudde era buli omu yali ayagala nnyo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku pulojekiti ejja.

eng_prompt: With its stunning landscapes, diverse wildlife, and rich cultural heritage, Uganda offers a unique experience for travelers. As a result, the country has become a popular destination for adventure seekers and nature lovers alike.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebifo ebirabika obulungi, ebisolo by'omu nsiko eby'enjawulo, n'ebyobuwangwa eby'obugagga, Uganda ewa abatambuze ebintu eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, eggwanga lifuuse ekifo ekimanyiddwa ennyo eri abo abanoonya okulambula n'abaagazi b'obutonde.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburungi bw'ensi, enyamiishwa nyingi, hamwe n'ebyobuhangwa bingi, Uganda neehereza abarambuzi ebintu by'omutaano. N'ekyarugiremu,eihanga rihindukire omwanya gw'okushemererwamu abarikwenda kurambura hamwe n'abarikukunda eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: Natural landscapes and unique geological formations often draw visitors from around the world. These stunning physical features create a sense of wonder and adventure that captivates travelers.

lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia a'di 'dizu afa dria 'diyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu amavile 'diyi esu azakoma ra. Awa'difo be, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi fi atita fezu.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a significant rise in the number of people relocating to new countries in search of better opportunities. This trend is reshaping demographics and economies worldwide.

ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni wel dano matye ka kobo I lobo manyen me yenyo gum me tic tye ka medde tutwal. Man tye ka kelo aloka-loka I kom wel dano ki lim I wilobo lung.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic napac ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga lu elosete akwapin nuitetiak aimo arerengesio nuajokak. Euta epone lo aijulakin enaaba loka itunga keda ikapun kotoma akwap kere.

eng_prompt: The team gathered for a meeting to discuss upcoming professional development opportunities. After reviewing the schedule, they were informed about the workshop.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu yakungaanidde mu lukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mikisa gy'okukulaakulana mu by'ekikugu egijja. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enteekateeka, baategeezebwa ku musomo.

eng_prompt: After reviewing their monthly expenses, they realized that the water bills had been accumulating over the past few months. Determined to settle their debts, they paid for all the water bills.

eng_prompt: When visiting Uganda, one of the first things you notice is the warm and welcoming nature of the people. Their culture places a strong emphasis on community and kindness towards guests.
lug_prompt: Bw'ogenda mu Uganda, ekimu ku bintu by'osooka okwetegereza y'engeri y'abantu ey'ebbugumu era ey'okwaniriza. Obuwangwa bwabwe bussa nnyo essira ku kitundu n'ekisa eri abagenyi.
ach_prompt: Ka ilimo lobo Uganda, gin acel ma ineno me acel en aye kit ma dano tye ki yomcwiny dok gijole kwede. Tekwaro gi keto cwiny gi tutwal I kom lwak ki kica bot wele.
teo_prompt: Nepejokina ijo Uganda, idiopebore yenisodit ijo aanyun ngesi amuno naka itunga. Isinyikokit inonosio kec itunga keda asianut mama ejaasi ipejok.
lgg_prompt: Eka mu omuru kari Uganda niri ma alea, e'yo alu mini ndre oko ri geri 'ba eyini aa'zu drizaru azini eyi ai'zu ri i. Eyi ma suruni okpo 'ba e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria tualu asi ndriza be omu eyini 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Ku orikutayayira Uganda, ekimwe ahabintu by'okubanza ebi orikureeba n'obufura n'okwakiira abantu. Eby'obuhangwa bwabo nibyongyera amaani omuby'obuhangwa hamwe n'embabazi aha bagyenyi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable shift in the engagement of young people within their communities. This newfound enthusiasm for civic involvement has led to a surge in youth participation in various organizations and initiatives.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo enkyukakyuka mu ngeri abavubuka gye beenyigiramu mu bitundu byabwe. Obwagazi buno obupya obw'okwenyigira mu by'obwannakyewa buviiriddeko okwongera kw'abavubuka okwetaba mu bitongole n'enteekateeka ez'enjawulo.

lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ojata e'dapi ra ri ebi ovu 'yeta 'ba ode eyini ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ma alea ci. Asi ꞌbaza ꞌbani esu oꞌdiru ꞌdi eꞌyo ꞌba oꞌbi yini ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdi fe ꞌba ode yini fizu amuti ndu ndu ꞌdiyi ma alia tu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, habaireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu kwejumba kw'eminyeeto omu byanga byabo. Omuhimbo gw'okwejumba omu by'obutegyeki ogutsya, gureesire okweyongyera kw'eminyeeto kwejumba omu bitongore ebitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: Despite their long friendship, recent conversations have left them feeling increasingly distant. Each believes the other has changed, leading to confusion and unspoken tension.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bamaze ebbanga ddene nga ba mukwano, emboozi gye buvuddeko yabalese nga beeyongedde okweyawula. Buli omu alowooza nti munne akyuse, ekireetawo okutabulwa n'obunkenke obutayogerekeka.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo lurem pi kare malac, lok ma obedo katimme cokcok-ki oweko gubedo mabor mada. Ngat acel-acel tamo ni lawote olokke, man kelo anywena-nywena ki lworo.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda epaperone loewoja noi, ineresinei lu pac ajalakisi kesi elwaka noi. Nginitunganan iyuunit ebe ejulakinos yenice, ido eyangauni aitolitol keda ingungeta lumam elimunitai.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemitem keda aitemonokin, abu erionget kitolot airiamunet ke naka ekaru kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok noi. Apotu imeban kotukokinos aicak abootin kanu aingarenikinio naka egurupu koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo onzezu azini otuta 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da 'ye mitingi eli vusi ri e'yo okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu. Memba eyi tra eyi voti 'bezu driceza amuti 'da ni ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okuhanuura hamwe n'okuteekateekyera,ekitongore kikakora orukiiko rwayo orw'omwaka, okukora aha nshonga z'amaani. Ba memba baketeerana kuteera akaruuru k'okwebembera guruupu omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In a society where every voice matters, it is essential to engage citizens in the decision-making process. Only through active participation can we ensure that our collective values and needs are truly represented.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu nga buli ddoboozi likulu, kya mugaso okwetabyamu bannansi mu nkola y'okusalawo. Nga twenyigiramu mu bujjuvu, tusobola okukakasa nti empisa n'ebyetaago byaffe eby'awamu bikiikirirwa mu butuufu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma dwon pa dano weng pire tek, pire tek tutwal me bedo tye ikare me moko tam. I yoo me bedo tye ki mit kom keken aye watwero neno ni jami ma wamito ki jami ma wamito kacel ki dano weng tye ka cung pigi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naepol noi akiro nuka itunga, ejokuna noi aimorikikin itunga kotoma ainapeta nuka aitolomun aseununeta. Kowai lo ajaut keda aswam ibusakinit oni awanyun ebe ebwoikitai ajokis keda ipudesia wok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'ba dria ma o'duko ni ovuzu orodriru ri ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba kari anzi 'diyi 'bazu e'yo peta pezu 'diyi ma alea indi. E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu 'yeta eyi ma alea okporu risi, ama eco ne ra kini 'ba pa tu e'yo amani lele 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu ahu eiraka ry'omuntu weena riri ery'omugasho, n'eky'omugasho kwejumba omunkora y'okusharamu. Nitwija kureeba ngu emitwarize yaitu hamwe n'ebyetengo byaitu byajwekyerwa kurabira omu kwejumbamu.

eng_prompt: I tried to engage with everyone and share some laughs, but instead, I was met with snide remarks and dismissive gestures. It was clear that they had no intention of including me in the fun.
lug_prompt: Nagezaako okukwatagana ne buli omu n'okuseka naye mu kifo ky'ekyo, nnasisinkana ebigambo ebinyooma n'obubonero obw'okunyooma. Kyali kyeyoleka bulungi nti tebaalina kigendererwa kya kunteekamu mu ssanyu.
ach_prompt: Atemo winye ki dano weng ki nyero kwedgi, ento me kaka meno, dano mapol gubedo ka lok marac i koma. Onen atyer kamaleng ni pe gubedo ki miti me lwonga I galowang ne.
teo_prompt: Abu eong atamit aiswamanar keda itunga kere kosodi aimor keda eong, konye konye aponi kitoronai eong keda akiro nuarokok. Acai cut ebe emamete kesi keda apeleikinet naka aimorikikin eong toma aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Ma o'bi e'yo o'yozu 'ba dria be azini ma o'ba o'dukosi, te pari 'di ma alia, 'ba fu dri e'yo onzi azini e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi be. Eri ndra e'da kililiru kini yi ma asi 'baza ma 'bazu ayiko nde ma alia yo.
nyn_prompt: Nkagyezaho kukorengana na buri omwe n'okushekyerera hamwe, kwonka omu mwanya gw'ekyo, nkashangwa n'ebigambo by'okushekyerera hamwe n'ebikorwa by'okushekyerera. Kikaba nikyoreka butunu ngu bakaba batiine kigyendererwa ky'okunyeta omu by'okushemererwa.

eng_prompt: In the midst of our heated discussion, the facilitator reminded us of the importance of maintaining a positive atmosphere. With tensions rising, they emphasized the need for understanding and cooperation among all participants.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kwaffe okw'amaanyi, omukubiriza yatujjukizza obukulu bw'okukuuma embeera ennungi. Olw'obunkenke okweyongera, bakkaatiriza obwetaavu bw'okutegeeragana n'okukwatagana mu bonna abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka lok matek tutwal, lapwony ne opoyo wiwa I kom ber pa bedo ki cwiny maber. I kare ma telle tye ka medde, guwaco ni mite ni dano weng omyero guniang dok gutii kacelo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitolot akiro kosi, abu eyaiton isiitik sio ajokis naka ajaut keda ejautene loajokan. Keda aiyatakin naka ingungeta, apotu kesi kitogogongoto eipud loka amisiikin keda aiswamanara kanejaas itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza amavileri ma agadria, 'ba e'yo 'yepiri ega amani orodri aa'zu e'yo muke be ri ma dria ra. Erita ako ni tuzu uru risi, eyi 'ba asi e'yo vata ni azini ti icita ni 'diyi ma dria 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugaaniira kwaitu okw'amaani, omwebembezi akatwijutsya omugasho gw'okuguma twine emiteekateekyere mirungi. Ahabw'obunkenke obweyongyeire, bakahamya ekyetengo ky'okwetegyerezana n'okukwatanisa omu bantu boona.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for our services, the company decided to expand its workforce. To ensure a smooth transition, a comprehensive hiring plan was developed.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'obuweereza bwaffe obweyongera, kampuni yasalawo okugaziya abakozi baayo. Okusobola okulaba ng'enkyukakyuka egenda bulungi, enteekateeka y'okupangisa yakolebwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutic wa, dul ne omoko tamgi me medo wel luticgi. Me neno ni aloka-loka eni otimme maber, kiyubu yub me pango jami weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin eipud loka aijaanakinio wok, abu ekampuni kitogogong eswamakake. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna aijulanakineta, aponi kitolomunai ainapeta nuka aipagisa.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu 'ba eyini amavile azi ngazu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, amuti 'da 'du e'yo 'ba eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma kalafe otuzu. E'yo ojaza ni aa'zu ewakokoru ri nezu, 'ba e'do otita 'bani 'ba eyi ofezu 'diyi ma dria dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bwaitu obweyongyeire, kampuni ekasharamu kwongyera aha bakozi baayo. Okureeba ngu habaho empindahinduka nungi, enteekateeka y'okupangisa abantu ekakorwaho.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation revealed their unethical practices, the company decided to take immediate action. As a result, the corrupt workers were stopped from working.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu okwazuula ebikolwa byabwe ebitali bya mpisa, kampuni yasalawo okubaako ky'ekolawo mu bwangu. N'ekyavaamu, abakozi abalya enguzi bayimirizibwa okukola.
ach_prompt: Inge timo kwed matut ma onyutu timgi ma pe ber, dul ne omoko tamgi me timo gin mo cut. Macalo adwogi ne, kijuko tic pa lucamcana.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok abu kitodu iponesiokec lumam ejokuka, abu ekampuni koseu aswam katipet. Kanuka ngun, aponi itapalarai eswamak lu ekorapusion kotoma aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza kililiru ri ma vutia, e'da 'yeta yini onzi 'diyi, amuti 'da 'du e'yo 'yezu indikindi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba oga azi'ba anyamgbolo ru 'diyi ma ti azi ngaza si ci.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi, kampuni ekareetaho enkora etari y'emitwarize mirungi. Ekyarugiremu, abakozi abashomankuzi bakazibirwa kukora.

eng_prompt: In our community, everyone is treated with respect and kindness, regardless of their background. We pride ourselves on fostering an inclusive environment where differences are celebrated.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyaffe, buli muntu ayisibwa n'ekitiibwa n'ekisa, awatali kufaayo ku nsi gy'ava. Twenyumiriza mu kukuza embeera erimu abantu bonna nga enjawulo ezijjaguzibwa.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa, dano weng kitero gi ki woro ki kica, labongo paro pi kabedo gi. Watye ki awaka I kom dongo kabedo ma dano weng tye iye kama dano ma pat pat gikwero iye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, eyaitai nginitunganan keda ayongit ka asianut, araida epone loelomunit ngesi. Ibusakinit sio aiyalama kanu aitopolorite ejautene loejok noi lo inumunumere iponesio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ma alea, 'ba 'ba dria eyi 'ye inzita si azini asi ndriza si, geri eyini engazu 'diyi ma talasi. Ama ama ma ngulupi ovu afusi angu 'ba dria ma eselea 'bani e'yo ndundu 'diyi inzizu ri ma e'yo si.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyanga kyaitu, buri omwe naatwarwa n'ekitiinisa n'embabazi, oihiremu oburugo bwe. Nitwetunguura ahabw'okureetaho embeera erimu abantu boona, ahu okwebaganisamu kurikujaguzibwa.

eng_prompt: After weeks of preparation and tailoring my resume, I finally submitted my job application. I felt confident that my skills matched the position perfectly.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwerako nga nneetegekera n'okutunga ebikwata ku bulamu bwange, nnasembayo okuwaayo foomu yange ey'okusaba omulimu. Nawulira nga nkakasa nti obukugu bwange bukwatagana bulungi n'ekifo.
ach_prompt: I nge cabit mapol me yube ki yubo karatac ma nyutu kit ma kwo na obedo kwede, agiki ne acwalo waraga na me penyo tic. Abedo ki tek cwiny ni diro na orwatte ki tic ne maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitemonokin ka aitemonokin akiroka nuka aijar, abu eong aijukar alipan ka naka aswam. Aomit eong ebe ejokuna noi acoa ka keda adoketait kangin.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia otuta 'yezu azini ma vile kokobi azi ngazu ri edezu 'bori ma vutia, asizu ma fe ma vile waraga azi zizuri ra. Ma etumu asi'baza be kini ma vile ondua yi eci pari 'da be kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi nz'okutebeekanisa n'okukora ebihandiiko byangye ebirikukwata aha magara gangye, nkaheza kuheerezayo okushaba kwangye okw'omurimo. Nkaba nyine obwesigye ngu emyoga yangye ekaba neehikaana n'omwanya.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing population and changing demographics, local officials held a series of meetings to discuss potential adjustments to the administrative boundaries. After thorough deliberation, they decided to implement changes to better serve the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera n'okukyuka kw'omuwendo gw'abantu, abakungu b'ebyalo baatuuza enkiiko eziwerako okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkyukakyuka eziyinza okukolebwa mu nsalo z'obukulembeze. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, baasalawo okussa mu nkola enkyukakyuka okusobola okuweereza obulungi ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano ki lok pa wel dano, lutic me tedero gubedo ki kacoke mapol me nywako lok I kom aloka loka matwero bedo tye I wang lobo pa gamente. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tamgi me kelo aloka-loka wek gutii maber pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga keda aijulanakineta nuka itunga, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kiswamata airiamununeta nuipu kanu aitemitem aijulanakineta kotoma oikoruon luka apugan. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, apotu kesi koseutu aitolomun aijulanakineta kanu aijanakin itunga ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu o'bi eyi ma kalafe ni i ojazu ri be, azi'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi karakara eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ojata eyini eco 'ye boda eyi ma alea ra 'diyi ma dria. Eyi ega e'yo eyi ma dria kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eyi ai ojata eyi 'yezu azi ngazu o'bi eyidri kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu hamwe n'empindahinduka y'omuhendo gw'abantu, abakungu b'ebyaro bakakora enkiiko nyingi kuhanuura aha mpindahinduka ezirikubaasa kubaho omu nsharo z'obwebembezi. Bwanyima y'okuteesa munonga, bakasharamu kutaho empindahinduka kwenda kuheereza gye abantu.

eng_prompt: The company had received numerous applications for the open positions. After careful review, the hiring team decided to move forward with the most promising candidates.
lug_prompt: Kampuni yali efunye okusaba kungi ku bifo ebikalu. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza, ttiimu y'abapangisa yasalawo okugenda mu maaso n'abo abasinga okusuubiza.
ach_prompt: Dul ne onongo waraga mapol me penyo pi dog tic matye. Ingee ngiyo ki diro, joo ma onongo tye ka coyo lutic gumoko tamgi me mede anyim ki joo ma onongo gitye ki gen.
teo_prompt: Abu ekampuni kodum aiwadikaeta nuipu kanu aiboisio nuejaas. Akaulo naka airereonor ejok, apotu etimu loka itunga luitolomete itunga koseutu ainyikokin keda ngul luejaasi keda amuno naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da esu waraga karakara eyi azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo eti ondazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, 'ba azi 'dupi 'diyi asi 'du e'yo muzu drile 'ba ecopi e'yo 'yepi onyiru tu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni ekaba etungire okushaba kw'emirimo kwingi. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza, tiimu y'abapangisa ekasharamu kugyenda omu maisho n'abo abaabaire nibaraganisa.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and securing funding, the city officials finally approved the project. The community had long awaited a solution to the traffic congestion caused by the aging infrastructure.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okufuna ensimbi, abakungu b'ekibuga kyaddaaki bakkirizza pulojekiti. Ekitundu kyali kilindiridde okumala ebbanga ddene eky'okugonjoola omugotteko gw'ebidduka ogwaleetebwa ebintu ebikozesebwa ebyakaddiwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki nongo cente, lutic me boma madit omoko yub eni. Lwak gubedo kakuru pi kare malac me nongo yoo me tyeko peko me mutoka ma obedo tye macalo adwogi me tic ki jami ma otii.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka adumun ikapun, apotu eswamak luka esite kocamutu epurojekt. Auta itunga aidar adaun apak naepol kanu aitemokin eipues loka amotokan kanuka iboro luemojongito.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi 'yezu azini robia esuzu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba aku ambo 'da ma alea 'diyi ai asizu otita 'da ra. Ongulumu 'da te sa'wa ezu geri 'bani ecozu e'yo omita nzila dria 'diyi ma aza kozu e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ni aa'zu 'bori ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera n'okutunga esente, abakuru b'orurembo bakahendera baikiriza purogyekiti. Abantu bakaba batwire nibategyereza oburemeezi bw'ebiiruka obwaretsirweho ebyombeko ebikuru.

eng_prompt: Residents have expressed growing concerns about safety in the area. Recent incidents have heightened fears about the lack of adequate security measures.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze balaze obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku by'okwerinda mu kitundu. Ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko byongedde okutya olw'obutaba na bukuumi bumala.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gunyutu lworo madit tutwal I kom gwoko kuc I kabedo eni. Jami ma otimme cokcok-ki omedo lworo I kom bedo peke pa jami ma mite pi gwoko kuc.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ayuara na aiboisit. Akiro nuiswamasi pac iyatakisi akuriau na amamus na ayuwara naedolit.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo ageitema ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi otu orisi e'yo 'bani e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma ako ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye boorekire okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda omu kyanga. Ebyabaireho obwahati, byongyeire okwerarikirira ahabw'eibura ry'eby'okwerinda ebirikumara.

eng_prompt: I was curious about your work situation. Do you have a traditional job, or do you work for yourself?
lug_prompt: Njagala okumanya embeera gy'olimu ku mulimu.
ach_prompt: Abedo ki miti me ngeyo kit ma tic megi tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong ajenun nuikamunitos aswam kon.
lgg_prompt: Ma ndra ava be e'yo mini azi ngazuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nkaba niinyenda kumanya ebirikukwata aha mirimo yaawe.

eng_prompt: After months of mounting pressure and scrutiny from upper management, I knew my position was becoming increasingly untenable. Despite my efforts to address the concerns raised, the situation had reached a breaking point.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okunyigirizibwa n'okukeberebwa okuva mu bakulembeze ab'oku ntikko, nnali nkimanyi nti ekifo kyange kyali kigenda kyeyongera okuzibuwala. Wadde nga nnafuba okukola ku nsonga ezaaleetebwa, embeera yali etuuse ku ssa ery'okumenya.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me lyeto ki ngiyo kor tic ma aa ki bot ludito tic, aniang ni kabedo na tye ka doko tek tutwal. Kadi bed ni atute matek me cobo peko ma obedo tye, peko ne onongo dong oo kama rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka ainingosit keda aingic kanejaas eyaitene loapolon, ajeni eong ebe mam eong apedori aidar adoketaitika. Karaida atamit eong aitemokin atiokisio nuaponi kitodiarai, adolu ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia okpo tupi azini e'yo eti ondaza engazu driceza uruleruri vu 'bori ma vutia, ani ra kini pari mavileri eca curu'do ewaru. Ma ni tro ma o'bi e'yo asi otiza 'bani eji 'diyi ma aza kozu ra ti, e'yo 'da ca e'yo onzi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okunyigirizibwa n'okushwijumwa ab'obushoborozi ahaiguru, nkamanya ngu omwanya gwangye gukaba nigweyongyera kugumira. Oihireho okuteeraho kwangye kukora aha nshonga ezaagambirwe, embeera ekaba ehikire aha muheru.

eng_prompt: Every year, thousands of pilgrims embark on a journey to honor the memory of those who sacrificed their lives for their faith. The vibrant atmosphere and deep spiritual significance draw visitors from near and far.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, enkumi n'enkumi z'abalamazi batandika olugendo okujjukira abo abaawaayo obulamu bwabwe olw'enzikiriza yaabwe. Embeera ennungi n'obukulu bw'eby'omwoyo bisikiriza abagenyi okuva kumpi n'ewala.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, lulim kabedo pa lubanga mapol gicito ka woro jo ma guto pi niye gi. Kabedo ne ma opong ki yom-cwiny kacel ki lok ma pire tek tutwal I lok me cwiny kelo wele ma aa ki I kabedo ma cok ki mabor.
teo_prompt: Kangolikaru, elosenenete ipejok ilukumin aiitun ngul luapotu kotwakiasi aijarakec kanuka aiyuunikec. Erai aiboisit naejok noi keda apolou naepol noi naepedori ayangaun ipejok kotoma aiboisio nueyapiete keda nuelwaka.
lgg_prompt: Eli vusi, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma alifu yi aci inzita fezu 'ba yi ma idri owipi a'ita yini ma e'yosi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Angu ndrizaru tu azini e'yo okporu e'yo Munguniri ma dria 'diyi omu eyi eji engazu angu ogogo 'diyi ma alea tualu angu re ru 'diyi ma alea tualu angu re ru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka, enkumi n'enkumi z'abaramagi nibatandika orugyendo rw'okwijuka abo abaheireyo amagara gaabo ahabw'okwikiriza kwabo. Embeera nungi hamwe n'omugasho gw'eby'omwoyo nigureeta abagyenyi kuruga haihi na hare.

eng_prompt: In times of division and uncertainty, it's crucial for us to come together as a community. Our strength lies in our ability to respect and understand one another, regardless of our differing beliefs.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'enjawukana n'obutali bukakafu, kya mugaso nnyo gye tuli okujja awamu ng'ekitundu. Amaanyi gaffe gali mu busobozi bwaffe okussa ekitiibwa n'okutegeeragana, awatali kufaayo ku nzikiriza zaffe ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare me apoka-poka ki peko, pire tek tutwal ni waribe macalo lwak. Tek cwiny wa tye I kero wa me woro ki niang I kom luwotwa, labongo paro pi jami ma watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Apakio nu atiakatiaka keda amamus ajenanut, ejokuna oni aimorikikin kwape itunga. Agogongu wok ejai kotoma apedoriwok naka ayongite ka amisikin yenice, araida egelegela iyuunito wok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ti ecita ako ni 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru amani emuzu tualu ongulumu ru. Okpo amani ri okpo amani ecozu inzita fezu azini ama ma eselea e'yo ama ma a'ita ndundu 'diyi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okwebaganisamu, n'eky'omugasho kwegaita hamwe nk'abantu. Amaani gaitu gari omu bushoboorozi bwaitu bw'okuheerezana ekitiinisa n'okwetegyerezana, oihireho enzikiriza zaitu ezitari zimwe.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing environment, communities are facing numerous challenges that require immediate attention. It is essential for those in leadership positions to actively engage with their constituents and address their needs effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, ebitundu byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi okwetaaga okufaayo amangu. Kya mugaso nnyo abo abali mu bifo by'obukulembeze okukolagana n'abantu baabwe n'okukola ku byetaago byabwe mu ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, lwak tye ka nongo peko mapol ma omyero ki tii iye oyot-oyot. Pire tek tutwal pi joo matye I tela me lok ki lubol kwir gi ki cobo miti gi maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka lolo lo ijulakina katipet, ejaas itunga keda atiokisio nuipu nu ekotosi aitemokin katipet. Erai ibore yenepol noi ngul luejaasi toma aiboisio nuka eingarenone aiswamanar keda itungakec kosodete aitemokin ipudesia kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: Angu ewu andruri ma alea ojata mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu eyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu eyini ani eyi ma aza kozu mbeleru. Eri orodriru 'ba pari driceza ni ma alia 'diyi ni e'yo nzezu 'ba angu yini opi nyazani 'diyi pie dika eyi ma aza kozu geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'empindahinduka y'amaani, abantu nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi oburikwetenga okukorwaho ahonaaho. N'eky'omugasho abo abari omu myanya y'obwebembezi kukorengana n'abantu abu barikujwekyera n'okukora ahabyetaago byabo kurungi.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it becomes increasingly important for leaders to set aside their differences. Collaboration among various political factions is essential to address the pressing issues facing the nation.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kyeyongera okuba eky'omugaso eri abakulembeze okulekawo enjawukana zaabwe. Enkolagana wakati w'ebiwayi by'ebyobufuzi eby'enjawulo ya mugaso mu kugonjoola ebizibu eby'amangu eggwanga bye lyolekaganye nabyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal ki lutela me weko apoka-poka meggi. Ribbe ikin dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko mapigi tego ma lobo man tye iye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko, erai ibore yenepol noi engarenok aibiror atiakatiaka kec. Aimorikikina kiding ipatei luegelegela erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok nu ejaas akwap.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, eri eca orodriru tu drice'ba eyini eyi ma esele coza 'diyi kuzu kalaa. Ti ecita amuti politiki ni ndundu 'diyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru e'yo okporu kari ni esu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho abebembezi okureka entaaniso zaabo aha rubaju. Enkoragana ahagati y'ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebitarikushushana n'ey'omugasho omu kukora aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa eihanga.

eng_prompt: To maintain high standards and accountability in public services, it is essential to implement consistent oversight measures. This oversight helps identify areas for improvement and ensures that resources are being used effectively.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma omutindo ogwa waggulu n'embalirira mu buweereza bwa gavumenti, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enkola z'okulondoola entakera. Okulondoola kuno kuyamba okuzuula ebifo eby'okulongoosaamu n'okukakasa nti eby'obugagga bikozesebwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko rwom me rwom ma malo ki kor tic pa gamente, pire tek tutwal me keto yub me doro tic I tic kare ki kare. Yub me ngiyo tic eni konyo me niang kama omyero kitim iye aloka-loka ki bene neno ni kitiyo ki lim maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar adoketait naepol noi keda aitodunit eipone lo itwasamaere apugan, ejokuna aitegear ainapeta nuka aimaniman. Ingarakinit aanyanar ngin ajenun aiboisio nuibusakinit aitojokar ka awanyun ebe itwasamao iboro ejok.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru 'bani e'yo eyi ma pamvu onezu sa'wa driasi. Azi pamvu oneza 'di ni azakoma fe angu 'bani ecozu otuzu ra 'diyi ma e'dazu dika eri ne ra kini 'ba afa ayuzaru 'diyi ayu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'omutindo gw'ahaiguru hamwe n'embaririra omu buheereza bwa gavumenti, n'eky'omugasho okutaho engyenderwaho y'okureebuuza buri kaire. Okucondooza nikuhwera omu kumanya emyanya y'okutereezaho n'okureeba ngu eby'obugaiga nibikozesibwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it is essential for all political parties to prioritize the needs of the citizens. Collaborative efforts can lead to more effective solutions and improved outcomes for the community.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kyetaagisa ebibiina by'obufuzi byonna okukulembeza ebyetaago bya bannansi. Kaweefube w'okukolera awamu asobola okuvaamu eby'okugonjoola ebisingawo obulungi n'ebirungi ebivaamu eri ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal pi dul me cungu iwi bye weng me keto miti pa anywali gi obed mukwongo. Tic kacelo twero kelo yoo me cobo peko ki dongo lobo pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiokisio, ejok ipatei kere aisingarenit ipudesia luka itunga. Aswam na aimorikikina epedori ayangaun aitemokineta nuajokak ka aitojokar eswamae lo itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, eri orodriru amuti dria politiki ni 'diyini e'yo kari anzi eyini le 'diyi 'duzu okporu. E'yo ti icita ni 'diyi eco fe e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kililiru dika eyi ma agata ma omgbo otu ongulumu eyini ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, ni kikuru ebibiina by'obutegyeki byona kwebembeza ebyetengo by'abantu. Enkora y'okukorera hamwe neebaasa kureetaho oburyo burungi bw'okutereeza ebyaro.

eng_prompt: In political landscapes, incumbents often enjoy advantages that challengers do not. This can lead to a strong likelihood of re-election.
lug_prompt: Mu byobufuzi, abo abali mu buyinza batera okuba n'enkizo ku abo abavuganya. Kino kiyinza okuviirako okuddamu okulondebwa.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me cungu iwi bye, joo matye iwi ker ipol kare gi nongo ber pa joo matye ka pyem kwedgi. Man twero kelo gum madit tutwal me nongo yer odoco.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nuka epolitikis, itunga luejaasi toma apugan ejaasi keda iboro luipu luepedorete kesi aswam. Epedori ngin ayangaun arereng naka aseo bobo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea, 'ba opi dria 'diyi tutuni drileba esu 'ba ageti otipi 'diyi vu ku. Diri eco fe 'bani ecozu opeta eyi 'yezu dika ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, abari omu butegyeki buriijo nibatunga obuhwezi obu abarikuhakanisa batarikutunga. Eki nikibaasa kureetaho oburemeezi bw'okugaruka kuteerwa akaruuru.

eng_prompt: Effective communication and accountability are essential for the success of any initiative. To ensure that goals are being met, stakeholders must stay informed about ongoing efforts.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi n'embalirira bikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bw'enteekateeka yonna. Okusobola okukakasa nti ebiruubirirwa bituukirizibwa, abakwatibwako balina okumanyisibwa ku kaweefube agenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Nywako lok ki miyo kor tic maber obedo gin ma pire tek pi cobo miti pa dul mo keken. Me neno ni kitye ka cobo miti ne, dano weng omyero gubed ki ngec i kom jami matye katime.
teo_prompt: Einer loajokan ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun ejok kanu akerianut naka edio aswam. Kanu awanyun ebe itodolikinio alosikineta, ekot itunga aijen nu iswamasi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo azi ma drile suza ni. Lezu nezu ra kini e'yo 'bani le 'ye 'diyi ca ra, le 'ba dria e'yo 'yepi 'diyi ma ni e'yo dria e'yo 'bani le 'ye 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuhurizagana kurungi n'okuheereza embaririra n'eby'omugasho aha businguzi bw'ekigyendererwa kyona. Okureeba ngu ebigyendererwa nibihikiirizibwa, abu kirikukwataho bashemereire kuguma nibamanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Many politicians seek new alliances when they feel disillusioned with their current party. However, the challenges of adapting to a different political environment often lead to quick exits.
lug_prompt: Bannabyabufuzi bangi banoonya emikwano emipya bwe bawulira nga baweddemu amaanyi mu kibiina kyabwe. Newankubadde, okusoomoozebwa kw'okumanyiira embeera y'ebyobufuzi ey'enjawulo kutera okuviirako okufuluma amangu.
ach_prompt: Pol lucungu iwi bye yenyo lurem manyen kace cwinygi otur ki dul me cungu iwi bye gi matye kombedi. Kadi bed kumeno, peko me ngiyo ki kabedo me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat ipol kare kelo weko tic oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Eutasi ipolitisans luipu aimo ipatei luitetiak arai mam kesi epodokinitos epate lo ejaas kesi. Konye, atiokisio nuka acamanar keda aiboisio nuegelegela nuka epolitikis duc eyangaunete anyoun katipet.
lgg_prompt: Ba politiki ni karakara eyi amuti o'diru 'diyi nda eyini e'yo amuti eyini aa'zu curu'do 'diyi ma alea 'diyi esuzu ewaru 'bori ma vutia. Kani si, e'yo ewaru aa'zu angu politiki ni ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea ri ni fe 'ba eyini e'yo politiki ni 'diyi kuzu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'obutegyeki abingi nibasherura enkwatanisa ensya, kubarikuhwa amaani n'ekibiina kyabo ekiriho obwahati. Kwonka, oburemeezi bw'okumanya embeera y'eby'obutegyeki etari emwe, buriijo niburugwamu juba.

eng_prompt: In today's increasingly polarized society, the rise of group identities often overshadows common values. This phenomenon can lead to an "us versus them" mentality that undermines constructive dialogue.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino abeeyongedde okweyawulayawulamu, okweyongerayongera kw'obumanyirivu bw'ebibinja emirundi egisinga kubikka ku mpisa ez'awamu. Kino kisobola okuleetera abantu okuba n'endowooza egamba nti "ffe tulwanyisa bo" ekiremesa abantu okuteesa obulungi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me kwo me kare-ni matye ki apoka-poka mapol tutwal, dongo pa dul mapat-pat ipol kare balo ber pa dano weng. Man twero weko dano bedo ki tam ni "wan watye ka lweny i komgi" ma weko lok pe bedo ber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo naepol atiakatiaka, apol naka ajenuneta nuka igurupun emunarete iponesio luka itunga kere. Epedori ngin ayangaun aomisioit naka "oni keda kesi" naepedori aitikitik aineranara naejok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea esele coza tupi tu ri ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ni tutuni e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo 'di eco fe 'ama tualu eyi pie' ma egata ecopi e'yo nzeza kililiru 'diyi ma aza kopi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba abarikweyongyera kwebaganisamu, okweyongyera kw'obumanyiso bw'abantu omu guruupu buriijo nikushiisha emitwarize ya boona. Enshonga egi neebaasa kureetaho enteekateeka y'okugamba ngu "itwe turikuhakanisa bo" ekirikuremesa okuganiira okw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In the pursuit of public service, one must often navigate complex challenges and difficult decisions. The weight of responsibility can be heavy, requiring a deep commitment to the greater good.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonya obuweereza bwa gavumenti, omuntu alina okutambula mu kusoomoozebwa okukaluba n'okusalawo okukaluba. Obuzito bw'obuvunaanyizibwa buyinza okuba obuzito, nga kyetaagisa okwewaayo okw'amaanyi eri ebirungi eby'awamu.
ach_prompt: I kare me tic pi lwak, omyero ngat moni okat I peko mapigi tego ki moko tam mapigi tego. Pek pa tic twero bedo pek tutwal, ma mito keto cwiny I kom ber pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijaanakin itunga, ibusakinit itunganan aitodolikin atiokisio nuetioko keda aseununeta nuetioko. Ationis na aswam epol noi, ekoto ainakina naepol kanu ajokis naepol.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza o'bi eyini ri ma alea, le 'ba alu alu ma fu e'yo ewaru azini peta ewaru 'diyi ma alea. Azi ma nziza eco ovu nzizaru, eri le asi feza okporu e'yo onyiru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuronda obuheereza bwa gavumenti, omuntu ashemereire kurabira omu buremeezi bw'amaani n'okucwamu kubi. Oburemeezi bw'obujunaanizibwa nibubaasa kuremera munonga, ekirikwetengyesa okwehayo munonga ahabw'ebirungi by'abantu boona.

eng_prompt: In a bid to strengthen his administration, the president seeks to surround himself with trusted supporters. This strategy not only consolidates power but also ensures loyalty within the government.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okunyweza obukulembeze bwe, pulezidenti anoonya okwetoloola n'abawagizi abeesigika. Akakodyo kano tekakoma ku kunyweza buyinza naye era kakakasa obwesigwa mu gavumenti.
ach_prompt: I miti ne me jingo tela mege, ladit lobo mito bedo ki lucwak ma gene. Yub man pe weko loc bedo matek keken ento bene weko dano bedo lugen I gamente.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong eyaitene ke, ekoto lokapolon akwap aimorikikin keda egangitok lu emunoi. Mam aitemonokineta nu itogogongitos apugan bon konye eyangauni amunokina kotoma apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini lezu okpo fezu driceza eriniri ma alia, prisdent le i ma ageyi 'ba asi'baza be 'diyi be. Otita 'di feni lu opi nyaza ma okpo ku te eri vini asi 'baza fe gamete ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera amaani omu bwebembezi bwe, omwebembezi w'eihanga naasherura abahagizi abarikwesigwa. Enkora egi terikwongyera aha butegyeki, kureka neeyongyera n'okureetaho obwesigwa omu gavumenti.

eng_prompt: As the job market continues to evolve, many young people are struggling to find stable employment. Investing in alternative education pathways could better prepare them for the demands of today's economy.
lug_prompt: Nga akatale k'emirimu bwe kakyagenda mu maaso n'okukyuka, abavubuka bangi balwana okufuna emirimu egy'olubeerera. Okusiga ensimbi mu by'enjigiriza ebirala kiyinza okubategekera obulungi ebyetaago by'ebyenfuna by'ennaku zino.
ach_prompt: I kare ma rwom me tic tye ka medde ameda, bulu mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo tic ma rii. Keto lim I gangi kwan mukene twero yubu lutino pi jami ma mite I tenge me lim I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Kwape euta esokoni loka aswamisinei aijulakin, eutasi atumunak luipu ainingosit adumun aswamisinei nuegogong. Aipikakin ikapun toma aiboisio ace nuka asioman epedori aitemonokin kes ejok kanuka ipudesia luka ikapun luka lolo.
lgg_prompt: Cu azi niri ni mu drile tuzu, 'ba ode karakara eyi dri ci azi aa'pi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi esuzu. Lonyi vuti aleza geri onita ni ndu ndu 'diyi ma alia ri ni nga eyi otu geri kililiru si e'yo robia esuzu ewu andruri ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu akatare k'emirimo nikagumizamu n'okutereera, eminyeeto baingi nibarwana kuronda emirimo y'obutuura. Okuta esente omu mishomo endiijo nikibaasa kubatebeekanisa kurungi ebyetengo by'entaasya y'erizooba.

eng_prompt: Many students in rural communities encounter significant challenges in accessing education. One of the most pressing issues they face is the need to travel long distances to reach their schools.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi mu byalo basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kufuna ebyenjigiriza. Ekimu ku bizibu eby'amangu bye basanga kwe kwetaaga okutambula engendo empanvu okutuuka ku masomero gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol I caro ginongo peko madit tutwal I nongo kwan. Peko acel madit tutwal ma ginongo en aye ni omyero guwot I bor piny me oo I gangi kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Esisiak luipu lukocaloi etereikina keda atiokisio nuipu kanu adumun asioman. Adiopet kotoma atiokisio nuepolok noi nuetereikina keda kesi ngesi alosit aiboisio nuelwaka kanu adolere osomeroikec.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu onita esuzu. E'yo azi okporu eyini esu ri eri lezu acizu angu ezuru 'diyi ma alea cazu sukulu eyivile 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi omu byaro, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kwega. Kimwe ahaburemeezi oburikukirayo obw'amaani obu barikutunga, n'okutambura engyendo ndaingwa kuhika aha mashomero gaabo.

eng_prompt: To support educational advancement and recognize academic excellence, the district has implemented a scholarship program. This initiative aims to provide financial assistance to deserving students pursuing higher education.
lug_prompt: Okuwagira enkulaakulana y'ebyenjigiriza n'okusiima abasomesa abalungi, disitulikiti etadde mu nkola enteekateeka ya sikaala. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa obuyambi bw'ensimbi eri abayizi abeetaaga okugenda mu matendekero aga waggulu.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me kwan ki miyo pwoc ki lutino kwan mabeco, district okatti ki yub me miyo gum me kwan nono. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo kony me lim ki lutino kwan ma omyero gukwan I rwom ma malo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aikeun apol naka asioman ka ajenun eswamae loajokan, etolomu edisitrikt ainapeta nuka asioman atitai. Alosikinet na erai ainakin agangat na ikapun mama ejaasi esisiak luepedorete alomar toma asioman na okwap.
lgg_prompt: Atita fezu onita ma omgbo otuzu dika 'ba onita ni onyiru 'diyi ma e'yo egazu, distrikiti 'ba otita atita onitani 'diyi 'yeta ma alia. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu azakoma robia niri fezu sukulu anzi orodriru onita uruleruri ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Okushagika entunguuka y'eby'obwegyese n'okusiima abeegi abarungi, disiturikiti etandikireho enteekateeka y'okushomera busha. Ekigyendererwa ky'ekitongore eki n'okuheereza obuhwezi bw'esente abeegi abarikwetenga kwega aha matendekyero agahaiguru.

eng_prompt: Investing in education is crucial for the development of underserved communities. To ensure that all children have access to quality learning environments, the government should prioritize funding for rural schools.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu by'enjigiriza kya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana y'ebitundu ebitalina buyambi. Okukakasa nti abaana bonna bafuna embeera z'okusomeramu ez'omutindo, gavumenti erina okukulembeza okuvujjirira amasomero g'omu byalo.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I gangi kwan pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo pa lwak ma pe ki kony ma oromo. Me neno ni lutino weng gunongo kwan maber, gamente omyero oket lim I gangi kwan me caro obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma asioman erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopol aiboisio nu mam ijanakino. Kanu awanyun ebe idwe kere edumunenete isomeroi lu ejokuka, ekot apugan aisingarenit agangat na ikapun mama ejaasi isomeroi luka ocaloi.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu onita ma alia ri eri orodriru angu 'bani azi ngazu ku 'diyi ezozu. Lezu nezu ra kini anzi nyiri dria eyi eco angu onita ni muke 'diyi esu ra, le gamete ma 'ba robia sukulu calo ru 'diyi dri oko.
nyn_prompt: Okutamu sente omu by'obwegyese n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura ebyanga ebitarikuheebwa obuheereza. Okureeba ngu abaana boona batunga eby'obwegyese birungi, gavumenti eshemereire kwebembeza esente z'amashomero g'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: Effective communication between families and educational institutions is essential for fostering a supportive learning environment. Collaboration can lead to better outcomes for students and strengthen the school community.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi wakati w'amaka n'amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza nkulu nnyo mu kutumbula embeera y'okusoma ennungi. Okukwatagana kusobola okuvaamu ebirungi eri abayizi n'okunyweza ekitundu ky'essomero.
ach_prompt: Lok maber ikin gangi ki gangi kwan pire tek tutwal pi dongo kabedo me kwan maber. Winye twero weko lutino kwan timo peny maber dok bene jingo gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Einer loajokan kiding ikalia keda isomeroi erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloria esomero. Epedori aiswamanara ayangaun eswamae loajokan kanuka esisiak ka aitogogong itunga lu osomero.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru familia eyi ma eselea sukulu eyi pie ri eri orodriru angu onita ni atita fezu ri ma omgbo otuzu. Ti ecita eco fe sukulu anzi eyini agata muke 'diyi esuzu tualu ongulumu sukulu eyini 'diyi ma okpo engazu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuhurizana kurungi ahagati y'amaka hamwe n'amatendekyero n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega. Okukwatanisa nikubaasa kureeta ebyarugamu birungi aha beegi n'okwongyera amaani omu bantu b'eishomero.

eng_prompt: Many students are currently facing financial barriers that prevent them from registering for important exams. To promote equal access to education, it is essential to address these challenges.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi mu kiseera kino basanga obuzibu mu by'ensimbi obubalemesa okwewandiisa okukola ebigezo ebikulu. Okutumbula obwenkanya mu kusoma, kya mugaso okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kuno.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol kombedi gitye ka nongo peko me lim ma gengo gi me coone pi timo peny ma pigi tego. Me medo rwom me nongo kwan marom, pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko magi.
teo_prompt: Ejaas kwana esisiak luipu keda ationis na ikapun na mam kesi epedorete aiwadikaun kanu aingito naepol. Kanu aitopolor adumunun na asioman, ejokuna aitemokin atiokisio nu.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi curu'do e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu eyini ani eyi ma ru sizu obeta okporu 'diyi 'yezu ku. Lezu 'ba eyi ma esu onita trotro ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abaingi obwahati baine oburemeezi bw'esente oburikubaremesa kwehandikisa kukora ebigyezo by'omugasho. Okureetaho oburingaaniza omu by'obwegyese, n'eky'omugasho kukora aha buremeezi obu.

eng_prompt: As the needs and expectations of students evolve, educational institutions must prioritize creating comfortable living environments. Upgrading outdated dormitory facilities can significantly enhance the overall student experience.
lug_prompt: Nga ebyetaago n'ebisuubirwa by'abayizi bikyuka, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza galina okukulembeza okutondawo embeera z'obulamu ennungi. Okutumbula ebizimbe by'ebisulo by'abayizi ebikadde kisobola okwongera ku bumanyirivu bw'abayizi okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti ki miti pa lutino kwan tye ka loke kwede, gangi kwan omyero guket cwiny gi i kom yubu kabedo maber me kwo pa lutino. Roco odi butu pa lutino kwan macon twero ilo malo rwom me kwan pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejulakinor ipudesia keda iboro lu ekotoi esisiak, ekot isomeroi aisingarenit aitolomun aiboisio nu ejokuka. Aiteteun isomeroi luemojongito epedori aitojokar aijar naka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sukulu anzi eyini le azini e'yo eyini ega 'diyi ni i ojazu risi, le sukulu eyi ma 'ba okpo angu eyini aa'zu muke 'diyi ma edeta ma dria. Afa sukulu anzi eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzuri eco sukulu anzi eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma edri otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyetengo n'ebi abeegi barikwetenga byahinduka, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese gashemereire kwebembeza okureetaho embeera nungi y'okutuuramu. Okutunguura ebyombeko by'okushutamaho ebikuru, nikibaasa kutunguura munonga emyoga y'abeegi.

eng_prompt: Achieving high standards in education requires a collaborative approach. Both parties must be committed to the learning process for success to flourish.
lug_prompt: Okutuuka ku mutindo ogwa waggulu mu byenjigiriza kyetaagisa enkola ey'omukago. Enjuyi zombi zirina okwewaayo eri enkola y'okuyiga okusobola okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Nongo rwom me kwan mamalo mito ribe. Dano weng omyero guket cwiny gi i kom yub me kwan eni wek gin weng owot maber.
teo_prompt: Adumunun adoketait naepol noi kotoma asioman ekoto aimorikikina. Ibusakinit itunga kere acamanar kanu aisisia kanu akerianut.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita ma omgbo otuzu ri le 'ba ma eci ti tualu. Le amuti iri 'diyi ma owi eyi e'yo onitani 'diyi ma alea drile suza ni zozu.
