nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese ogw'ahaiguru nikyetenga okukwatanisa. Enjuyi zoona zishemereire kwehayo omu kwega kugira ngu obusinguzi bukure.

eng_prompt: To enhance their students' understanding of the exam format and question types, educators frequently seek out effective study resources. One popular method involves utilizing previous years' examination papers.
lug_prompt: Okwongera ku kutegeera kw'abayizi baabwe ku nkola y'ebibuuzo n'ebika by'ebibuuzo, abasomesa batera okunoonya ebikozesebwa ebirungi mu kusoma. Engeri emu emanyiddwa ennyo kwe kukozesa empapula z'ebigezo ez'emyaka egiyise.
ach_prompt: Me medo niang pa lutino gi i kom kit ma peny tye kwede ki kwai lapeny, lupwonye ipol kare giyenyo jami ma konyo lutino me timo peny. Yoo acel ma oywek tutwal obedo tic ki karatac me peny ma okato.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar amisiikin na esisiak kec nuka ainapeta nuka aingito keda iponesio luka aingito, etapit isisianakinak aimo iboro lu isisiaete. Epone ediope loejenara noi ngesi aitwasam apapulai nuka aingito nuka okaru luatuboros.
lgg_prompt: Yi vile sukulu anzi 'diyi ma vata ma omgbo otuzu geri obeta eyini 'diyi ma dria, imba'ba eyi tutuni afa onita ni kililiru 'diyi nda. Geri 'bani lele tu 'diyi ma azi eri karatasi obeta eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura okwetegyereza kw'abeegi baabo aha nkora y'ebigyezo hamwe n'emiringo y'ebibuuzo, abegyesa nibakira kuronda eby'okukoresa omu kwega. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga, n'okukoresa empapura z'ebigyezo eby'emyaka ehwaire.

eng_prompt: As the job market continues to evolve, many young people are struggling to find stable employment after graduation. To address this issue, educational institutions must adapt their curricula to better prepare students for the workforce.
lug_prompt: Nga akatale k'emirimu bwe kakyagenda mu maaso n'okukyuka, abavubuka bangi balwana okufuna emirimu egy'olubeerera oluvannyuma lw'okutikkirwa. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza galina okukyusa ensoma yaago okusobola okutegeka obulungi abayizi ku lw'abakozi.
ach_prompt: Kit macalo cuk me tic tye kamede ki dongo, bulu mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo tic matye ingee tyeko kwangi me univaciti. Me tyeko peko man, gangi kwan omyero gulok yoo me pwonye gi wek oyub lutino pi tic.
teo_prompt: Kwape euta esokoni loka aswamisinei aijulakin, eutasi atumunak luipu ainingosit adumun aswamisinei nuegogong akaulo naka angetakin asioman. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, ekot isomeroi aijulakin aisisiaeta kec kanu aitemonokin esisiak kanu aswam.
lgg_prompt: Cu azi niri ni mu drile drile, 'ba ode karakara eyi dri ci azi aa'pi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi esuzu onita univasiti niri ma vutia. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, le sukulu eyi ma oja otita imbatani eyini 'diyi sukulu anzi eyi otuzu kililiru azi ngazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu akatare k'emirimo nikagumizamu nikakuratana, abantu baingi abato nibarwana kuronda emirimo y'obutuura bwanyima y'okuhendera emishomo yaabo. Okukora aha nshonga egi, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese gashemereire kuhindura engyenderwaho y'okwegyesa abeegi kugira ngu bateekateekye kurungi abakozi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals seek practical skills that can lead to immediate employment opportunities. One effective way to gain these skills is through informal education programs.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya obukugu obusobola okubasobozesa okufuna emirimu mu bwangu. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okufunamu obukugu buno kwe kuyita mu pulogulaamu z'okusoma ezitali za bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol giyenyo diro me tic cing ma weko gi nongo tic oyot oyot. Yo acel maber tutwal me nongo diro magi obedo I yub me kwan ma pe jenge I kom gamente.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete itunga luipu acoa na epedori ayangaun aswamisinei katipet. Epone ediope loajokan noi loka adumun acoa na ngesi aitolot ainapeta nuka aisisia.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ondua afa edele drisi 'diyini 'diyi nda eyini ani ecozu azi esuzu mbeleru. Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu ondua 'diyi esuzu ri geri onita azi ngazu ku 'diyi vusi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaronda emyoga erikubaasa kubareetera emirimo ahonaaho. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okutunga emyoga egi n'okuraba omu puroguraamu z'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In many communities, the influence of faith-based organizations extends beyond spiritual guidance, shaping social and political landscapes. As a result, the perspectives of religious figures often carry significant weight in local governance.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, obuyinza bw'ebitongole ebyesigamiziddwa ku nzikiriza busukka ku kulambika mu by'omwoyo, okutondawo embeera z'abantu n'ebyobufuzi. N'ekivuddemu, endowooza z'abakulembeze b'enzikiriza zitera okubeera ez'amaanyi mu bukulembeze bw'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, tela pa dul ma jenge i kom dini tye kama bor ki tela me cwiny, yubu kabedo me kwo pa dano ki cungu iwi bye. Macalo adwogi ne, tam pa lutela dini ipol kare bedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tela me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, epol apedor naka iriongeta lu ediini adepar aicoreta nuka edini, aitolomun ejautene loka itunga keda loka politikis. Kanuka ngun, aomisio nuka itunga lu ediini eraas nuepolok noi kotoma apugan naka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, okpo amuti e'yo aita ni 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria ri aga driceza e'yo aitanisi ri ra, e'yo o'bi eyi ma eselea azini e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma wura otuzu. E'yo 'disi, e'yo 'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ni 'diyi ma egata eyi okporu saaru e'yo driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi,ebitongore ebirikugyendera aha nyikiriza nibibaasa kukora ekirikukira aha buhabuzi bw'eby'omwoyo, n'okutereeza entuura y'abantu hamwe n'eby'obutegyeki. N'ekyarugiremu,ebiteekateeko by'abantu b'ediini nibitwara amaani omu bwebembezi bw'ebyaro.

eng_prompt: Many educational institutions rely on community support to enhance their facilities. As a result, they frequently organize events to raise money for various projects.
lug_prompt: Amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza mangi geesigama ku buyambi bw'ekitundu okutumbula ebizimbe byago. N'ekivuddemu, batera okutegeka emikolo okusonda ssente za pulojekiti ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Gangi kwan mapol gijenge I kom kony pa lwak me ilo malo rwom me gang kwan gi. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare giyubu yub me jogo cente pi yub mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Isomeroi luipu itwasamaete agangat na itunga kanu aitojokar aiboisio kec. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aitemonokin aswamisio kanu aituk ikapun kanuka ipurojektin luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Pari onitani karakara yi yi ati atita ongulumu yini 'diyi ma dria afa yini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni e'yo eyi otu robia trazu otita ndundu eyini.
nyn_prompt: Amatendekyero maingi g'eby'obwegyese nigeesiga obuhwezi bw'abantu b'omubyaro kutunguura ebyombeko byago. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kutebekanisa emikoro y'okurundaana esente za purogyekiti ezitari zimwe.

eng_prompt: Many parents seek educational environments that align with their values and beliefs. As a result, religious schools often emphasize character development alongside academic achievement.
lug_prompt: Abazadde bangi banoonya ebitundu by'okusomeramu ebikwatagana n'emitindo n'enzikiriza zaabwe. N'ekivuddemu, amasomero g'enzikiriza gatera okussa essira ku nkulaakulana y'empisa wamu n'okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu byensoma.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo mapol giyenyo kabedo me kwan ma rwatte ki jami ma pigi tego ki niyee gi. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan me dini ipol kare giketo cwinygi tutwalle i kom dongo kwo pa lutino ka iporo ki dongo rwom me kwan.
teo_prompt: Auriak luipu ekotosi aiboisio nu isisiaere nu eputosi keda iponesio kec keda aiyuunikec. Kanuka ngun, isomeroi lu idiinin isinyikokitos aitopoloun iponesio luka itunga nepepe keda aitodolikin asioman.
lgg_prompt: Tipika karakara eyi angu onita ni 'diyi nda eyi ma egata azini aita eyivile 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, sukulu e'yo aitanisi 'diyi okpo 'ba adriza ma ezoza ma dria aga agata onitaniri ma dria indi.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire baingi nibaronda oburugo bw'eby'obwegyese oburikuhikaana n'emitwarize yaabo hamwe n'enyikiriza yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, amashomero g'ediini nigakira kuta amaani omu kutunguura emicwe hamwe n'okushoma kurungi.

eng_prompt: In the competitive landscape of the construction industry, companies must navigate various challenges to deliver successful projects. With rising costs and increasing client expectations, ensuring high standards throughout the building process becomes essential.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'okuvuganya mu by'okuzimba, amakampuni galina okusoomoozebwa okusobola okutuusa pulojekiti ennungi. N'ebbeeyi erinnya n'okweyongera kw'ebisuubirwa bakasitoma, okukakasa omutindo ogwa waggulu mu nkola y'okuzimba yonna kifuuka kikulu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I tenge me gedo, dul mapat-pat omyero gu lweny i kom peko mapat-pat wek yub gi owot maber. Ki mede pa wel jami ki medo miti pa luwil, neno ni rwom me gedo tye malo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka aduko, ibusakinit ikampunin aitodolikin atiokisio nuegelegela kanu aitodolikin ipurojektin luekeriaka. Keda aiyatakin na itiaisinei keda aiyatakin na iboro lu ekoto itunga, ejokuna noi aanyun adoketait naepol noi kotoma aiduk.
lgg_prompt: E'yo baka seza okalamvu afa sizu 'diyiniri ma alia, le amuti eyi ma fu e'yo ewaru ndundu 'diyi ma alea eyini ani otita eyi 'yezu drile suzaru. Aje tuzu tualu 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma egata tuzu tualu, le 'ba ma ne kililiru kini afa 'bani si 'diyi ma wura onyiru sa'wa dria si.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okuhayahayana omu by'okwombeka, kampuni zishemereire kurwanisa oburemeezi bwingi okubaasa kukora purogyekiti nungi. Ahabw'emihendo erikweyongyera hamwe n'ebyetengo by'abaguzi kweyongyera, okureeba ngu omutindo gw'ebyombeko guraabe guri aha rurengo rw'ahaiguru, n'eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: Providing teachers with on-campus housing fosters a sense of community and accessibility. This close proximity allows for more informal interactions between students and teachers, enhancing their relationships.
lug_prompt: Okuwa abasomesa aw'okusula ku ssettendekero kitumbula enneewulira y'ekitundu n'okutuukirirwa. Okusemberera kuno kusobozesa okukolagana wakati w'abayizi n'abasomesa, okutumbula enkolagana yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Miyo gangi pa lupwonye ikin lutino kwan weko lutino bedo ma guribe dok giwinyo maber ikin lutino. Bedo cok man weko bedo ki kare me lok ikin lutino kwan ki lupwonye, medo wat ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Aijaikin isisianakinak itogoi luka esomero eyangauni aimorikikina keda aimorikikina. Aidunyet na ijaikini aiswamanara kiding esisiak keda isisianakinak, aitojokar eidicanekec.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba eyini jo eyini aa'zu sukulu'a 'diyi fezu ri ni fe ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu azini eyi ma esuta ma omgbo otu. Angu aa'zu tualu ri ni fe e'yo nzeza sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea imba'ba eyi pie ri ma omgbo otu eyini eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okuheereza abegyesa oburaaro ahaishomero, nikireetaho enkoragana n'obuhwezi. Okuba haihi n'eishomero nikibaasisa abeegi kukorengana n'abegyesa, ekirikureetaho enkoragana nungi.

eng_prompt: Many congregations face the challenge of maintaining and improving their facilities to better serve their communities. As a result, they frequently seek financial support through various fundraising efforts.
lug_prompt: Ebibiina bingi bisanga okusoomoozebwa okukuuma n'okulongoosa ebizimbe byabwe okusobola okuweereza obulungi ebitundu byabwe. N'ekivuddemu, batera okunoonya obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuyita mu nteekateeka ez'enjawulo ez'okusonda ssente.
ach_prompt: Kanica mapol nongo peko me gwoko ki ilo malo rwom me odigi wek gutii maber i kabedo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare giyenyo kony me lim kun gitiyo ki yoo mapat-pat me jogo cente.
teo_prompt: Etereikina ikurisitayon luipu keda ainingosit naka aidar ka aitojokar aiboisio kec kanu aijanakin aiboisio kec. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aimo agangat na ikapun kotoma aituk ikapun luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Kanisa karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma tambazu azini otuzu eyini ani azi ngazu ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea kililiru beni. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni atita robia niri nda geri ndundu robia trazu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Amakanisa maingi nigatunga oburemeezi bw'okureeberera n'okutunguura ebyombeko byago okubaasa kuheereza gye abantu baabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kusherura obuhwezi bw'esente kurabira omu kukora emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okurundaana esente.

eng_prompt: In the hustle and bustle of our daily lives, it's easy to overlook the blessings we receive. Taking a moment to pause and appreciate our journey can deepen our gratitude.
lug_prompt: Mu bbugumu ly'obulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo, kyangu okubuusa amaaso emikisa gye tufuna. Okuyimirirako katono okusiima olugendo lwaffe kisobola okwongera okusiima kwaffe.
ach_prompt: I kwo ma opong ki jami mapol tutwal, yot tutwal me cayo mot ma wanongo. Bedo ki kare me cung mot me pwoyo wot wa twero medo pwocwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijar naepol noi, epatana apalunit arerengesio nu idumuni oni. Ayangar apak kanu aisiyalamikin alositekosi epedori aiyatakin aiyalama wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ama vile idri o'du driasi 'diyi ma alea, eri ewakokoru ama ma mile avizu asi anzuru amani isule 'diyi ma dria. Sawa 'duzu pa sozu azini ama ma asi 'bazu aci amani 'diyi ma dria ri eco fe awa'difo amani ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu buremeezi n'akaimukiriro k'amagara gaitu aga buriizooba, kyanguhi kwebwa emigisha ei turikutunga. Okwihaho akaire k'okuyimiriramu tukasiima orugyendo rwaitu nikibaasa kwongyera okusiima kwaitu.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it is essential for communities to unite and support one another. The challenges posed by the pandemic have highlighted the importance of collective faith and resilience.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kya mugaso nnyo eri ebitundu okwegatta n'okuyambagana. Okusoomoozebwa okwaleetebwa ekirwadde bbunansi kulaga obukulu bw'okukkiriza awamu n'okugumira embeera.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal pi lwak me ribe ki konyo luwotgi. Peko ma two korona okelo onyuto ber pa bedo ki niye kacel ki diyo cwiny.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka atiokisio, ejokuka itunga aimorikikin ka aingaranakin yenice. Atiokisio nuelomunitos kanuka adeka naka ekorona itodunit ajokis na aiyuun keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, eri orodriru ongulumu eyini ti ecizu tualu azini eyi ma aza kozu eyi ma eselea. E'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ejipi 'diyi ece orodri a'ita tualuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, ni kikuru abantu kukwatanisa n'okuhagana. Oburemeezi obureesirweho endwara ruranda nsi, bworeka omugasho gw'okwikiriza hamwe n'okugumisiriza.

eng_prompt: In a country rich with diverse cultures and beliefs, it's essential to embrace our shared identity. Unity in diversity is what strengthens our nation, regardless of our varying faiths.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde obuwangwa n'enzikiriza ez'enjawulo, kikulu nnyo okukwatira awamu enzikiriza zaffe. Obumu mu njawulo kye kinyweza eggwanga lyaffe, awatali kufaayo ku nzikiriza zaffe ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki tekwaro ki dini ma pat pat, pire tek tutwal me jolo lanyut ma watye kwede. Ribe ikin dano ma pat pat aye tyelo kor lobo wa, kadi bed ni watye ki dini ma pat pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda inonosio keda aiyuunikec luegelegela, ejokuna noi acamun aijen wok. Aimorikikina kotoma atiakatiaka nes igangit akwap wok, araida egelegela aiyuunikewok.
lgg_prompt: Kari lonyi be e'yo suruni azini a'ita ndundu 'diyi pie ri ma alea, eri orodriru ama ma 'du e'yo amani ama eselea 'diyi. Ti ecita suru ndundu eyi ma eselea ri eri e'yo okpo fepi kari amavileri ni, amani ta tro aa'zu a'ita ndundu eyi ma alea ra ti.
nyn_prompt: Omu eihanga eririmu eby'obuhangwa n'enyikiriza nyingi, niky'omugasho kwikiriza endagamuntu yaitu. Okukwatanisa omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe nikyo kirikuhamya eihanga ryaitu, oihireho enzikiriza zaitu ezitari zimwe.

eng_prompt: As stewards of the Earth, communities have a responsibility to take action against climate change. One effective way to engage members and promote sustainability is through organized environmental initiatives.
lug_prompt: Ng'abawanika b'ensi, abantu balina obuvunaanyizibwa okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okusikiriza bammemba n'okutumbula obuwangaazi kwe kuyita mu nteekateeka ezitegekeddwa ez'obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Macalo lugwok lobo, lwak tye ki tic me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny. Yo acel maber tutwal me weko lumemba gubed tye ki miti me neno ni jami ma orumuwa omede anyim obedo tic ki yub ma kiyubu maber me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyaitok luka akwap, ejaas itunga keda aswam na aitikitik aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe. Epone ediope loajokan noi loka aimorikikin itunga keda aitopoloritor aijar naka akwap erai aitolot ainapeta nuka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Ekile 'ba nyaku ma ta mbapi 'diyi ru, ongulumu eyi ma azi e'yo 'yezu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri ma dria ci. Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu 'ba yi ma eselea 'diyi ejizu azini e'yo angu ama agei ri ma ta mbazu ri otuzu ri geri 'bani angu ama agei ri ma tambazu 'diyi vusi.
nyn_prompt: Nk'abakuumi b'ensi, abantu baine obujunanizibwa bw'okukora aha mpindahinduka y'obwire. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okureetaho abantu n'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa n'okurabira omu nteekateeka z'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing health crisis and the need for social distancing, many community activities have been reevaluated. As a result, church leaders have made the difficult decision to prioritize safety.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso n'obwetaavu bw'okwewa amabanga, emirimu gy'ekitundu mingi gizzeemu okwekenneenyezebwa. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa basazeewo ekizibu okukulembeza ebyokwerinda.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim ki miti me bedo mabor ki dano mukene, tic mapol ma ikabedo mapatpat ki ngiyo maber. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me kanica gumoko tam matek tutwal me keto gwoko kuc obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye keda eipud loka alaikina, aponi owanyunai aswamisinei nuipu nuka itunga. Kanuka ngun, eswamata engarenok lu ekanisa aseunet na etiono noi naka aisingarenit ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile ri ma dria azini lezu 'ba eyi ma esele cozu eyi ma eselea risi, 'ba ega e'yo 'yeta ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria dika. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi 'du e'yo ewaru e'yo ageyitema niri 'duzu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okwetantara abantu, emirimo y'abantu omu byaro mingi egarukirwemu. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi b'ekanisa bacwiremu kubi munonga kwebembeza eby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: To foster sustainable growth and support local economies, faith-based organizations can play a vital role in community development. One effective way to achieve this is by initiating agricultural initiatives that provide both resources and training to members.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera n'okuwagira ebyenfuna by'ekitundu, ebitongole by'enzikiriza bisobola okukola omulimu omukulu mu nkulaakulana y'ekitundu. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kutandikawo enteekateeka z'ebyobulimi eziwa bammemba ebyetaago n'okutendekebwa.
ach_prompt: Me tyelo kor dongo lobo matye kawot anyim ki cwako biacara me tedero, dule ma jenge i kom dini twero timo tic mapire tek tutwal I dongo lobo pa lwak. Yo acel maber me cobo man obedo cako yub me pur ma miyo kony ki pwonye bot lumemba.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol ka aigangia ikapun luka atutubet, epedorete iriongeta luka idiinin aswam naepol noi kotoma apol naka atutubet. Epone ediopebon loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi aitegear ainapeta nuka akoru nu ijaikitos itunga iboro ka aitutuoro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu e'yo robiani angu ma alia 'diyi dri, amuti e'yo aita nisi 'diyi eco azi okporu nga angu ezoma ma alia ra. Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri geri 'bani e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi e'dozu afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu azini imbata fezu 'ba memba ru 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho entunguuka n'okushagika eby'entaasya y'ekyaro, ebitongore by'amadiini nibibaasa kukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura ebyanga. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukora eki n'okutandikaho enteekateeka y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa erikuha abantu eby'okukoresa n'okutendeka.

eng_prompt: Supporting local church initiatives fosters a sense of community and strengthens the bonds among members. By contributing financially, individuals can help ensure that vital programs and outreach efforts continue to thrive.
lug_prompt: Okuwagira enteekateeka z'ekkanisa ez'omu kitundu kitumbula enneewulira y'ekitundu n'okunyweza enkolagana mu bammemba. Mu kuwaayo ensimbi, abantu basobola okukakasa nti pulogulaamu ez'omugaso n'okubudaabuda abantu byeyongera okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Cwako yub me kanica me tedero weko dano bedo ma guribe dok jingo wat ikin gi. I miyo kony me lim, dano acel acel twero konyo neno ni yub mapigi tego ki yub me konyo dano tye ka mede anyim.
teo_prompt: Aingarakin aswamisio nuka ekanisa eyangauni aimorikikina ka aitogogong eidicane loejai kidingikec. Kowai lo ainanakin ikapun, epedorete itunga aingarakin awanyun ebe iswamaete ainapeta nuepolok noi.
lgg_prompt: Atita fezu e'yo kanisa ni 'diyi ma dria ri ni ongulumu eyi ma eselea aa'ta 'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu. Geri robia fezurisi, 'ba alu alu eco azakoma fe nezu ra kini otita orodriru azini e'yo o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi mu drile drile.
nyn_prompt: Okushagika enteekateeka z'ekanisa omu byaro, nikireetaho okukwatanisa n'okunyweza enkoragana omu bantu. Kurabira omu kugaba esente, abantu nibabaasa kuhwera kureeba ngu puroguraamu n'emirimo y'okuhutuura abantu bigumizamu nibikora gye.

eng_prompt: Collaboration between different sectors can lead to innovative solutions for community challenges. By leveraging their unique strengths, organizations can create a greater impact on society.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana wakati w'ebitongole eby'enjawulo esobola okuviirako okuyiiya eby'okugonjoola okusoomoozebwa kw'ekitundu. Mu kukozesa amaanyi gaabyo ag'enjawulo, ebitongole bisobola okutondawo enkola ennene mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ribe ikin tenge mapatpat twero kelo yoo manyen me tyeko peko matye ikin lwak. I yoo me tic ki kero gi, dul mapat-pat twero kelo adwogi maber I kom lwak.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikina kiding iriongeta luegelegela epedori ayangaun aomisio nuka aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga. Kowai lo aitwasam agogongu kec, epedorete iriongeta aitojokar itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita esele ndundu eyi ma eselea ri eco fe e'yo ndundu eyi ma aza kozu e'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu ra. Amuti eyi ma okpo ndundu 'diyi ayuzu risi, eyi eco ojata okporu eji ongulumu eyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Enkoragana ahagati y'ebitongore ebitarikushushana neebaasa kureetaho oburyo bw'okutereeza oburemeezi bw'abantu. Kurabira omu kukoresa amaani gaago, ebitongore nibibaasa kukora kihango omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In an increasingly interconnected global economy, regional collaboration is essential for economic growth. By pooling resources and expertise, East African nations can enhance their competitiveness on the international stage.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ensi yonna ebyeyongera okukwatagana, enkolagana y'ebitundu ya mugaso mu kukulaakulana kw'ebyenfuna. Mu kukungaanya eby'obugagga n'obukugu, amawanga g'omu buvanjuba bwa Afirika gasobola okutumbula okuvuganya kwago ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma biacara me wilobo tye ka kube tutwal, ribbe ikin lobe mapol pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo. Lobo mapat-pat manonge I but lobo Afrika kunyango twero medo rwom me pyem I rwom me lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naeringa arucokina, epolok noi aiswamanara naka aiboisio nuka akwapin kanu apol naka ikapun. Kowai lo aimorikikin iboro keda acoa, epedorete akwapin nuka East Africa aikeun abolobolokec kotoma akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia esuzu wudrikurusiri ma alia, ti ecita angu ndundu eyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru zota robia esuzu ri ni. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi tualu ondua be, kari Africa ma kala etuni efuria 'diyi eco a'bala kari yi ma eselea wudrikurusiri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entaasya by'ensi yoona ebyeyongyeire kukwatanisa, okukwatanisa omu byanga n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'eby'entaasya. Amahanga g'oburugwa izooba bwa Africa kurabira omukukwatanisa eby'obugaiga hamwe n'obukugu, nigabaasa kwongyera amaani g'okuhayahayana aha rurengo rw'ensi yoona.

eng_prompt: Many community organizations rely on the generosity of their members to sustain their operations. One such organization is the church, which plays a vital role in providing support and services to its congregation.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'ekitundu bingi byesigama ku bugabi bwa bammemba baabyo okuyimirizaawo emirimu gyabyo. Ekimu ku bitongole ng'ebyo ye kkanisa, ekola omulimu omukulu mu kuwa obuyambi n'obuweereza eri abagoberezi baayo.
ach_prompt: Dule me kabedo mapol gijenge I kom mic pa lumemba gi me gwoko tic gi. Dul acel ma kit meno obedo kanica, ma timo tic mapire tek me miyo kony ki kony bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta luipu lu atutubet itwasamaete agangat naka imebanakec kanu aigang aswamukec. Adiopet kotoma oriongeta kangun erai ekanisa, lo iswamai ibore yenepol noi kanu aigang keda aijanakin ikuristayon.
lgg_prompt: Amuti ongulumu eyini karakara 'diyi yi ati afa feza 'ba eyini 'diyini 'diyi ma dria eyini ani azi eyini 'diyi ma ta mbazu. Amuti alu 'dile 'diyi kanisa, azi okporu 'yepi atita fezu azini azakoma fezu 'ba kanisa'a 'diyi driri'i.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore bingi eby'omubyaro, nibigyendera aha buntu bwa ba memba babyo, okubaisaho emirimo yaabo. Ekitongore kimwe nk'ekyo n'ekanisa, ekirikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuheereza abantu baayo obuhwezi n'obuheereza.

eng_prompt: In our community, the need for sustainable agricultural initiatives is growing, and local churches play a vital role in addressing this issue. By contributing land, individuals can help support these important projects that benefit everyone.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyaffe, obwetaavu bw'obulimi obuwangaazi bweyongera, era amakanisa gakola omulimu munene mu kukola ku nsonga eno. Mu kuwaayo ettaka, abantu basobola okuyamba okuwagira pulojekiti zino enkulu eziganyula buli omu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa, miti me yub me pur tye ka dongo dok kanica me tedero tye ki tic madit tutwal me cobo peko man. Pi miyo ngom, dano acel acel twero konyo ki yub magi ma pigi tego ma konyo dano weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, ejai eipud loka akoru na ejokuna noi, ido ikanisan luka atutubet iswamaete aswam naepol noi kanu aitemokin ationis na. Kowai lo ainanakin alupok, epedorete itunga aigang ipurojektin lu luepedorete aimedaun itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ma alea, e'yo lezu e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma omgbo ni tu uru, dika kanisa angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo 'di ma aza kozu. Nyaku feza si, 'ba alu alu eco atita fe otita orodriru 'ba dria ni 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga byaitu, ekyetengo ky'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ebirikugumaho nikyeyongyera, kandi ekanisa z'omubyaro nizikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kukora aha nshonga egi. Abantu ku barikugaba eitaka, nibabaasa kuhwera omu purogyekiti ezi ez'omugasho ahari buri omwe.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with division and uncertainty, it is essential for us to come together as a community of believers. By fostering our faith and supporting one another, we can strengthen our commitment to righteousness.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde enjawukana n'obutali bukakafu, kya mugaso nnyo gye tuli okwegatta ng'ekibiina ky'abakkiriza. Bwe tukuza okukkiriza kwaffe era ne tuwagiragana, tusobola okunyweza okwewaayo kwaffe eri obutuukirivu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki apoka-poka ki peko, pire tek tutwal ki wan me ribbe macalo lwak pa luyee. Ka wadongo niye wa ki konyo luwotwa, watwero jingo cwiny wa i kom kit ma atir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ejai atiakatiaka keda amamus ajenanut, ejokuna oni aimorikikin kwape itunga lu iyuunitos. Kowai lo aitogogong aiyuun wok ka aigangit yenice, ipedori oni aitogogong ainakinawok nuka aitodolikin nu abeit.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru esele coza azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi pie tre ri ma alea, eri orodriru ama ni emuzu tualu ongulumu 'ba aita ni 'diyi ru. Aa'ta ama ma aita ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu ama ma eselea risi, ama eco asi 'baza amani e'yo kililiruri ma dria ri okpo fe ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire okwebaganisamu, n'eky'omugasho kwegaita hamwe nk'ekibiina ky'abaikiriza. Twayombeka okwikiriza kwaitu n'okuhagana, nitubaasa kuhamya okwehayo kwaitu ahabw'okuhikiirira.

eng_prompt: As the congregation continues to grow, the church staff is finding it increasingly challenging to manage their responsibilities effectively. To enhance their availability and support for church activities, they are exploring options for nearby accommodation.
lug_prompt: Ekkanisa bwe yeeyongera okukula, abakozi b'ekkanisa bakisanga nga kizibu okuddukanya obulungi obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe. Okutumbula okubeerawo kwabwe n'obuyambi eri emirimu gy'ekkanisa, banoonyereza ku ngeri y'okusula okumpi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma kanica tye ka dongo kwede, lutic me kanica tye kanongo tek tutwal me timo tic gi maber. Me medo rwom me bedo tye gi ki cwak gi pi tic pa kanica, gitye ka yenyo kabedo matye cok.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos ikuristayon apolor, etionikinit eswamak lu ekanisa aitodolikin aswamukec ejok. Kanu aitogogong ajaut kec keda agangat kec kanuka aswamisinei nuka ekanisa, eutasi kesi aingic aiboisio nu idunyare.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini zozu drile, azi'ba kanisa ni 'diyi eri esu ewaru eyini azi eyini 'diyi 'yezu kililiru. E'yo eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu atita eyini fe e'yo kanisa ni 'diyi ni 'diyi pie, eyi geri eyini ecozu aa'zu angu eyi ma agei 'diyi esuzu 'diyi onda.
nyn_prompt: Obu ekanisa erikugumizamu neyeyongyera kukura, abakozi b'ekanisa nibasanga oburemeezi bwingi omu kukora emirimo yaabo kurungi. Kubaasa kwongyera aha buheereza n'obuhwezi bwabo omu mirimo y'ekanisa, bariyo nibasherura oburaaro oburi haihi.

eng_prompt: As time passes, many structures face wear and tear, especially those that have stood for decades. This is particularly true for places of worship, which often require updates to meet modern standards.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera bwe kigenda kiyitawo, ebizimbe bingi bikaddiwa n'okukutuka naddala ebyo ebibaddewo okumala emyaka mingi. Kino kituufu nnyo mu bifo by'okusinzizaamu, ebitera okwetaaga okudaabirizibwa okusobola okutuukana n'omutindo gw'omulembe guno.
ach_prompt: Ka kare woto ki kato, odi mapol gi rweny dok gi bale, tutwalle ma dong gucung pi mwaki mapol. Man obedo lok ada tutwalle pi kabedo me lega, ma ipol kare mito roco wek orwatte ki rwom ma ite kare ni.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi apak, epedorete adukena nuipu aibiror ka aibiror, kacut ngul luebwoitos adaun ikar luipu. Erai na abeit noi kanu aiboisio nu ilipere, nu ekotosi aitemonokino kanu aitodolikin adoketait naitetet.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ni muzu drile, jo karakara eyi e'yo eyi esu, tutuni 'ba ebipi pa tupi eli karakara 'bo 'diyi. Diri e'yo a'da tuni pari inzizu 'diyi ma dria, lepi 'ba ma ede eyi o'diru eyini ani aa'zu wura o'diru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Obwire ku burikuhinguraho, ebyombeko ebingi nibihendeka, namunonga ebyo ebimazire emyaka mingi. Eki n'eky'amazima munonga omu myanya y'okuramizamu, erikwetenga okuhunduuzibwa kuhikaana n'omutindo gw'omurembe.

eng_prompt: Concerns have been raised about the management of medical supplies in local clinics. Investigations into the distribution of government-funded medications have revealed troubling discrepancies.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku nzirukanya y'ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi mu malwaliro g'omu kitundu. Okunoonyereza ku kugaba kw'eddagala eriweebwayo gavumenti kuzudde obutakwatagana obweraliikiriza.
ach_prompt: Lworo tye I kom kit ma jami tic me ot yat tye kawot kwede I odi yadi me tedero. Kwed I kom yub me poko yadi ma gamente miyo ki dano onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aponi itodunai aiyalongong kanu eyaitene lo iboro lu amukian kadekisia nu okwap. Angicak nuikamunitos aikor ikee lu igangakit apugan itodunitos amamus acamanar.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'bi asi otiza e'da geri afa ayuzaru arojoa 'diyi ma tambazu arojo eyi ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza aro gameteni fele 'diyi ma awaza ma dria ri e'da e'yo onzi onzi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire aha nkora y'ebikwato by'eby'amagara omu marwariro g'omubyaro. Okucondooza aha kugaba emibazi erikushashurirwa gavumenti, kworeka obutaikirizana.

eng_prompt: The increasing incidence of drug theft in healthcare facilities has raised significant concerns among medical professionals. As a result, hospitals are struggling to maintain adequate supplies of essential medications.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'obubbi bw'eddagala mu malwaliro kireeseewo okweraliikirira mu basawo. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro galwana okulaba nga gafuna eddagala erimala.
ach_prompt: Medde pa kwo pa yadi I odi yadi okelo lworo madit tutwal I kin lutic yoto kom. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi tye ka yele me nongo yat ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Apol naka akoko na ikee kadekisia eyangauni aiyalongong kanejaas eswamak lu adekis. Kanuka ngun, eutasi adekisia ainingosit aidar ikee lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aro eyi ma ogu ni tupi arojo eyi ma alea ri eji asi otiza angiri 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, arojo eyi dri ci aro orodriru 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'obushuma bw'emibazi omu marwariro, kireesireho okwerarikirira omu bashaho. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro nigateganisibwa kuguma gaine emibazi y'omugasho erikumara.

eng_prompt: In an alarming trend, reports have surfaced indicating that certain employees within the healthcare system are engaging in unethical practices. Investigations have revealed that some hospital staff vandalise equipment to swindle funds for new purchases.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeeraliikiriza, alipoota zifulumye eziraga nti abakozi abamu mu kitongole ky'ebyobulamu beenyigira mu bikolwa ebitali bya mpisa. Okunoonyereza kuzudde nti abakozi b'eddwaliro abamu boonoona ebyuma ne babba ensimbi z'okugula ebipya.
ach_prompt: I yo ma kelo lworo madit tutwal, adwoki me kwed okati ma nyutu ni lutic mukene I tenge me yot kom tye ka timo jami ma pe ber. Kwed onyuto ni lutic me ot yat mukene gibalo jami ticgi me kwalo cente me wilo jami manyen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamisioit naerono noi, apotu iripootan kitodiasi ebe ejaasi eswamak ice luka angaleu toma aswamisio nuarokok. Aingic itodunit ebe icetunga lu adekis emunarete iswamasia kanu adumun ikapun lu egwelet iboro luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otizaru ni ma alia, o'duko efu ecepi kini azi'ba azi arojo ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi e'yo onzi 'ye. E'yo eti ondaza ece kini azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma azi eyi afa ayuzaru 'diyi eza eyini ani robia jezu afa o'diru 'diyi jezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikwerarikiriza, ripoota zikooreka ngu abakozi bamwe omu kitongore ky'eby'amagara nibejumba omu bikorwa ebitahikire. Okucondooza kworeka ngu abakozi b'amarwariro abamwe nibashiisha ebyoma, kugira ngu batungye esente z'okugura ebisya.

eng_prompt: Many healthcare facilities in rural areas struggle to maintain essential services due to financial constraints. As a result, regional hospitals often lack funds to run their activities.
lug_prompt: Amalwaliro mangi mu byalo galwana okukuuma obuweereza obwetaagisa olw'ebbula ly'ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro g'ebitundu gatera obutaba na nsimbi kutambuza mirimu gyago.
ach_prompt: Odi yadi mapol I caro gitye ki peko me gwoko kony ma mite pi peko me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi me twok piny ipol kare gi peke ki cente me doro tic gi.
teo_prompt: Aiboisio nuipu nu adekis kocaaloi etionikinit aidar ejanakine lo ejok kanu ikapun. Kanuka ngun, amamete duc adekisia nuka atutubena ikapun kanu aitolot aswamisiokec.
lgg_prompt: Pari arojo ni karakara angu caluru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi dri ci azi orodriru 'diyi ma ta mbazu e'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, arojo angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyivu robia eyini ecozu eyi ma azi eyi 'yezu ri yo.
nyn_prompt: Amarwariro maingi omu byaro nigatunga oburemeezi bw'okureeberera obuheereza bw'omugasho ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro g'ebyanga nigakira kubura esente z'okukora emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In many countries, the legal system is often manipulated by those in power, allowing them to evade accountability. As a result, corrupt practices flourish, undermining public trust and governance.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi, enkola y'amateeka etera okukyusibwa abo abali mu buyinza, ekibasobozesa okwewala okuvunaanibwa. N'ekivuddemu, emize gy'obuli bw'enguzi gigenda mu maaso, ne gityoboola obwesige bw'abantu n'enfuga.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol, joo matye ki twero pol kare gitiyo ki cik me gengo tic ki kor tic gi. Macalo adwogi ne, tim me camcana tye mapol tutwal, ma balo gen ki tela pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwapin nuipu, ngul luejaasi keda apedorosio kes itwasamaete ikisila tetere mam itodunitos nuiswamauna. Kanuka ngun, eyatakinos aswamisio nuka amidicio naka apiyai, aitolitol amunokina naka itunga keda apugan.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba okpo alea 'diyi tutuni e'yo azita ni 'diyi ayu eyini ani e'yo 'bani eyi 'yezu ri atrizu. E'yo 'disi, e'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra, e'yo 'ba eyini asi 'bazu eyi ma dria azini e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi, enkora y'ebiragiro neekoresibwa kubi abo abari omu bwebembezi, ekirikubabaasisa okwetantara embaririra. N'ekyarugiremu, obushomankuzi nibweyongyera munonga, ekirikuremesa abantu kwesiga n'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: Corruption in the healthcare system has reached alarming levels, undermining patient trust and the quality of care. To address this pressing issue, it is essential for hospital top management to take decisive action.
lug_prompt: Obuli bw'enguzi mu kitongole ky'ebyobulamu butuuse ku ddaala ery'entiisa, ekityoboola obwesige bw'abalwadde n'omutindo gw'obujjanjabi. Okukola ku nsonga eno ey'amangu, kyetaagisa abakulembeze b'eddwaliro ab'oku ntikko okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Tim me camcana I tenge me yot kom tye I rwom ma lamal tutwal ma balo gen pa lutwo ki rwom me kony me yot kom. Me tyeko peko man ma opoto atura, pire tek tutwal ni ludito me ot yat omyero gutim gin mo.
teo_prompt: Amidicio naka apiyai kotoma amukian adolokit adoketait naepol noi, ido itolitol amunokina naka adekak keda adoketait na amukian. Kanu aitemokin ationis na naepol noi, ibusakinit eyaitene loapolon loka adekis aswam kagogong.
lgg_prompt: Anyamgbolo arojo eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo tu ra, erini ani asi 'bazu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria ku dika eri fe 'ba eyini aro esuzu muke ku. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, eri orodriru driceza arojo ni 'diyi ni e'yo 'yezu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Obushomankuzi omu kitongore ky'eby'amagara, buhikire aha rurengo rw'okwerarikirira, ekirikuremesa abarwaire kwesiga abarwaire hamwe n'omutindo gw'obujanjabi. Okukora aha nshonga egi y'amaani, nikikuru abarikukurira eirwariro kukora eky'amaani.

eng_prompt: Building trust and open communication between health officials and the community is essential for effective public health initiatives. When citizens feel valued and heard, they are more likely to engage in health programs and adhere to guidelines.
lug_prompt: Okuzimba obwesige n'okuwuliziganya mu bwesimbu wakati w'abakungu b'ebyobulamu n'abantu kyetaagisa nnyo okusobola okukola obulungi emirimu gy'ebyobulamu. Bannansi bwe bawulira nga ba muwendo era nga bawulirwa, batera okwetaba mu pulogulaamu z'ebyobulamu n'okugoberera ebiragiro.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki gen ki lok maber ikin lutic yoto kom ki lwak pire tek tutwal pi yub me yot kom maber. Ka anywali winyo ni pigi tek dok giwinyo lokgi, gi bedo ki miti me donyo I yub me yot kom ki lubu cik.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong amunokina keda einer loepukora kiding eswamak luka angaleu keda itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin nuka angaleu naka itunga. Arai epupete itunga ebe ejokuna kesi ido epupete kesi, epedorete kesi alomar toma ainapeta nuka angaleu ka aitup aicoreta.
lgg_prompt: Asi'baza sizu azini e'yo nzeza ngmboru azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma eselea ongulumu eyi pie ri eri orodriru otita e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Kari anzi ka ega kini 'ba eyi ma orodri azini eyi ma e'yo eri ra, eyi nga mu otita e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma alea indi dika eyi ma obi azita eyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Okwombeka obwesigye n'empurizagana ahagati y'abakuru omu by'amagara hamwe n'abantu n'eky'omugasho omu nteekateeka z'eby'amagara. Abatuuragye kubarikuhurira ngu nibaheebwa ekitiinisa kandi bahurikirize, nibabaasa kwejumba omu nteekateeka z'eby'amagara kandi bakuratira ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: In recent surveys, many patients expressed skepticism about the quality of care provided in community clinics. This growing distrust has raised concerns among healthcare professionals and policymakers alike.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonyereza okwakakolebwa, abalwadde bangi baalaga okubuusabuusa ku mutindo gw'obujjanjabi obuweebwa mu malwaliro g'ekitundu. Obuteesigagana buno obweyongera buleeseewo okweraliikirira mu basawo n'abakola amateeka.
ach_prompt: I kwed ma okato cokcok-ki, lutwo mapol gubedo ki akala-kala I kom rwom me kony ma kimiyo I odi yadi me tedero. Bedo peke pa gen eni okelo lworo ikin lutic yoto kom ki lutela.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic napac, apotu adekak luipu itodutu abuonokin nuikamunitos adoketait na amukian na ijaikitai adekisia nuka atutubet. Mam amunokina na eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas eswamak luka angaleu keda luitolomete ikisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba azoru karakara eyi e'da asi otiza geri 'bani azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma dria. Asi'baza ma omgbo tupi 'diri eji asi otiza 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma eselea azini 'ba azita sipi 'diyi ma eselea indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kucondooza okwakozirwe juba, abarwaire baingi tibarikwikiriza omutindo gw'obujanjabi oburikuheebwa omu marwariro g'omubyaro. Okweyongyera kw'obuteyikirizana, kireesire okwerarikirira omu bakugu omu by'amagara hamwe n'abakozi b'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: To ensure transparency and accountability in public health systems, it is crucial to implement stringent oversight measures. Regular evaluations can help identify and mitigate potential risks of unethical practices among health officials.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obwerufu n'obuvunaanyizibwa mu nkola z'ebyobulamu, kikulu nnyo okussaawo enkola enkakali ey'okulondoola. Okukebera buli kaseera kusobola okuyamba okuzuula n'okukendeeza ku bulabe obuyinza okuva mu bikolwa ebitali bya mpisa mu bakungu b'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni jami weng tye atir I tenge me yot kom, pire tek tutwal me keto yub matek me bedo ki wang mabit I tic. Neno kit ma tic tye kawot kwede kare ki kare twero konyo me niang ki dwoko piny rwom me tim ma pe ber ikin lutic me yotkom.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere nuka angaleu, ejokuna noi aitegear ainapeta nuka aanyanar. Aingic duc epedori aingarakin ajenun ka aitidisiar atiokisio nuka aswamisio nuarokok kanejaas eswamak lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: Ovuzu e'yo ada be azini e'yo nzezu geri o'bi yini e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria kililiru, eri orodriru e'yo azita vuti obiza okporu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia. E'yo eti ondaza sawa driasi ri eco azakoma fe e'yo ecopi e'yo onzi 'yepi azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho amazima n'embaririra omu by'amagara g'abantu, n'eky'omugasho okutaho enkora y'amaani y'okureebuuza. Okukyebera buri kaire nikibaasa kuhwera omu kumanya n'okukyendeeza akabi akari omu kukora ebitahikire omu bakungu b'ebyamagara.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have highlighted a troubling pattern of mismanagement and unethical practices within government hospitals. To address these issues effectively, we need to consider more proactive measures.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti amalwaliro ga gavumenti galimu enkola embi n'ebikolwa ebitali bya mpisa. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino obulungi, twetaaga okulowooza ku ngeri endala ez'obwegendereza.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto kit ma tic tye ka time kwede i odi yadi pa gamente. Me tyeko lok magi maber, omyero watam tutwal I kom yoo me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lupac itodutu epone loerono noi loka eyaitene loaronon keda aswamisio nuarokok kotoma adekisia nuka apugan. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu ejok, ekot oni aomoom nu iswama.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo azi ngaza onzi azini 'yeta onzi arojo gameteni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, le ama ma ega e'yo 'bani eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka oburemeezi bw'okwebembera kubi n'ebikorwa ebitahikire omu marwariro ga gavumenti. Okukora aha nshonga ezi kurungi, twine kutaho oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: Corruption in the healthcare system has become a significant barrier to accessing quality medical services in Uganda. To address this issue effectively, it is crucial to engage the public in understanding their role in promoting transparency and accountability.
lug_prompt: Obuli bw'enguzi mu kitongole ky'ebyobulamu bufuuse ekiremesa okufuna obujjanjabi obulungi mu Uganda. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno obulungi, kikulu nnyo okuyingiza abantu mu kutegeera omulimu gwabwe mu kutumbula obwerufu n'embalirira.
ach_prompt: Tim camucana I tenge me yot kom obedo ariya madit tutwal I nongo kony me yot kom maber I lobo Uganda. Me tyeko lok man maber, pire tek tutwal me weko lwak guniang tic gi me kelo ada ki kor tic.
teo_prompt: Amidicio naka ikapun kotoma amukian erai ationis naepol noi kanu adumun amukian na abeit ko Uganda. Kanu aitemokin ationis na ejok, ejokuna noi aimorikikin itunga amisiikin nu ebeit kesi aswam kanu aitopolorite aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Anyamgbolo geri alata ni 'diyi ma alea ri eca e'yo azi okporu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ru. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu kililiru, eri orodriru o'bi yi 'bazu e'yo yini azi ngazu e'yo ada ma dria azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obushumankuzi omu kitongore ky'eby'amagara kihindukire ekizibu ky'amaani omu kutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara burungi omu Uganda. Okukora aha nshonga egi kurungi, n'eky'omugasho okureetera abantu kwetegyereza omurimo gwabo omukureetaho amazima n'embaririra.

eng_prompt: In recent years, numerous reports have highlighted the alarming levels of corruption within the healthcare system. To ensure patient safety and restore public trust, it is crucial for influential leaders in health to take a stand.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, alipoota nnyingi ziraga nti waliwo obuli bw'enguzi bungi mu kitongole ky'ebyobulamu. Okukakasa obukuumi bw'abalwadde n'okuzzaawo obwesige bw'abantu, kikulu nnyo abakulembeze b'ebyobulamu ab'amaanyi okubaako kye bakola.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, adwogi tic mapol onyuto rwom me camcana matye I tenge me yot kom. Pi gwoko lutwo ki dwoko gen ikin lwak, pire tek tutwal ni lutela ma oywek i tenge me yot kom omyero gumok tam gi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, itodunitos iripootan luipu adoketait na amidicio naka apiyai kotoma orionget loka angaleu. Kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara adekak ka ainyakun amunokina naka itunga, ejokuna noi engarenok luapolok luka angaleu ajaut toma.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, o'duko karakara eyi e'da e'yo anyamgbolo ni angu alata ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ra. Lezu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini asi'baza o'bi eyini ri ogozu, eri orodriru drice'ba okporu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyini pa tuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, ripoota nyingi nizooreka obushomankuzi omu kitongore ky'eby'amagara. Okuhamya oburinzi bw'abarwaire n'okugaruraho obwesigye bw'abantu, n'eky'omugasho aha beebembezi b'eby'amagara ab'amaani kugira eki barikukora.

eng_prompt: To ensure optimal performance and patient safety, it is crucial to prioritize the upkeep of all medical devices. Regular maintenance not only extends the lifespan of the equipment but also enhances the quality of care provided.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa enkola ennungi n'obukuumi bw'abalwadde, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza okulabirira ebyuma byonna eby'obujjanjabi. Okuddaabiriza buli kaseera tekikoma ku kwongera ku bulamu bw'ebikozesebwa naye era kyongera ku mutindo gw'obujjanjabi obuweebwa.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic tye maber ki gwoko lutwo, pire tek tutwal me gwoko jami tic weng me ot yat. Rwom me yubu jami I kare ki kare pe medo kare me tic pa jami enoni keken ento bene medo rwom me gwok ma kimiyo.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun eswamae loajokan ka ayuwara naka adekak, ejokuna noi aidar iswamasia lu adekis. Aitemonokin iswamasia duc mam iyatakini aijar naka iswamasia konye iyatakini amukian na ijaikitai kes.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza muke azini 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu, eri orodriru e'yo afa ayuzaru arojoa 'diyi ma tambazu ri 'duzu okporu. Afa ndundu eyi ma tambazu sa'wa driasi ri ni lu aa'zu sa'wa ezu ku te eyi ma tambaza ma omgbo otu indi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'okukoresa omu marwariro bikora kurungi n'okurinda abarwaire, n'eky'omugasho munonga okureeba ngu eby'okukoresa omu marwariro bikorwa kurungi. Okugarura busya ebyoma buri kaire tikirikumaraho kwongyera aha magara gaabyo, beitu nikyongyera n'omutindo gw'obujanjabi oburikuheebwa.

eng_prompt: The rising incidents of theft in healthcare facilities have become a significant concern for administrators. To enhance security measures and protect valuable medical equipment, proactive steps must be taken.
lug_prompt: Obubbi obweyongera mu malwaliro bufuuse okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi eri abaddukanya amalwaliro. Okutumbula eby'okwerinda n'okukuuma ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba eby'omuwendo, emitendera egy'obwegendereza girina okukolebwa.
ach_prompt: Rwom me kwo matye kamede I odi yadi tye ka kelo lworo madit tutwal I kom ludito tic gi. Me medo rwom me gwoko ber bedo ki gwoko jami tic me ot yat ma pigi tego, omyero ki tii ki diro.
teo_prompt: Apol naka akoko naka adekisia erai aiyalongong naepol noi kanejaas eyaitok lu adekis. Kanu aitogogong ayuara ka ayuarite iswamasia lu amukian lu epol ajokis, ekot aitolot iboro lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ogu ni tupi arojo eyi ma alea 'diyi eca asi otiza angiri ru azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi dri. E'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini afa arojo ni orodriru 'diyi ma tambazu, le 'ba ma 'du e'yo okporu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'obushuma omu marwariro, nikyerarikiriza abarikureeberera amarwariro. Okutunguura eby'okwerinda n'okurinda ebikwato by'eby'amagara eby'omugasho, haine ekishemereire kukorwa.

eng_prompt: Criminal organizations often target businesses for valuable tools and machinery. Once acquired, these items are typically difficult to trace and can be quickly liquidated.
lug_prompt: Ebibiina by'abamenyi b'amateeka bitera okulumba bizinensi okufuna ebikozesebwa n'ebyuma eby'omuwendo. Bwezimala okufunibwa, ebintu bino biba bizibu okulondoola era bisobola okusaanawo mangu.
ach_prompt: Dul pa lutim aranyi ipol kare giyenyo jami tic ki Cuma ma pigi tego ki bot lutim biacara. Kace ki nongo jami magi, pol kare tek tutwal me lubu korgi dok kitwero tyeko ticgi oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Etapit iriongeta luka abilak ikisila aimo ibiasaran kanu acuman nuepolok. Arai edumunio, etiono noi aanyun iboro lu ido epedorio aitwasam katipet.
lgg_prompt: Amuti e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi tutuni tujari eyi ma dria afa ayuzaru azini cuma orodriru 'diyi esuzu. Ba ka afa 'diyi esu 'bo, eri ewaru eyi ma vuti ondazu dika 'ba eco eyi eza mbeleru ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebibiina by'enkozi z'ebibi, buriijo nibigyenderera eby'obushubuzi okutunga ebyoma n'ebikwato by'omugasho. Bwanyima y'okubitunga, ebintu ebi bigumire kurondoora kandi nibibaasa kwihwaho juba.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain public trust and ensure accountability within the healthcare system, it is essential to address the issue of corruption among health officials. Implementing strict measures against those who exploit their positions for personal gain is crucial for the integrity of health services.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma obwesige bw'abantu n'okukakasa embalirira mu nkola y'ebyobulamu, kya mugaso okukola ku nsonga y'obuli bw'enguzi mu bakungu b'ebyobulamu. Okuteekawo enkola enkakali ku abo abakozesa ebifo byabwe okwefunira kya mugaso nnyo eri empeereza y'ebyobulamu ennungi.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko gen pa lwak ki neno ni lutic yoto kom tye ki kor tic gi, pire tek tutwal me tyeko lok me camcana ikin lutic yoto kom. Keto cik matek i tic i kom joo ma tiyo ki twero gi me nongo magoba gi obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar amunokina naka itunga ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere nuka angaleu, ejok aitemokin ationis naka amidicio naka apiyai kanejaas eswamak luka angaleu. Aitolomun ikisila luitegelikina mama ejaasi ngul luitosomaete aiboisio kec kanuka ameda kec bon erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amukian naejok.

E'yo okporu 'diyi 'bazu 'ba pari yini 'diyi ayu'ba orodri yini isu'ba 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obwesigye bw'abantu n'okureeba ngu eby'amagara bigarukwamu embaririra, n'eky'omugasho kukora aha nshonga y'obushomankuzi omu bakuru b'ebyamagara. Okutaho oburyo bw'amaani bw'okurwanisa abo abarikukoresa emyanya yaabo, n'eky'omugasho aha buheereza bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: Ensuring transparency and accountability in government is essential for a healthy democracy. To achieve this, it is crucial to encourage individuals to come forward with information about wrongdoing.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obwerufu n'obuvunaanyizibwa mu gavumenti kyetaagisa nnyo mu demokulasiya omulungi. Okutuukiriza kino, kya mugaso nnyo okukubiriza abantu okuvaayo n'obubaka obukwata ku bikolwa ebikyamu.

teo_prompt: Aitijenar aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun kotoma apugan erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aseo najokan. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ejok aisinyikokit itunga alomun keda akiro nuikamunitos aswamisio nuarokok.

ach_prompt: Medde pa kwo pa yadi I odi yadi okelo lworo madit tutwal I kin ludito tic ki joo ma gwoko cik. Me tyeko tim man ma kelo lworo, pire tek tutwal me keto yub ki yoo me tic maber itic.
teo_prompt: Apol naka akoko na ikee kotoma adekisia eyangauni aiyalongong kanejaas eyaitok keda ipolisin. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, ibusakinit aitegear iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok.

eng_prompt: The growing demand for healthcare services has put immense pressure on the existing workforce. As a result, many hospitals and clinics are struggling to find qualified professionals to meet patient needs.
lug_prompt: Obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera butadde akazito ku bakozi abaliwo. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro mangi n'obulwaliro birwana okufuna abakugu abalina ebisaanyizo okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Medde pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom oketo lyeto madit tutwal I kom lutic matye. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi ki odi yadi mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo ludiro ma oporre me cobo miti pa lutwo.
teo_prompt: Apolou na eipud loka amukian nes ejai ainingosit naepol noi mama ejaasi eswamak lu ejaas. Kanuka ngun, etionikinitos adekisia nuipu adumun ipirioitin lu epedorete aitodolikin ipudesia luka adekak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri 'ba azi'ba ci 'diyi ma dria okpo angiri. E'yo 'disi, arojo karakara eyi dri ci 'ba onita be 'diyi esuzu azakoma fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'ebyetengo by'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara, kireesireho oburemeezi bw'amaani aha bakozi abariho. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro maingi n'amarwariro garwana kuronda abakugu abarikubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abarwaire.

eng_prompt: Access to quality maternal healthcare is crucial for the well-being of mothers and their newborns. Currently, many regions lack adequate facilities to support expectant mothers during pregnancy and childbirth.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi bw'abakyala abazaala obw'omutindo kikulu nnyo eri obulamu bwa bamaama n'abaana baabwe abaakazaalibwa. Mu kiseera kino, ebitundu bingi tebirina bikozesebwa bimala okuyamba bamaama abali embuto mu biseera by'embuto n'okuzaala.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom ma ber pi mon ma oyac pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa mege ki lutino gi. Ite kare ni, but lobo mapol peke ki jami ma mite me konyo mon ma oyac ikare me yacu ki nywal.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian naka angor nu epotiete ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angor keda idwekec. Kwape kwana, emamiatatar aiboisio nuipu keda iboro lu igangakitos angor nu epotiete ka aidoun.
lgg_prompt: Rua alata okporovu eyini ri esuzu ri eri orodriru ayia eyi ma edri ni tualu anzi eyini osi 'diyi pie. Sawa 'disi angu karakara eyivu afa ayuzaru ayia okporovu ru 'diyi atizu sa'wa eyini okporovu ru risi azini osita si 'diyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza burungi bw'eby'amagara g'abakazi abaine enda n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abakazi hamwe n'abaana baabo. Obwahati,ebyanga bingi tibiine by'okukoresa ebirikumara okuhwera abakazi abarikuzaara baaba baine enda n'okuzaara.

eng_prompt: Many rural communities in Uganda rely heavily on their local hospitals for essential healthcare services. However, these facilities often struggle to maintain operations due to financial constraints.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi mu byalo mu Uganda beesigama nnyo ku malwaliro gaabwe okufuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa. Newankubadde, ebifo bino bitera okulwana okusigala nga bikola olw'ebbula ly'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol me caro gijenge tutwalle I kom odi yadi gi pi kony me yot kom ma mite pi kwo gi. Kadi bed kumeno, odi yadi magi ipol kare gi nongo peko me tic pi peko me lim.
teo_prompt: Ipu itunga lukocaloi luko Uganda lu emunokina adekisia kec kanu amukian. Konye, etapit duc aiboisio nu ainingosit aidar aswam naarai ikidioko ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara calo ru kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi asi'baza angiri arojo eyivile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu. Kani si, angu 'da eyi sa'wa driasi dri ci azi ngazu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Ebyaro bingi omu Uganda nibigyendera munonga aha marwariro gaabo okubaasa kutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara. Kwonka, ebyombeko ebi nibikira kurwana kurinda emirimo yaabo ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente.

eng_prompt: The recent audit revealed significant discrepancies in the reporting of health equipment purchases. Stakeholders are increasingly concerned about the lack of clarity in the procurement process.
lug_prompt: Okubalirira okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko kwalaga obutali bwenkanya obw'amaanyi mu kuwa lipoota ku kugula ebyuma by'obujjanjabi. Abakwatibwako beeyongera okweraliikirira olw'obutaba na bwerufu mu nkola y'okugula ebintu.
ach_prompt: Ngiyo kor tic ki lim ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I lok kom jami tic me ot yat ma kiwilo. Dano mapol gitye ki lworo I kom lok me pe niang maber I yub me wilo jami.
teo_prompt: Abu aingic ikapun luitetiak kitodu amamus aiwadikaeta nuikamunitos agwel iboro lu adekis. Iyalongongosi itunga nuikamunitos amamus aica kotoma ainapeta nuka agwel iboro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani andri o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo 'bani afa ayuzaru arojoa 'diyi jezu 'diyi ma dria ku. ꞋBa ambo ꞌdiyi ma asi otiza eꞌyo ꞌbani eꞌyo ꞌyezu eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba yi jezu ꞌdiyi ma dria kililiru kuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okushwijumwa kw'ebitabo okwabaireho obwahati, kworeka obutaikirizana bw'amaani omu ripoota y'okugura ebyoma by'okukoresa omu marwariro. Abarikukwataho beeyongyeire kwerarikirira ahabw'obutetegyerezibwa omu mirimo y'okugura ebintu.

eng_prompt: In the fight against corruption, it is crucial for officials to uphold integrity and transparency. They must navigate a system that often tempts individuals to compromise their values.
lug_prompt: Mu kulwanyisa obuli bw'enguzi, kikulu nnyo abakungu okukuuma obwesimbu n'obwerufu. Balina okutambulira mu nkola etera okukema abantu ssekinnoomu okukkaanya ku mpisa zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I lweny i kom camcana, pire tek tutwal ki lutic me bedo ki ada ki ada. Omyero gubed ki yoo me kwo ma pol kare weko dano pe lubu cik gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitiji ecamusana, erai ibore yenepol noi eswamak aitogogong abeit ka aica. Ibusakinit kesi alosit kotoma ainapeta nuitemonokini itunga aimusung iponesiokec.
lgg_prompt: A'di 'dizu anyamgbolo be ri ma alea, eri orodriru azi'ba eyini aa'zu e'yo ada be azini e'yo ada be. Le eyi ma aci geri 'ba eyi ma ngulupi eyi obepi eyi ma adriza onzi 'diyi ma alea sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kurwanisa obushomankuzi, n'eky'omugasho ab'eby'obutegyeki okukuratira amazima n'oburingaaniza. Bashemereire kugyendera omu nkora erikureetera abantu okureka emitwarize yaabo.

eng_prompt: As the demand for healthcare professionals continues to rise, it is crucial to address the barriers that prevent talented individuals from pursuing careers in this field. Increasing financial support for underprivileged students can help ensure a diverse and capable health workforce.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'abakugu mu byobulamu bweyongera okulinnya, kikulu nnyo okumalawo ebiremesa abantu abalina ebitone okukola emirimu mu mulimu guno. Okwongera obuyambi bw'ensimbi eri abayizi abataliiko mwasirizi kiyinza okuyamba okulaba nga waliwo abasawo ab'enjawulo era abasobola.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti pa lutic yoto kom tye kamede kwede, pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko matye ka gengo dano matye ki diro me donyo I tic man. Medo kony me lim pi lutino kwan matye ki peko twero weko lutic yoto kom ma padi padi bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipud loka ipirioitin luka angaleu, ejokuna aitemokin atiokisio nu itikitikete itunga luejaasi keda atalanta kotoma aswam aswam kotoma aswam kana. Aiyatakin agangat na ikapun nejaas esisiak lu ican epedori aingarakin adumun eswamak lu adekis lu egelegela.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tutu risi, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba talanta be 'diyi atripi azi ngazu pari 'di ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu. Atita robia niri ma omgbo otuzu sukulu anzi e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi dri ri eco fe azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma esele cozu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetengo by'abakugu omu by'amagara nibigumizamu kweyongyera, niky'omugasho kukora aha buremeezi oburikuremesa abantu abaine etaraanta kukora emirimo omu by'amagara. Okwongyera obuhwezi bw'esente omu beegi abatarikwebaasa, nikibaasa kuhwera omu kureeba ngu hariho abakozi b'ebyamagara baingi kandi barikubaasa.

eng_prompt: Access to higher education can often be hindered by financial constraints. To alleviate this burden, it's essential to inform students about the resources that can help fund their academic pursuits.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obuyigirize obwa waggulu kitera okulemesebwa olw'ebizibu by'ensimbi. Okukendeeza omugugu guno, kya mugaso nnyo okutegeeza abayizi ku bintu ebibayamba okusasulira emisomo gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki gum me kwan i rwom ma malo ipol kare bedo tek tutwal pi peko me lim. Me dwoko piny peko man, pire tek tutwal me miyo ngec bot lutino kwan i kom jami ma twero konyogi me culu pi kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun asioman na okwap epedori duc aitikitik kanuka ationis na ikapun. Kanu aitidisiar ationis na, ibusakinit aitijenikin esisiak nuikamunitos iboro luingarakinete kesi adumun ikapun luka asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru robia ma dria 'diyi eco e'yo onita uruleruri ma esuta atri ra. E'yo 'di ma omgbo esizu, eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyini imbata fezu geri eyini ecozu robia esuzu sukulu'a 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obwegyese bw'ahaiguru, nikibaasa kuremererwa ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente. Okutuubya aha buremeezi obu, n'eky'omugasho kumanyisa abeegi ebirikubaasa kubahwera omu kushashurira eby'obwegyese bwabo.

eng_prompt: Many educational institutions prioritize STEM fields when it comes to funding opportunities. However, it's essential to recognize the value of arts education and support those pursuing it.
lug_prompt: Amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza mangi gakulembeza emirimu gya STEM bwe kituuka ku mikisa gy'okusonda ssente. Newankubadde, kya mugaso okutegeera omugaso gw'okusoma kw'ebyemikono n'okuwagira abo abakugoberera.
ach_prompt: Gangi kwan mapol giketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom tic me STEM ka odok ilok me nongo lim. Kadi bed kumeno, pire tek tutwal me niang ber pa kwan me diro ki cwako joo matye katimo ne.
teo_prompt: Isomeroi luipu isingarenitos akiro nuka STEM kanu ikapun. Konye, ejokuna noi ajenun ajokis naka asioman naka aputosia ka aigang ngul lu iswamaete ngun.
lgg_prompt: Pari onita ni karakara eyi e'yo STEM ni 'diyi 'du okporu ka eca drileba robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria. Kani si, eri orodriru e'yo orodri onita e'yo drisi 'diyiniri ma dria azini atita fezu 'ba e'yo nde 'ye'baa 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Amatendekyero maingi g'eby'obwegyese nigakuza omu myanya y'eby'obwegyese eya STEM ku garikwija aha migisha y'okushashurira. Kwonka n'eky'omugasho kumanya omugasho gw'obwegyese bw'eby'emikono n'okuhwera abo abarikubukoresa.

eng_prompt: As educational opportunities become increasingly competitive, families are exploring various ways to support their children's academic journeys. One important aspect of this support involves understanding the mechanisms behind student sponsorship.
lug_prompt: Ng'emikisa gy'okusoma gyeyongera okuvuganya, amaka ganoonya engeri ez'enjawulo okuyambako abaana baabwe mu by'ensoma. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikwata ku buyambi buno kwe kutegeera engeri abayizi gye bayambibwamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo gum me kwan tye ka doko tek tutwal, gangi tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me konyo lutino gi I kwan gi. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I kom kony man obedo niang kit ma lutino kwan nongo kwede cente.
teo_prompt: Kwape epol abolobol naka asioman, eutasi ikalia aimo iponesio luegelegela lu igangakinete idwekec kotoma asioman. Adiopebore naepol noi naka agangat na imoriarit amisiikin iwaitin lu itwasamaere esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Drileba onita ni 'diyi ni ecazu abala ru, familia eyi geri ndundu eyini ecozu atita fezu anzi eyivile 'diyini onita ma alea 'diyi onda. E'yo azi orodriru atita 'di ma dria ri le 'ba ma va geri sukulu anzi eyini atita sukulu niri esuzu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Emigisha y'eby'obwegyese ku erikweyongyera, amaka gariyo nigasherura oburyo bw'okuhwera abaana baabo omu mishomo yaabo. Omuringo gumwe ogw'omugasho gw'obuhwezi obu, nigwetengyesa okwetegyereza engyenderwaho y'okushashurira abeegi.

eng_prompt: Many students in rural communities face significant barriers when it comes to accessing educational resources. As a result, they often remain unaware of the scholarship opportunities available to them.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi mu byalo basanga obuzibu obw'amaanyi bwe kituuka ku kufuna ebikozesebwa mu kusoma. N'ekivuddemu, tebatera kumanya mikisa gya sikaala egiriwo gye bali.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol i caro nongo peko madit tutwal ka odok ilok me nongo jami kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare pe gi ngeyo gum me kwan nono ma gitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Esisiak luipu kocaaloi etereikina keda atiokisio nuepolok nuikamunitos adumunun iboro lu asioman. Kanuka ngun, mam kesi ejenete nuikamunitos asioman naka atitai na ejaas kesi.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini afa onita ni 'diyi esuzu ria. E'yo 'disi, eyi nini e'yo drileba sukulu lazu pirini 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi omu byaro, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kuhikwaho eby'obwegyese. N'ekyarugiremu, tibarikumanya emigisha y'okushomera busha eriho.

eng_prompt: Many students aspire to pursue a college degree, believing it will open doors to better job opportunities. However, the rising costs of tuition and fees pose significant financial challenges for many families.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi baagala okusoma diguli, nga balowooza nti ejja kuggulawo emiryango gy'emirimu emirungi. Newankubadde, okweyongerayongera kw'ebisale by'essomero n'ebisale by'essomero bireetawo okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'ensimbi eri amaka mangi.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol tye ki miti me kwano digiri kun gitye ki gen ni man bi yabo dogola me nongo tic mabeco. Kadi bed kumeno, wel cul kwan matye kamede tye peko madit tutwal pi gangi mapol.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi esisiak luipu aisisia ediguri, eomitos ebe ebuni ngin apukor ikekia luka aswamisinei nuajokak. Konye, aiyatakin etiai loka ikapun luka esomero einakinit ikalia luipu atiokisio nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi le onita univasiti niri ma alea, eyini egazu kini eri nga eyi ma ti zi drileba azi ni muke 'diyi esuzu. Kani si, aje sukulu fizi ni tupi 'diyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi eji familia karakara eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi nibenda kwega diiguri aha itendekyero erikuru, barikwikiriza ngu neija kwiguraho emiryango y'emirimo mirungi. Kwonka, okweyongyera kw'ebishare by'eishomero n'ebishare by'eishomero, nikireetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu by'entaasya omu maka maingi.

eng_prompt: Many students face financial barriers that can hinder their educational pursuits. To ensure equal opportunities for all, it's crucial to promote available scholarships effectively.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi basanga ebizibu by'ensimbi ebiyinza okubalemesa okusoma. Okukakasa emikisa egyenkanankana eri bonna, kya mugaso okutumbula obulungi sikaala eziriwo.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol nongo peko me lim ma twero gengo kwangi. Me neno ni dano weng tye ki gum marom, pire tek tutwal me tyelo kor kwan nono matye.
teo_prompt: Esisiak luipu ejaas keda atiokisio nuka ikapun nu itikitikete asioman kec. Kanu awanyun ebe ejaasi itunga kere keda arerengesio nueriakasi, ejok aitopolorite asioman naka atitai.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu eyini ani ecozu eyi ma onita atrizu ra. Lezu drileba trotro 'diyi esuzu 'ba dria eyidri, eri orodriru atita sukulu lazu pirini ri ma omgbo otuzu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abaingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'esente oburikubaasa kuremesa emishomo yaabo. Okureeba ngu abantu boona batunga emigisha erikwingana, nikikuru okushongyera kurungi obuhwezi bw'okwegyera busha oburiho.

eng_prompt: Many students seek financial assistance to pursue their education, as the cost of higher learning continues to rise. Various funding options are available, but not all are equally accessible.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi banoonya obuyambi bw'ensimbi okugenda mu maaso n'okusoma kwabwe, ng'ebbeeyi y'okusoma mu matendekero aga waggulu yeeyongera okulinnya. Enkola z'ensimbi ez'enjawulo weeziri naye si zonna nti zituukirirwa kyenkanyi.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol giyenyo kony me cente me mede ki kwan gi, pien wel cul me kwan i rwom ma malo tye ka medde ameda. Yo mapat-pat me nongo lim tye, ento pe weng twero nonge marom.
teo_prompt: Eutasi esisiak luipu aimo agangat na ikapun kanu asioman kec, naarai iyata etiai loka asioman naka okuju. Ejaas iponesio luegelegela luka agangat na ikapun, konye mam itunga kere epedorete adolokin.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi atita robia niri nda eyini ani muzu onita eyivile ri ma alea, e'yo aje onita uruleruri niri ni tutu risi. Geri ndundu robia esuzu 'diyi ci, te 'ba econi dria eyi esu trotro ku.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi nibasherura obuhwezi bw'esente kugumizamu n'eby'obwegyese bwabo, ahabw'okuba ebishare by'okushoma aha matendekyero agahaiguru bigumizemu kweyongyera. Hariho oburyo bwingi bw'okutunga esente, kwonka tiburikwingana.

eng_prompt: Many talented students in rural areas face significant barriers to higher education. To help bridge this gap, it is essential to ensure they are informed about available financial aid opportunities.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi abalina ebitone mu byalo basanga obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu kusoma mu matendekero aga waggulu. Okuyambako okuziba ekituli kino, kya mugaso okulaba nga bategeezebwa ku mikisa gy'obuyambi bw'ensimbi egiriwo.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol ma gitye ki talanta i caro ginongo peko madit tutwal me nongo kwan me rwom ma malo. Me gengo peko man, pire tek tutwal me neno ni ki niango gi i kom kony me lim matye.
teo_prompt: Esisiak luipu luejaasi keda atalanta kocaaloi etereikina keda ainingosia nuepedorete aitodolikin asioman naka okuju. Kanu aingarakin aitikitik atiokisio nu, ejokuna aitijenikin kes nuikamunitos agangat na ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi talanta be karakara angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyini ecozu onita uruleruri esuzu 'diyi esu. Azakoma fezu esele coza 'diri ma ti opizu, eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba lu eyi dri geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi abaine etaraanta omu byaro, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kwega aha rurengo rwaheiguru. Okuhwera omu kuzibira omwanya ogu, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu bamanyisibwa aha migisha y'obuhwezi bw'esente eriho.

eng_prompt: Many communities in rural areas are struggling with inadequate educational resources and facilities. As a result, students in these regions are often left at a disadvantage compared to their urban counterparts.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi mu byalo birwanagana n'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa mu by'enjigiriza n'ebintu ebikozesebwa. N'ekivuddemu, abayizi mu bitundu bino batera okulekebwa mu mbeera embi bw'ogeraageranya ne bannaabwe mu bibuga.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma icaro gitye ka lweny ki peko me nok pa jami kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan ma ikabedo magi ipol kare gi bedo ki peko mapol ka iporo ki lutino kwan me boma.
teo_prompt: Atekerin nuipu kocaaloi eutasi ainingosit keda amamus na iboro lu asioman. Kanuka ngun, etapit duc esisiak luka aiboisio nu ajalakin ationis itiriani keda ipaupakec luka itaunin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi dri ci afa onita ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako si. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi angu 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ku e'yo ewaru ma alia aga eyi ma agyipika aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi omu byaro nibirwanagana n'eby'obwegyese ebitarikumara hamwe n'ebintu ebirikukoresibwa. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi b'omu byanga ebi, nibakira kusigaza omu mbeera mbi, kubarikugyeragyeranisa n'abegyi baabo ab'omu ndembo.

eng_prompt: In recent meetings, educational leaders and community representatives have expressed concerns about declining enrollment numbers. As a result, they have been exploring innovative strategies to attract and support prospective students.
lug_prompt: Mu nkiiko ezaakaggwa, abakulembeze b'ebyenjigiriza n'abakiise b'ebitundu balaze obweraliikirivu olw'omuwendo gw'abayizi ogukendeera. N'ekivuddemu, babadde banoonya engeri z'okusikiriza n'okuyambako abayizi.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma okato cokcok-ki, lutela me gangi kwan kacel ki luwang lwak gunyutu lworo gi i kom wel lutino kwan matye kadok piny. Macalo adwogi ne, gubedo ka yenyo yoo manyen me kelo ki konyo lutino kwan matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamununeta nupac, apotu engarenok luka isomeroi keda abwoikinitok itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aikidiokor na enaaba loka idwe. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aingic iwaitin luitetiak lu ingalaunete ka aigangakite esisiak lu ekotosi alomar toma.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi o'diru 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba onita ni 'diyi tualu 'ba pa tupi ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie ece asi otiza eyini e'yo kalafe sukulu anzi sukulu lapi sukulu'a 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi ebi geri o'diru 'diyi onda sukulu anzi ecopi sukulu'a 'diyi ma ava esuzu azini atita fezu eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkiiko ezihweireho, abeebembezi b'eby'obwegyese hamwe n'abajwekyerwa b'ebyanga boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'omuhendo gw'abeegi ogurikukyendeera. N'ekyarugiremu, babaire nibasherura oburyo bw'okureeta n'okushagika abeegi.

eng_prompt: Ensuring that children receive a balanced diet is essential for their overall development. Proper nourishment not only supports physical growth but also enhances their ability to concentrate and participate in school activities.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti abaana bafuna emmere erimu ebirungo byonna kya mugaso eri okukula kwabwe okutwalira awamu. Endya ennungi tekoma ku kuyamba kukula mu mubiri naye era eyongera ku busobozi bwabwe okussaayo omwoyo n'okwenyigira mu mirimu gy'essomero.

teo_prompt: Aanyun ebe edumunenete idwe enyame loejok kanu apolo kec. Ainyam najokan mam igangit apol naka akuan bon konye iyatakini apedor kec naka apodokinit ka ajaikin toma aswamisinei nuka esomero.

eng_prompt: Ensuring that children receive the right nutrients is crucial for their development. Parents and caregivers play a vital role in providing meals that support healthy growth and overall well-being.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti abaana bafuna ebiriisa ebituufu kya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana yaabwe. Abazadde n'abalabirira bakola omulimu munene mu kuwa abaana emmere eyamba okukula obulungi n'okubeera obulungi.
ach_prompt: Neno ni lutino tye ka nongo cam ma mite pi dongo gi pire tek tutwal. Lunyodo kacel ki joo ma gwoko lutino timo tic mapire tek tutwal me miyo cam ma konyo dongo pa lutino ki bedo maber.
teo_prompt: Aanyun ebe edumunenete idwe inyamat luedolitos erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apolo kec. Auriak keda lu idarete idwe iswamaete aswam naepol noi kowai lo aijanakin inyamat lu igangitos apolo ka aijar najokan.

eng_prompt: Many parents struggle with understanding the nutritional needs of their children, leading to unhealthy eating habits. To address this issue, community programs must focus on raising awareness about effective child feeding practices.
lug_prompt: Abazadde bangi balwana okutegeera ebyetaago by'abaana baabwe mu by'endya, ekiviirako emize gy'okulya egitali mirungi. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, pulogulaamu z'ekitundu zirina okussa essira ku kumanyisa abantu ku ngeri ennungi ey'okuliisaamu abaana.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo mapol ginongo tek tutwal me niang cam ma mite pi lutino gi, man weko gi camo cam ma pe ber pi yot kom gi. Me tyeko peko man, yub ma ikabedo omyero guket cwiny gi i kom rweyo lwak i kom kit me pito lutino maber.
teo_prompt: Auriak luipu etiono amisiikin iboro lu ekotosi idwekec, eyangauni ainyam na mam ejok. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, ekot ainapeta nuka itunga aisisianakin itunga iponesio luajokak luka aitan idwe.
lgg_prompt: Tipika karakara eyi dri ci afa anzi eyivile 'diyini lele nyaka nyazaru 'diyi ma vata ma dria, dika e'yo 'di ni fe eyini nyaka nyazu geri kililiru ku 'diyisi. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, le otita ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma fe asi imbata geri anzi nyiri eyini nyaka fezu muke 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: Many students are struggling to concentrate in class, and research shows that nutrition plays a crucial role in academic performance. To address this issue, schools need to revise their meal plans and feed students on a balanced diet.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi balwana okussaayo omwoyo mu kibiina, era okunoonyereza kulaga nti endya ekola kinene nnyo mu kukola obulungi mu byensoma. Okukola ku nsonga eno, amasomero geetaaga okuddamu okutunula mu nteekateeka zaago ez'emmere n'okuliisa abayizi emmere erimu ebirungo byonna.

eng_prompt: Addressing malnutrition requires a multifaceted approach that includes education and awareness. One effective strategy is to implement regular sensitization programs for families to improve their understanding of nutrition.

ach_prompt: Lweny i kom peko me neto mito yoo mapat-pat ma kwako pwony ki rweyo lwak. Yoo acel maber en aye me miyo pwony ki gangi kare ki kare wek guniang maber lok kom cam.
