Okuta esente omu kucondooza, nikiija kutubaasisa okukora emiringo y'okutunguura ebihingirwe.

eng_prompt: In many societies, the influence of cultural leaders plays a crucial role in shaping public attitudes and behaviors. By leveraging their authority and respect, these leaders can effectively promote health initiatives within their communities.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, obuyinza bw'abakulembeze b'ennono bukola omulimu omukulu mu kubumba endowooza n'enneeyisa y'abantu. Nga bakozesa obuyinza bwabwe n'ekitiibwa, abakulembeze bano basobola okutumbula obulungi enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu mu bitundu byabwe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, tela pa lutela tekwaro konyo tutwal I yubu tam ki tim pa lwak. Ki tic ki twero ki woro gi, lutela magi twero tyelo kor yub me yot kom ikabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atekerin nuipu, ejaasi engarenok luka inonosio keda aswam naepol noi kotoma aitolomun aomisio keda iponesio luka itunga. Kowai lo aitwasam apedorosiokec keda ayongite kec, epedorete engarenok lu aitopolorite nuka angaleu kotoma atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, drice'ba suruni 'diyi ma okpo azi okporu ni nga o'bi eyi ma egata eyi ma omgbo otuzu. Okpo yini azini inzita yini 'diyisi, drice'ba 'diyi eco otita alata ni 'diyi otu ongulumu yini 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka bingi, abebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhindura emiteekateekyere n'emitwarize y'abantu. Ahabw'okukoresa obushoborozi bwabo n'ekitiinisa kyabo, abebembezi aba nibabaasa kutunguura enteekateeka y'eby'amagara omu byanga byabo.

eng_prompt: Malnutrition remains a critical issue affecting the health and well-being of communities, particularly in underserved regions. To combat this growing problem, targeted interventions are essential.
lug_prompt: Endya embi ekyali nsonga ya maanyi ekosa obulamu n'obulamu obulungi bw'ebitundu naddala mu bitundu ebitatuukibwako bulungi. Okusobola okulwanyisa ekizibu kino ekigenda kyeyongera, waliwo ebintu ebirina okukolebwa.
ach_prompt: Two neto pud tye peko madit tutwal ma balo yotkom ki kwo pa lwak tutwalle ikabedo ma pe ki kony ma oromo. Me lweny i kom peko man matye kamede ameda, miti me timo gin moni pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Eringa adeka naka aligirir erai ationis naepol noi naetirori aijar naka itunga kacut aiboisio nu mam ijanakino. Kanu aitikitik ationis na naepol noi, ibusakinit aitolomun nu ebeit aswam.
lgg_prompt: Nyaka nyaza onzi ri nga po'di e'yo azi okporu ongulumu eyi ma rua ala azini aa'ta muke ri biipi tuni angu 'bani azi ngazu kililiru ku 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo 'di ma aza kozu geri kililiru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okurya kubi n'enshonga y'amaani erikuteganisa amagara n'amagara marungi g'abantu, namunonga omu byanga ebitarikuhikwaho obuheereza. Okurwanisa oburemeezi obu obweyongyeire, enkora nungi n'ey'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Despite advancements in healthcare, many Ugandans are unaware of the increasing prevalence of cancer and its devastating effects. Early detection is crucial, yet many individuals neglect regular health check-ups.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enkulaakulana mu byobulamu, Bannayuganda bangi tebamanyi ku kweyongera kwa kookolo n'ebizibu ebivaamu. Okuzuula amangu kya mugaso, naye abantu bangi balagajjalira okukeberebwa buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni rwom me kony me yot kom tye malo, pol pa dano me Uganda pe gingeyo wel lutwo cancer matye kamedde ki adwogi ne marac tutwal. Niang con pire tek tutwal, ento dano mapol pe giyee me pime ikare weng.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol naka angaleu, mam itunga luipu luko Uganda ejenete nuikamunitos adekasinei nuka ekansa keda atiokisio nuka ekansa. Ajenun sek ejok, konye mam itunga luipu epalunit ainwakio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, 'ba karakara Ugandaa 'diyi nini e'yo azo cancer niri ni tuzu tualu e'yo erini 'ye onzi 'diyi pie ri ma dria ku. Eꞌyo ꞌbani esu drioru ri eri orodriru, te ꞌba karakara ꞌdiyi asi ꞌba arojo yini yi andrizu sawa driasi ꞌdiyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka omu by'amagara, abanya Uganda abaingi tibarikumanya okujanjaara kwa kokoro n'oburemeezi bwayo. Okukyeberwa bukiri kare n'eky'omugasho, kwonka abantu baingi nibarekyerera okukyeberwa buri kaire.

eng_prompt: Raising awareness about breast cancer at a young age is crucial for early detection and prevention. Implementing educational programs in schools can effectively inform and empower young girls about their health.
lug_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu ku kookolo w'amabeere ku myaka emito kya mugaso nnyo mu kuzuula amangu n'okumutangira. Okuteeka mu nkola pulogulaamu z'ebyenjigiriza mu masomero kisobola bulungi okumanyisa n'okutumbula abawala abato ku byobulamu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Rweyo lwak i kom two cancer me tunu ikare me tino obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me niang ki gengo ne con. Keto yub me kwan itic i gangi kwan twero miyo ngec ki kero ki anyira matino i kom yot komgi.
teo_prompt: Aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos ekansa loka ekisin eringa edisiak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ajenun sek ka aitikitik. Aitolomun ainapeta nuka asioman osomeroi epedori aitijenikin apesur nuikamunitos angaleukec.
lgg_prompt: Imbata fezu 'ba eyini azo cancer ba vileri niri ma dria ri eri orodriru 'bani ani azo 'da esuzu drioru azini atrizu. Otita onita ni 'diyi ma e'dota sukulu eyi ma alea ri eco fe ezoanzi nyiri eyini imbata azini okpo fe eyi ma rua ala ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata ahari kokoro y'amabeere bakiri bato, n'eky'omugasho omu kumanya n'okuzibira. Okutaho puroguraamu z'eby'obwegyese omu mashomero, nikibaasa kuhwera abaishiki bato kumanya n'okumanya ebirikukwata aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Many rural communities in Uganda lack access to essential healthcare services, making it challenging for residents to seek specialized treatment. As a result, cancer patients from villages find it hard to go to the Uganda Cancer Institute.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu by'omu byalo bingi mu Uganda tebirina bujjanjabi bwetaagisa, ekizibuwaza abatuuze okufuna obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, abalwadde ba kookolo okuva mu byalo basanga obuzibu okugenda mu Uganda Cancer Institute.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol me caro pe gitye ki yoo me nongo kony me yot kom ma mite pi kwo gi, ma oweko obedo tek tutwal ki lwak me nongo kony me yot kom ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutwo cancer ma aa ki icaro ginongo tek tutwal me cito I Uganda Cancer Institute.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lukocaloi luko Uganda mam edumunenete amukian na itwasamao, einakini ainingosit itunga adumun amukian na itutuoritai. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit adekak ekansa lukocaloi alosit adekis naka ekansa koUganda.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara calo ru kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi esuni azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi orodriru 'diyi ku, e'yo 'di fe ewaru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aro esuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azo cancer niri be angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi eri esu mbazaru muzu arojo Uganda Cancer Institute niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ebyaro bingi omu Uganda tibirikubaasa kutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara, ekirikugumira abatuuragye kuronda obujanjabi bw'omutaano. Ekyarugiremu, abarwaire ba kokoro kuruga omu byaro, nikibagumira kuza omu irwariro rya kokoro erya Uganda.

eng_prompt: Given the rising incidence of cancer cases in the area and the lack of specialized treatment facilities, it has become increasingly urgent to address this public health crisis. Stakeholders have emphasized the importance of providing comprehensive care and support for patients and their families.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde ba kookolo mu kitundu n'ebbula ly'ebifo eby'obujjanjabi eby'enjawulo, kyeyongedde okuba eky'amangu okukola ku buzibu buno obw'ebyobulamu. Abakwatibwako batadde essira ku bukulu bw'okuwa abalwadde n'ab'omu maka gaabwe obujjanjabi n'obuyambi obwenkukunala.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel lutwo cancer matye kamede i kabedo man ki bedo peke pa odi yadi mabeco tutwal, omede ki bedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko me yotkom eni. Lwak guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me miyo kony ki kony bot lutwo ki lugangigi.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo iyatakinor adekasinei nuka ekansa kotoma aiboisit keda amamus na aiboisio nuka amukian, erai ibore yenepol noi aitemokin ationis naka angaleu naka itunga. Apotu itunga kitogogongoto ajokis naka aijanakin agangat nejaas adekak keda ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo cancer niri ma omgbo ni tuzu angu 'di ma alea ri ma e'yosi azini angu aro esuzu 'diyi ma ako si, eri eca curu'do e'yo mbeleru e'yo 'di ma aza kozu. Ba ambo ndundu eyi fe okpo orodri 'bani atita fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri tualu familia eyivile 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu oburwaire bwa kokoro bweyongyeire omu kyanga hamwe n'eibura ry'ebikwato by'eby'amarwariro ebirikwetengwa, n'eky'omugasho kukora aha buremeezi bw'eby'amagara g'abantu. Abaine akakwate aha nshonga, bahamize omugasho gw'okureeberera abarwaire n'amaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: In order to enhance educational opportunities for local students, the district has proposed the creation of a new institute. To move forward with this initiative, the district needs to obtain land for the establishment of the institute.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula emikisa gy'okusoma eri abayizi b'omu kitundu, disitulikiti eteesezza okutondawo ettendekero eppya. Okugenda mu maaso n'enteekateeka eno, disitulikiti yeetaaga okufuna ettaka okuzimba ettendekero.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me kwan pa lutino kwan me tedero, district omiyo tam me yabo gang kwan manyen. Me medde anyim ki yub man, district omyero onong ngom me yubu gang kwan eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor asioman naka esisiak luka atutubet, etemokinit edisitrikt aitolomun esomero loitetet. Kanu aitolot aswamisioit na, ekot edisitrikt adumun alupok kanu adukio adekis.
lgg_prompt: Lezu drileba onita ni sukulu anzi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, distrikiti 'da fe egata 'bani sukulu o'diru ni e'dozu. Lezu muzu drile e'yo 'di be, le distrikiti ma esu nyaku pari onita ni 'da sizu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura emigisha y'okwegyesa abeegi b'omubyaro, disiturikiti eteire ekiteiso ky'okutandikaho eitendekyero risya. Okugyenda omu maisho n'ekigyendererwa eki, disiturikiti eine kutunga eitaka ry'okwombeka eitendekyero.

eng_prompt: Regular health monitoring is essential for early detection of potential issues. Maintaining a proactive approach to health can significantly improve overall well-being.
lug_prompt: Okukebera ebyobulamu buli kaseera kya mugaso mu kuzuula amangu ebizibu ebiyinza okubaawo. Okukuuma enkola ey'obwegendereza ku byobulamu kisobola okutumbula obulungi bw'abantu okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Pimo yot kom kare ki kare pire tek tutwal me niang peko ma twero bedo tye con. Bedo ki yoo me tic maber i kom yotkom twero medo rwom me kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Aanyanar duc angaleu ejok kanu ajenun atiokisio sek. Ajaut keda epone loajokan loka aidar angaleu epedori aitojokar aijar.
lgg_prompt: Rua ma ale andrita sawa driasi ri eri orodriru e'yo onzi ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi esuzu drioru. Geri 'bani e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma tambazu ri eco 'ba eyi ma aa'ta muke ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukyebera amagara buri kaire n'eky'omugasho omu kumanya oburemeezi bukiri kare. Okutwarira eby'amagara omu nkora nikibaasa kutunguura entuura y'abantu.

eng_prompt: Cancer can manifest in various forms, impacting individuals of all ages. While many types are more common in adults, some are specifically prevalent in younger populations.
lug_prompt: Kkookolo asobola okweyoleka mu ngeri ez'enjawulo, okukosa abantu ab'emyaka gyonna. Newankubadde ebika bingi biyitiridde mu bantu abakulu, ebimu biyitiridde mu bantu abato.
ach_prompt: Two cancer twero time I yoo mapatpat, mako dano me mwaka weng. Kadi bed ni kwai jami mapol tye I kin jo madongo, mukene tye I kin jo matino.
teo_prompt: Epedori ekansa aitodun iponesio luegelegela, itolitolete itunga luka ikar kere. Karaida etapit iponesio luipu noi kanejaas itunga luapolok, icie iponesio luipu noi kanejaas atumunak.
lgg_prompt: Azo cancer niri eco i e'da wura ndundu eyi si, dika eri eco 'ba eyi 'ye eli ndundu eyi ma alea ra. Ka tro ovu wura karakara yi be 'ba 'wara yi ma eselea, azi 'diyi tuni 'ba oderu 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Kokoro neebaasa kweyoreka omu miringo mingi, erikukwata abantu b'emyaka yoona. N'obu emiringo mingi erikukira kubaho omu bantu abakuru, emwe neekira kubaho omu bantu bato.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions about the rising cancer rates in the area, the committee recognized the urgent need for specialized care. They explored various options and ultimately concluded that a dedicated facility would best serve the community's health needs.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo ku muwendo gwa kookolo ogweyongera mu kitundu, akakiiko kaategeera obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'obujjanjabi obw'ekikugu. Baanoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo era mu nkomerero baatuuka ku kusalawo nti eddwaliro erya nnamaddala lyandibadde lisinga okukola ku byetaago by'ebyobulamu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol I kom two kanca matye kamede I kabedo eni, dul enoni oniang ni mite tutwal me nongo kony me yot kom. Gin gukwedo yoo mapat-pat dok I agiki ne gumoko ni ot yat ma kiyubu pi lutwo en aye obi tiyo maber tutwal I kom miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemitem akiro nuikamunitos aiyatakin na ekansa katutubet, abu ekomiti koany eipud loka amukian na itegelikina. Apotu kesi kongicata iponesio luegelegela kosodete aitodun ebe adukio na adekis nes ibusakinit aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga luka adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia e'yo azo cancer niri ma ongmbo ni tuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria, komiti 'da esu e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba ma esu aro kililiru 'diyi mbeleru. Eyi onda geri ndundu eyi dika eyi 'yo asizu kini arojo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ngulupi si 'da ni nga azakoma fele e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi fe o'bi eyidri muke ndeni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga ebirikukwata aha burwaire bwa kokoro obweyongyeire omu kyanga, akakiiko kakareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okuragurirwa. Bakashwijuma emiringo etari emwe, reero bahendera bashanga ngu eirwariro ry'omutaano niribaasa kuhikiiriza kurungi ebyetengo by'abantu.

eng_prompt: Raising awareness about health issues is crucial for community well-being. In particular, understanding the factors that contribute to serious illnesses can empower individuals to make informed choices.
lug_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu obulungi bw'ekitundu. Okusingira ddala, okutegeera ensonga eziviirako endwadde ez'amaanyi kisobola okuwa abantu ssekinnoomu amaanyi okusalawo obulungi.
ach_prompt: Rweyo lwak i kom lok me yot kom pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa lwak. I yo acel-acel, niang jami ma kelo two madongo twero miyo kero ki dano me moko tam maber.

lgg_prompt: Imbata feza e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru ongulumu eyini aa'zu muke ri ni. Tutunisi, e'yo e'yo fepi azo onzi 'diyi ejipi 'diyi ma vata eco 'ba yi dri okpo fe e'yo 'duzu kililiru ra.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about healthcare accessibility, the government held a meeting to discuss potential reforms. After extensive deliberation, the leaders agreed on a new approach to improve service delivery across the nation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kufuna obujjanjabi, gavumenti yatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nnongoosereza eziyinza okukolebwa. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, abakulembeze bakkiriziganyizza ku nkola empya ey'okutumbula obuweereza mu ggwanga lyonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom yoo me nongo kony me yot kom, gamente obedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom aloka loka matwero time. Ingee tam matut, lutela guwinye I kom yoo manyen me ilo malo rwom me miyo kony ilobo ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naikamunit adumunun amukian, abu apugan iriamunos kanu aitemitem aijulanakineta. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu engarenok ocamutu epone loitetet loka aitojokar ejanakine kotoma akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi e'yo alata ma esuta ma dria, gamete 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo ojata ecopi 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia, drice'ba eyi ai geri o'diru azi ngaza kari 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu kari 'di ma alea ndulu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for accessible healthcare, the government has announced a new initiative. This plan aims to improve cancer treatment and support services across the country.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obutuukirirwa, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula obujjanjabi bwa kookolo n'obuyambi mu ggwanga lyonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me nongo kony me yot kom, gamente okatti ki yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me kony ki kony ma kimiyo pi lutwo cancer ilobo ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian na epatana adolokin, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aitojokar amukian naka ekansa keda agangat kotoma akwap.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu oburwaire bwa kokoro bweyongyeire n'oburemeezi bwabwo aha magara g'abantu, niky'omugasho gavumenti kukora kyona ekirikubaasika. Okuta esente omu by'amagara hamwe n'enteekateeka z'okuzibira, nikiija kuba eky'omugasho omu kukora aha nshonga egi erikweyongyera.

eng_prompt: Despite the availability of advanced medical technology and awareness campaigns, many individuals still neglect their health. This reluctance to seek preventive care can lead to serious consequences.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo tekinologiya ow'omulembe mu by'obujjanjabi ne kampeyini z'okumanyisa abantu, abantu bangi balagajjalira obulamu bwabwe. Okwewala kunoonya obujjanjabi obuziyiza kiyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni tet manyen me yot kom tye ki yub me rweyo lwak, dano mapol pud pe giparo pi yot komgi. Lworo me yenyo kony me gengo two twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas iponesio luka etatai loakwana keda aisisianakino, eringa itunga luipu epalunitos angaleukec. Amamut aimo amukian na aitikitik adekasinei epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia arojo ni okporu 'diyiniri ma talasi azini e'yo mile oziza ni 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara eyi nga po'di eyi ma rua ma ta mba ku. E'yo 'bani lezu atita esuzu e'yo azo atripi 'diyi ma dria ku ri eco e'yo onzi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho tekinorogye y'omurembe omu by'amagara hamwe n'ehururu z'okumanyisa abantu, abantu baingi nibarekyerera amagara gaabo. Okuremwa kuronda obujanjabi oburikuzibira, nikibaasa kurugwamu ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: Every year, millions of individuals and families are impacted by the harsh realities of a cancer diagnosis. Regardless of age, gender, or background, the disease touches lives in profound ways.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu ssekinnoomu n'amaka bakosebwa embeera enzibu ey'okuzuulibwamu kookolo. Ka kibeere myaka ki, kikula ki oba nsi ki, obulwadde bukosa obulamu mu ngeri ey'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, dano milion mapol ki gangi gi nongo peko me nongo two kanca. Labongo paro pi mwaka, coo onyo mon, two eni tye ki adwoki marac i kom kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kangolikaru, imilionin luka itunga keda ikalia etereikina keda atiokisio nuka adumun ekansa. Amamei apodokinit ikar, angor arai ikiliok, arai aiboisio, emunari adeka aijar koipone kaloepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli alu alu vusi, 'ba milioni karakara eyi tualu familia eyi pie eyi e'yo ewaru azo cancer niri esuzu 'diyisi. Eli ma talasi, agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie, kani ku angu eyini engazu 'diyi ma talasi, azo 'di ni 'ba eyi ma edri eyi 'ye geri okporu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka, obukaikuru n'obukaikuru bw'abantu hamwe n'amaka, nibashanga oburemeezi bw'okukyeberwa kokoro. Oihireho emyaka,ekikura ky'omuntu, nainga oburugo, oburwaire nibukwata aha magara g'abantu omu miringo mingi.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership is crucial for the success of any educational district. To ensure that resources are allocated efficiently and goals are met, careful planning is essential.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi bwa mugaso nnyo eri obuwanguzi bwa disitulikiti y'ebyenjigiriza yonna. Okukakasa nti eby'obugagga bigabanyizibwa bulungi n'ebiruubirirwa bituukiddwaako, okuteekateeka n'obwegendereza kwa mugaso.
ach_prompt: Tela maber pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa gangi kwan. Pi neno ni kitiyo ki lim maber dok kicobo miti ne, yub maber obedo gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka edio edisitrikta lo asioman. Kanu aanyun ebe itwasamao iboro ejok ka aitodolikin alosikineta, ibusakinit aitemonokin ejok.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri eri orodriru distrikiti onitani 'diyi ma drile suza ni. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi awazu kililiru azini e'yo 'bani lele 'diyi 'yezu, otuta kililiru ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho munonga aha businguzi bwa disiturikiti y'eby'obwegyese. Okureeba ngu eby'obugaiga nibiheebwa kurungi kandi ebigyendererwa bikahikiirizibwa, okuteekateekyera kurungi n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Before initiating any development plans, the district must ensure that all landowners are fairly compensated for their property. This requirement is crucial to maintain trust and uphold legal obligations in the community.
lug_prompt: Nga tebannaba kuteekawo nteekateeka yonna ey'enkulaakulana, disitulikiti erina okukakasa nti bannannyini ttaka bonna baliyirirwa mu bwenkanya olw'ebyobugagga byabwe. Kino kyetaagisa nnyo okukuuma obwesige n'okunyweza amateeka mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe gucako yub mo keken me dongo lobo, district omyero onen ni kiculu wegi ngom weng marom pi jami gi. Miti man pire tek tutwal me gwoko gen ki gwoko cik ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Erongo edumuna aitemonokineta nuka apol, ekot edisitrikt awanyun ebe etacio ikulepek alupok kere ejok kanuka iborokec. Erai na ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar amunokina ka aitodolikin ikisila kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di e'doni otita angu ezoma ni 'diyi e'do ku, le distrikiti ma ne ra kini 'ba dria nyaku e'ipi 'diyi ofe yi ma nyaku yi ma dria kililiru. E'yo 'di eri orodriru asi'baza ma tambazu azini e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu ongulumu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Enteekateeka y'entunguka etakatandikire, disiturikiti eshemereire kureeba ngu bakama b'eitaka bashashurirwa ebintu byabo omu buringaaniza. Ekirikwetengwa eki n'eky'omugasho munonga okurinda obwesigye n'okukuratira ebiragiro omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Frustrated by the rapid development in their neighborhood, the residents gathered to discuss their concerns. They felt that the new project would disrupt their community and harm the environment.
lug_prompt: Olw'okunyiiga olw'enkulaakulana ey'amangu mu kitundu kyabwe, abatuuze baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga zaabwe. Baalowooza nti pulojekiti empya yanditaataaganyizza ekitundu kyabwe n'obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Ki cwer cwiny pi dongo lobo ma tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal I kabedo gi, lutedero gucokke me nywako lok I kom peko gi. Guwinyo ni yub manyen eni obi balo kabedo gi ki cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luka atutubet kongurianata kanu apol naka aiboisit kec, apotu kesi kotukokinos kanu aitemitem atiokisio kec. Apotu kesi opuputu ebe ebuni epurojekt lo loitetet aitolitol aiboisit kec ka amunar ejautene lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma okposiri ma e'yosi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria. Eyi ega kini otita o'diru 'da ni nga ongulumu eyivile 'diyi eza dika eri nga angu amani aa'zu alenia ri eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'entunguuka y'amaani omu kicweka kyabo, abatuuragye baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga zaabo. Bakahurira ngu purogyekiti ensya neija kutabangura ekyanga kyabo n'obuhangwa bw'ensi.

eng_prompt: After the recent natural disaster caused significant damage to infrastructure, local officials appealed for assistance. In response to these urgent needs, the government has provided income for the reconstruction of roads in the area.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akatyabaga k'obutonde okwaliwo gye buvuddeko okusaanyaawo ebintu ebikozesebwa, abakungu b'ekitundu baasaba obuyambi. Mu kwanukula ebyetaago bino eby'amangu, gavumenti ewaddeyo ensimbi okuddamu okuzimba enguudo mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Inge peko ma poto atura ma otimme cokcok-ki obalo jami mapol, lutic me tedero gulego pi kony. Macalo adwogi me peko eni, gamente omiyo cente me yubu gudi i kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atiokisio nuka isuban nuapotu komudiasi iboro, apotu eswamak luka atutubet ilipata aingarakinio. Kanu aitemokin ipudesia lu atipet, ejaiki apugan ikapun kanu aitemonokino irotin katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru nyakuni efupi o'diru 'diyi ma vutia afa ayuzaru 'diyi eza okporu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ai 'ba eyi azakoma fezu. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete fe robia nzila angu 'da ma alea 'diyi sizu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ebihikiirizi ebyabaireho ebiro ebi okushiisha ebyombeko, abakuru b'ebyaro bakashaba obuhwezi. Gavumenti ehereize esente z'okugaruka kukora enguuto omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent project developments, the committee recognized the need for expert advice. As a result, they decided to set aside a budget for consultation purposes.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku ebyo ebibaddewo mu pulojekiti gye buvuddeko awo, akakiiko kaalaba obwetaavu bw'okufuna amagezi okuva eri abakugu. N'ekyavaamu, baasalawo okuteekawo embalirira ey'okwebuuzaako.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki I yub eni, dul enoni oniang ni omyero kimii tam ki ludiro. Macalo adwogi ne, gumoko tamgi me keto byek lim I tenge me laro lok.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo apol naka epurojekt kangol, abu ekomiti koany eipud loka adumun aicoreta nuka ipirioitin. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi koseutu aitemokin ebajet kanu aingitun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma otita 'da niri ma dria, komiti 'da esu e'yo lezu 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi ma embata ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi 'du e'yo bajeti 'bazu kalaa e'yo nzezu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha ntunguuka ya purogyekiti,akakiiko kakareeba ekyetengo ky'okuhaburwa abakugu. N'ekyarugiremu, bakasharamu kutaho embaririra y'okwebuuzaho.

eng_prompt: The city council has approved a comprehensive plan to enhance infrastructure. As a result, there will be an improved transport network.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko k'ekibuga kakkirizza enteekateeka ennambulukufu okutumbula ebintu ebigasiza abantu awamu. N'ekinaavaamu, wajja kubaawo entambula ennungi.
ach_prompt: Kancil me boma madit omoko yub me ilo malo rwom me gedo. Macalo adwogi ne, yoo me wot obi yube.
teo_prompt: Abu ekansulo loka eibuga itigogong ainapeta nuka aitojokar adukena. Kanuka ngun, epote irotin ajokunar.
lgg_prompt: Kanisulu aku ambu city niri niri ai otita azi dria 'bani ecozu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, geri 'bani acizu 'diyi nga ovu otuzaru.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko rw'orurembo rwikiriize enteekateeka y'okutunguura ebyombeko. Ekyarugiremu, nihaza kubaho entambura nungi.

eng_prompt: Before any road construction begins, it is essential to address the impact on local communities. Ensuring fair compensation for affected residents can help mitigate disruptions and foster goodwill.
lug_prompt: Nga okuzimba oluguudo lwonna tekunnatandika, kya mugaso okukola ku ngeri gye lukosaamu ebitundu. Okukakasa nti abatuuze abakoseddwa baliyirirwa mu bwenkanya kiyinza okuyamba okukendeeza ku butabanguko n'okutumbula enkolagana ennungi.
ach_prompt: Mapwod yub me yubu gudi mo keken pe ocake, pire tek tutwal me niang adwoki ne I kom lwak. Neno ni kiculu lutedero ma peko otimme i komgi maber twero konyo me dwoko piny peko ki kelo ber bedo ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Erongo edio erot egeuna aiduk, ejokuna aitemokin ationis na itunga. Ainanakin ikapun luedolitos mama ejaasi itunga luetirorit ngun ingarakini aitidisiar atiokisio ka aitopolor aomisio nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di 'ba e'doni nzila eyi si ku, eri orodriru e'yo eyini eco 'ye ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Geri 'bani 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma arioti ofezu kililiru ri ni e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma omgbo esi dika e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu muke ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'okwombeka enguuto gutakatandikire, n'eky'omugasho kumanya oku gurikukwata aha bantu b'omubyaro. Okureeba ngu abatuuragye abarikuteganisibwa bashumbuusibwa omu muringo oguhikire, nikibaasa kuhwera okukyendeeza oburemeezi n'okureetaho entuura nungi.

eng_prompt: As urban development projects continue to expand, many residents find themselves facing displacement from their homes. In such situations, it becomes essential to address the financial burden of moving.
lug_prompt: Nga pulojekiti z'enkulaakulana mu bibuga zeeyongera okugaziwa, abatuuze bangi beesanga nga boolekedde okusengulwa okuva mu maka gaabwe. Mu mbeera ng'ezo, kiba kikulu okukola ku buzibu bw'ensimbi bw'okusenguka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yub me dongo boma tye kamede ki dongo, lutedero mapol gitye ka nongo peko me kobo ki I gangi gi. I kare ma kit meno, pire tek tutwal me cobo peko me lim ma bino macalo adwogi me kobo.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos ipurojektin lu itopoloere itaunin apoloun, itunga luipu etereikina keda aibwot koreriakec. Kojautene kangol, ejokuna noi aitemokin atiokisio nuka ikapun nuka aibwot.
lgg_prompt: Otita angu ezoma ni aku ambo eyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, 'ba karakara eyi eyi esu eyini aa'zu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi ra. E'yo 'dile 'diyi ma alea, eri eca orodriru e'yo robia ni acizu ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Purogyekiti z'entunguuka omu ndembo ku zirikugumizamu nizeyongyera, abatuuragye baingi nibeshangwa nibafuruka omu maka gaabo. Omu mbeera nk'ezo, nikiba kiri eky'omugasho kukora aha buremeezi bw'esente bw'okufuruka.

eng_prompt: Before moving forward with the project, it is essential to ensure that everyone involved has had their concerns addressed. Clear communication and agreement among all parties are crucial for a successful start.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kugenda mu maaso na pulojekiti, kya mugaso okukakasa nti buli muntu akwatibwako ensonga ze zikoleddwako. Empuliziganya ennungi n'okukkaanya mu buli ludda bikulu nnyo ku ntandikwa ennungi.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe icito anyim ki yub eni, pire tek tutwal me neno ni dano weng matye I yub eni gunongo yoo me cobo peko gi. Lok maber ki winye ikin dano weng pire tek tutwal pi cako tic maber.
teo_prompt: Erongo elosi epurojekt ngol, ejokuna awanyun ebe aponi itemokinai ationisikec. Einer lo ecai ka acamanar kiding itunga kere eraasi nuepolok noi kanu ageunet najokan.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mu drile otita 'da be ku, eri orodriru ndrezu kini 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo eyi ma aza ko 'bo. E'yo nzeza kililiru azini ti ecita 'ba dria ma eselea ri eri orodriru e'dota drile suzaru ni.
nyn_prompt: Otakatandikire purogyekiti, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu buri omwe orikukwatwaho yaakora aha nshonga ze. Okuhurizagana kurungi n'okwikirizana ahagati y'abantu boona, n'eby'omugasho aha ntandikwa nungi.

eng_prompt: In any organization, fostering a sense of ownership and accountability is crucial for success. Engaging individuals in the process can lead to more informed and effective outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, okutumbula enneewulira y'obwannannyini n'obuvunaanyizibwa kikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi. Okwenyigiramu abantu kinnoomu mu nkola kiyinza okuvaamu ebivaamu ebimanyiddwa era ebikola obulungi.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, dongo cwiny me bedo ki twero kacel ki miyo kor tic pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti ne. Dwoko dano acel acel I yub eni twero kelo adwogi maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget ediokere, aitopolorite aomisioit naka ikulepek ka aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut. Aimorikikin itunga toma ainapeta ngun epedori ayangaun akiro nukajokak.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ngulupi si azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. ꞋBani ꞌba yi suzu eꞌyo ꞌyezu ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdiyi eco fe ꞌbani eꞌyo ꞌyezu kililiru azini kililiru ꞌdiyi esuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona, okureetaho enteekateeka y'obugabe n'embaririra n'eky'omugasho munonga aha businguzi. Okutwarira abantu omu nkora, nikibaasa kureetaho ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: The project has been carefully planned to respect property boundaries and minimize disruption to the community. All necessary permits have been obtained to ensure compliance with local regulations.
lug_prompt: Pulojekiti etegekeddwa n'obwegendereza okussa ekitiibwa mu nsalo z'ebyobugagga n'okukendeeza okutaataaganyizibwa mu kitundu. Olukusa lwonna olwetaagisa lufuniddwa okukakasa okugobererwa kw'amateeka g'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Yub eni kiyubu maber tutwal me gwoko wang ngom wek pe obal kwo pa lwak. Kimiyo twero weng ma mite me neno ni ki lubu cik me tedero.
teo_prompt: Itemonokitai epurojekt ngol ejok kanu ayongite ikoruo luka iboro ka aitidisiar aitolitol itunga. Aponi odumunai apapulai kere nu ekotoi kanu awanyun ebe etupitai ikisila luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ba oti otita 'di ma otita geri kililiru si lezu 'ba ma inzi boda angu ma dria 'diyi azini lezu e'yo eyi ezapi ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo esizu. Ba esu rukusa dria lele 'diyi nezu ra kini 'ba obi azita angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Purogyekiti etebekanisiibwe n'obwegyendesereza, okuheereza ekitiinisa ensharo z'eitaka, n'okukyendeeza okutabangura abantu. Ruhusa zoona ezirikwetengwa zitungirwe, okureeba ngu ebiragiro by'ekyaro nibikuratirwa.

eng_prompt: As society continues to evolve, new technologies and innovations are emerging at an unprecedented pace. Recognizing the potential benefits of these advancements is crucial for fostering progress and improving our quality of life.
lug_prompt: Ng'abantu beeyongera okukulaakulana, tekinologiya omupya n'obuyiiya bivaayo ku sipiidi etabangawo. Okutegeera emigaso egiyinza okuva mu nkulaakulana zino kikulu nnyo mu kutumbula enkulaakulana n'okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bwaffe.
ach_prompt: Ka lwak tye kamede ki dongo, diro me tet manyen tye kabino I rwom ma lamal tutwal. Niang ber pa dongo lobo eni pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki ilo malo rwom me kwo wa.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos itunga aijulakin, eutasi itunga aitolomunun acoasinei nuitetiak keda acoasinei nuitetiak. Ajenun ajokisio nuepedorete atakanun kotoma apol erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloria apol keda aitojokar adoketait na aijar wok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini muzu zozu drile, e'yo tekenologia ni o'diru 'diyi azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi efu okposi. Orodri ecopi orodriru e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma e'yo egazu ri eri orodriru tu e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini geri ama ma edri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu barikugumizamu nibahinduka, tekinorogye ensya n'okujumbura biriyo nibibaho aha sipiidi etari ya buriijo. Okwetegyereza emigasho y'entunguuka egi n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho entunguuka n'okutunguura omutindo gw'entuura yaitu.

eng_prompt: In order to effectively address the community's needs, it is essential to foster open communication and collaboration. Building trust and understanding among all stakeholders will lead to more effective decision-making.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukola obulungi ku byetaago by'ekitundu, kikulu nnyo okukuuma empuliziganya ennungi n'okukolagana. Okuzimba obwesige n'okutegeeragana mu bonna abakwatibwako kijja kuviirako okusalawo okulungi.
ach_prompt: Pi tyeko miti pa lwak maber, pire tek tutwal me kelo lok ki winye ikin lwak. Gedo gen ki winye ikin joo ma timo tic eni obi weko moko tam bedo ber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ejok ipudesia luka itunga, ejokuna aitopolor einer keda aiswamanara. Aitogogong amunokina keda apuponoro kanejaas itunga kere eyangauni aitolomunun aseununeta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo o'bi eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, eri orodriru e'yo nzeza azini ti icita ma omgbo otuzu. Asi'baza azini vata sizu 'ba dria ambo 'diyi ma eselea ri ni nga fe e'yo peta pezu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza kurungi ebyetengo by'abantu, n'eky'omugasho munonga okugira empurizagana n'okukwatanisa. Okwombeka obwesigye n'okwetegyerezana omu bantu boona, nikiija kureetaho okusharamu kurungi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote cultural heritage and historical awareness, the government has decided to highlight significant figures from the nation's past. As part of this initiative, the ministry of tourism has launched the story about Idi Amin.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula eby'obuwangwa n'okumanyisa ebyafaayo, gavumenti esazeewo okulaga abantu ab'omugaso okuva mu byafaayo by'eggwanga. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, minisitule y'ebyobulambuzi etongozza emboozi ekwata ku Idi Amin.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyelo kor lok me tekwaro ki ngec macon, gamente omoko tamme me nyuto dano ma pigi tego I kare macon me lobo man. Macalo but yub man, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom limo piny okati ki lok kom Idi Amin.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor akiro nuka einono keda acoa naka akiro nukolo, aseun apugan aitodun itunga luepolok noi kotoma akiro nukolo nuka akwapuwok. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, etolomu erionget loka eilat akiro nuikamunitos Idi Amin.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo suruni 'diyi otuzu azini imbata fezu e'yo a'dinisi 'diyi ma dria, gamete asi 'du e'yo 'ba orodriru engapi kari ma ewu drio 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'di ma azi ru, okalamvu mile otizaniri e'do o'duko Idi Amin ma dria 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'okumanyisa abantu ebyafaayo,gavumenti eshaziremu kworeka abantu b'omugasho kuruga omu byafaayo by'eihanga. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, minisiture y'eby'oburambuzi etandikireho ekitebyo ekirikukwata ahari Idi Amin.

eng_prompt: As interest in Uganda's political landscape grows, many citizens are seeking to understand the legacies of their leaders. This demand for knowledge has sparked discussions about the importance of documenting the country's political history.
lug_prompt: Obwagazi mu byobufuzi bya Uganda bweyongera, bannansi bangi banoonya okutegeera eby'obusika by'abakulembeze baabwe. Obwetaavu buno obw'amagezi buviiriddeko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw'okuwandiika ebyafaayo by'eggwanga mu byobufuzi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me lok me cungu iwi bye me lobo Uganda tye ka dongo, anywali mapol tye ka mito niang jami ma lutela gi otimo. Miti me ngec eni okelo nywako lok I kom ber pa coyo lok kom cungu iwi bye macon me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kwape apolor eipud loka epolitikis loko Uganda, ekotosi itunga luipu ajenun nuikamunitos engarenok kec. Eipud lo loka acoa nes eyaunit epeget kanuikamunitos ajokis naka aiwadika akiro nukolo nuka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza e'yo politiki ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri si, kari anzi karakara eyi le e'yo drice'ba eyivile 'diyi ni 'diyi ma e'yo va. E'yo 'bani lezu ondua esuzu 'diri fe agbatara ma omgbo e'yo orodri e'yo politiki ni kari ma alia 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku eby'obutegyeki bwa Uganda birikweyongyera, abatuuragye baingi nibenda kumanya ebirikukwata aha beebembezi baabo. Ekyetengo ky'obwengye eki kireesireho okuhanuura aha mugasho gw'okuhandiika ebyafaayo by'obutegyeki bw'eihanga.

eng_prompt: As the debate heated up, tensions rose among the crowd gathered to discuss the nation's past. Some individuals began to question the authenticity of the information being presented by the outsiders.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo bwe kweyongera, obunkenke bweyongera mu bantu abaali bakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku byafaayo by'eggwanga. Abantu abamu baatandika okubuusabuusa obutuufu bw'amawulire agaali gaweereddwa abantu ab'ebweru.
ach_prompt: I kare ma laro lok omedde, lworo omedde I kin dano ma gugure me nywako lok I kom jami ma otime I kare macon me lobo man. Dano mukene gucako bedo ki akala-kala I kom lok ada pa dano ma aa ki woko.
teo_prompt: Neapolor epeget, apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos kanejaas itunga lu atukonokin kanu aitemitem akiro nukolo nuka akwap. Apotu icetunga kogeutu abuonokin abeit naka akiro nu elimunitai kokinga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara niri ni ecaria drizaru, asi otiza tu 'ba eyi ma eselea okupi e'yo nzezu kari 'di ma ewu drio ri ma dria. Ba azi 'diyi e'do e'yo a'da e'yo 'ba amve 'diyi ni ece 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: To understand the evolution of broadcasting in the country, extensive research was conducted. This involved delving into various sources to gather comprehensive information.

eng_prompt: The curators aimed to highlight the significance of historical narratives in shaping contemporary identities. By showcasing various artifacts and artworks, they invite visitors to reflect on the complexities of cultural heritage.

lgg_prompt: ꞋBa eꞌyo ꞌyeꞌba ꞌdiyi le ꞌba ma ece orodri ꞌbani eꞌyo ꞌyezu ewu driorisi ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌbani eꞌyo ꞌyezu ewu curuꞌdo ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdiyi ma dria. Afa edele ewu driorisi 'diyi e'dazu, eyi omu eyi omve e'yo egazu e'yo ewaru e'yo suruni 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: The local government has approved plans for a new cultural project. As part of this initiative, there will be a construction of the museum in the area.

ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero omoko yub me yub me tekwaro manyen. Macalo but yub man, kibi yubu museum I kabedo eni.

lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ai otita eyi otita o'diru e'yo suruni 'diyini. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga angu afa eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi si angu 'da ma alea.

eng_prompt: In an increasingly interconnected world, communities are recognizing the importance of showcasing their unique offerings. As a result, various initiatives are being launched to highlight local attractions and foster economic growth.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eyeeyongedde okukwatagana, ebitundu bikitegedde obukulu bw'okwolesa ebiweebwayo byabwe eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zitongozebwa okulaga ebifo ebisikiriza eby'omu kitundu n'okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions with community leaders and stakeholders, the board has finalized plans for a new cultural initiative. As part of this effort, the district will secure land for the construction of the museum.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'abakulembeze b'ekitundu n'abakwatibwako, akakiiko kaamalirizza enteekateeka z'enteekateeka y'ebyobuwangwa empya. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, disitulikiti ejja kufuna ettaka ery'okuzimbako ekkaddiyizo ly'ebintu eby'edda.

teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka arotak iyemuto naewomitai ebe ebeit ajaikin, apotu ekomiti kimorikikinos einer nuikamunitos aseo naebunit. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka ailajara keda ailajara kotoma ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie 'bani egale saaru ri ma alea, komiti 'da tra eyi e'yo nzezu e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria e'yo opeta emupi 'diyi ma dria. Eyi fe okpo orodri e'yo ada ni azini e'yo ada be ri ma dria e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: Visitors gathered in the gallery, eager to learn more about the rich cultural heritage of East Africa. Curators had meticulously arranged artifacts and displays to highlight significant events and figures in Uganda's past.
lug_prompt: Abagenyi baakuŋŋaanidde mu galagi, nga baagala nnyo okumanya ebisingawo ku buwangwa bw'amawanga g'obuvanjuba bwa Afirika. Abakuumaddembe baali bategese n'obwegendereza ebintu eby'edda n'okwolesebwa okulaga ebintu ebikulu ebyaliwo n'abantu ab'omu byafaayo bya Uganda.
ach_prompt: Wele gucokke I ka nyuto cal mapat-pat, ki miti me pwonyo jami mapol I kom tekwaro pa lobo Afrika kunyango. Lutela guyubu ki diro jami macon me nyuto jami mapigi tego ma otimme I kare macon me lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Apotu ipejok kotukokinos aiboisit naetodianarere iboro, ekotosi aisisia nuipu nuikamunitos inonosio luka East Africa. Apotu itunga luka atukot ngin itemonokisi ejok iboro luiswamauna kapakio nukokau kanu aitodun akiro nuapolok nuapotu kotakanutu koUganda kapakio nukokau.
lgg_prompt: Omu eyi tra eyi angu 'bani afa ndundu eyi e'dazu 'diyi ma alea eyini ava be e'yo onizu e'yo suruni East Africa ni 'diyi ma dria. Ba afa edele ewu driorisi 'diyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi otu afa edele ewu driorisi 'diyi tualu afa 'bani e'dazu 'diyi pie e'dazu e'yo orodriru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abagyenyi baketeeranira omu myanya y'okureeberaho ebishushani, baine ekihika ky'okwega ebirikukwata aha bugaiga bw'eby'obuhangwa bwa burugwa izooba bwa Africa. Abarikureeberera eby'obuhangwa bakaba batebekaniise n'obwegyendesereza eby'obuhangwa n'okworeka ebyabaireho n'abantu b'omugasho omu byafaayo bya Uganda.

eng_prompt: Naming roads after influential leaders can serve as a tribute to their contributions to the nation. It helps to instill a sense of history and pride in the community.
lug_prompt: Okutuuma enguudo amannya g'abakulembeze ab'amaanyi kisobola okulaga nti tusiima ebyo bye baakola mu ggwanga. Kiyamba okussa enkola y'ebyafaayo n'okwenyumiriza mu kitundu.

teo_prompt: Aijukar irotin ikiroria luka engarenok lu epol ajokis epedori aitodun nu iswamatos kesi kanuka akwap. Ingarakini ngin aisisianakin itunga akiro nukolo ka aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Nzila eyi ma ru sizu drice'ba okporu 'diyi ma ru si ri eco azi nga inzita fezu azi eyini nga kari 'di ma alea 'diyini. Eri azakoma fe e'yo adi ni azini afusi 'diyi 'bazu ongulumu eyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various regions of Uganda have played pivotal roles in shaping the nation's progress. Among these, the West Nile region stands out for its significant contributions to economic and social development.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebitundu bya Uganda eby'enjawulo bikoze emirimu emikulu mu kutumbula enkulaakulana y'eggwanga. Mu bino, ekitundu kya West Nile kyeyoleka olw'obuyambi bwakyo obw'amaanyi mu nkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna n'embeera z'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, but lobo Uganda mapat-pat gutimo tic mapire tek tutwal I dongo lobo man. I kin lobe magi, but lobo me west nile tye ki jami mapol ma okelo dongo lobo I tenge me lim ki kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, iswamata aiboisio nuegelegela nuka Uganda aswam naepol noi kotoma aitopoloria apol naka akwap. Kotoma aiboisio nu, erai atutubet nako West Nile naepol noi kanu aitopolor edumune loka ikapun keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, angu kari Uganda niri ma woko ndundu 'diyi nga azi okporu kari 'di ma zota ma alea. Angu 'diyi ma eselea, angu westnile niri e'da e'yo erini 'ye okporu angu ezoma e'yo robiani azini o'bi yi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, ebicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe omu Uganda bikozire emirimo y'amaani omu kutunguura eihanga. Omuri ebi, ekyanga kya West Nile nikyeyongyera ahabw'obuhwezi bw'amaani omu ntunguuka y'eby'entaasya hamwe n'entunguuka y'abantu.

eng_prompt: During a recent visit to the cultural heritage site, the minister expressed his commitment to supporting local traditions. He emphasized the importance of preserving the Lugbara culture for future generations.
lug_prompt: Mu kulambula okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko awo mu bifo eby'obuwangwa, minisita yalaga obumalirivu bwe mu kuwagira eby'obuwangwa by'omu kitundu. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukuuma obuwangwa bw'e Lugbara olw'emirembe egijja.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en olimo kabedo me tekwaro cokcok-ki, minista onyuto cwinye me cwako tekwaro me tedero. En owaco ni pire tek me gwoko tekwaro me Lugbara pi anyim.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka aipejokin aiboisit naka einono, abu eminista kitodu ainakina ke kanu aigang inonosio luka atutubet. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aidar inonosio luka Lugbara kanuka ateker nakoingaren.
lgg_prompt: Sawa erini muzu omuru angu e'yo suruni 'diyi ma alia o'di 'diyi ma alia, minisita 'da ece ava erini e'yo suruni 'diyi atizu. Eri fe okpo orodri 'bani e'yo suruni Lugbara ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu ewu drusiri ni.
nyn_prompt: Obu yaabaire ataayaayiire emyanya y'eby'obuhangwa, minisita akooreka okwehayo kwe kushagika eby'obuhangwa. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa bwa Lugbara ahabw'eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: Uganda has a diverse cultural heritage and a complex past that reflects its various ethnic groups and historical events. To fully appreciate and understand this nation's journey, it is essential to document and analyze its history comprehensively.
lug_prompt: Uganda erina eby'obuwangwa eby'enjawulo n'ebyafaayo eby'enjawulo ebiraga amawanga gaayo ag'enjawulo n'ebyafayo mu byafaayo. Okusiima n'okutegeera olugendo lw'eggwanga lino, kyetaagisa okuwandiika n'okwekenneenya ebyafaayo byalyo mu bujjuvu.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye ki tekwaro ma pat pat ki jami ma otime I kare macon ma nyutu kaka ki jami ma otime I kare macon. Me bedo ki pwoc ki niang maber I kom wot pa lobo man, pire tek tutwal me coyo ki ngiyo lok me tekwaro ne I yoo matut tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi Uganda keda inonosio luegelegela keda akiro nukokau nu itodunitos atekerin nu egelegela keda akiro nukolosek. Kanu ajenun ka amisiikin alosit naka akwap kana, ejokuna noi aiwadik ka aingic akiro nukolo.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma e'yo suruni 'diyi karakara dika e'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi e'da suru ndundu eyi ma eselea tualu e'yo ewu driori ma alea 'diyi pie. Bani ani ecozu aci kari 'di niri ma e'yo 'duzu kililiru, eri orodriru e'yo eri vile 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Uganda eine eby'obuhangwa eby'omutaano hamwe n'ebyabaireho ebirikworeka enganda zaayo n'ebyabaireho. Okwetegyereza kurungi orugyendo rw'eihanga eri, nikikuru okuhandiika n'okushwijuma ebyafaayo byaryo kurungi.

eng_prompt: As the excitement builds in the community, plans are being finalized for a grand celebration. This year marks a significant milestone for the club, making the event even more special.
lug_prompt: Nga essanyu lyeyongera mu kitundu, enteekateeka zimalirizibwa okujaguza okw'amaanyi. Omwaka guno guba gwa nkizo nnyo eri ttiimu, ekireetera omukolo guno okuba ogw'enjawulo ennyo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma yom-cwiny tye ka mede ikin lwak, yub tye ka time pi kwer madit tutwal. Mwaka man obedo mwaka ma pire tek tutwal pi dul tuku eni, ma oweko yub eni odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aiyalama kotunga, eutai aitemonokin ainapeta nuka ainumunum naepol noi. Erai ekaru lo apak naepol noi kanu ekilabu, ido ijaikit epucit ngol aiboisit na itegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko zuza ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, 'ba otita eyi asizu ayiko zuza amboru ni 'diyi 'yezu. Eli 'disi ri e'yo azi okporu ni amuti 'da ni, e'yo 'di 'bapi wura ndusi.
nyn_prompt: Okushemererwa kweyongyeire omu bantu, enteekateeka z'okujaguza kw'amaani ziriyo nizikorwa. Omwaka ogu n'ogw'omugasho munonga aha kiraabu, ekirikureetera omukoro kweyongyera kuba ogw'omutaano.

eng_prompt: The community has been eagerly planning a series of events to honor the local heritage. As a result, the celebrations will take place in February.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kiteekateeka n'obwagazi emikolo egy'enjawulo okussa ekitiibwa mu buwangwa bw'ekitundu. N'ekyavaamu, ebikujjuko bijja kubaawo mu Gwokubiri.

eng_prompt: The long-awaited championship victory has finally arrived, uniting fans and players alike in celebration. As the final whistle blew, the excitement in the air was palpable, marking a historic moment for our town.

eng_prompt: For years, the team has worked tirelessly to build a strong community presence and foster local talent. Their dedication and success on the field have made them a beloved institution in the region.

Asi feza yini azini drile suza yini pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alia 'diyi fe yini ovuzu pari 'ba lepi tu angu 'di ma alea ri'I.

eng_prompt: In the heart of the city, the vibrant nightlife draws in crowds from all walks of life. As a result, local entrepreneurs have found unique ways to capitalize on the bustling social scene.
lug_prompt: Mu mutima gw'ekibuga, obulamu bw'ekiro obujjuvu busikiriza abantu okuva mu buli mbeera y'obulamu. N'ekivuddemu, abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu bazudde engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okufunamu ssente mu mbeera y'embeera z'abantu ezirimu akajagalalo.

lgg_prompt: Aku ambu cityniri ma aliari ma alia, idri inisiri ni 'ba yi eji engazu pari dria ma alia. E'yo 'disi, 'ba tujari 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu geri ndundu eyini ecozu robia esuzu angu 'da ma alea.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments and feedback from members, the club has decided to hold an emergency meeting. During this meeting, the club will address all the challenges it is facing.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bigenda mu maaso gye buvuddeko n'ebiteeso okuva mu bammemba, kiraabu esazeewo okukuba olukiiko olw'amangu. Mu lukiiko luno, ttiimu ejja kukola ku kusoomoozebwa kwonna kw'eyolekaganye nakwo.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges, including financial constraints and fierce competition, the club has shown remarkable resilience. Their commitment to developing local talent and fostering a strong community support has played a crucial role in their success.

ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gurwatte ki peko mapol, ma I kingi obedo peko me lim ki pyem matek tutwal, dul tuku eni onyuto tekcwiny madit tutwal. Cwinygi me pwonyo dano matye ki diro ki cwak ma aa ki bot lwak okonyo tutwal I cobo miti gi.

eng_prompt: In any organization, the productivity of employees plays a crucial role in determining overall success. When workers are motivated and skilled, they tend to perform their tasks more effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, okukola kw'abakozi kulina kinene kye kukola mu kusalawo obuwanguzi okutwalira awamu. Abakozi bwe baba nga bakubirizibwa era nga balina obukugu, batera okukola emirimu gyabwe obulungi.

eng_prompt: The community has been eagerly preparing for the annual festival. Excitement is building as the date approaches, and everyone is looking forward to the festivities.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kyetegekera n'obwagazi omukolo ogutegekebwa buli mwaka. Essanyu lyeyongera ng'olunaku lusembera era buli omu yeesunga ebikujjuko.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent challenges faced by the organization, the leadership team has been discussing potential solutions. To ensure the club's success, the president will support the club where they are lacking.

eng_prompt: As the community gathered to discuss pressing issues, it became clear that the atmosphere was charged with a sense of urgency and camaraderie. What started as a simple meeting quickly evolved into a platform for voices to be heard and connections to be made.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ez'amangu, kyalabika bulungi nti embeera yabaddemu obwetaavu obw'amangu n'omukwano. Ekyo ekyatandika ng'olukiiko olutonotono kyakyuka mangu ne kifuuka omukutu amaloboozi mwe gawulirwa n'okukwatagana okukolebwa.
