teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukonokin kanu aitemitem akiro nuka atiokisio, apotu kojenutu ebe ejai eipud loka atiokisio keda aimorikikina. Ibore yen egeunit kwape airiamunet naedit abu koraun aiboisit na epupere iporotoi ka arucokina.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da eyi oku eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria, e'da kililiru kini angu 'da ma alea e'yo eyi 'ye mbeleru tualu e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie. E'yo andra e'dopi mitingi ewakokoru ri eca geri 'bani o'duko eyi erizu azini eyi ecizu 'ba eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga z'amaani, kikarebeka butunu ngu embeera ekaba eri ey'amaani n'obumwe. Ekyatandikire nk'orukiiko rworobi kikarahuka kuhinduka omwanya gw'okugarukamu amahurire n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In a diverse society, it is essential to foster an environment of respect and understanding among individuals with varying beliefs. Embracing our differences can lead to more productive discussions and a stronger community.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu ab'enjawulo, kya mugaso okukuza embeera y'ekitiibwa n'okutegeeragana mu bantu abalina enzikiriza ez'enjawulo. Okukkiriza enjawukana zaffe kisobola okuleetawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okulungi n'ekitundu ekinywevu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma dano tye ma pat pat, pire tek tutwal me kelo woro ki niang ikin dano matye ki niyee ma pat pat. Cwako apoka-poka matye ikinwa twero weko nywako lok bedo ber dok dongo kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela, ejokuna aitopolor aiboisit na ayongit ka apuponoro kanejaas itunga lu iyuunitos iyuunito luegelegela. Aicam atiaketait wok epedori ayangaun aineranara na ejok keda atutubet na egogong.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ndundu eyi ma alea, eri orodriru inzita azini vata ma omgbo otuzu 'ba a'ita ndundu 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo ama esele cozu 'diyi atizu ri eco e'yo nzeza orodriru azini ongulumu okporu 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'emitwarize etarikushushana, n'eky'omugasho okureetaho emicwe y'ekitiinisa n'okwetegyerezana omu bantu b'enyikiriza ezitari zimwe. Okwikiriza entaaniso zaitu, nikibaasa kureetaho okuhanuura kurungi n'obuhangwa burungi.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about climate change and habitat loss, local officials have initiated discussions on sustainable practices. Community members have expressed a strong desire to protect their natural resources for future generations.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku nkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okusaanawo kw'obutonde, abakungu b'ebyalo batandiseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkola eziwangaala. Abantu b'omu kitundu balaze obwagazi obw'amaanyi okukuuma eby'obugagga byabwe eby'obutonde olw'emirembe egijja.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom alokaloka pa piny ki rweny pa kabedo pa dano, lutic me tedero gucako nywako lok I kom kit me gwoko kwo pa dano. Lwak gunyutu miti matek me gwoko cwec ma lubanga aye ocweyo pi anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka ekuse keda ecae lo akwap keda aibiror naka aiboisio, etegeasi eswamak luka atutubet ineresinei nuikamunitos iponesio luajokak. Apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu eipud loepol noi loka aidar iborokec luka Edeke kanuka ateker naka oingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi e'yo angu mile ma ojata ma dria azini angu 'bani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ri ma dria, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do e'yo nze e'yo 'yeta eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'da ava okporu eyi ma lonyi nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu ewu drialeri ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'empindahinduka y'obwire hamwe n'okufeerwa eby'obuhangwa, abakungu b'ebyaro batandikireho okuhanuura aha bikwatireine n'obuhangwa. Abantu b'omukyanga boorekire ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okurinda eby'obuhangwa bwabo ahabw'eminyeeto y'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing concerns about water scarcity and environmental degradation, government officials convened to discuss potential solutions. After extensive deliberation, they decided to take action by launching a new initiative.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bbula ly'amazzi n'okwonoona obutonde bw'ensi, abakungu ba gavumenti baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ensonga. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo nga batongoza enteekateeka empya.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom peko me nok pa pii ki bale pa cwec ma orumuwa, lutic pa gamente gubedo ka lok I kom yoo me cobo peko ne. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tamgi me cako yub manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka ekadakada loka akipi keda amunar alupok, apotu eswamak luka apugan iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu kesi koseutu aswam kowai lo aitegear aomisioit naitetet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi e'yo yi ako ni azini angu ama agei ri ezazuri ma dria, azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri 'bani ecozu eyi ma aza kozu ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi asi 'du e'yo 'yezu geri eyini e'dozu e'yo azi o'diru ni si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahabw'eibura ry'amaizi hamwe n'okusisikara kw'obuhangwa bw'ensi, abakuru omu gavumenti bakateerana kuhanuura aha bintu ebirikubaasa kukorwa. Bwanyima y'okuteesa munonga, bakasharamu kutandikaho enteekateeka nsya.

eng_prompt: Before any new legislation can be enacted, it must undergo a thorough review. This ensures that all necessary checks and balances are in place.
lug_prompt: Etteeka eriggya bwe liba terinnaba kuteekebwa mu mateeka, lirina okusooka okwekenneenyezebwa obulungi. Kino kikakasa nti ebintu byonna ebyetaagisa bikolebwa.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe kiketo cik manyen mo keken, omyero kong kikwany maber. Man neno ni jami weng ma mite me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Erongo itolomun ekisil loitetet, ekot airereonor ejok. Einakini ngin awanyun ebe ibwaikitai iboro kere lu ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di 'ba e'doni azita o'dini si ku, le 'ba ma andri eri geri kililiru si. Diri ne ra kini e'yo dria 'bani le 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ci.
nyn_prompt: Ebiragiro ebisya bitakatandikire kukorwa, bishemereire kushwijumwa kurungi. Eki nikireebeka ngu ebintu byona ebirikwetengwa nibibaho.

eng_prompt: As the city plans for future development, it is crucial for the council to assess the potential impact on the community. Accurate assessments will guide their decisions regarding land use and resource allocation.
lug_prompt: Nga ekibuga kiteekateeka okukulaakulana mu biseera eby'omu maaso, kikulu nnyo akakiiko okwekenneenya ebiyinza okukosa ekitundu. Okunoonyereza okutuufu kujja kulagirira okusalawo kwabwe ku nkozesa y'ettaka n'okugaba eby'obugagga.
ach_prompt: Ka citi tye ka yube pi dongo lobo me anyim, pire tek tutwal ki kancil me neno adwoki ne I kom lwak. Bedo ki ngec matut I kom ngom obi konyo I moko tam gi I kom kit me tic ki lonyo.
teo_prompt: Kwape itemonokini esite nuka apol koingaren, ejokuna ekansulo airereor epone loepedoriata itunga aswam ngun. Aingic na abeit nes ebuni aingarenikin aseununeta kec nuikamunitos aitwasam alupok keda aikor iboro.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambu city niri ni otuta 'yeria angu ezoma ewu drile ri ma alea, eri orodriru kanisulu ni e'yo ecopi 'yepi ongulumu eyi ma dria ra 'diyi ma ale andrizu. E'yo eti ondaza kililiru 'diyi nga e'yo yini 'diyi ma dri ce e'yo nyaku ayuza ma dria azini lonyi awaza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ekibuga kukirikukora enteekateeka y'entunguka omu biro by'omumaisho, n'eky'omugasho munonga akakiiko kushwijuma ebirikubaasa kukwata aha bantu. Okucondooza okuhikire, nikwija kuhwera omu kusharamu aha bikwatiraine n'okukoresa eitaka hamwe n'okugabira abantu eby'obugaiga.

eng_prompt: In any organization, fostering a sense of ownership and collaboration is essential for success. To achieve this, it is crucial to ensure that stakeholders are actively engaged in the process.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, okutumbula enneewulira y'obwannannyini n'okukolagana kikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi. Okutuukiriza kino, kikulu nnyo okukakasa nti abakwatibwako benyigira mu nkola.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, dongo cwiny me bedo wegge ki winye obedo gin ma pire tek pi cobo miti ne. Me cobo man, pire tek tutwal me neno ni joo ma lok tye I komgi gubedo tye I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget ediokere, aitopolor eipud loka aimorikikina keda aimorikikina erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ejokuna noi awanyun ebe ejaas itunga kere toma akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ma ta mbazu tualu azi ngazu tualu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. E'yo 'di 'yezu, eri orodriru ndrezu kini 'ba ambo ndundu 'diyi fi e'yo nde ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona, okureetaho enkoragana n'okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi. Okuhikiiriza eki, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu abu kirikukwataho boona bejumbire omu nkora egyo.

eng_prompt: After a thorough review of the candidates' qualifications and community involvement, the committee presented their recommendations. Following a lively discussion, the council reached a consensus on the proposed appointments.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebisaanyizo by'abeesimbyewo n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu, akakiiko kaayanjudde ebiteeso byabwe. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi, akakiiko kaatuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku nteekateeka y'okulonda.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo rwom me kwan pa lutino kwan kacel ki miti pa lwak, dul ne gumiyo tam gi. Ingee nywako lok maber tutwal, lutela guwinye I kom yub me cimo dano.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor iboro lu itutuoritai kanu abwaak keda itunga, abu ekomiti ijaik aomisio kec. Akaulo naka aineranara ejok, abu ekansulo kodolok acamanara kanuikamunitos aseununeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma onita ma vutia azini e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'da fe egata eyini 'diyi ra. E'yo onzeza avasiri ma vutia, kanisulu 'da esu ti ecita e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi ebirikwetengwa by'abeesimbireho hamwe n'okwejumba kw'abantu, akakiiko kakareeta ebiteiso byaabo. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura kurungi,akakiiko kakaikirizana aha nteekateeka y'okutoorana abantu.

eng_prompt: As we assess our current strategies, it's crucial to consider the impact of our decisions on future outcomes. What steps can we take to ensure our efforts align with our goals?
lug_prompt: Nga twekenneenya enteekateeka zaffe eziriwo kati, kikulu okulowooza ku ngeri okusalawo kwaffe gye kuyinza okukosaamu ebinaavaamu mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka neno yoo ma watye kwede kombedi, pire tek tutwal me neno adwoki pa tam ma wamoko I kom jami ma obitimme I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kwape sio aanyanar iwaitin lu iswamaete oni kopana, ejok aanyun epone loepedoria oni aitodolikin nu iswamaete oni koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo amani 'ye sawa 'disi 'diyi ma ale andriria, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo amani 'dule ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nitushwijuma enkora yaitu eriho hati, n'eky'omugasho okureeba oku ebiteiso byaitu birikubaasa kukora omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to protect the delicate ecosystem and its diverse wildlife, the local conservation group has proposed a new initiative. This plan aims to create a safe environment for the flora and fauna that thrive in the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi obunafu n'ebisolo byayo eby'omu nsiko eby'enjawulo, ekibiina ekikuuma obutonde mu kitundu kiteesezza enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno eruubirira kutondawo embeera ennungi eri ebimera n'ebisolo ebikula mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki jami ma orumuwa, dul ma gwoko cwec ma orumuwa okatti ki tam manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me kelo kabedo maber pi jami makwo ki lum matye ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na ayuarite isuban luka ekwam keda itiang lukokutwi luegelegela, etemoki egurupu loka aidar iboro luitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitolomun aiboisit na eyuwara kanuka iraan keda itiang luejarete noi katutubet.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu angu 'da ma ta mbazu tualu anyapa asea 'diyi pie, amuti angu 'da ma ta mbapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu angu kililiru sizu anyapa asea azini anyapa asea 'diyi dri angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'obuhangwa bwabyo, ekitongore ky'okurinda eby'obuhangwa kihaire ekiteiso ekisya. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okureetaho obusingye burungi ahabw'ebimera n'enyamaishwa ebirikukurakurana omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for innovation in various fields, the government has decided to invest in advanced learning initiatives. This initiative aims to bridge the gap between academia and industry.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obuyiiya mu bintu eby'enjawulo, gavumenti esazeewo okussa ssente mu by'enjigiriza eby'omulembe. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okumalawo ekituli wakati w'abasomesa n'abakola amakolero.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me nongo diro manyen I tenge mapat-pat, gamente omoko tamme me keto lim I yub me kwan me rwom ma malo. Yub man tye ki miti me juko apoka-poka matye ikin gangi kwan ki lucat wil.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loepol noi loka aitolomunun iboro luitetiak kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela, abu apugan koseu aipikakin ikapunukec toma aisisia naka adoketait nakokuju. Alosikinet na erai aitikitik eidicane loejai kiding esomero keda ikampunin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo ndundu eyi edezu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, gamete 'du e'yo lonyi vuti aleza 'bazu e'yo onita ni okporu 'diyi ma alea. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu esele coza sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea okalamvu eyi pie ri ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetago bw'okujumbura omu myoga etari emwe,gavumenti eshaziremu kuta esente omu mishomo y'ahaiguru. Ekigyendererwa ky'ekigyendererwa eki n'okuzibira omwanya oguri ahagati y'abeegi n'abakugu omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to stimulate economic growth, local officials have outlined a new development plan. This initiative aims to attract investment and create job opportunities in the region.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna, abakungu b'ebyalo bataddewo enteekateeka empya ey'enkulaakulana. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okusikiriza bamusigansimbi n'okutondawo emirimu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute me kelo dongo lobo I tenge me lim, lutic me tedero guyubu yub me dongo lobo manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me kelo biacara ki cako tic I twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong apol naka ikapun, etolomutu eswamak luka atutubet ainapeta nuitetiak nuka apol. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai kanu ayangaun agwelanar keda aitolomun aswamisinei kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'da otita angu ezoma ni o'diru ni eyi. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu 'ba lonyi vuti alezani 'diyi ejizu azini drileba azi fezu 'diyi ejizu angu 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya, abakungu b'ebyaro bateireho enteekateeka nsya y'entunguuka. Ekigyendererwa n'okureetaho eby'obushubuzi n'emirimo omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: As the economy continues to grow and diversify, opportunities for trade are expanding. This shift is expected to attract both local entrepreneurs and international businesses.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyenfuna byeyongera okukula n'okukyuka, emikisa gy'ebyobusuubuzi gyeyongera. Enkyukakyuka eno esuubirwa okusikiriza abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu n'ab'ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: Ka biacara tye kamede ki dongo, gum me timo biacara bene tye ka nya. Aloka-loka man byek tye ni obi kelo lutim biacara me tedero kacel ki biacara ma aa ki ilobo mawoko.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini apol naka ikapun keda aiboisio nuegelegela, iyatakinos arerengesio nuka agwelanar. Eomitai ebe ebuni aijulakinet ngin ayangaun agwelanarak luka akwapuwok keda akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robiani 'diyi ni mu drile zoria azini yi ma eselea, drileba tujari ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ojata 'di ni nga 'ba tujari 'yepi kari 'di ma alea ogogo 'diyi eji tualu tujari kari amve 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entaasya ku birikugumizamu nibikura, n'emigisha y'eby'obushubuzi neyeyongyera. Empindahinduka egi neeza kureetaho abashubuzi b'omwihanga hamwe n'abashubuzi b'amahanga goona.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the region of Arua has seen significant growth and investment opportunities. To support this progress, the government has implemented various initiatives aimed at enhancing local infrastructure.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ekitundu kya Arua kirabye enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi n'emikisa gy'okusiga ensimbi. Okuwagira enkulaakulana eno, gavumenti etadde mu nkola enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, but piny me Arua dong odongo tutwal ki gum me timo biacara. Me tyelo kor dongo lobo man, gamente oketo yub mapat-pat me ilo malo rwom me gedo.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ewanyunit aiboisit nako Arua apol keda arerengesio nuka agwelanar. Kanu aigang apol na, etolomu apugan iponesio luegelegela lu ekotore aitojokar iboro luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, angu Arua niri esu zota okporu tualu drileba lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi pie. E'yo angu ezoma ni 'diri atizu, gamete 'ba e'yo ndundu eyini lezu afa ayuzaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, ekyanga kya Arua kitungire entunguuka n'obushubuzi. Okushagika entunguuka egi,gavumenti eteire omu nkora enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okutunguura ebyombeko by'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: Collaboration is essential for innovation and progress in any field. By pooling their diverse skills and perspectives, individuals can create solutions that are more effective and impactful.
lug_prompt: Okukwatagana kwa mugaso mu kuyiiya n'okukulaakulana mu kisaawe kyonna. Mu kugatta obukugu bwabwe obw'enjawulo n'endowooza, abantu basobola okuleetawo eby'okugonjoola ebizibu ebikola obulungi era ebireetawo enkyukakyuka.
ach_prompt: Winye obedo gin ma pire tek pi kelo diro ki dongo lobo I kabedo mo keken. Ka dano guribo diro gi mapat-pat kacel ki tam gi, gitwero kelo yoo me cobo peko mapat-pat makelo adwogi maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Erai aiswamanara ibore yenepol noi kanu aitolomunun acoasinei nuitetiak ka apol kotoma aiboisio kere. Kowai lo aimorikikin acoasinei kec keda aomisiokec, epedorete itunga aitolomun iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita eri orodriru e'yo ndundu eyi edezu azini zota ejizu pari ciria. Geri eyini ondua eyini ndundu 'diyi trazu tualu egata eyini 'diyi pie risi, 'ba eyi eco e'yo eyi ma aza ko geri kililiru azini orodriru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okujumbura n'okutunguuka omumirimo yoona. Abantu ku barikugaita emyoga yaabo n'ebiteekateeko byabo, nibabaasa kutunga oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions with community leaders, the local government has finalized plans for a new development initiative. To support this effort, the district has provided land for the project.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'abakulembeze b'ekitundu, gavumenti y'ebitundu emalirizza enteekateeka z'enkulaakulana empya. Okuyambako mu kaweefube ono, disitulikiti ewaddeyo ettaka lya pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Ingee lok mapol ki lutela me tedero, gamente me tedero otyeko yubu yub me dongo lobo manyen. Me tyelo kor tic man, district omiyo ngom pi yub eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda engarenok lu atutubet, adau apugan naka atutubet angetakin aitemonokineta nuka apol naitetet. Kanu aigang aswam na, ejaiki edisitrikt alupok kanu epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri de otita eyi e'dozu e'yo angu ezoma ni o'diru 'diyi 'yezu. Atita fezu okpo 'di ni, distrikiti fe nyaku otita 'di ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'abebembezi b'ebyaro, gavumenti y'ebyaro eherize kukora enteekateeka y'entunguuka ensya. Okushagika enteekateeka egi, disiturikiti ehereize purogyekiti eitaka.

eng_prompt: The team had been eagerly preparing for the presentation all week. However, just hours before it was set to begin, they received unexpected news.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu ebadde yeetegekera n'obwagazi okwanjula wiiki yonna. Newankubadde, ng'ebulayo essaawa ntono okutandika, baafuna amawulire agateeberezebwa.
ach_prompt: Dul pa lutic gubedo ka yubbe ki miti madit tutwal pi yub me miyo ngec man pi cabit acel kulu. Kadi bed kumeno, cawa manok ma peya ocake, gunongo lok angea ma onongo pe gitye ka byekone.
teo_prompt: Auta etimu aitemonokin kanu aitodiaret ngin osabiti kere. Konye, isawan idis eringa egeuna, apotu kesi kodumutu iyemuto lumam kesi eomitos.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ebi otuta 'ye avasi e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi o'dazu 'da ni sabiti 'da ma alea ndulu. Kani si, de nga po'di sawa were de nga po'di e'doni ku, eyi esu o'dukoti 'bani ega ku 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu etwire neeteekateekyera okwanjura esande yoona. Kwonka, eshaaha nkye zitakatandikire, bakatunga amahurire agu batabaire nibateekateeka.

eng_prompt: After months of discussions and community feedback, the council recognized the urgent need for action. Various issues had been plaguing the town, prompting officials to seek effective solutions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'ebiteeso by'abantu, akakiiko kaategeera obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola. Ensonga ez'enjawulo zibadde zitulugunya ekibuga, ekyaleetedde abakungu okunoonya eby'okugonjoola.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me nywako lok ki tam pa lwak, kancil oniang ni omyero kitim gin mo oyot. Peko mapat-pat obedo ka yelo boma ne, ma oweko lutic guyenyo yoo me tyeko ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemitem keda aomisio nuka itunga, abu ekansulo koany ebe ibusakinit aswam katipet. Ipu akiro nuetapit ainingosit etaun, ido abu isinyikok eswamak aimo iwaitin lu itemokinet ngun.
lgg_prompt: Mba e'yo onzezu azini o'duko feza ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma vutia, kanisulu 'da esu ra kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo eyi mbeleru. E'yo karakara eyi ebi e'yo ewaru tawuni 'da ma alea 'diyi fe azi'ba eyini e'yo eyi ma aza kozu geri kililiru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuhanuura hamwe n'ebiteiso by'abantu,akakiiko kakareeba ngu hariho ekishemereire kukorwa juba. Enshonga nyingi zikaba ziteganiise orurembo, ekyareteire abakungu kuronda oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: As the attendees took their seats, a sense of anticipation filled the room. The organizer stepped up to the podium, ready to kick off the event with a moment of unity.
lug_prompt: Abaabaddewo bwe baatuula mu bifo byabwe, essuubi lyajjula ekisenge. Omutegesi yalinnya ku podium, nga mwetegefu okutandika omukolo n'akaseera k'obumu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma joo ma obedo tye gubedo I kabedogi, dano mapol gubedo ki miti madit tutwal. Luyub odonyo iwi podium, ma oyubbe me cako yub ne ki kare me ribe.
teo_prompt: Neautatar itunga aiboikin aiboisio kec, apotu itunga luipu kojaikinos toma agola. Abu etemonokinan kolom toma opodium, ekapakina ageun epucit ngol keda apak naka aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Ba emu'ba 'diyi ni yi vile kiti 'duzu 'boria, asi 'baza ga jo ale aliza ma alia tre. Ba e'yo otupi 'diyi tu pa podiuma dria, ngonde e'yo 'da e'dozu e'yo ti icita ni si.
nyn_prompt: Abaizire omu ruteerane ku baashutamiire omu myanya yaabo, ekishengye kikaijuura amatsiko. Omutebekanisa akaruga ahari podium, ayeteekateekire kutandika omukoro n'akaire k'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: As the discussion progressed, attendees began to notice the speaker's increasing discomfort. Finally, he paused and took a deep breath before sharing his troubling news.
lug_prompt: Ng'okukubaganya ebirowoozo kugenda mu maaso, abeetabye mu lukuŋŋaana baatandika okukiraba nti omwogezi yeeyongera okuwulira obubi. Ku nkomerero, yayimirirako katono n'assa omukka omungi nga tannawa mawulire ge agamutawaanya.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nywako lok tye ka mede anyim, dano ma gubedo tye gucako neno kit ma lalok tye ka winyo marac kwede. I agiki ne, en ocungu mot dok omayo yweyo matut mapwod pe otito lok angeya ma obedo ka yelo cwinye.
teo_prompt: Neautar aitetem akiro ngun, apotu itunga kowanyutu ebe mam eraban eyalama noi. Kawasia, abu ngesi kobwo kosodi aiyeng eringa elimokinia ngesi akiro nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza ni muzu drile, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi e'do e'yo 'ba anzenzea ei ni aa'zu e'yere ri ndre. Asizu, so pa azini 'du ava aliru de nga po'di awini o'duko e'yo ewaru 'diyi awa ku.
nyn_prompt: Okugaaniira kwagyenda nikugyenda omu maisho, abaabaire bariho bakatandika kwetegyereza oburemeezi bw'omugambirizi. Ahamuheru, akeemerera kakye yaata omwika gw'amaani atakagambire amakuru ge agarikumwerarikiriza.

eng_prompt: As tensions rose and discussions became increasingly heated, it became clear that the group was not reaching a consensus. Recognizing the need for a break, the speaker took a deep breath and prepared to address the room.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo kweyongera, kyalabika bulungi nti ekibinja kyali tekikkiriziganya. Ng'ategeera obwetaavu bw'okuwummulamu, omwogezi yassa omukka omungi era ne yeetegekera okwogera eri abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle omede ki nywako lok omede, nen atyer kamaleng ni dul ne onongo pe tye ka winye. Ki niang ni myero ki ywee mot, lalok okwanyo yweyo matut ci oyubbe me lok ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Neapolor atiokisio keda ipegeta, apotu kojenutu ebe mam egurupu epedoritos acamanar. Kanu ajenun eipud loka aiyengun, abu eraban koyangau ekwam loepol noi kosodi aitemonokin einer keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu azini e'yo o'yoza ni tuzu drile, eca e'da kililiru kini ongulumu 'da econi ti ecita ma dria ku. Erini e'yo egazu kini le 'ba ma li ava ra, anzenzea ei 'du ava aliru dika eri otu i e'yo nzezu 'ba dria 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire n'okuhanuura kweyongyera, kikarebeka butunu ngu guruupu ekaba etarikubaasa kwikirizana. Ahabw'okumanya ekyetengo ky'akahuumuro, orikukurira eishengyero akateera omuriro gw'amaani yaatebeekanisa kugamba omu kishengye.

eng_prompt: As the meeting commenced, everyone was eager to hear the insights of the highly anticipated guest speaker. Little did they know, the speaker was battling a serious illness that would soon affect the presentation.
lug_prompt: Olukiiko bwe lwatandika, buli omu yali yeesunga okuwulira amagezi g'omwogezi omugenyi eyali asuubirwa ennyo. Baali tebamanyi nti omwogezi yali alwanagana n'obulwadde obw'amaanyi obwali bugenda okukosa ennyanjula ye.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kacoke ocake, dano weng obedo ki miti me winyo tam pa lalok ma kibedo kakuru. Onongo pe gingeo ni lalok ne tye ka lweny i kom two marac tutwal ma onongo obubedo ki adwoki marac i kom lokke.
teo_prompt: Neageunia airiamunet ngin, akoto itunga kere apupokin aomisio nuka einer loetepesenitai noi. Mam kesi ejenete, ajai eraban keda adeka naepol noi naepedori aitolitol aitodiaretakec.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ni e'doria, 'ba dria ma asi de ava e'yo nzeza 'ba omvele guest speaker ruri erizu. Eyi nini ndra ku, 'ba anzenzea ei 'da ri a'di 'di azo onzi ecopi e'yo nzeza 'da ezapi mbeleru ri be.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko ku rwatandikire, buri omwe akaba aine ekihika ky'okuhurira ebiteekateeko by'omugambi owabaire ateekateekirwe munonga. Bakaba batarikumanya ngu sipiika akaba arwaire oburwaire bw'amaani obwabaire nibwija kurabanisamu entebeekanisa ye.

eng_prompt: Just days before the event, he seemed full of energy and enthusiasm. However, without warning, his health took a drastic turn.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebula ennaku ntono omukolo gutandike, yalabika ng'alina amaanyi mangi n'obwagazi. Kyokka, awatali kulabula, obulamu bwe bwakyuka nnyo.
ach_prompt: Nino manok ma peya yub eni otimme, en nen calo obedo ki kero ki mit kom mapol. Ento, labongo ciko dano, yotkom mege olokke tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apaarasia adis eringa epucit ngol iswamauna, ajai ngesi keda agogongu naepol noi. Konye, komamei aikwenyar, abu angaleuke kijulakin noi.
lgg_prompt: O'du were de nga po'di omu 'da ecani ku, eri e'da ndra okpo azini ava be tre. Kani si, bile ndu liza kokoru, eri ma rua ma alata oja i onzi.
nyn_prompt: Ebiro bikye omukoro gutakahikire, akareebeka aine amaani n'omuhimbo. Kwonka, hatariho kurabura, amagara gye gakahinduka munonga.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, several participants expressed their expectations for the upcoming presentation. They emphasized the importance of clear communication and time management.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana, abeetabye mu lukungaana baalaga bye basuubira mu kwanjula okujja. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okuwuliziganya obulungi n'okukekkereza obudde.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke, dano mapol ma gubedo tye i kacoke ne gunyutu miti gi i kom yub matye kabino ni. Guketo cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa lok maber ki gwoko cawa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet kangin, apotu itunga luipu itodutu aomisiokec kanu aitodiaret naebunit. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka einer ejok ka aidar apak.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi ece e'yo eyini ega e'yo emupi 'diyi ma dria ra. Eyi fe okpo orodri e'yo nzeza kililiru ri ma dria tualu sa'wa ma tambaza be.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, abeejumbiremu baingi bakoreka ebibarikwetenga ahabw'empurizagana erikwija. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'empurizagana nungi hamwe n'okukoresa gye obwire.

eng_prompt: Residents have expressed frustration over the lack of updates regarding local projects. Many feel that their concerns are not being addressed effectively by the officials.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze balaze obwennyamivu olw'obutaba na bipya bikwata ku pulojekiti z'omu kitundu. Bangi bawulira nti ebyeraliikiriza byabwe abakungu tebabikolako bulungi.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gunyutu cwer cwiny gi pi bedo peke pa ngec manyen ma lubbe ki yub me tedero. Dano mapol gitye ki tam ni lutic pe tye ka cobo peko gi maber.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu amamus na akiro nuitetiak nuikamunitos ipurojektin luka atutubet. Eomitos itunga luipu ebe mam eswamak itemonokinete atiokisio kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece candi eyini e'yo o'dukoti edrizu otita eyini 'diyi ma dria ri ma ako si. Ba karakara eyi ega kini azi'ba eyi 'yeni e'yo eyi ma dria geri kililiru risi ku.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye boorekire okwetomboitwa ahabw'obutaheebwa amakuru agarikukwata aha purogyekiti z'omubyaro. Baingi nibateekateeka ngu ebirikubateganisa tibirikukorwaho kurungi abakuru.

eng_prompt: Despite repeated warnings about maintaining decorum, the speaker continued to disregard the council's established protocols. Their behavior has raised concerns among the members about the integrity of the proceedings.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yalabulwa enfunda eziwera ku kukuuma empisa, omwogezi yeeyongera okubuusa amaaso ebiragiro by'olukiiko ebyateekebwawo. Enneeyisa yaabwe ereeseewo okweraliikirira mu bammemba ku bwenkanya bw'emisango.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ki ciko en tyen mapol me gwoko kit maber, lalok madit omedde ki kwero lubu cik ma dul enoni oketo. Timgi okelo lworo ikin lumemba I kom ber bedo pa yub eni.
teo_prompt: Karaida ikwenyaritai irwan ipu kanu aidar ainapara, abu eraban inyikok ainger ainapeta nuka ekansulo. Apotu iponesiokec koyangautu aiyalongong kanejaas imeban kanuikamunitos ailajara naka akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo bile ndu liza 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, anzenzea ei ri mu drile azita council ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku. Yeta yini 'diyi eji asi otiza memba yi ma eselea e'yo 'bani e'yo 'yezu kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okurabura okwarugiremu aha bikwatiraine n'okurinda emicwe mirungi, sipiika akagumizamu atafayo aha biragiro by'akakiiko. Enkora yaabo ereesire okwerarikirira omu ba memba ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'emishango.

eng_prompt: Despite their charisma and ability to engage the audience, the speaker often struggles to keep their thoughts in order. Their tendency to forget important details only adds to the chaos of their presentations.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde balina obusobozi bw'okusikiriza abantu, aboogezi bazibuwalirwa okukuuma ebirowoozo byabwe nga bitebenkedde. Endowooza yaabwe ey'okwerabira ebintu ebikulu byongera ku butabanguko mu kwanjula kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye ki mar ki kero me weko dano winyo lokgi, lalok pol kare nongo tek tutwal me neno ni tamgi tye maber. Gin wigi wil I kom jami mapigi tego tutwal ma weko yub gi bedo ma opong ki anywena-nywena.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda apedor naka aitodolikin itunga, etiono duc einer aidar aomisiokec ejok. Amumu kec naka aimurwokin akiro nuepolok iyatakini ationis naka aitodianareta kec.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu onyiru azini ecozu 'ba emu'ba 'diyi 'duzu ra ti, 'ba e'yo nze'ba 'diyi dri ci e'yo yini 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru. Eyi ma adriza e'yo okporu 'diyi ma avizu ri ni lu e'yo eyini nze 'diyi ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho obusinguzi n'obushoboorozi bwabo bw'okureetaho abantu, abo abarikugamba, nibakira kurwana kurinda ebiteekateeko byabo. Emicwe yaabo y'okwebwa ebintu ebikuru neeyongyera aha butabanguko bw'empurizagana yaabo.

eng_prompt: Before the meeting began, there was some confusion about whether all participants would be present. It was crucial for the speaker to communicate his attendance status to the clerk.
lug_prompt: Nga olukiiko terunnatandika, waaliwo okutabulwa ku oba abeetabye bonna bajja kubaawo. Kyabadde kikulu nnyo omwogezi okutegeeza omuwandiisi ku mbeera ye ey'okubeerawo.
ach_prompt: Mapwod kacoke ne pe ocake, anywena-nywena obedo tye I kom kace dano weng ma obedo I kacoke ne bibedo tye. Obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal ki lador ot moko cik me waco kit ma en obino kwede I ot moko cik.
teo_prompt: Erongo airiamun egeuna, ajai ationis arai epote itunga kere ajaikin. Arai ibore yenepol noi eraban aitijenikin ekalani ejautene ke.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mitingi 'da e'doni ku, 'ba eyi ma omi eza kani 'ba dria emupi mitingi 'da ma alea 'diyi nga adri ci yari ma dria. Eri ndra orodriru anzenzea ei ni e'yo erini emuzu ri oluzu karani dri.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko rutakatandikire, hakaba hariho okubuzabuzibwa yaaba abeejumbiremu boona nibaza kubaho. Kikaba kiri eky'omugasho omwebembezi w'eishengyero kumanyisa omuhandiiki oku yaabaire ari.

eng_prompt: The recent surge in community complaints has raised urgent concerns among residents. If left unaddressed, the situation could escalate further, prompting immediate action from the council.
lug_prompt: Okwemulugunya kw'abantu okweyongera gye buvuddeko kuleeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amangu mu batuuze. Singa embeera eno tebagigonjoola, eyinza okwongera okwonooneka, ekiyinza okuviirako akakiiko okubaako kye kakolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Koko ma lwak tye kwede cokcok-ki okelo lworo madit tutwal ikin lwak. Ka pe kitimo gin mo, lok ne twero mede, ma weko kancil timo gin mo oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Apol naka angurian nuka itunga eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas itunga. Arai mam itemokitai, epedori ejautene aiyatakin, ido ijaikini ekansulo aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini onuzu o'diru 'diyi eji asi otiza okporu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. Ba ka e'yo 'di ma aza ko ku, e'yo 'di eco mu drile, e'yo 'duza mbeleru engazu kanisulu vu.
nyn_prompt: Okwetomboitwa kw'abantu kweyongyeire, kireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani omu batuuragye. Enshonga zaaba zitakozirweho, nizibaasa kweyongyera, ekirikureetera akakiiko kukora ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Whispers of illicit activities had been circulating in the nearby town for weeks. Locals spoke in hushed tones about the strange figures that emerged from the shadows of the dense trees.
lug_prompt: Engambo z'ebikolwa ebimenya amateeka zibadde zitambula mu kabuga akaliraanyewo okumala wiiki eziwera. Abantu b'omu kitundu baayogera mu ddoboozi erikkakkamu ku bifaananyi ebyewuunyisa ebyava mu bisiikirize by'emiti eminene.
ach_prompt: Lok ma pe atir obedo ka wot I taun matye cok ki kany pi cabit mapol. Lutedero guloko I dwan matidi I kom cal mapat-pat ma okatti ki I tipo pa yadi matye mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu akiro nuikamunitos aswamisio numam ekisil ecamunit kotoma otaun lo eyapie adaun isabitin luipu. Apotu itunga luka atutubet kinerata keda iporotoi luitegelikina luapotu kolomutu kotoma okibira luka ikito.
lgg_prompt: O'duko e'yo 'yeta azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria ri ebi aci tawuni enyia ri ma alea sabiti karakara. O'bi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi nze e'yo o'duko alia 'diyi ma dria e'yo wura onzi efu'ba engapi pati karakara 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Orugambo rw'ebikorwa ebitahikire rukaba rutwire nirugyenda omu tawuni eri haihi kumara esande. Abatuuragye bakagamba n'eiraka rikye, ebikwatiraine n'ebishushani ebitarikushushana ebyabaire nibishohora omu bicuucu by'emiti.

eng_prompt: In the event of an emergency during the meeting, it's crucial to have a clear plan in place. If the speaker becomes incapacitated, the deputy must be prepared to step in and lead the discussion.
lug_prompt: Singa wabaawo ekintu eky'amangu mu lukiiko, kikulu nnyo okuba n'enteekateeka etegeerekeka obulungi. Singa sipiika aba takyasobola kukola, omumyuka we alina okuba omwetegefu okuyingirawo n'okukulembera okukubaganya ebirowoozo.
ach_prompt: Ka gin mo otimme atura ikare me kacokke, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki yub maber. Ka lador ot moko cik pe twero tic, lalub kore omyero obed atera me donyo ki doro lok ne.
teo_prompt: Kojautene lo engeso kotoma airiamunet, ejokuna noi ajaut keda ainapeta nuecaete. Arai mam eraban epedori aswam, ibusakinit atupiton akapakina alomar kosodi aingarenikin aineranara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru ni ka i 'ye sa'wa drifuza nirisi, eri orodriru ovuzu otita kililiru be. Ba anzenzea ei ka eca okpo kokoru, eri ma endru ma ovu ngonde fizu e'yo onzeza ma dri cezu.
nyn_prompt: Habaho ekintu ky'amaani omu rukiiko, n'eky'omugasho kugira enteekateeka nungi. Sipiika ku arikuba atarikubaasa, omuhwezi we ashemereire kuba ayeteekateekire kwebembera okuhanuura.

eng_prompt: Due to unforeseen circumstances, several key participants are unable to attend the original meeting. It is essential to ensure that everyone can be present for the discussion.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera etasuubirwa, abeetabi abakulu abawerako tebaasobola kubaawo mu lukiiko olwasooka. Kya mugaso okulaba nga buli omu asobola okubeerawo mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo.
ach_prompt: Pi jami ma otimme atura, dano mapol ma pigi tego pe gubedo tye I kacoke macon. Pire tek tutwal me neno ni dano weng gubedo tye ikare me nywako lok.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ejautene lomam ewanyunitai, mam itunga luipu apedorete ajaikin toma airiamunet nasodit. Erai ibore yenepol noi awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere ajaut toma opeget.
lgg_prompt: Eꞌyo ꞌbani ega kokoru ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyosi, ꞌba karakara eꞌyo ꞌyepi ꞌdiyi econi mu mitingi okori ma alia ku. Eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba dria eco mu e'yo onzeza ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera etari y'okureeberaho, abantu baingi ab'omugasho tibarabaasize kuza omu rukiiko orwabaire rutandikireho. N'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu buri omwe abaho omu kuhanuura.

eng_prompt: The finance team prepared a detailed presentation outlining the proposed expenditures. All department heads were invited to discuss their needs and justify their requests.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu y'ebyensimbi yategeka ekiwandiiko ekiraga mu bujjuvu ensaasaanya etegekeddwa. Abakulu b'ebitongole bonna baayitiddwa okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku byetaago byabwe n'ensonga zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Dul ma loyo lok kom lim guyubu lok matut I kom cente ma mite me tic kwede. Kilwongo ludito me dul mapat-pat weng me nywako lok I kom miti gi ki tyen lok ma oweko gulego.
teo_prompt: Abu etimu loka ikapun itemok aitodiareta nuikamunitos ikapun lu ekotoi aitwasam. Aponi onyaraunai lukapolok luka edipatiment kere aitemitem ipudesia kec ka aitodun abeit naka ailipakec.
lgg_prompt: Amuti e'yo robia ni 'diyi ondrepi ri otu e'yo dria 'bani lele 'diyi ayuzu 'diyi ma dria. Ba omve drice'ba enyati eyini 'diyi dria agbatara gbazu afa eyini le 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'eby'esente ekatebeekanisa entebeekanisa erikworeka enshohoza erikuteekateekwaho. Bakuru b'ebitongore boona bakeetwa kuhanuura ahabyetengo byabo n'eshonga ezibarikushaba.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for local governance and community engagement, the government issued a directive to enhance collaboration between various levels of administration. As a result, the ministry authorised the municipal council to observe and coordinate the underlying activities.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obukulembeze bw'ebitundu n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu, gavumenti yafulumya ekiragiro okutumbula enkolagana wakati w'emitendera egy'enjawulo egy'obukulembeze. N'ekyavaamu, minisitule yawadde akakiiko ka munisipaali obuyinza okwetegereza n'okukwasaganya emirimu egyali gikolebwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me tela me tedero ki ribbe pa lwak, gamente okatti ki cik me medo winye ikin lutela ma rwom gi pat pat. Macalo adwogi ne, gangkal omiyo twero ki municipal council me neno ki doro tic mapat-pat matye katime.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka epugae lo okwap keda aiswamanara naka itunga, abu apugan kitolomu aicoreta nu aitogogong aiswamanara kiding atutubena nuegelegela nuka eyaitene. Kanuka ngun abu erionget kocamak ekansulo loka emunisipaliti airereonor ka arucokinit aswamisinei nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu e'yo driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu ongulumu eyi ma eselea risi, gamete fe azita ti icita ma omgbo otuzu driceza esele ndu ndu 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, okalamvu alataniri fe driwala kanisulu munisipaliti niri dri e'yo ndundu 'diyi onezu azini eyi ma ti ojizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kweyongyera kw'obwebembezi bw'ebyaro hamwe n'okwetabamu kw'abantu, gavumenti ekataho ekiragiro ky'okureetaho okukwatanisa ahagati y'abebembezi b'emiringo etari emwe. N'ekyarugiremu, minisiture ekaha akakiiko ka munisiparite obushoborozi kureebuuza n'okureeberera emirimo eriho.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about safety and community cohesion, local leaders organized a meeting to discuss potential solutions. After much deliberation, it was decided that a physical barrier would help protect their shared values and beliefs.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku by'okwerinda n'okukwatagana kw'ekitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baategese olukiiko okuteesa ku ngeri z'okugonjoolamu ensonga. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, kyasalibwawo nti ekikomera ky'omubiri kyandiyambye okukuuma empisa n'enzikiriza zaabwe ezaawamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom ber bedo ki ribbe I kin lwak, lutela me tedero guyubu kacoke me nywako tam I kom yoo me cobo peko ne. Ingee tam matut, kimoko tam ni lageng ma kiyubu ki kom dano bikonyo me gwoko jami ma pigi tego kacel ki niyee gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka ayuwara keda aimorikikina naka itunga, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kitemokisi airiamun kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, aponi koseunai ebe ebuni aibwo aidar iponesio keda aiyuunikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi e'yo agei tema ni azini ti icita ongulumu eyini ri ma dria, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi otu mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu. E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba 'du e'yo kini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi atrizu 'diyi nga eyi ma azako e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini e'yo eyini a'i 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda hamwe n'okukwatanisa kw'abantu, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakatebekanisa orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha nshonga ezirikubaasa kukorwaho. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga, kikaikirizibwa ngu ensharo y'omubiri neija kuhwera omu kurinda emitwarize n'enyikiriza zaabo.

eng_prompt: The city council has approved the construction of a new facility designed to foster economic growth. This innovative space aims to bring together entrepreneurs and local businesses.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko k'ekibuga kakkirizza okuzimba ekifo ekipya ekigendereddwamu okutumbula ebyenfuna. Ekifo kino eky'obuyiiya kigendererwamu okugatta abasuubuzi ne bizinensi z'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kancil me boma madit oyee yub me gedo gedo manyen ma kiyubu pi dongo lobo. Kabedo manyen man tye ki miti me ribo lutim biacara ki biacara me tedero.
teo_prompt: Acamaki ekansulo loka eibuga adukio naka aduketait naitetet kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun. Alosikinet naka aiboisit na erai aimorikikin agwelanarak keda ibiasaran luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Kanisulu aku ambu city niri niri ai afa ayuzaru o'diru 'bani edele zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri sizu ra. Angu 'bani afa ndundu eyi edezu o'diru 'diri ma asisile lezu 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi eji tualu tujari 'yepi ogogo 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko rw'orurembo rwikiriize okwombeka ekyombeko ekisya ekyateirweho okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya. Omwanya gw'okujumbura nigugyenderera okugaita abashubuzi n'abashubuzi b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to rise over the construction site, the community gathered to witness the progress of the new church. Volunteers from various backgrounds worked tirelessly, but it was the Christians who took the lead in laying the foundation.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okuvaayo mu kifo awazimbibwa, abantu baakuŋŋaana okulaba enkulaakulana y'ekkanisa empya. Bannakyewa okuva mu mbeera ez'enjawulo baakola butaweera, naye abakrisitaayo be baakulemberamu mu kuteekawo omusingi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako aa malo I kabedo me gedo, lwak gugure me neno kit ma ot lega manyen tye ka wot kwede. Lumii kony ma aa ki I kabedo ma pat pat gutiyo matek tutwal, ento lukricto aye gutelo yub me keto guti.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibwo kotoma aiboisit naedukere, apotu itunga kotukokinos asesen apol naka ekanisa loitetet. Apotu itunga luka aiboisio nuegelegela iswamata keda agogongu, konye eraasi ikurisitayon luapotu kisingarenitos aiduk atukot ngin.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria engazu pari afa sizu ri ma dria, ongulumu eyi tra eyi muzu kanisa o'diru 'da ma zota nezu. Ba owitaru engapi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi nga azi ande kokoru, te 'ba Kristayo ru 'diyi 'du driceza e'yo 'bani e'yo 'da sizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwatandikire kwija aha mwanya gw'okwombekamu, abantu baketeeranira hamwe okureeba entunguka y'ekanisa ensya. Abarikwehayo kuruga omu myanya etari emwe bakakora n'amaani, kwonka abakurisitayo nibo beebembeire omu kutaho omusingi.

eng_prompt: As part of the construction project, each participating chapel has committed to contributing materials. This collaboration ensures that every chapel will provide a specific number of bricks.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekitundu ku pulojekiti y'okuzimba, buli kkanisa eyeetabamu yeeyamye okuwaayo ebintu. Enkolagana eno ekakasa nti buli kkanisa ejja kuwaayo omuwendo gw'amabaati ogutegekeddwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo but yub me gedo, kanica acel-acel ma obedo tye ocikke me miyo jami tic. Ribbe man weko ot lega acel acel miyo wel matafali ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma opurojekt lo aiduk, ekot ngol ekanisa aijaikin iboro. Aimorikikina ngin itodunit ebe kangin ekanisa ebuni aijaikin enaaba loka amatapalin.
lgg_prompt: Otita afa sizu 'di ma azi ru, kanisa alu alu fi'ba alenia 'diyi owi eyi afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu. Ti ecita 'di ni fe kililiru kini kanisa alu alu ni mu biriki eyi ma kalafe fe.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha purogyekiti y'okwombeka, buri kanisa eyejumbiremu eyehaireyo kuhayo eby'okukoresa. Enkoragana egi neehamya ngu buri kanisa neeza kuheereza omuhendo gw'amabaati ogurikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In a time of uncertainty and struggle, the community gathered in the church, hoping for a sign of hope. As the priest stepped forward with a collection of cherished items, a sense of anticipation filled the air.
lug_prompt: Mu kaseera k'obutali bukakafu n'okulwanagana, abantu baakuŋŋaanidde mu kkanisa nga basuubira akabonero k'essuubi. Ng'omusosodooti agenda mu maaso n'ebintu eby'omuwendo bye yakung'aanyizza, obwagazi bwajjula mu bbanga.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lworo ki lweny, lwak gugure I gang lega, ki gen me nongo lanyut me gen. I kare ma padi okato anyim ki jami mapol ma pigi tego, dano mapol gubedo ki miti madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus ajenanut keda atiokisio, apotu itunga kotukokinos okanisa, aomitos ebe ejai aanyunet naka amuno. Neautar esaserodoti alomun keda iboro lueminasi ngesi noi, apotu itunga luipu kopuputu aiyalama noi.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru ma alia, ongulumu tra yi kanisa, asi 'baza be eceta asi'baza niri ma dria. Padere ni mu drile afa 'bani lele tu 'diyi trazurisi, asi 'baza ga angu ma alea tre.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutetegyerezibwa hamwe n'oburemeezi, abantu baketeeranira omu kanisa, barikwesiga akamanyiso k'amatsiko. Omusesorodooti ku yaagyendeire omu maisho n'ebintu bye eby'omuhendo, abantu bakagira amatsiko maingi.

eng_prompt: Many community organizations rely on donations and support to sustain their programs. As a result, financial resources are essential for various initiatives.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'ekitundu bingi byesigama ku buyambi n'obuyambi okusobola okuyimirizaawo pulogulaamu zaabyo. N'ekyavaamu, eby'ensimbi bikulu nnyo mu mirimu egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Dule me tedero mapol gijenge I kom kony ma aa ki bot lwak me tyelo kor yub gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lim obedo gin ma pire tek pi yub mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta luipu lu atutubet itwasamaete agangat ka agangat kanu aigang ainapeta kec. Kanuka ngun, ejokuka noi ikapun kanu aswam iboro luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Amuti ongulumu eyini karakara 'diyi yi ati afa feza azini atita eyi ma dria otita eyini 'diyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo 'disi, geri robia esuzu 'diyi orodriru e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore by'abantu bingi nibyesiga obuhwezi n'obuhwezi kureeberera puroguraamu zaabyo. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'empiiha n'eby'omugasho omu mirimo etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In today's world, music plays a significant role in shaping the identities and experiences of young people. Whether it's through streaming platforms or live concerts, the influence of music is undeniable among the youth.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, ennyimba zikola omulimu munene mu kubumba endagamuntu n'ebyo ebiyitamu abavubuka. Ka kibeere nga kuyita mu mikutu gya yintaneeti oba ebivvulu, amaanyi g'ennyimba tegayinza kugaanibwa mu bavubuka.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, wer tye ki tic madit tutwal I yubu kit kwo pa bulu. Kadi bed ni obedo I kabedo me nywako lok angeya onyo yub me goyo wer, pe tye ngat mo ma twero kwero adwogi me wer I kom bulu.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, ejaasi ikososinei keda aswam naepol noi kotoma aitolomun ajenanut keda akiro nuisisiaete atumunak. Arai kitosomaete elago arai bo aitodianareta, mam epedorio aitepeg apolou naka ikososinei kama ejaasi atumunak.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, ongo yi azi okporu nga e'yo 'ba ode yini yi ma ngulupi ni azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria. Ka tro ovu trayi pari e'yo oyuzani 'diyi ma aliasi kani ku avita avita ni 'diyi ma aliasi, okpo ongoni 'ba ode yi ma eselea ri aparakaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, ebyeshongoro nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhindura emicwe y'eminyeeto. Yaaba nikirabira omu mikutu y'ebyempurizagana nainga ebivvulu by'okweshongora, omugasho gw'ebyeshongoro tigurikwetengwa omu minyeeto.

eng_prompt: Many individuals who identify as Christians feel a strong sense of responsibility to contribute to their faith community. This often manifests in financial support for various church initiatives and programs.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi abeeyita abakrisitaayo bawulira obuvunanyizibwa obw'amaanyi okuwaayo eri enzikiriza yaabwe. Kino kitera okweyolekera mu kuwa obuyambi bw'ensimbi eri enteekateeka n'enteekateeka z'ekkanisa ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma giwaco ni gubedo lukricto giwinyo ni gitye ki tic matek me miyo kony bot dini gi. Man ipol kare nen ikare me miyo kony me lim pi yub mapat-pat me kanica.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lu ebalasi ebe eraasi ikurisitayon epupete eipud loka aijanakin nejaas aiyuunikec. Itodununei ngun kotoma agangat naka ikapun mama ejaasi ikanisan luegelegela keda ainapeta nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi 'bapi eyi Kristayo ru 'diyi ega kini eyi ma azi eyi afa fezu ongulumu eyivile aita ni 'diyi dri. E'yo 'di ni i e'da tutuni atita robia ni 'diyi fezu otita kanisa ni ndundu 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abarikwetwara nk'abakristaayo, nibateekateeka ngu baine obujunaanizibwa bw'okuhwera abantu b'enyikiriza yaabo. Eki nikyeyoreka omu kuheereza obuhwezi bw'esente omu nteekateeka z'ekanisa ezitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: Effective strategies for engaging communities often rely on consistent communication. One powerful approach is to keep the message alive through regular reminders.
lug_prompt: Enkola ennungi ez'okukwataganya ebitundu zitera kwesigama ku mpuliziganya etali ya nkalakkalira. Engeri emu ey'amaanyi kwe kukuuma obubaka nga bulamu okuyita mu kujjukiza buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Yoo maber me kubu lwak ipol kare jenge I kom lok matye kare ki kare. Yo acel maber tutwal en aye me poyo wi dano kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu aitodolikin itunga iswamaete kotupitete einer. Epone ediope loajokan noi ngesi aidar akiro ngun kowai lo aiitun duc.
lgg_prompt: Geri kililiru o'bi eyini e'yo nzezu eyi ma eselea 'diyi tutuni aa e'yo nzeza eyi ma eselea sa'wa driasi ri ma dria. Geri azi okporu 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo 'bani 'yole 'diyi ma ta mbazu idriru geri 'bani egazu eyi ma dria sa'wa driasi risi.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'okureetaho abantu omu byaro, neyesigama aha kugaaniira okuhikire. Omuringo gumwe ogw'amaani n'okurinda obutumwa kurabira omu kwijusya buri kaire.

eng_prompt: In our community, we believe in the power of collective effort and generosity. Therefore, every donation, no matter how small, plays a vital role in helping those in need.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyaffe, tukkiririza mu maanyi g'okukola awamu n'obugabi. N'olwekyo, buli kiweebwayo, ne bwe kiba kitono kitya, kikola kinene nnyo mu kuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa, watye ki niyee I kom teko pa tic kacel ki bedo jo ma cingi yot. Pi meno, mic mo keken, kadi bed ni tidi, konyo tutwal I konyo lupeko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, iyuunit sio agogong naka aswam nepepe keda ainanakin. Kanuka ngun, ngin agangat, araida edit, iswamai ejok noi kanu aingarakin ngul lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ma alea, ama a'ita okpo 'bani azi ngazu tualuri ma dria. Ka'dini, afa dria fele, tro ovuzu werea ra ti, eri orodriru 'ba afa koko 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyanga kyaitu, nitwikiriza omu maani g'okukorera hamwe n'okuba efura. N'ahabw'ekyo, buri buhwezi, nobu bwaba bukye, nibukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhwera abo abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: As our community continues to grow and evolve, it is essential for us to establish a sustainable funding model. Dependence on external support limits our autonomy and long-term viability.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitundu kyaffe kigenda mu maaso okukula n'okukulaakulana, kya mugaso nnyo gye tuli okuteekawo enkola y'ensimbi ey'olubeerera. Okwesigama ku buyambi okuva ebweru kitukugira okweyimirizaawo n'okuwangaala.
ach_prompt: Kit ma kabedo wa tye kamede ki dongo ki dongo, pire tek tutwal ni omyero wayub yoo me nongo lim ma rii pi kare malac. Jenge I kom kony ma aa ki lobo ma woko gengo kero wa me timo tic ki kero wa me kwo pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini atutubetekosi apol keda apol, ejokuna noi oni aitolomun iwaitin lu igangakino ikapun. Ajaut keda agangat kama ejaasi akwapin nukokinga itidisiari aijar wok naka apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ni mu drile zozu azini zoria, eri orodriru amani geri robia esuzu 'diyi e'dozu. Asi'baza atita engazu amve 'diyi ma dria ri ni ama ma okpo azini aa'ta ewu ezu ri ma alea ri ma omgbo esi.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kyaitu ku kirikugumizamu nikikura n'okutunguuka, n'eky'omugasho okureetaho enkora nungi y'okutunga esente. Okwetegyeka obuhwezi kuruga aheeru nikituzibira kwebaisaho n'okugumaho kumara obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: Engaging in unlawful activities can lead to serious legal consequences. One of the most common violations of the law is stealing someone else's property.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu bikolwa ebimenya amateeka kiyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi mu mateeka. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga okumenya amateeka kwe kubba ebintu by'omuntu omulala.
ach_prompt: Donyo I tim ma turu cik twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal I kot. Bal acel ma dano timo tutwalle obedo kwalo jami pa ngat mukene.
teo_prompt: Aswam iboro lumam ekisil ecamakinit epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuepolok noi. Adiopet kotoma abilibilio naka ikisila erai akoko iboro luka itunganan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita palaa ku 'diyi 'yezu ri eco e'yo onzi eyi eji ra. E'yo azita onyozani tuni 'diyi ma azi eri 'ba azi ma afa oguzu.
nyn_prompt: Okwejumba omu bikorwa ebitahikire, nikibaasa kureetaho ebizibu by'amaani omu biragiro. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikukira kuhenda ebiragiro n'okwiba ebintu by'omuntu ondiijo.

eng_prompt: In many cases, law enforcement agencies work tirelessly to track down and retrieve property that has been taken unlawfully. Their efforts can lead to the recovery of valuable possessions that were once thought lost.
lug_prompt: Ebiseera ebisinga, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe bikola butaweera okunoonya n'okununula ebintu ebitwalibwa mu bumenyi bw'amateeka. Kaweefube waabwe asobola okuviirako okuzuula ebintu eby'omuwendo ebyalowoozebwanga nti byabula.
ach_prompt: I kare mapol, dul ma gwoko cik gitiyo matek me nongo ki gamo jami ma ki kwanyo iwi alii. Tute gi twero weko ginongo jami ma pigi tego ma onongo ki tamo ni gurwenyo.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuipu, iswamaete lu ikisila agogongu kanu aimo ka adumun iboro lu eyangaritai komam ekisil ecamakinit. Aswam kec epedori ayangaun adumun iboro luepolok lu eomitai ebe eoliorete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara eyi ma alea, amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi azi nga okposi afa 'bani 'du geri azita palaa ku 'diyi esuzu. Okpo eyini 'ba ri eco fe 'bani afa orodriru 'bani egaleri avi ra 'diyi esuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwire obwingi, ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro nibikora n'amaani kuronda n'okwihaho ebintu ebirikutwarwa omu buryo butahikire. Amaani gaabo nigabaasa kurugwamu okugarura ebintu by'omuhendo ebyabaire nibiteekateekwaho kuba bibuzire.

eng_prompt: In rural areas, many families rely on agriculture for their livelihood. One of the primary activities they engage in is livestock farming.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo, amaka mangi geesigama ku bulimi okusobola okweyimirizaawo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu bye bakola kwe kulunda ebisolo.
ach_prompt: I caro, gangi mapol jenge I kom pur me nongo cente. Tic acel ma pigi tego ma gitimo obedo gwoko lee.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi, ejarete ikalia luipu kotoma akoru. Adiopet kotoma aswamisinei nuiswamaete kesi erai aipit ibaren.
lgg_prompt: Angu caluru 'diyi ma alea, familia karakara eyi aa agirikica ma dria eyini ani aa'zu edriru. Yeta yini 'yele okporu 'diyi ma azi eri anyapa ta mbaza.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro, amaka maingi nigakoresa eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa okubaisaho. Omwe aha mirimo y'amaani ei barikukora n'okuriisa amatungo.

eng_prompt: After a series of burglaries in the neighborhood, the authorities launched an investigation. Following a tip-off, the suspects were apprehended and brought in for questioning.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'obubbi obw'omuddiring'anwa mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza baatandika okunoonyereza. Oluvannyuma lw'okutegeezebwa, abateeberezebwa baakwatibwa ne baleetebwa okubuuzibwa ebibuuzo.
ach_prompt: Inge bal me turu ot ma obedo ka time I kabedo enuni, lutela gucako kwed. Inge nongo ngec, kimako jo mabyek me bal tye I komgi ni ki kelo gi me penyo gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akoko naka itogoi koidunyet, apotu apedorosio kogeutu aingic. Akaulo naka aikwenyar, aponi ikamarai luitepesenitai kosodete ayangaun aingiseta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi oguzu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma vutia, drice'ba eyi e'do e'yo eti ondaza. E'yo eceza ma vutia, 'ba obi 'ba 'bani ega eyi eza e'yo 'diyi azini eji eyi obeta eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'obwibi bwingi omu byaro, ab'obushoborozi batandikireho okucondooza. Ahanyima y'okuhaburwa, abarikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro bakakwatwa baareetwa kubuzibwa ebibuuzo.

eng_prompt: In a just society, it is essential to uphold moral standards and ensure accountability. To maintain order and protect citizens, legal systems are established to address harmful actions.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekirimu obwenkanya, kya mugaso okunyweza emitindo gy'empisa n'okukakasa embalirira. Okukuuma emirembe n'okukuuma bannansi, enkola z'amateeka ziteekebwawo okukola ku bikolwa eby'obulabe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma opore, pire tek tutwal me gwoko rwom me kwo ki gwoko kor tic. Me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pa anywali, ki keto cik me lweny i kom tim maraco.

eng_prompt: As the temperatures rise and water sources dwindle, the landscape becomes increasingly harsh. Many species struggle to find food and shelter during this challenging time.
lug_prompt: Ebbugumu bwe lyeyongera n'ensibuko z'amazzi ne zikendeera, embeera yeeyongera okuba embi. Ebisolo bingi birwana okufuna emmere n'awokusula mu kaseera kano akazibu.

eng_prompt: It's important to uphold the law and maintain a sense of justice in our society. We must remember that actions have consequences, and we should not excuse or justify wrongdoing.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso okukuuma amateeka n'obwenkanya mu kitundu kyaffe. Tulina okujjukira nti ebikolwa birina ebivaamu, era tetulina kwekwasa oba kwekwasa bikolwa bibi.
