ach_prompt: I lobo ma kwo pol kare nen calo jenge I kom tim maraco, dano mogo twero bedo ki akala-kala I kom ber pa moko tam gi. Gitwero bedo ki akalakala kace miti ne obedo ber loyo yoo ne kace ginongo peko ki peko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naesubit bala ejaria aijar kotupitete aswamisio nuarokok, epedorete icetunga aingitun ajokis naka aseununeta kec. Aticepak ewomitos kesi arai ekotosi kesi aitodolikin epone loepedoriata kesi aitodolikin ationis keda atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani idri ta mbazuri ni e'dazu e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria, 'ba azi 'diyi eco e'yo 'du e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ra. Yi eco e'yo osu kani e'yo 'bani lezu 'yezu 'diyi e'yo 'bani lezu 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ci yini e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi esuzu 'boria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu okubaho kurikukira kurugirira aha bikorwa by'obwinazi, abantu abamwe nibabaasa kubanganisa oburingaaniza bw'okucwamu kwabo. Nibabaasa kwebuuza yaaba ebigyendererwa nibyoreka oburingaaniza bw'emiringo baaba baine amaganya n'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In tight-knit communities, residents often become familiar with each other's habits and behaviors. This familiarity can sometimes lead to feelings of unease about certain individuals.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu ebirina enkolagana ey'oku lusegere, abatuuze batera okumanyiira emize n'enneeyisa ya buli omu. Obumanyirivu buno ebiseera ebimu buyinza okuleetawo obutali bumativu ku bantu abamu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo matye ki ribbe matek, lutedero ipol kare gi ngeyo kit ki tim pa luwot gi. Ngec man ikare mukene kelo cwer cwiny I kom dano mukene.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nu imorikikina, ejenete itunga iponesio ka iponesio luka luce. Ajenanut na acie apakio eyangauni amamus aiyalama mama ejaasi itunga ice.
lgg_prompt: Angu aa'pi tualu 'diyi ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni eyi ma adriza eyi tualu adriza eyi pie. E'yo 'bani nile 'diri eco sa'wa azi 'diyisi fe 'ba azi 'diyi ma e'yo aa'zu muke ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ebirikukwatanisa, abatuuragye nibakira kumanya emicwe n'emitwarize ya buri omwe. Okumanya eki obumwe nikibaasa kureetaho okwetomboita ahabantu abamwe.

eng_prompt: In each district, local governance plays a crucial role in ensuring effective administration and community engagement. One key figure in this structure is the resident district commissioner, who oversees various initiatives and programs.
lug_prompt: Mu buli disitulikiti, obukulembeze bw'ebitundu bukola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukakasa obukulembeze obulungi n'okwenyigiramu kw'ekitundu. Omu ku bantu abakulu mu kitongole kino ye resident district commissioner, alabirira enteekateeka n'enteekateeka ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I dicitrwik acel-acel, tela me tedero timo tic mapire tek tutwal me neno ni tic tye maber ki lwak bene gubedo tye. Ngat acel ma pire tek tutwal I dul man obedo RDC, ma en aye doro yub mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kangolidisitrikt, iswamai apugan na okwap epelu loepol noi kanu awanyun ebe ejai eyaitene loajokan keda aiswamanara na itunga. Idiopetunganan yenepol noi kotoma orionget kalo ngesi ekomisiona loka edisitrikt loeyait ainapeta keda ainapeta nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Distrikiti dria eyi ma alea, local governance ni azi okporu nga e'yo driceza ni kililiru ri ma alea tualu e'yo o'bi eyini 'ye 'diyi pie. Ba azi okporu angu 'di ma alea ni 'ba resident district commissioner ru, azi ngapi e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria azini otita ndundu eyi onepi ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omuri buri disiturikiti, obwebembezi bw'ebyaro nibukora omurimo gw'amaani, okureeba ngu eby'obwebembezi nibikorwa kurungi, hamwe n'abantu b'omubyaro kwejumba omu mirimo. Omwe aha bantu abakuru omu kitongore eki n'omujwekyerwa w'omwebembezi w'eihanga omu disiturikiti, orikureeberera enteekateeka nyingi.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, a sense of urgency filled the air. Orders had been issued, and the troops knew it was time to prepare for the upcoming mission.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, waaliwo obwetaavu obw'amaanyi. Ebiragiro byali biweereddwa era abasirikale baali bakimanyi nti kye kiseera okwetegekera omulimu ogwali gugenda okujja.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, cwiny me lworo omako dano mapol tutwal. Kimiyo cik, ki lumony guniang ni kare dong oromo me yubbe pi tic matye kabino anyim.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu itunga luka atutubet kopuputu eipuda loepol noi. Aponi koinakinai aicoreta, ido ajore ejenete ebe erai apak na aitemonokin kanuka aswamisioit naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, e'yo azi mbeleru ni ga angu ma alea dria. Ba fe ndra azita eyi asikari eyini dika eyi nii ra kini sa'wa ca 'bo eyi otuzu e'yo emupi 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga, haabaho ekyetengo ky'amaani. Ebiragiro bikaba byaheirwe kandi abaserukare bakamanya ngu n'obwire bw'okweteekateekyera omurimo ogurikwija.

eng_prompt: The lessons of the past often shape our present and future. As societies evolve, the memories of significant events and figures tend to endure through generations.
lug_prompt: Ebyayita bye tuyigamu bye bitukwatako mu kiseera kino ne mu biseera eby'omu maaso. Nga ebitundu bikulaakulana, ebijjukizo by'ebintu ebikulu n'abantu bibeerawo okumala emirembe.
ach_prompt: Pwony ma wanongo I kare mukato ni pol kare yubo kwo wa I kare-ni ki anyim. Ka lwak tye ka dongo, wii dano bedo ka po I kom jami mapigi tego ma otimme I kare macon ki I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Aisisiaeta nuka apakio nukokau etapit aitemokin ejautene wok loakwana keda lo oingaren. Kwape itopoloorete itunga, aiituneta nuka akiro nuapolok keda itunga luapolok eyangaikinete kotoma ateker.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma dria 'diyi tutuni ama vile ewu curu'dorisi azini ewu drialeri ma alia 'diyi e'da. Ongulumu eyini zoria, e'yo 'bani ega e'yo okporu eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma e'yo eyi sa'wa driasi ewu drialeri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Eby'enyegyesa kuruga enyima, nibitubumba hati n'omubiro byaitu by'omumaisho. Abantu ku barikuhinduka, ebirikwijuka ebyabaireho hamwe n'abantu b'omugasho, nibikira kugumaho kurabira omu mirembe mingi.

eng_prompt: Embracing freedom allows individuals to pursue their passions and express themselves fully. With autonomy, people can make choices that align with their values and aspirations.
lug_prompt: Okukkiriza eddembe kisobozesa abantu okukola ebyo bye baagala n'okweyanjula mu bujjuvu. Abantu bwe babeera n'obwetwaze, basobola okukola okusalawo okukwatagana n'emitindo gyabwe n'ebiruubirirwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Bedo agonya weko dano timo jami ma cwinygi mito dok ginyutu kit ma giwinyo kwede. Ki twero me loc ken, dano twero moko tam ma rwatte ki jami ma pigi tego ki miti gi.
teo_prompt: Aingarakin ailajara ngin itunga aswam nu ekotos kesi ka einer nu ekotos kesi kere. Keda aipugaikin bon, epedorete itunga aiswamaun aseununeta nuikamunitos iponesiokec keda apeleikinata kec.
lgg_prompt: Driwala aizu ri ni fe 'ba eyini e'yo eyini le 'diyi 'yezu dika eyi ma egata eyi ecezu dria. Driwala be, 'ba eyi eco peta eyi pe e'yo eyini lele 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okwakiira obugabe nikibaasisa abantu kukora ebi barikwenda n'okworeka ebibarikwetenga. Abantu baine obushoborozi, nibabaasa kukora okucwamu okurikuhikaana n'emitwarize yaabo n'ebigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: As the crowd gathered in the auditorium, anticipation filled the air. Everyone was eager to hear the insights and experiences of the esteemed major.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe baakuŋŋaanidde mu kisenge, baali beesunga nnyo. Buli omu yali yeesunga okuwulira amagezi n'obumanyirivu bwa meeja ow'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak gugure I ot lega, dano mapol gubedo ki gen. Dano ducu gubedo ki miti me winyo tam ki ngec pa major.
teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukonokin kotoma aiboisit, apol noi aomisio nuka itunga. Ekapakina itunga kere aipup aomisio keda amisiarit naka emeja lo angosibib.
lgg_prompt: O'bi yini yi trazu pari avitaniri ma alia 'boria, asi 'baza ga angu ma alia tre. Ba dria ma ava ndra e'yo egaza azini e'yo erini esu engazu major inzile inzi 'da vu 'diyi erizu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira omu kishengye, haabaho amatsiko maingi. Buri omwe akaba aine ekihika ky'okuhurira ebiteekateeko n'obuhangu bwa meeja.

eng_prompt: The recent surge in violent crime has left residents feeling vulnerable and anxious. Many community members are calling for increased police presence to address their growing fears.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'obuzzi bw'emisango gyebuvuddeko kulese abatuuze nga tebalina mwasirizi era nga beeraliikirivu. Abantu b'omu kitundu bangi basaba poliisi eyongezebweko okusobola okumalawo okutya kwabwe okweyongera.
ach_prompt: Medde pa tim aranyi ma otime cokcok-ki oweko lutedero gubedo ki lworo. Lwak mapol tye ka lego ni omyero kimed wel abili me tyeko lworo gi matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Apol naka abilibilio naka ikisila nes ejalakinit itunga aiyalongong ka aiyalongong. Ekotosi itunga luka atutubet aiyatakin ajaut naka ipolisin kanu aitemokin akuriau kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita onyoza onzi 'diyi ma omgbo tupi o'diru ri fe 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aa'zu okpo kokoru azini asi otiza be. Ba ongulumu eyi ma alea karakara eyi ai polisi eyi ma kalafe ma omgbo otuzu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'emishango y'okunyangaraza abantu, kireesire abatuuragye baine okwerarikirira n'okwerarikirira. Abantu baingi omu byaro nibashaba ngu poriisi eyongyereyo kubaho, okubaasa kumaraho okutiina kwabo okuriyo nikweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the government has established strict regulations regarding firearm ownership. These laws are designed to ensure that only qualified individuals can possess firearms for safety and security reasons.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, gavumenti etaddewo amateeka amakakali agakwata ku kubeera n'emmundu. Amateeka gano gakoleddwa okukakasa nti abantu abalina ebisaanyizo bokka be basobola okuba n'emmundu olw'ensonga z'obukuumi n'obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, gamente oketo cik matek tutwal I kom bedo ki muduku. Cik magi kiyubu me neno ni dano ma oporre keken aye twero bedo ki muduku pi gwoko kuc ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, abu apugan ibwaik ikisila luikidioko nuikamunitos ajaut keda imudun. Iswamaunitai ikisila lu kanu aanyun ebe itunga lu itutuoritai kes bon epedorete ajaut keda imudun kanuka ayuwara keda ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, gamete 'ba azita okporu eyi e'yo osu eyi ma ta mbazu ri ma dria. Ba ede azita 'diyi nezu ra kini lu 'ba agapi ra 'diyi eco ovu osu be e'yo ageitema ni 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, gavumenti eteireho ebiragiro by'amaani ebirikukwata aha kugira ebikwato. Ebiragiro ebi bikozirwe okureeba ngu abantu abarikwetegyerezibwa bonka nibo barikubaasa kugira ebikwato by'okurwanisa ahabw'eshonga z'eby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: Due to their compact size and lack of security features, many people underestimate the risks associated with parking motorcycles in public areas. As a result, they often become prime targets for thieves.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunene bwazo obutono n'obutaba na bintu by'okwerinda, abantu bangi banyooma akabi akali mu kusimba pikipiki mu bifo ebyolukale. N'ekivuddemu, ababbi batera okubatunuulira.
ach_prompt: Pi dit pa piki ki bedo peke pa jami me gwoko kuc, dano mapol pe tamo I kom peko matye I keto piki I kabedo ma lwak tye iye. Macalo adwogi ne, lukwo ipol kare gi keto cwiny gi i komgi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka adoketaitikec naedit keda amamus na iboro lu ayuara, mam itunga luipu ejenete atiokisio nu ejaas keda aipikakin ipikipikin kaiboisio nuipu itunga. Kanuka ngun, etapit duc kesi araun lu ekotosi ikokolak.
lgg_prompt: O'bi karakara eyi e'yo onzi pikipiki eyi ma ta mbazu angu o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea ku e'yo eyini pikipiki eyi 'bazu angu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea risi. E'yo 'disi, eyi eca sa'wa driasi 'ba ogua eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obuhango bwazo hamwe n'eibura ry'eby'okwerinda, abantu baingi tibarikumanya akabi akarikuruga omu kusimba pikipiki omu myanya y'abantu baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kuteganisibwa abashuma.

eng_prompt: After gathering sufficient evidence and interviewing witnesses, the authorities made the decision to detain the individuals involved. Following the arrest, the officers prepared to transfer the suspects to the local precinct for processing.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya obujulizi obumala n'okubuuza abajulizi, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okusiba abantu abeenyigiddemu. Oluvannyuma lw'okukwatibwa, abasirikale beetegese okutwala abateeberezebwa ku sitenseni y'omu kitundu okukeberebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee coko caden ma oromo ki penyo lucaden, lutela gumoko tam gi me mako joo ma otimo bal eni. Inge makogi, abili guyube me cwalo joo mabyek me bal tye I komgi I gang ticgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atukun aitogogongoret naedolit ka aingitingit ajenak, apotu apedorosio kiswamautu aseunet naka aiwen itunga luetirorit. Akaulo na aikamanario, apotu ipolisin itemonokinos ayangar lu ekamunitai polis kanu aitemokin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo afa ecetaru 'diyi trazu azini 'ba sadiniru 'diyi ozizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba okpo e'ipi 'diyi 'du e'yo 'ba yi bizu arujoa. E'yo 'bani eyi obizu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba eyi otu eyi 'ba 'bani ega eyi eza e'yo 'diyi jizu angu eyi ma alea 'bani eyi ma e'yo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okurundaana obujurizi burikumara n'okubuuza abajurizi, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu kukwata abantu abaabaire bejumbiremu. Ahanyima y'okukwatwa, abapooriisi baketeekateekyera kutwara abarikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro aha poriisi y'omukyanga kukora aha nshonga zaabo.

eng_prompt: After months of conflict and uncertainty, the long-awaited peace treaty was finally signed. As news spread throughout the city, excitement and joy filled the air, prompting a grand celebration.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obukuubagano n'obutali butebenkevu, endagaano y'emirembe ebadde erindiriddwa okumala ebbanga eddene yasembyeyo okussibwako omukono. Amawulire bwe gaasaasaana mu kibuga kyonna, essanyu n'okucamuka byajjula empewo, ekyaviirako okujaguza okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me lweny ki lworo, ki keto cing I winye me kuc ma dano obedo kakuru pi kare malac. I kare ma lok angea ne okato I boma ne, yom-cwiny ki yom-cwiny opong I yamo, ma okelo kwer madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ingungeta keda amamus acamanar, aponi kicikakinai akan toma acamanar naka aipuc. Nealimorata iyemuto kotoma oibuga kere, apotu aiyalama keda aiyalama kilelebunos kokwam, ido abu koyangau ainumunum naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Mba ngiringiri ni azini e'yo ewaru ni 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba ti dri kokobi asianzu ni 'bani ebi te sawa ezu ri ma dria ra. O'duko nderi ni i erezu aku ambu city niri ma alea ndulu, ayiko azini ayiko ga angu ma alea tre, e'yo 'da fe ayiko zuza amboru ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'obutaikirizana, endagaano y'obusingye ekahwaho. Amahurire ku gaahikire omu rurembo rwona, okushemererwa n'okushemererwa bikarugaho, kyareetaho okujaguza kw'amaani.

eng_prompt: As crime rates have been steadily increasing, community members are becoming increasingly concerned about their safety. It is essential to explore effective strategies to address these issues.
lug_prompt: Ng'obumenyi bw'amateeka bweyongedde buli lukya, abantu b'omu kitundu beeyongera okufaayo ku bukuumi bwabwe. Kya mugaso okunoonyereza ku ngeri ennungi ey'okugonjoolamu ensonga zino.
ach_prompt: Kit ma rwom me timo bal tye kamede kwede, lwak bene tye ka paro pi ber bedo gi. Pire tek tutwal me yenyo yoo maber me tyeko peko magi.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata noi abilibilio naka ikisila, epodokitos itunga luka atutubet ayuwara kec. Erai ibore yenepol noi aimo iwaitin lu itemonokinet akiro nu.
lgg_prompt: Ongmbo e'yo onzi 'yezu ri ni tu uru, 'ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi eca asi otiza be eyi ma agei tema ma dria. Eri orodriru geri kililiru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku obukozi bw'ebibi bweyongyeire, abantu b'omubyanga beeyongyeire kufayo ahaby'okwerinda kwabo. N'eky'omugasho okuronda oburyo burungi bw'okukora aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: Our brains are constantly processing information from the world around us. As we navigate our daily lives, we absorb knowledge about our environment and the people in it.
lug_prompt: Obwongo bwaffe buli kaseera bukola ku bubaka okuva mu nsi etwetoolodde. Nga tutambula mu bulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo, tufuna okumanya ku butonde bwaffe n'abantu ababulimu.
ach_prompt: I kare weng adamwa tye ka tic ki ngec ma aa ki ilobo ma orumuwa. Ka watye ka wot I kwowa me nino ducu, wanongo ngec I kom kabedo ma orumuwa ki dano matye iye.
teo_prompt: Euta adam wok duc aitemonokin akiro nuka akwap wok. Kwape ilosi oni aijar wok naka nginiparan, idumuni oni acoa naikamunit aiboisio nuikamunitos akwap wok keda itunga luejaasi toma.
lgg_prompt: Ama omi eyi o'du driasi o'dukoti engazu wudrikuru ama agei ri ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Amani aa'ria idri amani o'du driasi ri ma alea, ama ni ondua angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma dria tualu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Obwongo bwaitu buriijo nibukoresa amahurire kuruga omu nsi etwetorwaire. Ku turikugyenda omu magara gaitu aga buriizooba, nitutunga obwengye oburikukwata aha bantu abarikutubugyetooroora hamwe n'abantu abarikutubugyetooroora.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with constant noise and distractions, it's easy to lose sight of inner tranquility. Many factors can intrude upon our serenity and create turmoil in our lives.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde amaloboozi n'ebiwugulaza buli kaseera, kyangu okubulwa eddembe ly'omunda. Ensonga nnyingi zisobola okutaataaganya emirembe gyaffe n'okuleetawo obutabanguko mu bulamu bwaffe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki woo ki jami ma dwoyo tam pa dano, yot tutwal me rwenyo wang I kom kuc me cwiny. Tye jami mapol ma twero balo kuc ma watye kwede dok kelo kuku kuku i kwo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda iporotoi keda iboro luipu, epatana amunar ainapakina. Ipu iboro luepedorete aitolitol aijar wok kosodete ayangaun amumu kotoma aijar wok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea o'duko azini afa e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi pie tre, eri ewakokoru ama ma mile avi asi anzuru ma dria. E'yo karakara eyi eco e'yo amani aa'zu e'yere 'diyi atri ra dika eyi eco e'yo ewaru eji ama edri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire orwari hamwe n'ebirikuturemesa, kyanguhi kufeerwa obusingye bw'omunda. Hariho ebintu bingi ebirikubaasa kuturemesa kugira obusingye n'obutebekana omu magara gaitu.

eng_prompt: The impact of crime extends far beyond the immediate loss of property. It infiltrates communities, leaving individuals in a constant state of fear and anxiety.
lug_prompt: Ebiva mu bumenyi bw'amateeka bisukka ku kufiirwa ebintu. Kiyingirira ebitundu, ne kireka abantu mu mbeera y'okutya n'okweraliikirira buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Adwogi me timo bal tye kama bor loyo rweny pa jami. Tye ka donyo I kabedo mapatpat, weko dano bedo ki lworo ki lworo I kare weng.
teo_prompt: Ationis naka abilibilio naka ikisila erai naepol noi adepar aibiror naka iboro. Elomanari toma atutubena, ijalakini itunga akurianu keda aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita onyoza ni 'diyi ma e'yo eyi aga e'yo 'bani afa eyi avizu mbeleru ri ra. Eri fi ongulumu eyi ma alea, erini fezu 'ba eyini aa'zu orisi azini asi otiza be sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Ebihikiirizi by'obukozi bw'ebibi nibirenga aha kufeerwa ebintu. Nikihika omu bantu, kireka abantu omu bwire bw'okutiina n'okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: In response to a recent surge in gun-related incidents, law enforcement agencies intensified their efforts to ensure public safety. As part of this initiative, the authorities searched for those that would be owning guns illegally.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongera kw'emisango egyekuusa ku mmundu gye buvuddeko, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe byayongera amaanyi mu kaweefube w'okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, ab'obuyinza baanoonya abo abayinza okuba n'emmundu mu bumenyi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa tim maraco makubbe ki muduku, dul ma gwoko cik omedo kero gi me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak. Macalo but yub man, lutela guyenyo joo ma onongo gitye ki muduku iwi alii.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin akiro nuikamunitos imudun, apotu atukona nuka ikisila kitogogongoto aswamukec kanu ayuwar itunga. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, apotu apedorosio komoata ngul lu eomitai ejaas keda imudun koipone kalo mam ebeitor.

nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburingaaniza omu by'obwegyese n'okuzibira okugwa omu maisho, gavumenti ya Uganda eteireho ebiragiro ebirikukwata aha mirimo y'abegyesa. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okureeba ngu abeegi boona batunga obwegyese burungi, oihireho ahu barikutuura.

eng_prompt: To ensure continuous improvement and maintain high standards, the company has implemented a structured evaluation process. This allows management to identify strengths and areas for development among employees.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okwongera okulongoosa n'okukuuma omutindo ogwa waggulu, kampuni etaddewo enkola ennungi ey'okukebera. Kino kisobozesa abaddukanya emirimu okuzuula amaanyi n'ebifo eby'okukulaakulana mu bakozi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni rwom me tic tye kamede ki dongo dok rwom me tic tye malo, dul ne oketo yub me ngiyo kit ma tic tye kawot kwede. Man weko ludito tic gi niang kero pa lutic gi ki kama omyero gudong iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe inyikokinitai aitojokar ka aidar adoketait naepol, etolomu ekampuni ainapeta nuka airereonor iboro. Ingarakini ngin eyaitene ajenun agogongu keda aiboisio nu ekotosi eswamak apoloun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otuza azini wura muke ri ma tambazu, amuti 'di 'ba geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru. Diri fe driceza driceza niri dri okpo azini angu zota ni 'diyi esuzu azi'ba eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu habaho entunguuka n'okurinda omutindo gw'ahaiguru, kampuni eteireho enkora y'okushwijuma. Eki nikibaasisa abarikukurira emirimo okureeba amaani n'emyanya y'entunguuka omu bakozi.

eng_prompt: In the education system, the role of teachers is crucial in shaping students' academic success. Their guidance and support play a significant part in ensuring that pupils achieve their learning goals.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'ebyenjigiriza, omulimu gw'abasomesa gwa mugaso nnyo mu kubumba obuwanguzi bw'abayizi mu kusoma. Okulambika kwabwe n'obuyambi bikola kinene okulaba ng'abayizi batuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe eby'okusoma.
ach_prompt: I tenge me kwan, tic pa lupwonye pire tek tutwal I dongo kwan pa lutino. Kimiyo tira ki kony ma pire tek tutwal I neno ni lutino gu cobo miti gi me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma asioman, epol noi aswam naka isisianakinak kanu aitodolikin eswamae loajokan loka esisiak. Aicoreta kec keda agangat kes iswamaete ejok kanu awanyun ebe edolonokinete idwe apeleikinata kec nuka aisisia.
lgg_prompt: Onita ma alea, azi imba'ba eyini ri eri okporu sukulu anzi eyi ma agata onita ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Eyi ma imbata azini atita eyi azi okporu ni nga nezu ra kini sukulu anzi eyi ma otita onita ni 'diyi esu ra.

eng_prompt: As educators strive to enhance the learning experience, they often seek effective strategies to boost student engagement and understanding. Identifying key areas for improvement is essential for fostering academic success.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bwe bafuba okwongera ku bumanyirivu bw'okusoma, batera okunoonya enkola ennungi okutumbula okwenyigira kw'abayizi n'okutegeera. Okuzuula ebitundu ebikulu eby'okulongoosaamu kya mugaso mu kutumbula obuwanguzi mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lupwonye tye ka yele me medo rwom me kwan, giyenyo yoo maber me medo miti ki niang pa lutino. Niang kabedo mapigi tego ma omyero kimed iye rwom me kwan pire tek tutwal pi dongo rwom me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kwape isisianakinak iswamaete kagogongu kanu aitojokar eswamae lo aisisia, etapit kesi aimo iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu aitojokar aisisia keda amisiikin esisiak. Ajenun aiboisio nuepolok nuibusakinit aitojokar ejok kanu aitopolor akerianut kotoma asioman.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba eyini okpo 'bazu onita ma omgbo otuzu, eyi sa'wa driasi geri kililiru eyi nda sukulu anzi eyi ma ava otuzu azini eyi ma vata ma omgbo otuzu. Angu okporu otuzaru 'diyi ma e'dazuri eri orodriru drile suza onita ma alia ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa ku barikugyezaho kutunguura eby'okwega, nibakira kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okureetera abeegi kwejumba n'okwetegyereza. Okureeba emyanya y'omugasho y'okutunguura n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho obusinguzi omu by'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent developments, he felt it was crucial to address the public directly. To ensure transparency and provide accurate information, he called the journalists for a press conference tomorrow.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gye buvuddeko, yawulira nga kikulu okwogera eri abantu butereevu. Okusobola okukakasa obwerufu n'okuwa amawulire amatuufu, yayita bannamawulire mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire enkya.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, en otamo ni pire tek tutwal me lok ki lwak atir. Me neno ni jami weng tye atir ki miyo ngec matir, en olwongo lucoo lok angeya me lok ki lucoo lok angeya diki.

lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri ega kini eri orodriru e'yo nzezu o'bi yi be. Aa'zu e'yo ada be dika e'yo ada fezu, eri omve 'ba osisia ni 'diyi e'yo nzezu yi be drusi.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a positive work environment is essential for productivity and morale. To achieve this, effective communication and mutual respect between management and employees are crucial.

eng_prompt: After graduating from college, my sister was eager to find a job that aligned with her values. She eventually landed a position at a non-profit organization dedicated to community service.

eng_prompt: Each morning, educators prepare their lesson plans and gather their materials. With a sense of purpose, they head to their classrooms, ready to inspire and guide the next generation.

teo_prompt: Kanginitupuruc, itemonokinete isisianakinak ainapeta kec nuka aisisia kosodete aituk iboro kec. Keda apeleikinet, elosete kesi atukotokec, ekapakina aisinyikokin ka aingarenikin ateker naetupakini.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maintain a positive and productive environment, the organization has decided to implement stricter guidelines. These new policies aim to address and mitigate disruptive behavior among team members.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma embeera ennungi, ekitongole kisazeewo okussa mu nkola ebiragiro ebikakali. Enkola empya zigendereddwamu okukendeeza n'okukendeeza ku mpisa ezitabangula mu bammemba ba ttiimu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me gwoko kabedo maber dok ma ber, dul ne omoko tamgi me keto cik matek tutwal itic. Cik manyen magi tye ki miti me gengo tim maraco ikin lumemba me dul tic.

eng_prompt: In an effort to address staffing imbalances across the country, the Ministry of Education announced a major reshuffling of teachers. As a result, over seventy teachers were transferred from Kampala district to other districts in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okugonjoola obutali bwenkanya mu bakozi okwetooloola eggwanga, minisitule y'ebyenjigiriza yalangiridde enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu basomesa. N'ekyavaamu, abasomesa abasukka mu nsanvu baakyusibwa okuva mu disitulikiti y'e Kampala ne batwalibwa mu disitulikiti endala mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyeko peko me bedo peke pa lutic I lobo man, Ministry me pwonye owaco ni kibiloko lupwonye mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lupwonye makato pyerabiro ki kobo gi ki I districts me Kampala me cwalo gi I districts mukene I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka eswamak kakwap kere, abu erionget loka aisisia kolimo aijulanakineta nuepolok nuka isisianakinak. Kanuka ngun, aponi ijularai isisianakinak luedeparete akaisakanyarei koKampala aiboisio ace ko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu azi'ba eyi ma esele cozu kari 'di ma alea ndulu, okalamvu onita niri azi ojata okporu imba'ba eyini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba oja imba'ba ogogo kali aziri engazu distrikiti Kampala niri ma alea distrikiti azi 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okukora ahaburemeezi bw'abashomesa okwetoroora eihanga, minisiture y'eby'obwegyese ekarangirira empindahinduka y'amaani omu beegyesa. Ekyarugiremu, abegyesa abarikurenga makumi mushanju, bakahindurwa kuruga omu disiturikiti ya Kampala baaza omu disiturikiti ezindi omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: In response to recent concerns about educational standards, the district has decided to implement a new oversight initiative. As part of this effort, the education officers shall be supervising schools anytime from now.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okwaliwo gye buvuddeko ku mutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza, disitulikiti esazeewo okuteekawo enkola empya ey'okulondoola. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abakungu b'ebyenjigiriza bajja kuba balondoola amasomero obudde bwonna okuva kati.

teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka adoketait na asioman, aseu edisitrikt aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aimaniman. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, epote eswamak lu asioman aimaniman isomeroi adio apak ageun kwana.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza o'diru e'yo onita ma wura ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, distrikiti 'du e'yo 'bani e'yo onita ma pamvu onezu o'diru ni 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, azi'ba onita ni 'diyi mu sukulu eyi ma pamvu one sa'wa ciria e'dozu sa'wa 'disi.

eng_prompt: As I plan for my future, I'm trying to gather information about the benefits and regulations surrounding government employment. One key aspect I'm curious about is the retirement age for civil servants in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe nteekateeka ebiseera byange eby'omu maaso, ngezaako okukungaanya obubaka ku miganyulo n'ebiragiro ebikwata ku mirimu gya gavumenti. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu bye njagala okumanya y'emyaka abakozi ba gavumenti gye balina okuwummulirako mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka yubbe pi anyim mega, atye katemo me nongo ngec i kom ber pa tic ki cik makwako tic pa gamente. Gin acel ma amito niang iye tutwal obedo mwaka pa lutic pa gamente me weko tic.

lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo otuzu ewu mani drilerisi, ma o'bi o'dukoti tra orodri azini azita azi ngaza gameteni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu mani lezu onizu ma dria ri eli azi'ba gameteni 'diyini ava lizu azi vurisi ri i.

eng_prompt: As you approach the final years of your career, it's important to start planning for the transition ahead. This includes preparing for the responsibilities that come with retirement.

eng_prompt: In modern infrastructure, efficient water distribution is crucial for urban development. To achieve this, various methods are employed to ensure that water reaches homes and businesses effectively.

teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuakwana, ejai aikor akipi ejok kanu apol naka itaunin. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, itwasamao iwaitin luegelegela kanu awanyun ebe edolonokinete akipi oreria keda ibiasaran ejok.

lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okufuna amazzi amayonjo kukyali kusoomoozebwa kwa maanyi. Ensonga eno yeeyoleka nnyo mu bitundu ebirimu ensozi.

eng_prompt: During my childhood, I spent many summers in a small village surrounded by lush greenery. One of my daily tasks there involved helping my family with the water supply.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnali nkyali muto, ebiseera byange eby'omusana nnabimala mu kyalo ekitono ekyali kyetooloddwa ebimera ebirabika obulungi. Omu ku mirimu gye nnakola eyo buli lunaku kwe kuyamba ab'omu maka gange okufuna amazzi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma pud atidi, abedo I kare me oro mapol I caro mo matidi ma lum orumuwa. Tic acel ma onongo atimo nino ducu obedo konyo lugang na ki nongo pii.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana editeu eong, apotu eong adautu apakio nuipu nuka akolong kocalo lo ikidioko noi. Adiopet kotoma aswamisinei nueswamai eong kanginiparan ngesi aingarakin ekale ka adumun akipi.
lgg_prompt: Ma vile mvaari ma alia, ma oa eli aliru 'diyi ma alia calo werea 'bani ma ageia 'diyi ma alia. Azi alu mani nga o'du driasi 'da ma alea ri ma azi familia mavileri ma aza kozu yi ma esuta si.
nyn_prompt: Omu buto bwangye, nkaba nimara obwire bwingi bw'omushana omu kyaro kikye ekyehinguririize eby'obuhangwa. Omwe aha mirimo yangye eya buriizooba, n'okuhwera eka yangye okutunga amaizi.

eng_prompt: In a fast-paced environment, unexpected issues can arise at any moment. When these situations occur, it's essential to address them promptly.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ezirimu eby'amangu, ebizibu ebitasuubirwa bisobola okujja essaawa yonna. Embeera ng'ezo bwe zibaawo, kikulu okuzikolako mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, peko ma pe byek tye I komgi twero time ikare mo keken. Ka jami magi otimme, pire tek tutwal me cobo gi oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuepolok noi, epedorete atiokisio nu mam iwomitai atakanun adio apak kere. Karai iswamaunun ngun, ibusakinit aitemokin atipet.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'bani aa'zu mbeleru ri ma alea, e'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi eco efu sa'wa cirisi ra. E'yo 'dile 'diyi ka i'ye, eri orodriru e'yo 'yezu yi ma dria mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okwiruka, enshonga ezitarikuteekateekwaho nizibaasa kubaho eshaaha yoona. Embeera egi ku erikubaho, ni kikuru kugikoraho ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: As urban areas continue to evolve, the dynamics of daily life in town centres have become increasingly complex. Residents and visitors alike navigate a landscape filled with both opportunities and obstacles.
lug_prompt: Nga ebibuga byeyongera okukulaakulana, embeera y'obulamu obwa bulijjo mu bibuga wakati yeeyongedde okukaluba. Abatuuze n'abagenyi bonna batambulira mu nsi ejjudde emikisa n'ebizibu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kabedo me boma tye kamede ki dongo, kwo me nino ducu I dye boma dong odoko tek tutwal. Lutedero ki wele gitye ka wot I kabedo ma opong ki gum ki peko.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiboisio nuka itaunin apolor, apolor noi aijar naka nginiparan naka itaunin. Itunga keda ipejok kes elosete aiboisit na eleleba keda arerengesio keda atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni ru 'diyi ni mu drile e'doria, e'yo idri o'du driasi tawuni ma agandua 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eca curu'do kongolokoru. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tualu omu eyi pie mu angu 'di ma alea drileba eyi pie tualu e'yo ewaru eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Emyanya y'endembo ku erikugumizamu n'okutunguuka, entwaza y'abantu omu myanya y'endembo eyeyongyeire kugumizamu. Abatuuragye n'abagyenyi nibatambura omu myanya eijwire emigisha n'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: Geographical features can significantly influence climate and vegetation. One such feature is the presence of hills and mountains, which often leads to varying elevations.
lug_prompt: Ebintu by'ettaka bisobola okukosa ennyo embeera y'obudde n'ebimera. Ekimu ku bintu ng'ebyo kwe kubeerawo kw'obusozi n'ensozi, ekitera okuvaako obugulumivu obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Kabedo ma dano bedo iye twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kom kit ma piny bedo kwede ki jami ma dongo. Gin acel ma kit meno obedo bedo tye pa cere ki godi, ma pol kare kelo rwom me rwom ma pat pat.
teo_prompt: Epedorete aiboisio nuegelegela aitojokar ejautene loka ikwamin keda iraan. Adiopet koboro kwape kangun ngesi ajaut naka imoru keda imoru, ibore eyangauni aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyi eco e'yo angu mile ni 'diyi oja tualu ori eyi pie ra. E'yo azi 'dile 'diyi ma azi eri 'be azini 'be yi ma aa'ta ni, e'yo fepi 'ba eyini aa'zu angu uru ndundu 'diyi ma alea ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Ebintu ebirikukwata aha mwanya nibibaasa kukora kihango aha mbeera y'obwire hamwe n'ebimera. Kimwe aha bintu nk'ebyo, n'okubaho kw'enshozi n'enshozi, ekirikureetaho oburaingwa butarikushushana.

eng_prompt: As traditional water supplies become increasingly strained, communities are seeking innovative solutions. Exploring different methods to access water is essential for sustainability.
lug_prompt: Ng'amazzi ag'edda geeyongera okukaluba, abantu banoonya engeri endala ez'okugagonjoolamu. Okunoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okufunamu amazzi kya mugaso mu kuyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma pii macon tye ka doko tek tutwal, lwak tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me nongo pii. Kwed yoo mapatpat me nongo pii pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kwape etiono noi aikor akipi, eutasi itunga aimo iwaitin luitetiak. Aingic iponesio luegelegela luka adumun akipi erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar akwap.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma ayuza oku 'diyi ni ecazu ewaru, ongulumu eyi geri o'diru 'diyi nda. Geri ndundu yi esuzu 'diyi ma eti ondazu ri eri orodriru e'yo idri ta mbazuri ni.
nyn_prompt: Obu amaizi g'obuhangwa garikweyongyera kukyendeera, abantu nibaronda oburyo burungi. Okucondooza emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okutunga amaizi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okugumaho.

eng_prompt: As climate change continues to impact weather patterns, many regions are experiencing prolonged periods of little to no rainfall. These conditions can severely affect local ecosystems and agriculture.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkyukakyuka y'obudde yeeyongera okukosa embeera y'obudde, ebitundu bingi bifuna ebiseera ebiwanvu nga enkuba etonnya oba nga tetonnya. Embeera zino zisobola okukosa ennyo obutonde bw'ensi n'ebyobulimi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma alokaloka me piny tye kamede ki kelo alokaloka i kom kit ma piny bedo kwede, but lobo mapol tye ka nongo kot manok onyo peke pi kare malac. Jami magi twero balo kwo pa jami ma orumuwa kacel ki pur.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae aitolitol ekuse keda ecae loka ikwamin, ejaasi aiboisio nuipu keda apakio nuewojak nuka edou. Epedorete ejautene lo aimusung isuban keda iboro lu akoru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri ni mu drile e'yo angu mile ni 'diyi ojazu risi, angu karakara eyi ozoo esu sa'wa ezu kani ku ozoo ku. E'yo 'diyi eco angu ama agei 'diyi ma ta mba tualu agirikica be ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku empindahinduka y'obwire erikugumizamu neekora aha mpindahinduka y'obwire, ebicweka bingi nibitunga obwire bureingwa bw'enjura nkye nainga etariho. Embeera egi neebaasa kuteganisa munonga eby'obuhangwa n'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: Collaboration is essential for achieving our goals, and we must recognize the value of diverse perspectives. Embracing teamwork can lead to innovative solutions and stronger outcomes.
lug_prompt: Okukwatagana kwa mugaso okutuuka ku bigendererwa byaffe era tulina okutegeera omugaso gw'endowooza ez'enjawulo. Okukolera awamu kisobola okuleetawo eby'obuyiiya n'ebirungi ebivaamu.
ach_prompt: Winye obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me cobo miti wa, omyero bene waniang ber pa tam mapatpat. Cwako tic kacelo twero kelo yoo manyen me cobo peko ki adwogi maber.
teo_prompt: Erai aiswamanara naejok kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekosi, ido ekot oni ajenun ajokis naka aomisio nuegelegela. Aimorikikin aswam nepepe epedori ayangaun aomisio nuitetiak ka akiro nuejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita eri orodriru e'yo amani lele 'diyi esuzu, dika le ama ma ega orodri e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria ri ra. Azi ngaza tualu ri eco fe e'yo ndundu eyi ma aza kozu dika e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho omu kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byaitu, kandi twine kumanya omugasho gw'emiteekateekyere etari emwe. Okukorera hamwe nikibaasa kureetaho oburyo burungi bw'okutereeza enshonga n'ebirikurugamu.

eng_prompt: In a system where the pressure is reduced, the movement of fluids is affected. As a result, the dynamics of water flow change significantly.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola nga puleesa ekendedde, entambula y'amazzi ekosebwa. N'ekivuddemu, entambula y'amazzi ekyuka nnyo.

eng_prompt: In the heat of election season, candidates often seek to win over voters with grand declarations. However, many of these pledges tend to fade away once they take office.
lug_prompt: Mu bbugumu ly'ebiseera by'okulonda, abeesimbyewo batera okugezaako okusikiriza abalonzi n'ebirangiriro ebinene. Newankubadde, bingi ku bisuubizo bino bitera okusaanawo oluvannyuma lw'okutwala woofiisi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lyeto me bolo kwir, lucungu ipol kare gi yenyo yo me nongo cwak pa lubol kwir kun gitiyo ki lok angeya madongo tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, pol pa cikke magi rweny woko kace gucako tic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuapolok nuka aseo, etapit abwoak aitam aitelekaar aseak keda alimonokineta nuapolok. Konye, ekotosi aisumuneta nu aibiror akaulo naka alomar oyapesi.

eng_prompt: In today's political landscape, trust in leaders has significantly diminished. Many citizens feel disillusioned by the constant stream of misinformation and broken promises.
lug_prompt: Mu byobufuzi by'ennaku zino, obwesige mu bakulembeze bukendedde nnyo. Bannansi bangi bawulira nga baweddemu amaanyi olw'amawulire amakyamu n'ebisuubizo ebitamatuukiridde.
ach_prompt: I lok me cungu iwi bye me kare-ni, gen i kom lutela odok piny tutwal. Anywali mapol cwinygi otur pi lok goba ki cikke ma pe ocobbe.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nuka epolitikis lolo, ekidiokoto amunokina mama ejaasi engarenok. Apotu itunga luipu itakadikisi kanuka akiro nuarokok ka aisumuneta numam itodolikinitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni ewu andruri ma alea, asi'baza drice'ba eyi ma dria ri esi ra. Kari anzi karakara eyi ma asi eza e'yo e'yo onzi eyi ma dria sa'wa driasi azini e'yo 'bani eyi owizu ku 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki eby'erizooba, obwesigye omu beebembezi bukyendeire munonga. Abatuuragye baingi nibamara amaani ahabw'amakuru agatahikire n'ebiraganiso ebitahikire.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, the nation looks to its leaders for guidance and solutions. Effective leadership is essential for addressing the complex challenges that arise in society.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu, eggwanga litunuulira abakulembeze baalyo okufuna obulagirizi n'okugonjoola ebizibu. Obukulembeze obulungi bwa mugaso nnyo mu kugonjoola okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi okujjawo mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, lobo neno lutela gi pi kony ki yoo me cobo peko. Tela maber pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko mapol matye I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, emoi akwap nejaas engarenok ke kanu aingarenikinio ka aitemokin ationis. Engarenone loajokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuelomunete kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, kari ni asi 'ba drice'ba erini 'diyi vu imbata esuzu azini e'yo eyi ma aza kozu. Driceza kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo ewaru efu'ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.

eng_prompt: In any organization, the dynamics of power and influence are constantly shifting. As circumstances change, it becomes evident that leaders can be replaced.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, enkola y'obuyinza n'obuyinza ekyukakyuka buli kaseera. Embeera bwe yeeyongera okukyuka, kyeyoleka kaati nti abakulembeze basobola okukyusibwa.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, rwom me tela ki tela tye ka loke I kare weng. Ka jami tye ka loke, nen atyer kamaleng ni lutela twero loke.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oriongeta kere, ejulakinete apugan keda apedor. Kwape ijulakinor ejautene, ecai cut ebe epedorio aijulakin engarenok.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria ma alea, e'yo okpo ni azini okpo feza ni 'diyi oja yi sa'wa driasi. E'yo ni i ojazu 'boria, eri eca e'dazaru kini 'ba eco drice'ba eyi oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona, amaani n'obushoborozi nibigyenda nibihinduka. Embeera ku erikuhinduka, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu abeebembezi nibabaasa kuhindurwa.

eng_prompt: Despite the high-profile nature of the event, attendance was surprisingly low. Organizers had anticipated a larger turnout, given the significance of the announcement.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'omukolo gwali gwa kitiibwa nnyo, kyewuunyisa nti abantu batono nnyo abajja. Abategesi baali basuubira abantu bangi okujja olw'obukulu bw'okulangirira kuno.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub eni obedo ber tutwal, wel dano ma obino obedo nok tutwal. Luyub onongo gitye ki byek ni dano mapol bibino, malubbe ki ber pa lok angeya man.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejenara noi epucit ngol, ikidioko itunga luapotu kopotu. Aomitos etemonokinak ebe epote itunga luipu alomun, kotupitete ajokis naka alimoret ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo omu 'da ni ovuzu okporu ri ma talasi, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma kalafe ndra were. Ba e'yo otupi 'diyi ega ndra 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma kalafe angiri, e'yo 'bani e'yo azi 'da ma orodri 'duzu 'bori ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho omurimo gw'amaani, abantu bakye nibo baizire aha mukoro. Abatebekanisa bakaba nibateekateeka ngu abantu baingi nibaza kwija ahabw'omugasho gw'okurangirira.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, many leaders have demonstrated a relentless ambition to maintain their authority. This desire often leads them to implement strategies aimed at prolonging their tenure.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abakulembeze bangi balaze obwagazi obutasalako okukuuma obuyinza bwabwe. Okwagala kuno kutera okubaleetera okuteeka mu nkola enkola ezigendereddwamu okwongezaayo obuyinza bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, lutela mapol gubedo ki miti matek me gwoko twero gi. Miti man pol kare weko gi tiyo ki yoo me medo kare gi me loc.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, itodunitos engarenok luipu eipud loka aidar apedorosiokec. Amuno na eyangauni kesi aitegear iwaitin lu ekotosi kesi aiyatakin apak kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba karakara eyi e'da e'yo eyini lezu okpo eyini ri ma tambazu. Leta 'di ni eyi ma ti pe geri eyini ecozu eyi ma aa'zu kari 'di ma alea sa'wa ezu 'diyi 'yezu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, numerous scandals and broken promises have eroded public confidence in elected officials. As a result, many citizens feel disillusioned and skeptical about the integrity of their leaders.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, emivuyo mingi n'ebisuubizo ebitatuukiridde bikosezza obwesige bw'abantu mu bakungu abalonde. N'ekivuddemu, bannansi bangi baggwaamu essuubi era babuusabuusa obwesimbu bw'abakulembeze baabwe.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, bal mapat-pat ma otimme I kom gamente ki cikke ma pe ocobbe orwenyo gen pa lwak I kom lutela ma kiyero gi. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali mapol cwinygi otur dok gitye ki akala-kala I kom ber bedo pa lutela gi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, amumu naepol noi keda aisumuneta numam itodolikinitos amunokina naka itunga mama ejaasi eswamak lu eseunitai. Kanuka ngun, mam itunga luipu ejenete ajokis naka engarenok kec.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo onzi karakara azini e'yo 'bani owizu 'diyi eza o'bi yi ma asi'baza azi'ba 'bani ope 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, kari anzi karakara eyi aa'ni ava ako be dika eyi ega e'yo ada drice'ba eyivile 'diyiniri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, obushomankuzi bwingi hamwe n'ebiraganiso ebitahikire, bitumire abantu batakikiririza omu bakuru abatoorainwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi tibarikuhurira gye kandi tibarikwesiga obwesigwa bw'abebembezi baabo.

eng_prompt: In the competitive landscape of elections, candidates often seek to gain the trust and support of the electorate. To achieve this, they frequently resort to making bold commitments and assurances.
lug_prompt: Mu kuvuganya kw'okulonda, abeesimbyewo batera okunoonya obwesige n'obuwagizi bw'abalonzi. Okutuukiriza kino, batera okwesigama ku kukola obweyamo obw'amaanyi n'okukakasa.
ach_prompt: I kare me pyem I yer, lucungu ipol kare giyenyo gen ki cwak pa lubol kwir. Me cobo man, pol kare gicito ka miyo cikke ki gen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka aseo, ekotosi duc abwaak adumun amuno keda agangat kama ejaasi aseak. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, etapit kesi aitodolikin aisumuneta keda aitogogongeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo baka seza ni opeta eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea, 'ba pa tupi 'diyi sa'wa driasi le asi'baza azini atita 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi niri esu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, eyi tutuni asi 'ba e'yo eyi 'yezu okporu azini e'yo eyi 'yezu e'yo adaru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okuhayahayana omu karuuru, abesimbireho nibaronda obwesigye n'obushagiki bw'abateezi b'akaruuru. Okuhikiiriza eki, nibakira kuhayo obuhame n'obuhame.

eng_prompt: Uganda has a diverse political landscape that reflects its complex history and social dynamics. As a result, various groups have emerged to represent different ideologies and interests within the country.
lug_prompt: Uganda erina ebyobufuzi eby'enjawulo ebiraga ebyafaayo byayo ebizibu n'enkyukakyuka mu mbeera z'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, ebibiina eby'enjawulo bivuddeyo okukiikirira endowooza n'ebigendererwa eby'enjawulo mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye ki lok me cungu iwi bye ma pat pat ma nyutu jami ma otimme con ki kit ma kwo pa dano tye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, gurup mapat-pat okati me cung pi tam mapat-pat ki miti mapat-pat I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi Uganda keda iponesio luegelegela luka politikis luitodunitos akiro nukolosek keda iponesio luegelegela luka itunga. Kanuka ngun, apotu igurupun luegelegela kolomutu kanu abwoikin aomisio nuegelegela keda ipudesia luegelegela kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma e'yo politiki ni ndundu 'diyi e'da e'yo ewu driori ma alea 'diyi tualu e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, amuti ndu ndu efu pa sozu egata azini e'yo ndundu kari ma alia 'diyi ma paria.
nyn_prompt: Uganda eine eby'obutegyeki bitari bimwe na bimwe ebirikworeka ebyafaayo byayo ebitarikwetegyerezibwa hamwe n'embeera y'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, guruupu nyingi zitandikireho kujwekyera ebiteekateeko n'ebigyendererwa bitari bimwe omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: In times of turmoil and conflict, finding a way to mend relationships and heal emotional wounds becomes essential. Embracing the journey of forgiveness and understanding can lead to profound inner tranquility.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutabanguko n'obukuubagano, okunoonya engeri y'okuzzaawo enkolagana n'okuwonya ebiwundu by'ebirowoozo kifuuka kikulu. Okukkiriza olugendo lw'okusonyiwa n'okutegeeragana kisobola okuleetawo emirembe egy'omunda.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kuku-kuku ki lweny, nongo yoo me yubu wat ki cango awano me cwiny doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Jolo yoo me timo kica ki niang maber twero kelo kuc i cwiny dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amumu keda ingungeta, aimo epone loka aitemokin eidicane loajokan keda aimukia ajimis erai ibore yenepol noi. Aimorikikin alosit naka aitim keda amisiikin epedori ayangaun ainapakina naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma alea, geri esuzu aa'ta eyi ma eselea azini bile eyi ma aza kozu ri eca orodriru. Acita truta ni azini vata ma e'yo a'izu ri ma a'izu ri eco fe 'ba eyini aa'zu asianzu ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko n'obutabanguko, okusherura oburyo bw'okugarura busya enkoragana n'okukiza ebironda by'ebiteekateeko nikiba kiri eky'omugasho munonga. Okwikiriza orugyendo rw'okusaasira n'okwetegyereza nikibaasa kureetaho obusingye bw'omunda.

eng_prompt: The current administration has faced numerous challenges and controversies that have left many citizens disillusioned. As the nation grapples with pressing issues, a fresh perspective in leadership could pave the way for meaningful change.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti eriwo kati eyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa n'obukuubagano ebirese bannansi bangi nga baweddemu amaanyi. Nga eggwanga lirwanagana n'ensonga ez'amangu, endowooza empya mu bukulembeze eyinza okuggulawo ekkubo ly'enkyukakyuka ey'amakulu.
ach_prompt: Gamente matye kombedi okato ki peko mapol tutwal ma oweko dano mapol pe gubedo ki gen. I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki peko mapigi tego, neno manyen I tela twero yabo yoo pi aloka loka ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Etereikina eyaitene loejai kopana keda atiokisio keda ingungeta luipu luejalakisi itunga luipu aiyalongong. Kwape etereikina akwap keda atiokisio nuepolok, aomisioit naitetet kotoma eingarenone epedori aitolomun aijulakinet naejok.
lgg_prompt: Driceza sawa 'disi ri esu e'yo ewaru karakara eyi fepi kari anzi karakara eyini ava ako ni. Kari ni dri ciria e'yo okporu 'diyi pie, egata o'di driceza ma alia 'diyi eco geri e'yo ojata orodriruri ni 'diyi ma ti zizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi oburiho obwahati butungire oburemeezi bwingi n'obutaikirizana oburetsire abantu baingi okuhwa amaani. Obu eihanga ririkurwanagana n'eshonga z'amaani, enteekateeka nsya omu bwebembezi neebaasa kwiguraho omuhanda gw'empinduka y'amaani.

eng_prompt: In an increasingly interconnected world, the challenges faced by one nation can often mirror those of another. By sharing insights and strategies, countries can foster mutual growth and resilience.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eyeeyongera okukwatagana, okusoomoozebwa eggwanga lye lisanga kutera okufaanagana n'ery'ensi endala. Mu kugabana amagezi n'obukodyo, amawanga gasobola okutumbula enkulaakulana n'okugumira embeera.
ach_prompt: I lobo man matye ka kube matek tutwal, peko ma lobo acel nongo ipol kare rom aroma ki pa lobo mukene bene. I yo me nywako tam ki yoo mapat-pat, lobo mapat-pat twero dongo dok twero cung matek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naeringa arucokina, atiokisio nu etereikina keda akwap adiope epedorete aitodun nuka akwapin ace. Kowai lo aimor acoasinei keda iwaitin, epedorete akwapin aitojokar apol keda apedor.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani e'yo yi ecizu tualuri ma alia, e'yo ewaru kari alu ni dri fuzu yi be 'diyi eco sawa driasi e'da kari azi 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ra. E'yo ndundu eyi awazu tualu geri ndundu eyini eyi 'yezu 'diyisi, kari eyi eco zota tualu ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikweyongyera kukwatanisa,oburemeezi obu eihanga rimwe ririkurabamu, nibubaasa kuba nibushushana n'obw'eihanga erindi. Okugabana ebiteekateeko n'oburyo, amahanga nigabaasa kureetaho entunguuka hamwe n'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: Despite their efforts to campaign and engage with the community, the new political party has struggled to gain recognition. Many residents are unaware of their platform and candidates.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko kaweefube w'okunoonya akalulu n'okukwatagana n'abantu, ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekipya kilwanye okufuna okumanyibwa. Abatuuze bangi tebamanyi bifo byabwe n'abeesimbyewo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek me bito kwi ki lok ki lwak, dul me cungu iwi bye manyen ne obedo ka tute matek me nongo yweka. Lutedero mapol pe gingeyo yub gi ki lucungu gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamaete kesi kagogongu kanu aisup aseeta keda aiswamanar keda itunga, etiono noi epate loitetet aijen. Mam itunga luipu ejenete nuikamunitos aiboisio kec keda abwoak kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo yini ti odaza 'yezu azini e'yo nzezu o'bi yi be ra ti, amuti politiki ni o'diruri ebi dri ci e'yo isuzu. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma karakara eyi nini e'yo eyi ma kokobi eyi ma dria ku dika 'ba pa tupi eyi pie 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani gaayo g'okuronda akaruuru n'okukwatanisa n'abantu, ekibiina ky'obutegyeki ekisya kitungire oburemeezi bw'okumanya abantu. Abatuuragye abaingi tibarikumanya ebibiina byabo n'abeesimbireho.

eng_prompt: Every year, citizens gather to honor the sacrifices made for their freedom. This significant event marks a pivotal moment in the nation's history.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, bannansi bakungaana okussa ekitiibwa mu kwefiiriza okwakolebwa ku lw'eddembe lyabwe. Omukolo guno ogw'omugaso gwa nkizo nnyo mu byafaayo by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, anywali gure me woro dano ma gujale pi bedo agonya gi. Yub man obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tekwaro pa lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kangolikaru, etukonokino itunga aiitun ngul luapotu kotuboros kanu ailajara kec. Atukot na naepol noi erai naepol noi kotoma akiro nukolo nuka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Eli vusi, kari anzi eyi tra eyi inzita fezu 'ba eyini eyi owizu driwala eyini risi 'diyi dri. Yeta orodriru 'diri sawa okporu adi kari niri ma alea ni i.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka, abatuuragye nibateeranira hamwe okuheereza ekitinisa abo abaheireyo kurwanirira obugabe bwabo. Omukoro gw'omutaano ogu nigureetaho obwire bw'omutaano omu byafaayo by'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In light of recent polls showing a surge in support, the party has ramped up its campaign efforts. With a clear strategy in place, they are focusing on key issues that resonate with voters.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko awo okulaga okweyongera kw'obuwagizi, ekibiina kyongedde amaanyi mu kakuyege waakyo. Nga balina enteekateeka etegeerekeka obulungi, essira balitadde ku nsonga enkulu ezisikiriza abalonzi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki bolo kwir ma otimme cokcok-ki ma onyuto ni cwak tye kamede, dul me cungu iwi-bye ne omedo kero me bito kwi. Ki yub matye atir, gitye ka keto cwinygi I kom lok mapigi tego ma oyomo cwiny lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aseo napac itodunit ebe eyatakinos egangitok, eyataki epate ikampeins. Keda aitemonokineta nuecaete, eutasi kesi aitemokin akiro nuepolok nuepedorete acamanar keda aseak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo voti 'beza o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, amuti politiki ni 'da otu okpo e'yo ti odaza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ra. Otita kililiru be, eyi asi 'ba e'yo okporu 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuteera akaruuru akahweireho akarikworeka obushagiki obweyongyeire,ekibiina kyongyeire amaani omu kampeyini zaakyo. Baine enteekateeka nungi, nibagyenderera enshonga nkuru ezirikushemeza abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: The community had been eagerly preparing for the annual awards ceremony, hoping to celebrate the achievements of local heroes. In a surprising announcement, it was revealed that our president would be attending the event.
lug_prompt: Abantu babadde beetegekera n'obwagazi omukolo gw'okugaba awaadi buli mwaka, nga basuubira okujaguza ebituukiddwaako abazira b'omu kitundu. Mu kulangirira okwewuunyisa, kyazuulibwa nti pulezidenti waffe ajja kubaawo ku mukolo.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka yubbe ki miti madit tutwal pi yub me miyo mic mwaka ki mwaka, ki gen me kwero jami ma oteka me tedero otimo. I lok angeya ma obedo me ur, kinyuto ni ladit lobo wa bibedo tye I yub meno.
teo_prompt: Auta itunga aitemonokin kanuka epucit loka aijaario naka ainanakineta kangin ekaru, kowomitos ebe epedorete kesi ainumunum aitodolinikineta nuka itunga luka atutubet. Kotoma alimoret na itegelikina, aponi kolimorai ebe ebuni lokapolon akwap wok ajaikin toma opucit.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi otuta 'ye avasi omu dria dria dria feza ni eli vusi ri ni, asi 'baza be e'yo 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni 'ye 'diyi inzizu. E'yo azi osutaru ni ma alia, 'ba ece kini ama vile prisdentni nga ovu omu 'da ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu babaire nibeteekateekyera munonga omukoro gw'okuheereza ebirabo buri mwaka, barikuteekateeka ngu nibaza kujaguza ebirikubaasa kukorwa abahangu b'omukyanga kyabo. Omu kurangirira okutangaaza, kikamanywa ngu purezidenti waitu naija kuba ari aha mukoro.

eng_prompt: In recognition of their service and sacrifices, the government has taken steps to support the well-being of veterans. As part of this initiative, the ministry has donated twenty million shillings to the veterans.
lug_prompt: Mu kusiima obuweereza bwabwe n'okwefiiriza, gavumenti ekoze emitendera okuwagira obulungi bw'abaazirwanako. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, minisitule ewadde abaazirwanako obukadde abiri.
ach_prompt: I pwoc pi ticgi ki jalo kwogi, gamente otimo jami mapol me konyo lumony macon me kwo maber. Macalo but yub man, gangkal omiyo ciling milyon pyeraryo bot lumony macon.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisiyalamikin aijanakin kec keda aijarakec, etolomu apugan nuepedorete aingarakin ngul lu eyengunak. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ejaiki erionget imilionin akaisarei mama ejaasi lumojong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini azi ngazu azini yi owizurisi, gamete 'du e'yo atita fezu 'ba a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di ' Otita 'di ma azi ru, okalamvu 'da fe silingi milioni kali iri asikari ndra a'di 'dipira 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti, ahabw'okusiima obuheereza bwabo n'okwefeerereza kwabo, eteireho oburyo bw'okuhwera abazirwanireho. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, minisiture ehereize abazirwanireho obukaikuru makumi abiri.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a noticeable increase in local engagement and collaboration among residents. Various organizations have been hosting events to encourage involvement and strengthen community bonds.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongerayongera mu kwegatta n'okukolagana mu batuuze. Ebitongole eby'enjawulo bibadde bitegeka emikolo okukubiriza okwenyigiramu n'okunyweza enkolagana mu bitundu.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, rwom me ribbe I kin lutedero omede tutwal. Dule ma padi padi gubedo ka yubu yub me cuku cwiny lwak me bedo tye i yub eni ki bene me jingo wat ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, ejai aiyatakino naepol noi naka aimorikikina keda aiswamanara kanejaas itunga luka atutubet. Itolosete iriongeta luipu aswamisio kanu aisinyikokit itunga ajaut toma ka aitogogong eidicane lo itunga.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ni ti ecizu tualu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo tu ra. Amuti ndundu eyi ebi otuta eyi 'ye eyini ani 'ba eyi ma eselea dika eyi ma eselea 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, habaireho okweyongyera kw'abantu b'omubyaro okukwatanisa n'okukwatanisa. Ebitongore ebitarikushushana bitwire nibitebeekanisa emikoro y'okuhiga abantu kwejumbamu n'okwongyera amaani omu kukwatanisa kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: Making a commitment is an important step in demonstrating your dedication to a cause. It is essential to recognize the significance of your promise and take action to honor it.
lug_prompt: Okukola obweyamo ddaala lya mugaso mu kulaga obweyamo bwo eri ensonga. Kya mugaso okutegeera amakulu g'ekisuubizo kyo n'okukola okukituukiriza.
ach_prompt: Cikke obedo yoo acel ma pire tek me nyutu ni imito timo gin moni. Pire tek tutwal me niang ber pa cikke ni ki timo gin mo me cobo ne.
teo_prompt: Aswam ainakina erai ainapeta nuepolok kanu aitodun ebe ikoto ijo aswam ibore. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun ajokis naka aisumun kon kosodi aitodolikin ngun.
lgg_prompt: Mi owizu e'yo azi ma dria ri eri geri azi orodriru mini mi owizu e'yo azi ma dria ri e'dazu. Eri orodriru mini e'yo mini owizu ri ma orodri esuzu azini e'yo 'duzu eri 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okwehayo n'omuringo gw'omugasho gw'okworeka okwehayo kwawe aha kintu. N'eky'omugasho kumanya omugasho gw'ebiraganiso byawe n'okukora kyona ekirikwetengyesa okubihikiiriza.

eng_prompt: After years of dedication and hard work, the organization has made significant strides in its mission. Members gathered to reflect on their achievements and look forward to the future.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga bakola n'obunyiikivu, ekibiina kino kituuse ku buwanguzi mu mulimu gwakyo. Bammemba baakuŋŋaanye okufumiitiriza ku bye batuuseeko n'okutunuulira ebiseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me keto cwiny ki tic matek, dul ne dong odongo tutwal I ticgi. Lumemba gugure me tam I kom jami ma gutimo ki dong neno anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam keda agogongu, eswamau erionget apol noi kotoma aswamuke. Apotu imeban kotukokinos aomoom nu eswamata kesi ka asesen koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu asi driasi azini azi ngazu avasi 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'di isu drileba angiri e'yo erini le 'ye 'diyi ma alea. Memba eyi tra eyi e'yo egazu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria tualu ewu drialeri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okwehayo n'okukora n'amaani, ekitongore kitungire entunguuka omu mirimo yakyo. Ba memba baketeeranira hamwe kuteekateeka aha bibahikiriize n'okureeba omu maisho.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated service in local government, he decided to run for a higher office. His commitment to the community and his vision for the future resonated with voters.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'aweereza mu gavumenti z'ebitundu, yasalawo okwesimbawo ku kifo ekya waggulu. Obumalirivu bwe eri abantu n'ebirooto bye eby'ebiseera eby'omu maaso byasiimibwa abalonzi.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek I gamente me tedero, en omoko tamme me cung pi dog tic madit. Cwinye i kom lwak kacel ki neno ma en tye kwede pi anyim oyomo cwiny lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin kotoma apugan naka atutubet, abu ngesi koseu aibwo kanu eyapiesi loapolon. Apotu aseak kocamutu ainakina ke mama ejaasi itunga keda aomisioitike nuka oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Eli erini azi ngazu okporu local government ma alia 'bori ma vutia, eri 'du e'yo pa tuzu ofisi ururi ma alia. Asi feza erini ongulumu eyini ri tualu egata erini ewu drialeri ma dria 'diyi pie 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma asi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi omu gavumenti z'ebyaro, akasharamu kwesimbaho ahabwa ofiisi y'ahaiguru. Okwehayo kwe aha bantu hamwe n'ekirooto kye ky'ebiro bya nyensya bikashemezibwa abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing concerns of the local community, the member of parliament recognized the need for organized support. To address these issues effectively, she decided to establish various groups in that region.
lug_prompt: Ng'ayanukula okweraliikirira kw'abantu b'omu kitundu okweyongera, omubaka wa paalamenti yakitegedde obwetaavu bw'obuyambi obutegekeddwa. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino obulungi, yasalawo okutandikawo ebibiina eby'enjawulo mu kitundu ekyo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo matye kamede pa lwak me tedero, lamemba me parliament oniang miti me miyo kony ma kiyubu maber. Me tyeko peko magi maber, en omoko tamme me cako dul mapat-pat I but lobo enuni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka itunga luka atutubet, abu emeeba loka airabet kojen eipud loka agangat na itemokinitai. Kanu aitemokin akiro ngun ejok, abu ngesi koseu aitolomun igurupun luegelegela katutubet kangin.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ma asi otizu, memba koloseni ni 'da esu ra kini le 'ba ma otu atita ra. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, eri 'du e'yo amuti ndundu eyi e'dozu angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okwerarikirira kw'abantu b'omubyaro, memba w'eishengyero akareeba ekyetengo ky'obuhwezi obutebekanisiibwe. Okukora aha nshonga ezi kurungi, akasharamu kutandikaho guruupu nyingi omu kyanga ekyo.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, the members expressed their concerns about the group's image and its impact on public perception. In response to their discussion, the president advised them to rename the group.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana, bammemba baalaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku kifaananyi ky'ekibiina n'engeri gye kikwata ku ndowooza y'abantu. Mu kwanukula okukubaganya ebirowoozo kwabwe, pulezidenti yabawa amagezi okukyusa erinnya ly'ekibiina.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke, lumemba gunyutu lworo gi i kom nying dul enoni ki adwoki ne i kom tam pa lwak. I kare ma gitye ka lok, ladit lobo ominigi tam me loko nying dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka airiamunet, apotu imeban itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos ekiror loka egurupu keda epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol aomisio nuka itunga. Kotoma abongokinet kec, abu lokapolon akwap kicorak kesi aijulakin ekiror lo egurupu.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, 'ba memba ru 'diyi ece asi otiza yini e'yo amuti 'da ma wura ma dria azini e'yo erini 'ye o'bi eyi ma egata ma dria ri ma dria. Erini e'yo nzezu yi ma eselea, prisdent fe yi dri embata amuti nde ma ru ojazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, ba memba bakooreka okwerarikirira kwabo aha kishushani ky'ekibiina hamwe n'oburemeezi bwaakyo aha miteekateekyere y'abantu. Omu kugarukamu okuhanuura kwabo, purezidenti akabahabura kuhindura eiziina ry'ekibiina.

eng_prompt: After months of waiting for promised support, the villagers grew increasingly frustrated with the lack of action. In a recent meeting, the village leaders decided it was time to confront the president about his commitments.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi nga balindirira obuyambi obwasuubizibwa, abantu b'oku kyalo beeyongera okunyiiga olw'obutabaako kye bakolawo. Mu lukiiko olwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, abakulembeze b'ekyalo baasalawo nti kye kiseera okwogera ne pulezidenti ku bye yeeyama.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me kuro kony ma kicikke me minigi, cwiny lutedero obedo ka cwer tutwal pi peko me tic. I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, lutela me caro gumoko ni kare dong oromo me lok ki ladit lobo I kom cikke ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aidar agangat na esumunitai, apotu itunga lu ocaalo itakadikisi kanu amamus aswam. Kotoma airiamunet napac, apotu engarenok lu ocaalo itutuboto ebe erai apak na airiamun keda lokapolon akwap kanuikamunitos aisumunetake.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia 'bani atita 'bani owizu 'diyi tezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba calua 'diyi eca candi ru e'yo 'bani e'yo 'yezu kurisi. Mitingi azi ebipi o'diru ni ma alea, drice'ba calo ni 'diyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bo e'yo nzezu purezidenti be e'yo erini owizu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okurinda obuhwezi obwaraganisiibwe, abantu b'omubyaro bakahwamu amaani ahabw'obutabaho. Omu rukiiko orwabaireho juba, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakasharamu ngu obwire buhikire kubugana omwebembezi w'eihanga aha bikwatiraine n'okwehayo kwe.

eng_prompt: In order to achieve their goals and support their initiatives, the groups are seeking financial assistance. Without adequate funding, their efforts may be severely hindered.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe n'okuwagira enteekateeka zaabwe, ebibiina binoonya obuyambi bw'ensimbi. Awatali buyambi bumala, kaweefube waabwe ayinza okulemesebwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti gi ki cwako yub gi, gurup ne tye ka yenyo kony me lim. Labongo cente ma oromo, tute gi twero bedo ki peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekec ka aigangite ainapeta kec, eutasi igurupun aimo agangat na ikapun. Arai emamei ikapun luedolitos, epedorete aswamukec aitolitol noi.
lgg_prompt: Asisile yini 'diyi esuzu azini atita fezu e'yo yini 'diyi dri, amuti nde 'diyi azakoma robia niri nda. Robia eyini aa'zu angiri kuri kokoru, okpo eyini 'diyi eco e'de ra.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing recognition of the unique challenges faced by veterans returning to civilian life. As a result, various organizations and initiatives have emerged to address their specific needs and support their reintegration into society.

eng_prompt: Many farmers are exploring alternative crops to diversify their revenue streams. One such option gaining popularity is a new type of sustainable agriculture.

eng_prompt: The health of our gardens and the abundance of our harvests depend significantly on the presence of pollinators. Among these, bees play a crucial role in enhancing the growth and productivity of various plants.

eng_prompt: My passion for beekeeping began years ago when I first discovered the fascinating world of honeybees. Over the years, I have honed my skills and developed a deep understanding of their behavior and needs.
lug_prompt: Okwagala kwange mu kulunda enjuki kwatandika emyaka mingi emabega lwe nnasooka okuzuula ensi y'enjuki ezisikiriza. Emyaka bwe gizze giyitawo, nkuzizza obukugu bwange ne nfuna okutegeera okw'amaanyi ku nneeyisa yaabwe n'ebyetaago byabwe.

teo_prompt: Amina ka naka aipit awo egeunit ikar lu atuboros ne awanyunia eong akwap naka awo. Kokaru lu atuboros, abu eong aitojokaar acoa ka kosodi amisiikin iponesio kec keda ipudesia kec.

eng_prompt: Many flowering plants have evolved to attract pollinators, playing a crucial role in their reproductive processes. Among these, honey plants are particularly significant for their ability to produce nectar that sustains bee populations.
lug_prompt: Ebimera bingi ebirimu ebimuli bivuddeyo okusikiriza abafuuwa empeke, nga bikola omulimu omukulu mu nkola yaabyo eyokuzaala. Mu bino, ebimera by'omubisi gw'enjuki bya mugaso nnyo okusingira ddala olw'obusobozi bwaabyo okufulumya omubisi gw'enjuki ogukuuma omuwendo gw'enjuki.

lgg_prompt: Ori mawua 'diyi ma karakara eyi e'do curu'do anyapa asea 'diyi ma ti pe, dika eyi azi okporu ni nga geri eyini anzi eyi osizu 'diyi ma alea. Diyi ma eselea, ori anyu ni 'diyi orodriru tuni okpo yini anyu yi ma esele idri ta mbazuri ma e'yosi.

eng_prompt: As stewards of the Earth, it is our responsibility to ensure the sustainability of our planet. The delicate balance of ecosystems is increasingly threatened by human activities, making it imperative for us to take action.
lug_prompt: Ng'abawanika b'ensi, buvunaanyizibwa bwaffe okulaba nti ensi yaffe ebeerawo emirembe gyonna. Obutebenkevu bw'obutonde bw'ensi bweyongera okutiisibwatiisibwa emirimu gy'abantu, ekitufuula ab'obwetaavu okubaako kye tukola.

eng_prompt: Honey production in Uganda is renowned for its quality and unique flavors, with various regions contributing to its rich diversity. Among these regions, Bushenyi stands out as a particularly exceptional area for beekeeping.
lug_prompt: Okufulumya omubisi gw'enjuki mu Uganda kumanyiddwa nnyo olw'omutindo gw'omubisi n'obuwoomi bwagwo obw'enjawulo, ng'ebitundu eby'enjawulo bye biviirako obugagga bwagwo obw'enjawulo. Mu bitundu bino, Bushenyi yeeyoleka ng'ekitundu eky'enjawulo eky'okulunda enjuki.
ach_prompt: Kic ma kiyubu I lobo Uganda oywek pi rwomgi ki mitgi mapat-pat, but lobo mapat-pat bene okelo jami mapat-pat mapat-pat manonge I iye. I kin but lobo magi, Bushenyi obedo kabedo maber tutwalle me gwoko kic.
teo_prompt: Akoru na esike ko Uganda ejenara noi kanu adoketait ke keda iponesioke luitegelikina, ido aiboisio nuegelegela kes eyangaunete iponesioke luegelegela. Kotoma aiboisio nu, erai Bushenyi aiboisit naejok noi naka aidar awo.
lgg_prompt: Anyu ma edeta kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ma ru ku e'yo onyiru azini wura ndusi 'diyisi, angu ndundu eyini ani anyu 'da ma omgbo otuzu. Angu 'diyi ma eselea, Bushenyi ni e'da angu onyiru anyu ta mbazu ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Okukora obwoki omuri Yuganda nikumanywa ahabw'omutindo gw'obwoki n'oburungi bwabwo, kandi ebicweka bitari bimwe nibireetaho oburungi bwabwo. Omu bicweka ebi, Bushenyi neshangwa nk'omwanya murungi gw'okuriisa enjoki.

eng_prompt: Many communities face significant challenges in overcoming poverty, leading to a search for sustainable solutions. One innovative approach that has gained traction is the promotion of beekeeping as a means to generate income and improve livelihoods.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi bisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kuwangula obwavu, ekiviirako okunoonya eby'okugonjoola eby'olubeerera. Engeri emu ey'obuyiiya efunye obuwagizi kwe kutumbula obulunzi bw'enjuki ng'engeri y'okufunamu ensimbi n'okutumbula embeera z'abantu.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol ginongo peko madit tutwal me lweny i kom can ma oweko giyenyo yoo me cobo peko matye. Yoo acel manyen ma oywek tutwal en aye tyelo kor gwoko kic macalo yoo me nongo cente ki medo rwom me kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga luipu keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kanu aitikokin ican, eyangauni aimo iwaitin lu itojokaret. Adiopet iwaitin lu itolomunitai kes aitopoloria aipit awo kwape epone loka adumun ikapun ka aitojokar aijar.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu e'yo alio niri ndezu eyini ani e'yo eyi ma aza kozu. Geri azi o'diru 'bani esu 'di eri geri anyu tambaza ma omgbo otuzu geri robia esuzu azini geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi nibihikwaho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kusingura obworo, ekirikubareetera kuronda oburyo bw'okugonjoora oburemeezi. Omuringo gumwe ogw'okujumbura oguretsireho amaani n'okutunguura okuriisa enjoki nk'omuringo gw'okutunga entaasya n'okutunguura entuura y'abantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote sustainable agriculture and environmental awareness, local leaders initiated a series of workshops on pollinator health. As a result, they have boosted beekeeping in the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulimi ebiwangaala n'okumanyisa abantu ku butonde bw'ensi, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baatandikawo emisomo egy'enjawulo ku bulamu bw'ebisolo ebiwunya enfuufu. N'ekivuddemu, batumbudde okulunda enjuki mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor pur ki rweyo lwak i kom cwec ma orumuwa, lutela me tedero gucako kacoke mapol me pwonyo dano i kom yotkom pa winyo. Macalo adwogi ne, gu tyelo kor gwoko kic ikabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor akoru na ejok ka aisisianakino na akwap, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kitegeasi airiamunun nuikamunitos angaleu naka ikur. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi itopoloutu aipit awo kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ori ezozaniri otuzu azini imbata fezu angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma dria, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otita imbatani karakara eyi e'yo anyapa eyi ma rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi otu anyu tambaza ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa hamwe n'okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha buhangwa bw'ensi, abebembezi b'ebyaro batandikireho emishomo erikukwata aha magara g'enyamaishwa. N'ekyarugiremu, batungire amaani g'okuriisa enjoki omu bantu.

eng_prompt: As societal norms continue to evolve, traditional gender roles are being redefined. This shift has led to an increasing number of women taking on the primary financial responsibilities in their households.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkola z'ekitundu zigenda mu maaso okukyuka, emirimu gy'ekikula ky'abantu egy'ennono giddamu okunnyonnyolwa. Enkyukakyuka eno ereetedde omuwendo gw'abakyala okweyongera okutwala obuvunaanyizibwa obusookerwako obw'ensimbi mu maka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Kit ma cik me kwo pa dano tye ka loke kwede, tic pa mon ki coo bene tye ka loke. Alokaloka man oweko wel mon mapol tye ka doro tic me lim I gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos iponesio luka itunga aijulanakin, eutai bobo aitetem aswamisinei nuka ikiliok keda angor. Eyangaunit aijulanakineta ngun angor nuipu aijaunun ikapun luka ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: Azita ongulumu eyini 'diyi ni mu drile eyi ojazu, azi oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie oku eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie 'diyi ma e'yo eyi oja dika. Ojata 'di fe kalafe tupi tupi oku eyini e'yo robia esuzu aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri 'duzu eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku emicwe y'abantu erikugumizamu neehinduka, emirimo y'abashaija n'abakazi ey'obuhangwa eriyo neetandikwaho. Empindahinduka egi ereesire omuhendo gw'abakazi kweyongyera kutwara obujunanizibwa bw'esente omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: After completing her beekeeping course, she eagerly awaited the arrival of her new equipment. To her delight, the local community garden decided to support her passion for pollinators.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumaliriza emisomo gye egy'okulunda enjuki, yalindirira n'obwagazi okutuuka kw'ebikozesebwa bye ebipya. Ekyamusanyusa, ennimiro y'ekyalo yasalawo okuwagira obwagazi bwe eri abakukusa enfuufu.
ach_prompt: Ingee tyeko kwane me gwoko kic, en obedo kakuru ki miti madit cato jami ne manyen. Cwinye obedo yom tutwal I kare ma poto pa lwak me tedero omoko tamgi me cwako miti ma en tye kwede I kom lujogi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angetakin ekoosi ke loka aidar awo, abu ngesi idarak keda eipud adolonokin naka iswamasia ke luitetiak. Kanu aiyalama ke, abu amisiri naka itunga lu atutubet igangit amina ke naka aituk ikur.
lgg_prompt: Erini i vile onita anyu tambazaniri dezu 'bori ma vutia, eri te eri vile afa ayuzaru o'diru 'diyi ma ecata avasi. Ayiko fezu eri dri, amvu ongulumu eyini angu 'da ma alea ri pe atita fezu leta erini 'ba osasaa ofupi 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable shift in the demographics of beekeeping enthusiasts. More and more women are embracing this sustainable practice, contributing to the growing interest in apiculture.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo enkyukakyuka mu muwendo gw'abantu abaagala ennyo okulunda enjuki. Abakyala bangi beeyambisa enkola eno ey'obutebenkevu, ekiviiriddeko obwagazi obweyongera mu kulunda enjuki.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, alokaloka madit otime I kin dano ma maro gwoko kic. Mon mapol gitye ka jolo tim man matye kamede anyim, ma oweko miti me gwoko kic tye ka mede.

lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, ojata 'ba anyu ta mbapi saaru 'diyi ma eselea ri ebi ovu ci. Oku karakara eyi curu'do e'yo 'di 'du eyini ani e'yo anyu tambaza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
