eng_prompt: In response to the devastating natural disaster, local authorities assessed the damage and identified those in need of assistance. Following this evaluation, the government announced a relief package to support the affected communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obutyabaga bw'obutonde obw'amaanyi, ab'obuyinza mu byalo beekenneenya ebyonoonese ne bazuula abo abeetaaga obuyambi. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya kuno, gavumenti yalangiridde enteekateeka y'obuyambi okuyamba ebitundu ebikoseddwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma peko ma poto atura otimme, lutela me tedero gutimo kwed me niang ngo ma oballe ki bene guniang jo ma mito kony. Ingee ngiyo kit ma tic tye kwede, gamente okatti ki yub me miyo kony bot lwak ma onongo peko.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu akwap, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet owanyutu iboro lu amunaros kosodete ajenun ngul lu ekotos aingarakinio. Akaulo naka airereonor akiro ngun, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuka agangat mama ejaasi itunga luetirorit.
lgg_prompt: O'duko e'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi one e'yo ezale 'diyi dika eyi esu 'ba azakoma lepi 'diyi ra. E'yo eti ondaza 'di ma vutia, gamete azi otita azakoma fezu ongulumu e'yo 'yepi 'diyi atizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihikiirizi by'obuhangwa, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro bakashwijuma ebyasisikaire kandi bamanya abo abaabaire nibetenga obuhwezi. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma, gavumenti ekarangirira enteekateeka y'obuhwezi y'okuhwera abantu abateganisiibwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for effective leadership within the community, the district chairman has taken the initiative to enhance skills among local leaders. To address this, he has organised a leadership workshop at the headquarters.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obukulembeze obulungi mu kitundu, ssentebe wa disitulikiti atutte enteekateeka okutumbula obukugu mu bakulembeze b'ebyalo. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, ategese omusomo gw'obukulembeze ku kitebe ekikulu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me tela maber ikin lwak, won kom me district okwanyo yoo me medo diro me tic ikin lutela me tedero. Me tyeko lok man, en oyubu kacoke me pwonye pa lutela I gang kal madit.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka engarenone loajokan kotoma atutubet, abu apolon eicolong lo edisitrikt kitutub aitutuoro kanejaas engarenok luka atutubet. Kanu aitemokin ngun, etemoki ngesi airiamun na engarenok koyapiesi lokapolon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu driceza kililiru ni ma e'yosi, ogua e'i distrikiti niri 'du e'yo drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ondua otuzu. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, eri otu otita imbatani driceza ma dria aku ambori ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kweyongyera kw'obwebembezi burungi omu bantu, mukuru w'entebe ya disiturikiti atwireho enteekateeka y'okutunguura emyoga y'abebembezi b'ebyaro. Okukora aha nshonga egi, atebekaniise omushomo gw'obwebembezi aha kitebe kikuru.

eng_prompt: As they leave behind their homes and familiar surroundings, many refugees embark on a difficult journey in search of safety and stability. Upon arrival in their new communities, they often encounter a range of obstacles that complicate their integration.
lug_prompt: Nga bava mu maka gaabwe n'ebitundu bye bamanyi, abanoonyiboobubudamu bangi batandika olugendo oluzibu okunoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu. Nga batuuse mu bitundu byabwe ebipya, batera okusanga ebizibu bingi ebibakaluubiriza okwegatta.
ach_prompt: I kare ma luring ayela giweko gangigi kacel ki kabedo ma gingeyo, gi cako wot matek me yenyo kuc ki ber bedo. Ikare ma guo ikabedo gi manyen, ipol kare ginongo peko mapol ma weko bedo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Nealakakinete kesi oreria kec keda aiboisio nu ejenete kesi, egeunete ikerai luipu alosit orot loetiono noi aimo ayuwara keda ainapakina. Neadolunia kesi aiboisio kec nuitetiak, etapit kesi adumunun atiokisio nuipu nuitikitikitos kesi aimorikikin.
lgg_prompt: Emunyale karakara eyi aku eyivile 'diyi ku angu eyini nile 'diyi pie, eyi e'do aci ewaru eyi ma alea ageitema ndazu. Ecazu angu yini o'diru 'diyi ma alia 'boria, eyi tutuni e'yo karakara eyi esu eyini aa'zu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ku 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Obu empungi nyingi zirikuruga omu maka gaabo n'emyanya ei zaabaire zimanyiriire, nizitandika orugyendo rugumire kuronda oburinzi n'obutebekana. Kubarikuba bahikire omu myanya yaabo misya, nibakira kushanga oburemeezi oburikubaremesa kwegaita ahabantu.

eng_prompt: The community gathered last week to discuss the future of local youth programs. During the meeting, it was announced that our chairman would take on a significant role in supporting these initiatives.
lug_prompt: Abantu baakuŋŋaana wiiki ewedde okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'abavubuka eby'omu maaso. Mu lukiiko, kyalangirirwa nti ssentebe waffe ajja kukola omulimu omukulu mu kuwagira enteekateeka zino.
ach_prompt: Lwak gugure I cabit ma okato me nywako lok I kom anyim pa yub pa bulu. Ikare me kacoke, kicwalo lok angeya ni won kom wa obi timo tic mapire tek me cwako yub magi.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga kotukokinos osabiti je kanu aitemitem ingaren naka ainapeta nuka atumunak. Kotoma airiamunet, aponi kolimorai ebe ebuni apolon eicolong wok aitolot aswam naepol noi kanu aigang aswamisio nu.

eng_prompt: Before we started the training, we gathered in the conference room, eager to learn. As we settled in, the officer prepared to outline the day's agenda.
lug_prompt: Nga tetunnatandika kutendekebwa, twakungaanidde mu kisenge mwe bakuŋŋaanira nga twagala nnyo okuyiga. Bwe twatuula, omuserikale yeetegese okunnyonnyola enteekateeka y'olunaku.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe wacako pwonye, wacokke I ot me kacoke, ki miti me pwonyo jami mapol. Ikare ma wabedo piny, abili ne oyube me tito jami ma omyero watim inino enuni.
teo_prompt: Erongo sio egeuna aituutoorio, apotu sio atukokinos agola naka airiamun, ekotosi oni aisisia. Neautar sio aiboi, abu eswaman okapakina aitetem nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka aparan.

nyn_prompt: Tutakatandikire kutendekwa, tuketeeranira omu kishengye ky'orukiiko, twine ekihika ky'okwega. Ku twaherize kutuura, ofiisa akeeteekateekyera kugamba ebyabaire nibenda kukorwa eizooba eryo.

eng_prompt: Investing in employee training can significantly enhance overall workplace efficiency. As individuals acquire new skills and knowledge, their ability to perform tasks effectively improves.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu kutendeka abakozi kisobola okutumbula obulungi bw'emirimu okutwalira awamu. Abantu bwe bafuna obukugu obupya n'amagezi, obusobozi bwabwe okukola emirimu obulungi bweyongera.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I pwonye pa lutic twero medo rwom me tic. Ka dano tye ka nongo diro ki ngec manyen, kero gi me timo tic gi mede.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma aitutuonoro naka eswamak epedori aitojokar aswam. Nepedoria itunga adumun acoa naitetet keda acoa naitetet, epote kesi aitodolikin aswamisinei kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu azi'ba eyi ma imbata ma alea ri eco azi ngaza ma omgbo otu ra. Ba eyi ka ondua azini ondua o'diru 'diyi esu, eyi ma okpo azi ngazu kililiru ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.

eng_prompt: Despite initial enthusiasm and a shared vision for success, the women involved in the poultry project faced growing tensions and disagreements. As time went on, their inability to work together effectively began to undermine their efforts.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga mu kusooka baali banyiikivu era nga balina ekiruubirirwa kimu eky'obuwanguzi, abakyala abeenyigira mu pulojekiti y'enkoko baayolekagana n'obunkenke n'obutakkaanya obweyongera. Ekiseera bwe kyagenda kiyitawo, obutasobola kwabwe okukolera awamu obulungi bwatandika okunafuya kaweefube waabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni cwinygi obedo yom tutwal I acakkine dok gubedo ki neno acel me cobo miti gi, mon ma gubedo I yub me gwoko gweno gunongo telle ki telle matye kamedde. Ikare ma kare okato, peko me tic kacelo ocako balo kero gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ajaasi kesi keda aiyalama naepol noi keda aomisioit naka akerianut, apotu angor nuejaasi toma opurojekt loka akokorei kodumutu ingungeta keda amamut acamanara. Kwape elosi apak, abu amamus kec naka aswam nepepe kogeu aitidisiar aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako yini okorisi azini egata yini tualu drile suza ma dria ra ti, oku yi 'yepi otita aria ta mbazaniri ma alia 'diyi fu dri e'yo asi omiza azini erita ako yini tupi tupi 'diyi be. Sawa ni muzu drile, yini ecozu azi ngazu tualu kililiru ku ri e'do okpo yini 'diyi ma omgbo esi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amashemererwa g'okubanza hamwe n'ekigyendererwa kyabo eky'obusinguzi, abakazi abaabaire bejumbire omu purogyekiti y'enkoko, bakatunga obunkenke n'obutakwatanisa. Obwire ku bwagyendeire omu maisho, oburemeezi bwabo kukorera hamwe, bukatandika kuremesa amaani gaabo.

eng_prompt: Many borrowers seek financial assistance to meet their immediate needs. However, they often overlook the terms and conditions associated with these loans.
lug_prompt: Abeewola bangi banoonya obuyambi bw'ensimbi okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe eby'amangu. Kyokka, batera okubuusa amaaso amateeka n'obukwakkulizo obukwatagana ne looni zino.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma deno lim gipenyo pi kony me cobo miti gi. Kadi bed kumeno, pol kare gi cayo cik ma kwako lim den magi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu luekorete ikapun ekotosi agangat na ikapun kanu aitodolikin ipudesia kec. Konye, etapit kesi apalunit ikisila keda nutupitono nuikamunitos ilonin lu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara mari 'dupi 'diyi azakoma robia niri nda eyini ani ecozu afa eyini le mbeleru 'diyi esuzu. Kani si, eyi sa'wa driasi e'yo azini azita loni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abarikweguza, nibaronda obuhwezi bw'esente okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabo. Kwonka, nibakira kwehuzya ebiragiro n'obukwakurizo oburikukwata aha rooni ezi.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous warnings from the financial advisor, the leadership team continued to make risky investments. As a result, the club's financial stability was put in jeopardy.

ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lamii tam i kom lim obedo ka ciko gi tyen mapol, lutela gumede ki timo biacara ma pe ber. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me lim pa dul tuku eni obedo I peko.
teo_prompt: Karaida ikwenyaritai kesi noi kanejai ecoran loka ikapun, apotu engarenok inyikokisi aswam iboro luetioko. Kanuka ngun, aponi ibwaikinai etiai loka ikapun luka ekilabu ationis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo bile ndu liza engazu 'ba embata fepi e'yo robia ni ma dria 'diyi vu 'diyi ma talasi, amuti driceza ni 'diyi mu drile e'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, amuti mupira avizu 'da ma e'yo robia ni 'diyi 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea.

eng_prompt: Deforestation has become a critical issue as human activities continue to encroach upon natural habitats. The loss of forests not only impacts wildlife but also disrupts the delicate balance of ecosystems.
lug_prompt: Okusaanyaawo ebibira kifuuse kizibu kya maanyi ng'emirimu gy'abantu gigenda mu maaso n'okusaalimbira mu bifo eby'obutonde. Okubula kw'ebibira tekukosa bisolo by'omu nsiko byokka naye era kutaataaganya n'embeera y'obutonde.
ach_prompt: Tongo yadi dong odoko peko madit tutwal pien tic pa dano tye kamede ki balo kabedo pa cwec ma orumuwa. Rweny pa bunga pe balo kwo pa dano keken ento bene balo kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa.

lgg_prompt: E'yo pati ogaza niri eca curu'do e'yo azi okporu ni ru e'yo 'ba ada eyini 'ye 'diyi ni mu drile angu nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu risi. Oce eyi ma aviza ni lu e'yo 'ye anyapa asea 'diyi ma dria ku, te eri vini e'yo afa eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi eza indi.
nyn_prompt: Okutema emiti, kihindukire enshonga y'amaani ahabw'emirimo y'abantu kugumizamu kutaahirira eby'obuhangwa. Okuhwaho kw'ebibira tikirikukwata aha banyamaishwa byonka, kureka nikushiisha n'obuhangwa bw'ensi.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing crisis, local organizations and government agencies worked together to provide support for those in need. As a result, our district received about three hundred refugees last year.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ekigenda mu maaso, ebitongole by'ebitundu n'ebitongole bya gavumenti byakolagana okuwa obuyambi eri abo abali mu bwetaavu. N'ekyavaamu, disitulikiti yaffe yafuna abanoonyiboobubudamu nga bisatu omwaka oguwedde.
ach_prompt: Pi peko matye ni, dule me tedero kacel ki dule pa gamente gutiyo kacelo me miyo kony bot lupeko. Macalo adwogi ne, dictrik megwa onongo luring ayela maromo miya adek imwaka ma okato.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis na elosi akonye, apotu iriongeta luka atutubet keda luka apugan iswamata nepepe kanu aigang ngul lu ican. Kanuka ngun, abu edisitriktakosi kodum ikerai luedolete akwatat okaru je.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tualu amuti gameteni 'diyi pie nga azi tualu atita fezu 'ba afa koko 'diyi dri. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti amavileri esu emunyale ogogo turu na eli ajerisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho,ebitongore by'ebyaro hamwe n'ebitongore bya gavumenti bikakorera hamwe okuheereza obuhwezi abo abatarikwebaasa. Ekyarugiremu, disiturikiti yaitu ekatunga empungi nka magana ashatu omwaka oguhwaire.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote gender equality and empower local communities, the government has launched several initiatives aimed at supporting women's organizations. As part of this initiative, financial support has been allocated to all women groups in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omwenkanonkano mu kikula ky'abantu n'okutumbula ebitundu, gavumenti etongozza enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okuyamba ebitongole by'abakyala. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, obuyambi bw'ensimbi buweereddwa ebibiina by'abakyala byonna mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyelo kor rwom me mon ki coo kacel ki ilo malo rwom me twero pa mon, gamente okatti ki yub mapol me konyo dule pa mon. Macalo but yub man, kimiyo kony me lim bot dul pa mon weng I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolorite nuka angor keda ikiliok ka aitigogong itunga, etolomu apugan iboro luegelegela lu igangitos iriongeta lu angor. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ejaikitai agangat na ikapun mama ejaasi igurupun lu angor kere luko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie trotro dika okpo fezu ongulumu eyini 'diyi dri, gamete e'do e'yo ndundu eyi atita fezu amuti oku eyini 'diyi dri. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba fe atita robia ni amuti oku eyini kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburinganiza n'okutunguura abantu b'omubyaro,gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okuhwera ebitongore by'abakazi. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, obuhwezi bw'esente buheirwe guruupu z'abakazi zoona omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: Many employees have been expressing their concerns about the unusual timing of this month's payroll. It's strange that we haven't received any updates regarding our salaries.
lug_prompt: Abakozi bangi babadde balaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku kiseera ekitali kya bulijjo eky'omusaala gw'omwezi guno. Kyewuunyisa nti tetufunye bubaka bwonna obukwata ku misaala gyaffe.
ach_prompt: Lutic mapol gubedo ka nyutu lworo gi I kom kare ma pe obedo ber tutwal me culu mucara dwe eni. Tye me ur ni pud pe wanongo ngec manyen I kom mucara wa.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ainapeta nu mam etapit nuka aitac elap kalo. Erai ibore yenitegelikina ebe mam sio idumunit akiro nuitetiak nuikamunitos eropit wok.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba karakara eyi e'bi e'da asi otiza eyini sa'wa 'bani musara ofezu imba 'disi ri ma dria. Eri osutaru kini ama esuni nga e'yo azi o'diru ama vile musara ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Abakozi baingi batwire nibereka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'obwire obutari bwa buriijo obw'okushashurira okwezi oku. Nikitangaaza okureeba ngu titukatungire amakuru agarikukwata aha mishaara yaitu.

eng_prompt: Many residents in the countryside have expressed their frustration with the infrastructure. As a result, the local government has been urged to address the deteriorating conditions of the roads.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze bangi mu byalo balaze obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'ebizimbe. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti y'ebitundu esabiddwa okukola ku mbeera y'enguudo eyeeyongera okwonooneka.
ach_prompt: Lutedero mapol ma icaro gunyutu cwer cwiny gi i kom gedo eni. Macalo adwogi ne, ki lego gamente me tedero me timo gin mo I kom kit ma gudu tye ka bale kwede.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu luko ocaloi itodutu amamut aiyalama kanu aduketa nu. Kanuka ngun, aponi olimokinai apuganisinei nuka atutubena aitemokin ejautene lo erono lo irotin.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara aa'pi angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ece e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi afa ayuzaru 'diyi si ri ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai gamete angu ndundu eyini 'diyi e'yo nzila eyini aa'zu muke ku 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi omu byaro boorekire okwetomboitwa kwabo ahabw'ebyombeko. N'ekyarugiremu, gavumenti z'ebyaro zishabirwe kukora aha mbeera y'enguuto eyeyongyeire.

eng_prompt: The school board has been reviewing the financial reports for the past few months. After several meetings and discussions, they are finally ready to present the proposed allocations.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko k'essomero kabadde keekenneenya alipoota z'ebyensimbi okumala emyezi mitono egiyise. Oluvannyuma lw'enkiiko eziwerako n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, kati beetegefu okwanjula ebiteeso by'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Lutela me gang kwan gubedo ka ngiyo adwoki me tic ki lim I dwe ma okato ni. Ingee kacoke ki nywako lok mapol, dong gitye atera me miyo tam gi.
teo_prompt: Auta atukot naka esomero airereor iripotan luka ikapun kanu ilapio idis luatuboros. Akaulo naka airiamunun keda ipegeta luipu, ekapakina kesi aitodiar ainanakineta.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba sukulu ni 'diyi ebi o'duko e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andri mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. Drifuza azini agbatara karakara 'diyi ma vutia, yi asizu ngonde e'yo 'bani lele 'diyi 'bazu.
nyn_prompt: Akakiiko k'eishomero kabeire nikashwijuma ripoota z'esente kumara ameezi makye agahwaire. Bwanyima y'enkiiko nyingi n'okuhanuura, ahamuheru beeteekateekire kworeka enteekateeka y'okugaba sente.

eng_prompt: In light of recent financial discrepancies, officials emphasized the importance of transparency in funding allocations. They urged leaders to ensure that every dollar spent is properly documented and justified.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ensimbi obubaddewo gye buvuddeko, abakungu bakkaatirizza obukulu bw'obwerufu mu kugaba ensimbi. Baasabye abakulembeze okukakasa nti buli ddoola esaasaanyizibwa ewandiikibwa bulungi era etegeerekeka.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me lim ma obedo tye cokcok-ki, ludito guwaco ni pire tek me bedo ki ada ikit ma kimiyo kwede lim. Gulego lutela me neno ni dola weng ma kitiyo kwede kicoyo maber dok tye ki tyen lok.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun, apotu eswamak kitogogongoto ajokis naka aica kotoma aikor ikapun. Apotu kesi ilipata engarenok awanyun ebe ibwaikitai idolas kere lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza robia niri ma dria ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba 'da eyi 'ba asi orodri e'yo ada ma dria e'yo robia ni 'diyi awazu ri ma dria. Eyi ai drice'ba eyi nezu ra kini 'ba si dola dria 'bani ayu 'diyi ma dria kokobi kililiru azini e'yo kililiru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente obwakyerereirwe, abakungu bakahamya omugasho gw'oburingaaniza omu kugaba esente. Bakashaba abebembezi okureeba ngu buri doora ekozesibwa ehandiikwa kurungi kandi erikworeka oburingaaniza.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the community's needs and the rising demand for medical care, the council members convened to discuss potential budget adjustments. They recognized that enhancing health services was crucial for the well-being of our residents.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyetaago by'ekitundu n'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera, bammemba b'akakiiko baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkyukakyuka mu mbalirira. Baakitegeera nti okutumbula empeereza y'ebyobulamu kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu obulungi bw'abatuuze baffe.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo miti pa lwak kacel ki dongo pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom, lumemba me kancil gubedo kacoke me nywako lok I kom aloka loka ma twero time I byek me lim. Gu niang ni ilo malo rwom me miyo kony me yot kom pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa lutedero wa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ipudesia luka itunga keda eipud loka amukian, apotu imeeban luka ekansulo iriamunos kanu aitemitem aijulanakineta nuka ebajet. Apotu kesi kojenutu ebe aitojokar amukian erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aijar naka itunga wok.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia azini e'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu 'bori ma vutia, memba kanisulu ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu ojata otita ajeni 'diyi ma dria. Eyi esu ra kini azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru aa'ta muke 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyetaago by'abantu hamwe n'obwetaavu bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire, ba memba b'akakiiko bakashutama kuhanuura aha mpindahinduka y'embaririra. Bakamanya ngu okwongyera aha buheereza bw'eby'amagara n'eky'omugasho ahabw'oburungi bw'abatuuragye baitu.

eng_prompt: Governments rely on various sources of revenue to support public services and infrastructure. One of the primary sources of this funding is the collection of taxes from individuals and businesses.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti zeesigama ku nsibuko z'ensimbi ez'enjawulo okuwagira obuweereza bw'olukale n'ebizimbe. Emu ku nsibuko enkulu ez'ensimbi zino kwe kukungaanya emisolo okuva mu bantu ssekinnoomu ne bizinensi.
ach_prompt: Gamente jenge I kom yoo mapat-pat me nongo lim me konyo tic pa lwak. Yo acel madit loyo me nongo cente en aye me jogo mucoro ki bot dano ki biacara.
teo_prompt: Ipugaete apuganisinei aiboisio nuegelegela nu idumunet ikapun kanu aigang aijaanakinio naka itunga. Adiopet koboro luingarakinete ikapun ngun ngesi aituk isolosinei kama ejaasi itunga keda ibiasaran.
lgg_prompt: Gamete yi yi ati geri ndundu robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria azakoma fele o'bi eyidri azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi atizu. Geri 'bani robia esuzu okporu 'diyi ma azi eri musoro traza engazu 'ba yi ma ngulupi yi vu tualu tujari yi vu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti neeyesiga oburugo bw'esente butari bumwe na bumwe, okureeberera obuheereza bwa gavumenti hamwe n'ebyombeko. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikureeta esente ezi n'okushorooza emishoro kuruga omu bantu n'eby'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing demands for better healthcare services, the administration has been reviewing compensation packages for essential workers. After extensive discussions, a decision was made to enhance the financial support for those in the medical field.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obugenda mu maaso obw'obujjanjabi obulungi, abakulembeze babadde beetegereza enteekateeka z'okuliyirira abakozi abakulu. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, okusalawo kwakolebwa okwongera ku buyambi bw'ensimbi eri abo abali mu by'obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me miti me nongo kony me yot kom maber, gamente obedo ka neno yub me culu lutic ma pigi tego. Ingee nywako lok mapol, kimoko tam me medo kony me lim bot lutic yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian najokan, euta eyaitene airereor nuka atacio naka eswamak. Akaulo naka aineranara noi, aponi itolomunai aseunet naka aiyatakin agangat naka ikapun mama ejaasi ngul lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi muke 'diyi esuzu risi, driceza eyi e'bi geri 'bani azi'ba orodriru 'diyi ofezu 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia, 'ba 'du e'yo atita robia niri ma omgbo otuzu 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okushaba obuheereza burungi bw'eby'amagara, abarikukurira ekitongore batwire nibashwijuma enteekateeka y'okurihirira abakozi abakuru. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga, hakabaho okusharamu okwongyera obuhwezi bw'esente omu by'amagara.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the budget and assessing the current condition of the road, it became clear that additional financial resources were necessary. Despite our efforts to secure more funding, we are still facing a shortfall.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embalirira n'embeera y'oluguudo mu kiseera kino, kyalabika bulungi nti ssente endala zaali zeetaagibwa. Wadde nga tufuba okufuna ensimbi endala, tukyafuna ebbula.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo byek me lim ki neno kit ma gudu tye kwede, onen atyer kamaleng ni lim mukene mite. Kadi bed ni watye ka yele me nongo lim mukene, pud can lim tye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ebajet keda airereor ejautene loka erot, apotu kojenutu ebe ipudai ikapun luipu. Karaida iswamata sio kagogongu kanu adumun ikapun luipu, eringa oni itereikina keda ekadakada.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka otita ajeni ma ale andri azini geri nzila 'da ni aa'zu sa'wa 'disi ri ma ale andri 'bori ma vutia, eri eca kililiru kini le 'ba ma fe robia azi dika. Okpo amani 'ba robia esuzu drile ri ma talasi, ama nga po'di e'yo ako isu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embaririra hamwe n'omutindo gw'enguuto, kikarebeka butunu ngu esente ezindi zikaba nizetengwa. Oihireho okuteeraho kwaitu kutunga esente ezindi, nitukihikwaho eibura.

eng_prompt: Many communities are struggling with inadequate infrastructure. As a result, the condition of local roads has deteriorated significantly.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi birwanagana n'ebikozesebwa ebitamala. N'ekivuddemu, embeera y'enguudo z'omu kitundu eyonoonese nnyo.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol tye ka lweny ki peko me jami ma mite. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me gudu me tedero oballe tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ejaas itunga luipu keda iboro lumam edolitos. Kanuka ngun, erono noi ejautene loka irotin luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi dri ci afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako si. E'yo 'disi, nzila angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eza eyi saaru.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi nibirwanagana n'ebyombeko ebitarikumara. N'ekyarugiremu, embeera y'enguuto z'omubyaro esiisire munonga.

eng_prompt: When infrastructure projects are planned, it is essential to consider the impact on local communities and their properties. To mitigate the effects of such developments, policies are often put in place to ensure fairness and support for those affected.
lug_prompt: Pulojekiti z'ebizimbe bwe zitegekebwa, kikulu okulowooza ku ngeri gye zikosaamu abantu b'omu kitundu n'ebintu byabwe. Okukendeeza ku buzibu obuva mu nkulaakulana ng'ezo, amateeka gatera okuteekebwawo okukakasa obwenkanya n'obuyambi eri abo abakoseddwa.
ach_prompt: Ka kiyubu yub me gedo, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwogi ne I kom lwak ki jami gi. Me dwoko piny peko ma bino macalo adwogi me dongo lobo enoni, ki keto cik mapat-pat me neno ni dano ma peko man otimme i komgi tye ki kony.
teo_prompt: Arai itemonokino ipurojektin lu aduko, ibusakinit aomoom nu epedorete aitodolikin itunga keda iborokec. Kanu aitidisiar atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun, itolomunono ainapeta kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna ka agangat nejaas ngul luetirorit.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka otita afa ndundu eyi sizu 'diyi otu, eri orodriru e'yo eyini eco 'ye ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria tualu afa eyini 'diyi pie ri ma dria. E'yo ewaru angu ezoma 'dile 'diyi ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu, 'ba azita eyi o'ba e'yo adaru azini atita fezu 'ba e'yo 'da ni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Purogyekiti z'ebyombeko ku zirikukorwa, niky'omugasho okureeba oku zirikukwata aha bantu b'omubyaro hamwe n'ebintu byabo. Okutuubya aha kabi akarikuruga omu ntunguuka nk'ezo, ebiragiro nibiteebwaho okureeba ngu hariho oburingaaniza n'obuhwezi bw'abo abarikukwatwaho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve the quality of life for its citizens, the government prioritizes funding for various community programs. This financial commitment reflects a dedication to addressing social issues and supporting vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bwa bannansi baayo, gavumenti ekulembeza okuvujjirira pulogulaamu z'ekitundu ez'enjawulo. Okwewaayo kuno okw'ensimbi kulaga okwewaayo okukola ku nsonga z'embeera z'abantu n'okuyamba abantu abateesobola.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa anywali ne, gamente keto cente I yub mapat-pat me tedero. Cikke me lim man nyutu miti me cobo peko me kwo pa lwak ki konyo dano ma goro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar adoketait na aijar naka itungake, isingarenit apugan aijaikin ikapun mama ejaasi ainapeta nuegelegela nuka itunga. Ainakinet na naka ikapun itodunit ainakina kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga ka aigang itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Okpo erini 'ba kari anzi erini 'diyi ma edri otuzu ri ma alea, gamete ni atita robia niri 'ba okporu otita ongulumu eyini ndundu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo robia ni 'diri ece ava feza e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu azini atita fezu 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura omutindo gw'entuura y'abantu baayo, gavumenti neekora n'amaani okushashurira enteekateeka z'abantu baayo. Okwehayo kw'esente nikyoreka okwehayo kukora aha nshonga z'abantu n'okuhwera abantu abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: Many communities across the nation are facing severe environmental challenges. As a result, access to essential resources has become increasingly limited.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi okwetooloola eggwanga byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kw'obutonde bw'ensi okw'amaanyi. N'ekivuddemu, okufuna ebintu ebikulu kweyongedde okukendeera.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol ilobo ni gitye ka nongo peko me cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo adwogi ne, nongo jami ma mite pi kwo dong odoko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Atekerin nuipu kakwap kere ejaas keda atiokisio nuepolok nuka alupok. Kanuka ngun, etiono noi adumunun iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi e'yo ewaru angu ama agei ri ni 'diyi esu. E'yo 'disi, geri 'bani afa orodriru 'diyi esuzu ri eca curu'do ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi okwetorora eihanga nibirwanagana n'oburemeezi bw'obuhangwa bw'ensi. N'ekyarugiremu, okutunga ebintu ebikuru kweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and collaboration with local communities, the government has successfully implemented several new water projects. These initiatives aim to improve access to clean water in underserved areas.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuteekateeka n'okukolagana n'abantu b'omu kitundu, gavumenti esobodde okussa mu nkola pulojekiti z'amazzi eziwerako. Enteekateeka zino zigendereddwamu okutumbula okufuna amazzi amayonjo mu bitundu ebitakyaweebwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki winye ki lwak me tedero, gamente oketo yub me pii mapol I tic. Yub magi tye ki miti me medo yoo me nongo pii maleng I kabedo ma pe tye ki kony.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka aiswamanara keda itunga luka atutubet, apedo apugan aitegear ipurojektin lu akipi luipu. Alosikinetekec erai kanu aitojokar adumunun akipi nu elaete kaiboisio nu mam ijanakino.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu tualu ti ecita be ongulumu eyi pie 'bori ma vutia, gamete 'ba otita yi ni o'diru 'diyi 'yeta ma alea ra. Otita 'diyi 'ba asi geri yi ala esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu angu azi ngazu kililiru ku 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okukwatanisa n'abantu b'omubyaro, gavumenti etandikire kukora purogyekiti z'amaizi. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okwongyera amaizi marungi omu myanya etarikuhikwaho.

eng_prompt: Access to clean drinking water is a fundamental necessity for maintaining public health. Unfortunately, many communities struggle with inadequate water sources, leading to serious health risks.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amazzi amayonjo ag'okunywa kyetaago ekikulu mu kukuuma obulamu bw'abantu. Eky'omukisa omubi, ebitundu bingi birwanagana n'obutaba na mazzi gamala, ekivaako obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu byobulamu.
ach_prompt: Nongo pii maleng me amata obedo gin ma pire tek pi gwoko yot kom pa lwak. Ki gum marac, kabedo mapol tye ki peko me nok pa pii, man kelo peko madit tutwal I kom yotkom.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akipi nu elaete erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar angaleu naka itunga. Nukaiturur, itereikina itunga luipu keda aiboisio nu ikidioko akipi, nu eyangauni ationis naepol noi naka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Yi mvuza ala esuzu ri eri orodriru e'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma tambazu. Drile onziru, ongulumu karakara eyi dri ci geri yi esuzu 'diyi ma ako si, e'yo 'dipi e'yo rua ala ni onzi 'diyi ejipi.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga amaizi marungi g'okunywa, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda amagara g'abantu. Eky'obusaasi, ebyanga bingi nibirwanagana n'oburugo bw'amaizi obutarikumara, ekirikureetaho akabi kahango aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Many pathogens and contaminants can be present in untreated water, posing health risks. To ensure its safety, it's essential to take precautions when consuming water from uncertain sources.
lug_prompt: Obulwadde bungi n'obucaafu busobola okubeera mu mazzi agatali malongooseddwa, ekireeta obulabe eri obulamu. Okukakasa obukuumi bwayo, kyetaagisa okwegendereza ng'onywa amazzi okuva mu nsibuko ezitali nnambulukufu.
ach_prompt: Jami ma kelo two mapol twero bedo I pii ma pe kiyubu maber, ma man kelo peko I kom yotkom pa dano. Me neno ni pii ne tye maber, pire tek tutwal me gwoke ikare me mato pii ma aa ki kama pe ngenne.
teo_prompt: Ipu iboro luepedorete ayangaun adekasinei luejaasi toma akipi numam itemonokinitai, ido epedorete ayangaun adekasinei nuarokok. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna, ejokuna aitikitik aimat akipi kama ejaasi aiboisio numam ejenasi.
lgg_prompt: Azo karakara eyi eco aa yi 'bani eyi ma tambazu ku 'diyi ma alea ra, e'yo eyi 'yepi e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ejipi ra 'diyi. Aa'zu ageitema be, eri orodriru mi ma aa milesi mini yi mvuzu engazu angu 'bani nile ku 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwingi n'ebintu ebirikutokooza, nibibaasa kuba biri omu maizi agatarikutukuzibwa, ekirikureeta akabi aha magara. Okureeba ngu habaho oburinzi, ni kikuru kwegyendesereza waaba noyanywa amaizi kuruga omu myanya etarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Access to clean drinking water is essential for maintaining good health. Unfortunately, many communities around the world struggle with inadequate sanitation and contaminated water supplies.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amazzi amayonjo ag'okunywa kya mugaso mu kukuuma obulamu obulungi. Eky'omukisa omubi, ebitundu bingi okwetooloola ensi yonna birwanagana n'obuyonjo obutamala n'amazzi amakyafu.
ach_prompt: Nongo pii maleng me amata pire tek tutwal pi gwoko yot kom. Ki gum marac, kabedo mapol I wilobo gitye ki peko me lengo ki pii ma obale.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akipi nu elaete ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar angaleu najokan. Nukaiturur, itunga luipu kotoma akwap kere eutasi ationis na aila keda akipi nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Yi mvuza ala esuzu ri eri orodriru aa'zu rua ala be. Drile onziru, ongulumu karakara wudrikuru ma kalasi 'diyi dri ci alata ako azini yi ondiru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga amaizi marungi g'okunywa n'eky'omugasho aha magara marungi. Eky'obusaasi, abantu baingi omunsi yoona nibarwanagana n'obuyonjo bubi hamwe n'amaizi mabi.

eng_prompt: In many regions, access to clean water remains a critical challenge that affects public health and well-being. To address this issue, various organizations collaborate with government agencies to implement effective solutions.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okufuna amazzi amayonjo kukyali kusoomoozebwa kwa maanyi okukosa obulamu bw'abantu n'obulamu obulungi. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bikolera wamu n'ebitongole bya gavumenti okussaawo engeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: I but lobo mapol, nongo pii maleng pud tye peko madit tutwal ma balo yotkom ki kwo pa lwak. Me tyeko peko man, dul mapat-pat tye katic kacel ki dul mapat-pat pa gamente me nongo yoo me cobo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, adumunun akipi nu elaete erai ationis naepol noi naetirori aijar naka itunga. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, iswamaete iriongeta luegelegela keda iriongeta lu apugan kanu aitolomun iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, geri eyini ecozu yi ala esuzu ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru 'ba eyini aa'zu edriru ri i. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, amuti ndundu eyi azi nga amuti gamete ni 'diyi pie e'yo eyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, okutunga amaizi marungi, nikigumizamu kuba ekizibu ky'amaani ekirikuteganisa amagara g'abantu. Okukora aha nshonga egi,ebitongore ebitarikushushana nibikwatanisa n'ebitongore bya gavumenti kuta omu nkora oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: In many rural communities, access to clean water is a critical issue that affects health and daily living. As a result, various methods have been implemented to secure reliable water sources.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, okufuna amazzi amayonjo kizibu kya maanyi ekikosa obulamu n'obulamu obwa bulijjo. N'ekivuddemu, enkola ez'enjawulo ziteekeddwa mu nkola okusobola okufuna ensibuko z'amazzi ezesigika.
ach_prompt: I caro mapol, nongo pii maleng obedo peko madit tutwal ma balo yotkom ki kwo pa dano. Macalo adwogi ne, yoo mapat-pat ki keto itic me nongo pii maber.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, adumunun akipi nu elaete erai ationis naepol noi na itolitoli angaleu keda aijar naka nginiparan. Kanuka ngun, etolomun iwaitin luegelegela kanu adumun aiboisio nu edumunere akipi.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alea, yi ala esuzu ri eri e'yo azi okporu e'yo rua ala ni azini aa'ta o'du driasi ri biipi ni i. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do geri ndundu eyi geri yi esuzu kililiru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, okutunga amaizi marungi, n'enshonga y'amaani erikuteganisa amagara n'entuura y'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo mingi eteirwe omu nkora okureeba ngu habaho oburugo bw'amaizi oburikwesigwa.

eng_prompt: After assessing the water scarcity issues faced by the community, the team held a meeting with the village leaders. They emphasized their commitment to improving access to clean water for everyone in the area.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebizibu by'ebbula ly'amazzi ebisangibwa mu kitundu, ttiimu yatuuza olukiiko n'abakulembeze b'ekyalo. Baakakasizza obweyamo bwabwe mu kutumbula okufuna amazzi amayonjo eri buli muntu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee neno peko me nok pa pii ma lwak tye ka kato ki iye, dul ne gubedo ki kacoke ki lutela me caro. Guwaco ni gimito medo yoo me nongo pii maleng pi dano weng ma ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor atiokisio nuka aikidiokus na akipi nu ejaas itunga, apotu etimu iriamunos keda engarenok lu ocaalo. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ainakina kec kanu aitojokar adumunun akipi nu elaete kanuka itunga kere lu atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo yi ako ni ongulumu eyini esu 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da 'ye mitingi drice'ba calo ni 'diyi pie. Eyi 'ba asi e'yo eyini eyi owizu yi ala esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu 'ba dria angu 'da ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma oburemeezi bw'eibura ry'amaizi oburikushangwa abantu, tiimu ekakora orukiiko n'abebembezi b'ebyaro. Bakashoboorora okwehayo kwabo okwongyera amaizi marungi ahari buri omwe omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enforce payment compliance, the local water authority announced a strict new policy. As a result, the cooperation has disconnected all people who fail to pay their water bills.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okussa mu nkola okusasulwa, ekitongole ky'amazzi kyalangiridde enkola empya enkakali. N'ekivuddemu, ekibiina ky'obwegassi kisazeeko abantu bonna abalemererwa okusasula ebisale by'amazzi.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me keto cik me cul itic, dul ma doro lok kom pii I tedero okati ki cik manyen matek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ne ongolo kakube pa dano weng ma pe guculu cente gi me pii.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong aitac ikapun, abu erionget loka akipi kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Kanuka ngun, elemari atukot ngin itunga kere lumam epedoritos aitac ikapun luka akipi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo 'bani robia ofezu 'diyi ma vuti obizu, amuti local water authority niri azi azita okporu o'diru ni. E'yo 'disi, amuti yi ti icita niri li 'ba dria yi ma aje ofepi ku 'diyi ma ti ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburinganiza omu kushashura, ekitongore ky'amaizi eky'omubyaro kikarangirira engyenderwaho nsya. N'ekyarugiremu,ekitongore ky'amaizi kigarwireho abantu boona abaremwa kushashura ebishare byabo by'amaizi.

eng_prompt: Recent inspections revealed significant issues with the water supply infrastructure. As a result, we conducted a thorough assessment of the boreholes in our region.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko kwazudde obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu nkola y'amazzi. N'ekyavaamu, twakebera bulungi nnayikondo mu kitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: Yub me ngiyo piny ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto peko madongo I yub me poko pii. Macalo adwogi ne, watimo kwed matut I kom tangi matye I twok piny wa.
teo_prompt: Angicio na pac abu kitodu atiokisio nuepolok noi nuikamunitos akipi. Kanuka ngun, apotu sio angicata agilon nu aiboisit wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani andri o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo okporu yi awaza ma alia 'diyi ra. E'yo 'disi, ama andri bowaholu angu amavileri ma alea 'diyi ma pamvu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka oburemeezi bw'amaani omu nkora y'amaizi. N'ekyarugiremu, tukakora okucondooza aha naikondo omu kyanga kyaitu.

eng_prompt: To ensure the safety and health of the community, it is essential to maintain the water sources. Regular maintenance will prevent contamination and protect the wells from animals and debris.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi n'obulamu bw'ekitundu, kya mugaso okukuuma ensibuko z'amazzi. Okuddaabiriza enzizi buli kaseera kijja kuziyiza obucaafu n'okukuuma enzizi okuva ku bisolo n'ebisasiro.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko ber bedo ki yot kom pa lwak, pire tek tutwal me gwoko kama pii tye iye. Gwokke kare ki kare obi gengo balo pii ki gwoko kulu ne ki kom lee ki yugi.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe eyuara keda angaleu naka itunga, ejok aidar aiboisio nu akipi. Aitemonokin duc ebuni aitikitik ekorono ka ayuarite alibuneta kama ejaasi itiang keda agasia.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini aa'zu muke azini aa'zu rua ala be, eri orodriru geri yi esuzu 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru. Afa eyi ma tambaza sa'wa driasi ri ni mu angu ezapi 'diyi atri dika eri nga yi ara eyi ma ta mba anyapa eyivu azini nyaku eyivu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya oburinzi n'amagara g'abantu, n'eky'omugasho kureeberera oburugo bw'amaizi. Okugarurwa busya buri kaire, nikiija kutangira okujunda kw'amaizi n'okurinda amaizi kuruga aha nyamaishwa hamwe n'ebisasiro.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of their community, local congregations have come together to discuss their plans for future outreach. As a result, Christians have raised money to support the expansion of their Church.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebyetaago by'ekitundu kyabwe ebigenda byeyongera, ebibiina by'omu kitundu bikungaanidde wamu okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka zaabyo ez'omu maaso. N'ekivuddemu, abakrisitaayo basonze ssente okuyambako mu kugaziya ekkanisa yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak, kanica me tedero guribbe kacel me nywako tam gi i kom yub me konyo lwak ikare me anyim. Macalo adwogi ne, lucristayo gu jogo cente me dongo kanica gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubetekec, imorikikinos ikuristayon aitetem nu ebeit kesi aswam koingaren. Kanuka ngun, atukutu ikurisitayon ikapun kanu aitanyanyar ekanisa kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, kanisa angu eyini 'diyi emu tualu agbatara gbazu otita eyini 'diyi ma dria eyini ani azi ngazu ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, kristiani eyi tra robia atita fezu kanisa eyini ri ma ale sizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu omu byanga byabo, amakanisa g'omubyaro gakwatanisize kuhanuura aha nteekateeka zaago ez'obuhwezi omu biro by'omumaisho. Ekyarugiremu, abakurisitaayo batungire esente z'okushanjuura ekanisa yaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to strengthen community relations and support local leaders, the government has announced a new initiative. As part of this program, they will provide resources to enhance the mobility of influential figures in our districts.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okunyweza enkolagana mu bantu n'okuwagira abakulembeze b'ebitundu, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya. Ng'ekitundu ku nteekateeka eno, bajja kuwa obuyambi okutumbula entambula y'abantu ab'amaanyi mu disitulikiti zaffe.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me jingo wat ikin lwak ki cwako lutela me tedero, gamente otito yub manyen. Macalo but yub man, gibimiyo kony me wot pa dano ma oywek i districts wa.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong eidicane lo itunga ka aigang engarenok luka atutubet, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nu, epote kesi aijaikin iboro lu itojokaret alosit naka itunga luejenara noi kodisitriktan wok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu aa'ta ongulumu eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu dika atita fezu drice'ba angu eyini 'diyi dri, gamete azi e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, eyi nga afa ayuzaru 'diyi fe acita 'ba okporu distrikitia 'diyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura enkoragana y'abantu n'okushagika abebembezi b'ebyaro, gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka nsya. Nk'emwe aha puroguraamu egi, nibeija kuheereza eby'okukoresa okwongyera aha ntambura y'abantu b'amaani omu disiturikiti zaitu.

eng_prompt: Many religious organizations prioritize helping those less fortunate, recognizing their responsibility to support the vulnerable. As a result, they often engage in various outreach programs and initiatives.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'enzikiriza bingi bikulembeza okuyamba abo abateesobola, nga bakimanyi nti buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe okuyamba abo abateesobola. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwenyigira mu pulogulaamu n'enteekateeka ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Dule me dini mapol giketo pi konyo lupeko bedo gin ma pire tek tutwal, kun gingeyo ni obedo tic gi me konyo lupeko. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare gidonyo I yub mapat-pat me konyo dano.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta luipu luka idiinin isingarenitos aingarakin ngul lu ican, ajenete ebe erai aswam kec aigang ngul lu ican. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi alomar toma ainapeta nuegelegela nuka aitodolikin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Amuti e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ma pari yi asi 'ba 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu, yini yi ma azi egazu 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi atizu. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni eyi 'ye otita azini e'yo ndundu eyini imbata fezu o'bi eyidri 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore by'ediini ebingi nibitwara okuhwera abo abatarikwebaasa nka kikuru, barikumanya obujunanizibwa bwabyo obw'okuhwera abo abatarikwebaasa. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kwejumba omu nteekateeka z'okuhwera abantu.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and change, it is essential for communities to support their local institutions. One way to strengthen the faith community is through financial contributions.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'enkyukakyuka, kya mugaso eri ebitundu okuwagira ebitongole byabwe eby'omu kitundu. Engeri emu ey'okunyweza enzikiriza y'abantu kwe kuwaayo obuyambi bw'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki aloka-loka, pire tek tutwal ki lwak me cwako dule gi. Yo acel me jingo dini obedo miyo kony me lim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus ajenanut keda aijulanakineta, ejokuka itunga aigang atukona kec. Epone ediope loka aitogogong aiyuunikec ngesi ainanakin ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini ojata ni 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru ongulumu eyini atita fezu amuti eyivile 'diyi dri. Geri azi 'bani ecozu ongulumu e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ma okpo engazu ri geri robia fezu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutegyendesereza n'empinduka, ni kikuru abantu kushagika ebitongore byabo. Omuringo gumwe gw'okutunguura enyikiriza n'okuhayo esente.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various religions have sought to guide their followers towards harmonious living and ethical behavior. Among these, Christianity stands out for its emphasis on love, compassion, and the importance of moral values.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, amadiini ag'enjawulo gagezezzaako okulungamya abagoberezi baago mu bulamu obweyagaza n'enneeyisa ennungi. Mu bino byonna, obukrisitaayo busibuka ku kwagala, okusaasira, n'obukulu bw'empisa.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, dini mapat-pat otemo me konyo lulub korgi me bedo ki kuc ki kit maber. I kin magi, dini pa lucristayo nen tutwal pi keto cwinygi I kom mar, kica ki ber pa cik me kwo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo, atamitos idiinin luegelegela aingarenikin atupitokokec toma aijar najokan keda iponesio luajokak. Kotoma akiro nu, itegelikina ikurisitayot kanu aisingarenit amin, asianut keda ajokis naka iponesio lukajokak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, dini ndundu eyi o'bi eyi ma 'ba eyi ma ti oji geri aa'zu tualu azini adriza kililiru 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, e'yo Kristayo ni 'diyi e'da e'yo erini asi 'bazu leta ma dria, asi ndriza ma dria, azini orodri e'yo ada ma dria 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, amadiini agatari gamwe gashaziremu kuhabura abakurasi baabo, kugira ngu bagire entuura nungi n'emitwarize mirungi. Omuri ebi, obukristaayo nibureebeka kurugirira aha rukundo, okusaasira, hamwe n'omugasho gw'emitwarize.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there have been growing concerns about financial transparency within the church. As a result, many congregants have begun to question the integrity of their leaders.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, wabaddewo okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bwerufu mu by'ensimbi mu kkanisa. N'ekivuddemu, abakrisitaayo bangi batandise okubuusabuusa obwesimbu bw'abakulembeze baabwe.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, lworo obedo ka mede I kom ada I lok me lim I kanica. Macalo adwogi ne, lucristayo mapol gucako bedo ki akala-kala I kom ber bedo pa lutela gi.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, ejai aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos aica naka ikapun kokanisa. Kanuka ngun, egeunos ikuristayon luipu abuonokin abeit naka engarenok kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, asi otiza e'bi tu e'yo e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria kanisa ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba kanisa'a 'diyi e'do e'yo ega e'yo ada drice'ba yini 'diyiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, habaireho okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza omu by'empiiha omu kanisa. N'ekyarugiremu, abanyikiriza baingi batandikire kubanganisa obwesigwa bw'abebembezi baabo.

eng_prompt: After years of saving and planning, the congregation finally received a generous donation. This unexpected financial support provided the perfect opportunity for much-needed improvements.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okutereka n'okuteekateeka okumala emyaka, ekibiina kyamala ne kifuna obuyambi obw'omutima omugabi. Obuyambi bw'ensimbi buno obutasubirwa bwawa omukisa ogutuukiridde mu kutumbula ebyetaagibwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me gwoko cente ki yube, kanica dong onongo kony me cente. Kony me lim man ma pe byek tye I komgi omiyo kare maber tutwal me kelo alokaloka ma mite tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aimono keda aitemonokin, apotu ikuristayon kodumutu agangat. Agangat na na ikapun na mam aomitai abu ijaik arerengu na aitodolikin iboro lu ekotoi noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara 'bani robia trazu azini otuta 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, kanisa isu asizu afa feza asi driasi. Atita robia ni 'bani ega kokoru 'diri fe drileba kililiru e'yo otuza 'bani le saaru 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okubiika n'okuteekateekyera, ekanisa ekahendera yaatunga obuhwezi. Obuhwezi bw'esente obwabaire butarikuteekwateekwaho, bukaheereza omugisha gw'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: During the annual gathering, the leaders reflected on the significant contributions made by various faith communities. They emphasized the importance of collaboration in advancing their shared mission.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana olutegekebwa buli mwaka, abakulembeze bafumiitiriza ku buyambi obw'amaanyi obukolebwa enzikiriza ez'enjawulo. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okukolagana mu kutumbula omulimu gwabwe ogw'awamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka, lutela ne gubedo ka tam I kom jami mabeco ma dini mapat-pat omiyo. Guketo cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa ribbe I tyelo kor tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet kangin ekaru, apotu engarenok itetemoto nuikamunitos agangat naepol na itunga luka idiinin luegelegela. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis na aiswamanara kanu aitodolikin aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Sawa okuta eli vusi ri si, drice'ba eyi ega e'yo orodriru 'bani fele e'yo aita ni ndundu 'diyini 'diyi ma dria. Eyi 'ba asi orodri ti ecita niri ma dria eyini ani e'yo eyini lele 'diyi 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'omwaka, abeebembezi bakateekateeka aha buhwezi bw'amaani oburikukorwa amadiini agatari gamwe na gamwe. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okukwatanisa omu kutunguura ekigyendererwa kyabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the urgent need for rebuilding after the recent natural disaster, a fundraising campaign was launched. Generous supporters from various countries rallied together to contribute essential materials for the affected communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okuddamu okuzimba oluvannyuma lw'akatyabaga k'obutonde akaaliwo gye buvuddeko, kaweefube w'okusonda ssente yatandikibwawo. Abawagizi abagabi okuva mu mawanga ag'enjawulo baakungaanidde wamu okuwaayo ebintu ebikulu eri abantu abaakosebwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me miti me gedo odoco I ngee peko ma poto atura ma otimme cokcok-ki, yub me jogo cente kicako. Lumi kony ma cwinygi yot ma aa ki ilobo mapat-pat gugure kacel me miyo jami ma mite pi lwak ma peko ne opoto i komgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka aiduk bobo akaulo naka atiokisio nuka edeke, aponi kitegearai aituk ikapun. Apotu egangitok luka akwapin nuegelegela kimorikikinos nepepe kanu aijaikin iboro lu itunga lu etereikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu mbeleru e'yo ewaru nyakuni ebipi o'diru 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba e'do otuta robia trazu ri ra. Ba atita fepi engapi kari ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tra eyi tualu afa orodriru 'diyi fezu ongulumu e'yo ewaru 'yepi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'ahonaaho ky'okugaruka kwombeka ahanyima y'ebihikiirizi eby'obuhangwa ebyabaireho juba, bakatandikaho ehururu y'okushorooza esente. Abashagiki baingi kuruga omu mahanga gatari gamwe baketeerana hamwe kuhayo ebintu by'omugasho omu byaro ebirikuteganisibwa.

eng_prompt: Over the decades, the community has gathered for worship and fellowship, fostering a strong sense of belonging. Many families have deep roots in this place, passing down traditions from generation to generation.
lug_prompt: Okumala emyaka mingi, abantu bakungaanidde wamu okusinza n'okubeera awamu, ekireetedde abantu okuba n'enkolagana ey'oku lusegere. Amaka mangi galina emirandira egy'amaanyi mu kifo kino, nga gayisa eby'obuwangwa okuva ku mulembe okudda ku mulala.
ach_prompt: Pi mwaki mapol, lwak gugure pi woro ki ribbe, ma weko giwinyo ni gitye dano acel. Gangi mapol tye ki yadi mapol tutwal I kabedo man, ma nyutu tekwaro gi I kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etukonokinos itunga ailip ka aimorikikin, ido ijaikit kesi ajenun ebe eraasi kesi luka atutubet. Ikalia luipu ejaas keda iraan luepolok noi kotoma aiboisit kana, itolomete inonosio kec kotoma ateker itoni ateker.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu eyi tra eyi inzizu azini aa'zu eyi ma eselea, eyini ani aa'zu eyi ma eselea. Familia karakara eyi ma ola angu 'di ma alea sa'wa driasi, eyi ma a'di eyi aga engazu ewu drialeri ma alea kpere ewu drialeri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Kumara emyaka mingi, abantu bateranire hamwe kuramya n'okukwatanisa, ekirikureetaho enshonga y'amaani. Amaka maingi gaine emizi y'amaani omu mwanya ogu, nigahitsya eby'obuhangwa kuruga aha murembe kuza aha murembe.

eng_prompt: In a move to strengthen law enforcement, the government announced a new initiative to enhance public safety. As part of this initiative, the president yesterday passed out eighty assistant inspectors of police.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okunyweza abakwasisa amateeka, gavumenti yalangiridde enteekateeka empya ey'okutumbula obukuumi bw'abantu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, pulezidenti eggulo yayisizza abayambi b'abakebera poliisi kinaana.
ach_prompt: I yub me jingo cik, gamente okati ki yub manyen me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak. Macalo but yub man, ladit lobo laworo okatti ki lukony kor abili pyeraboro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong ikisila, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aitogogong ayuwara naka itunga. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, abu bian lokapolon akwap ijaik engarakinitok luka ipolisin akaisakanyauni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu okpo fezu 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi dri, gamete azi e'yo azi o'diru ni ageitema o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, prisdent fe aje 'ba azakoma fepi polisi eyini 'diyi ma kalafe aro.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'okwongyera amaani omu kukuratira ebiragiro,gavumenti ekarangirira enteekateeka nsya y'okureetaho obusingye omu bantu. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, omwebembezi w'eihanga nyomwebazyo akaheereza abahwezi makumi munaana abarikureeberera poriisi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events and increasing public scrutiny, the police department implemented a comprehensive training program. This initiative aimed to equip officers with the necessary skills to handle a variety of challenging scenarios effectively.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okweyongera kw'okukeberebwa kw'abantu, ekitongole kya poliisi kyassaawo enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa abasirikale obukugu obwetaagisa okukola ku mbeera ez'enjawulo ezisoomooza obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki mede pa ngiyo kor tic pa lwak, dul pa abili oketo yub me pwonye I tic. Yub man obedo me miyo ngec ki abili ma mite me lweny i kom peko mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda aanyanario naka itunga, apotu ipolisin itolomutu ainapeta nuituutoonorere. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai ainanakin eswamak acoa na ekotoi kanu aitikitik atiokisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini o'bi yi ma e'yo ondrepi tu 'diyi ma e'yosi, arakala polisi niri 'ba otita imbatani 'diyi dria. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu azi'ba yi dri ondua fezu e'yo ewaru ndundu 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwegyezamu kw'abantu, ekitongore kya pooriisi kitandikireho enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu. Enteekateeka egi ekaba egyendereire kuheereza ba ofiisa emyoga y'okukora aha nshonga ezitarikushushana kurungi.

eng_prompt: In response to recent community feedback, the department has decided to implement a new training program. This initiative aims to enhance the interaction between officers and the public.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku ebyo abantu bye baayogera gye buvuddeko awo, ekitongole kisazeewo okussa mu nkola enteekateeka empya ey'okutendeka abantu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula enkolagana wakati w'abaserikale n'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tam ma lwak omiyo cokcok-ki, dul ne omoko tamgi me keto yub me pwonye manyen itic. Yub man tye ki miti me medo wat ikin abili ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aomisio nuka itunga, abu erionget itolomu ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aitutuonoro. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar eidicane kiding eswamak keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko o'diru ongulumu eyini fe 'diyisi, arakala 'da 'du e'yo otita imbatani o'diruni 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu ti ecita azi'ba eyi ma eselea o'bi eyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu ebyarugiremu kuruga omu bantu,ekitongore kishazireho kutaho enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okutunguura enkoragana ahagati y'abakuru n'abantu.

eng_prompt: In response to recent incidents involving crowd control, the authorities recognized the need for enhanced safety measures. As a result, they organized a comprehensive training session for the personnel involved.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebibaddewo gyebuvuddeko nga bizingiramu okufuga abantu, ab'obuyinza baalaba obwetaavu bw'okwongera ku mutindo gw'ebyokwerinda. N'ekyavaamu, baategeka okutendekebwa okw'omuggundu eri abakozi abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ma kwako gengo dano mapol, lutela oniang ni omyero kimed rwom me gwoko kuc. Macalo adwogi ne, guyubu pwonye matut tutwal pi lutic ma gubedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin akiro nuiswamasi pac nuikamunitos aitikitik itunga, apotu apedorosio kojenutu eipud loka aitikitik ayuwara. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi itemokisi aituutoorio naejok kanu eswamak.
lgg_prompt: Omvita e'yo yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma alia ongulumu eyi ma omgbo esizu ri ma dria, drice'ba eyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma otu e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi otu otita imbatani eyi 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi dri dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati, ab'obushoborozi bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okwongyera amaani omu by'okwerinda. N'ekyarugiremu, bakatebekanisa okutendekwa kw'abantu boona abaabaire bejumbiremu.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing frequency of civil unrest, law enforcement agencies implemented a comprehensive training program. Officers participated in intensive workshops designed to enhance their ability to manage large crowds safely and effectively.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko obweyongera mu bantu, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe byassaawo enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu. Abakungu beetabye mu misomo egyateekebwawo okutumbula obusobozi bwabwe okukwasaganya abantu abangi obulungi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa tim gero I kin lwak, dul ma gwoko cik guketo yub me pwonye I tic. Abili gubedo tye I kacoke me pwonye ma kiyubu pi medo kero gi me tic maber I kom dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin amumu na iyata noi, apotu atukona nuka ikisila itolomutu ainapeta nuka aitutuoro. Apotu ipolisin kojaikinos toma airiamununeta nuepedorete aitojokar apedor kec naka ayait itunga luipu ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri kari ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi 'ba otita imbatani 'diyi dria. Azi'ba fi otita imbatani okporu 'diyi ma alea eyini ani ecozu eyi ma okpo otuzu ongulumu karakara eyi ma aza kozu kililiru azini kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro bikataho enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu. Ba ofiisa bakeejumba omu mishomo y'amaani eyateirweho okwongyera amaani omu kukora aha bantu baingi omu muringo murungi.

eng_prompt: The foundation for this innovative approach to education was laid decades ago, as pioneers sought to revolutionize learning methods. As interest in new teaching techniques grew, educators began to explore uncharted territories in pedagogy.
lug_prompt: Omusingi gw'enkola eno ey'obuyiiya mu by'enjigiriza gwateekebwawo emyaka mingi emabega, nga bapayoniya banoonya okukyusa enkola z'okusoma. Okwagala enkola z'okusomesa empya bwe kweyongera, abasomesa baatandika okunoonyereza mu bitundu ebitazuuliddwa mu kusomesa.
ach_prompt: Gedo me yoo manyen man me kwan ki keto mwaki mapol ma okato angec, macalo lutela ma otemo kelo aloka loka I yoo me kwan. I kare ma miti me diro manyen me pwony omedde, lupwonye gucako yenyo kabedo ma pe ki niang iye I lok me pwonyo lutino.
teo_prompt: Aponi kipikakinai atutubet naka epone lo loitetet loka aisisia ikar lu atuboros, kwape luapolok luekotosi aijulakin iponesio luka aisisia. Kwape apolor eipud loka iponesio luitetiak luka aisisianakin, apotu esisianakinak kogeutu aingic aiboisio nu mam itodunitere nuka aisisianakin.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'do geri onita ni o'diru 'di ma vuti eli karakara agapi 'bo, 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi 'diyi le geri onita ni 'diyi ojazu o'diru. Leta geri onita ni o'diru 'diyi ma dria ri ni tu uru, imba'ba eyi e'do angu 'bani esu ku 'diyi ma ale andri e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omusingye gw'enkora y'eby'obwegyese ey'omutaano gukatebwaho emyaka mingi enyima, nk'abahanguzi abarikugyezaho kuhindura emihanda y'okwegyesamu. Omuhimbo gw'okukoresa oburyo obusya bw'okwegyesa kukweyongyera, abegyesa batandika kuronda emyanya etarikushangwa omu kwegyesa.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated as the crowd grew increasingly agitated, chanting slogans and demanding justice. Authorities warned the demonstrators to disperse, but their calls went unheeded.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera ng'abantu beeyongera okutabuka, nga bakuba enduulu n'okusaba obwenkanya. Ab'obuyinza baalabula abeekalakaasi okusaasaana, naye omulanga gwabwe tegwagobererwa.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde ikare ma lwak gubedo ki lworo matek tutwal, ma gubedo ka wero dwan matek dok bene gubedo ka lego ni kingol kop matir. Lutela gu ciko lujemo me pokke, ento lwongogi pe ki winyo.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai apotu itunga kijulakinos, ekosioto ikososinei luekotosi kesi etube loajokan. Apotu apedorosio ikwenyasi itunga lu ediyak aisiarakin, konye mam aponi opupokinai aiwororio kec.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri tu uru 'ba ongulumuru 'diyi ni e'dozu e'yo onzi 'yezu tualu e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo liza kililiru ri si. Okpo e'ipi fe bile ndu liza 'ba aoko e'dapi 'diyi dri yi erezu ra te 'ba awini eyi ma omveta 'du ku.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'okugira ngu abantu beeyongyeire kutabanguka, barikweshongora ebigambo ebirikworeka ngu nibenda oburingaaniza. Ab'obushoborozi bakarabura abeshaaringi okwetantara, kwonka okushaba kwabo tikurahurirwe.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy chase through the city, the officers finally cornered the suspects in an alley. Tensions escalated as the suspects resisted arrest, prompting the police to take decisive action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuyigga abantu okumala ebbanga eddene mu kibuga, abasirikale baasembayo okukwata abateeberezebwa okuba abamenyi b'amateeka mu luguudo olumu. Obunkenke bweyongedde ng'abateeberezebwa okugaana okukwatibwa, ekyaleetedde poliisi okubaako ky'ekolawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ryemo dano pi kare malac I dye citi, abili gumako jo mabyek me bal tye I komgi. Lworo omede ikare ma jo mabyek me bal tye I komgi gukwero makogi, ma oweko abili omoko tamgi me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka arukio naepol noi kotoma oibuga, apotu ipolisin kodumutu itunga luitepesenitai. Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai apotu luetepesenitai ogiroto aikamanario, ido abu koinak ipolisin aswam kagogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi drozu sa'wa ezu aku ambu city niri ma alea 'bo ri ma vutia, polisi eyi esu 'ba 'bani ega eyi eza e'yo ra ada 'diyi asizu. E'yo ewaru tu 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ra ada 'diyi ni a'di 'dizu 'bani eyi obizu risi, e'yo 'da fe polisi eyini e'yo 'yezu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara obwire buraingwa barikubahiiga omu rurembo, abaserukare bakahendera bashanga abarikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro omu muhanda mukye. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'abarikuteekateekwaho kuremwa kukwatwa, ekyareteire poriisi kukora eky'amaani.

eng_prompt: After my recent check-up, the doctor expressed concern about my health. I was surprised to learn that my blood pressure readings were consistently elevated.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukeberebwa gye buvuddeko, omusawo yalaze obweraliikirivu ku bulamu bwange. Kyanneewuunyisa nnyo okukimanya nti puleesa yange yeeyongera buli kiseera.
ach_prompt: I ngee pime cokcok-ki, daktar onyuto lworo I kom yotkom mega. Abedo ki ngeng tutwal I kare ma aniang ni lyeto me remo tye ka medde tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainwakio ka, abu emuron kitodu aiyalongong kanuka angaleuka. Abu eong aumokin noi ajenun ebe apolor noi epuresa ka.
lgg_prompt: Ma ma andrita eturisi 'bori ma vutia, dakitari ece asi otiza ma rua ala ma dria ra. Ma eca osuta si onizu kini ma ma ari ma omgbo tu sawa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okunkyebera, dokita akooreka okwerarikirira aha magara gangye. Nkatangaara kumanya ngu puresha yangye ekaba eguma neyeyongyera.

eng_prompt: As we analyze the trends in voter engagement, it's important to look back at the turnout from past elections. Understanding the level of participation can provide insights into the effectiveness of our outreach efforts.
lug_prompt: Nga twekenneenya engeri abalonzi gye bakwataganamu, kikulu okutunula emabega ku muwendo gw'abalonzi okuva mu kulonda okuwedde. Okutegeera omutindo gw'okwetabamu kusobola okuwa amagezi ku buwanguzi mu kaweefube waffe ow'okutuuka ku bantu.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka ngiyo kit ma lubol kwir tye ka tic kwede, pire tek tutwal me neno wel lubol kwir ma okato angec. Niang rwom me bedo tye twero weko waniang maber tutwal I kom kit ma tic wa tye ka wot kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape sio aanyanar eipone lo aiswamanar keda aseak, ejokuna aanyun ebe apotu itunga kojaikinos toma aseo na atuboros. Amisiikin adoketait na ajaikina epedori aijaikin oni acoa na aitodolikin aswam wok.
lgg_prompt: Amani geri 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma ti ecizu 'diyi ma ale andriria, eri orodriru ama ma ndre 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma kalafe engazu opeta agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia. Ongmbo 'bani fizu alenia ri ma vata eco fe ondua e'yo amani 'ye 'diyi ma orodri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nitushwijuma enkora y'okwegata kw'abateezi b'akaruuru, ni kikuru kureeba omuhendo gw'abateezi b'akaruuru kuruga omu karuuru akahweire. Okwetegyereza omutindo gw'okwetabamu, nikibaasa kutuhwera kumanya oburungi bw'emirimo yaitu.

eng_prompt: We need to finalize the logistics for the upcoming training session. To ensure we have enough materials and space, it's important to know the number of participants.
lug_prompt: Twetaaga okumaliriza enteekateeka y'okutendekebwa okujja. Okusobola okukakasa nti tulina ebikozesebwa ebimala n'ekifo ekimala, kikulu okumanya omuwendo gw'abo abeetabamu.
ach_prompt: Omyero wa tyek tic pi pwonye matye kabino ni. Me neno ni watye ki jami tic ki kabedo ma oromo, pire tek tutwal me ngeyo wel dano matye katime.
teo_prompt: Ekot oni angetakin ainapeta nuka aituutoorio na ebunit. Kanu aanyun ebe ijaasi oni keda iboro luedolete keda aiboisit naedolit, ejokuna ajenun enaaba loka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Le ama ma de e'yo otuta ni 'diyi otita imbatani emupi 'diyi ni 'diyi ma alia ra. Aa'zu kililiru kini ama vu afa ayuzaru azini angu angiri, eri orodriru kalafe 'ba fi'ba 'diyi niri nizu.
nyn_prompt: Twine kumaririza emirimo y'okutendeka okurikwija. Okureeba ngu twine ebintu ebirikumara n'omwanya, n'eky'omugasho kumanya omuhendo gw'abantu abarikwejumbamu.

eng_prompt: In a world that often emphasizes conformity, it's essential to recognize the unique perspectives each individual brings. Celebrating diversity can lead to greater understanding and collaboration among us.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi etera okussa essira ku kukkaanya, kya mugaso okutegeera endowooza ez'enjawulo buli muntu z'aleeta. Okujaguza enjawulo kusobola okuleetawo okutegeera n'okukolagana mu ffe.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma ipol kare keto cwinye tutwal I kom bedo marom, pire tek tutwal me niang tam mapat-pat ma ngat acel-acel kelo. Kwero jami ma pat pat twero weko winye ki winye bedo tye ikinwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na isinyikokit itunga acamanar, ejokuna noi ajenun aomisio nuegelegela nu itunganan eyangauni. Ainumunum iponesio luegelegela epedori ayangaun apuponoro keda aimorikikina kanejaas oni.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea 'bani asi 'bazu e'yo dria 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba alu alu ni ejile 'diyi ma dria. Ayiko zuza e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria ri eco fe ama ma eselea vata azini ti ecita ma omgbo ni tuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikukira kuta amaani aha kukoragana, n'eky'omugasho kumanya emiteekateekyere y'omutaano ei buri omwe arikureeta. Okujaguza ebitarikushushana nikibaasa kureetaho okwetegyerezana n'okukwatanisa ahagati yaitu.

eng_prompt: As tensions rose during the protest, chaos began to unfold in the streets. Amid the unrest, some individuals saw an opportunity to exploit the situation for their own gain.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera mu kwekalakaasa, akavuyo kaatandika mu nguudo. Wakati mu butabanguko, abantu abamu baalaba omukisa okukozesa embeera ku lw'ebigendererwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ka telle omedde I kare me jemo, kuku kuku ocake I teng gudu. Ikare me jemo enoni, dano mukene guneno kare me tic ki peko man me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Neapolor atiokisio kotoma aidiya kangin, abu amumu kogeu atakanun korotin. Kokiding naka amumu, apotu icetunga kowanyutu arereng naka aitosom ejautene ngol kanu ameda kec bon.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu sawa ngiringiri nirisi, ngiringiri e'do efu nzila eyi ma alea. Ngiringiri 'da ma talasi, 'ba azi 'diyi ndre drileba e'yo nde ayuzu eyi ma orodri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire omu kwesharinga, akaimukiriro kakatandika kubaho aha nguuto. Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko, abantu abamwe bakareeba omugisha gw'okukoresa embeera ahabw'ebyaabo.

eng_prompt: After years of oppression and injustice, we can no longer remain silent. The time has come for us to stand up and demand our rights.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'okunyigirizibwa n'obutali bwenkanya, tetukyayinza kusirika. Ekiseera kituuse okuyimirira n'okusaba eddembe lyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me diyo dano ki ngolo kop alenga, pe dong watwero ling. Kare dong oromo pi wan me cung matek pi twero wa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aiticanio keda amumu, mam bobo oni ipedori aililing. Adolu kwana apak na oni aibwo ka ailip apedorosiowok.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani candi fezu azini e'yo ada kokoru 'diyi ma vutia, ama econi curu'do ovu ciri ku. Sa'wa ca ama ni pa sozu drilemgbo amavile 'diyi ai'zu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okubonabonesibwa n'obutari buringaaniza, titurikubaasa kuguma tuhunami. Obwire buhikire kwemerera kushaba obugabe bwaitu.

eng_prompt: I heard you were really passionate about that team. I'm curious, what kind of financial commitment have you made to support them?
lug_prompt: Nawulira nti ddala wali oyagala nnyo ttiimu eyo.
ach_prompt: Awinyo ni imaro tim meno mada.
teo_prompt: Apupunit eong ebe imina jo noi etimu ngol.
lgg_prompt: Ma eri ndra kini mi avaru amuti 'da ma dria saaru.
nyn_prompt: Mpuriire ngu okaba nookunda munonga tiimu egyo.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, the risk of data breaches and unauthorized access to personal information is higher than ever. Organizations must prioritize the security of their data to maintain trust and compliance with regulations.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, akabi k'okumenya amateeka n'okufuna obubaka bw'omuntu nga tokkiriziddwa kuli waggulu okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Ebitongole birina okukulembeza obukuumi bwa data yaabyo okusobola okukuuma obwesige n'okugoberera amateeka.
ach_prompt: I kare me intanet me kare-ni, peko me turu cik ki nongo ngec pa dano ma pe ki twero tye lamal tutwal. Dule omyero guket gwoko tic gi obed gin ma pire tek pi gwoko gen ki lubu cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, epol noi ationis naka aibil akiro nuka itunga keda adolokin akiro nuka itunga. Ekot iriongeta aisingarenit ayuwara naka akiro kec kanu aidar amuno ka aitup ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea, e'yo 'bani e'yo 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi onyozu azini e'yo 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi esuzu rukusa kokoru ri ma omgbo angiri ndeni aga oku driorisi. Le amuti eyi ma 'ba e'yo e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi ma tambaza okporu eyini ani asi'baza ma tambazu azini azita eyi ma vuti obizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, akabi k'okuhenda ebirikukwata aha bantu n'okutunga ebirikukwata aharibo, nikakira kare. Ebitongore bishemereire kwebembeza eby'okwerinda kw'amakuru gaabyo kugira ngu bigume nibyesigwa kandi bikuratire ebiragyiro.

eng_prompt: What you see in your mind's eye may not reflect reality. It's important to distinguish between what is real and what is simply a product of your thoughts.
lug_prompt: By'olaba mu birowoozo byo biyinza obutaba bituufu. Kikulu okwawula wakati w'ebyo ebituufu n'ebyo byokka ebiva mu birowoozo byo.
ach_prompt: Ngo ma ineno I wii twero bedo ni pe tye ada. Pire tek tutwal me poko kin jami matye ada ki jami ma obedo tam mamegi keken.
teo_prompt: Ibore yenewanyunit jo kotoma aomisio kon aticepak mam itodunit abeit. Erai ibore yenepol noi atiakakin kiding ibore yen abeit keda ibore yenewomitai kotoma aomisiokon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mini ndre mi omi ma mile si 'diyi econi e'da e'yo adani ku. Eri orodriru esele cozu e'yo a'da 'diyi ma eselea e'yo mini egale 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ebi orikureeba omu biteekateeko byawe nibibaasa kuba bitarikworeka amazima. N'eky'omugasho okwahura ahagati y'ebihikire n'ebiteekateeko byawe.

eng_prompt: I heard there's a new season starting soon. Are you keeping up with the latest matches?
lug_prompt: Mpulidde nti sizoni empya etandika mu bbanga ttono.
ach_prompt: Awinyo ni kare me tuku manyen cok cakke.

lgg_prompt: Ma eri ra ayi ti o'di ni e'doria mbeleru.

eng_prompt: Our team is dedicated to implementing sustainable practices and innovative solutions. Together, we believe that positive change is possible and essential for future generations.

lug_prompt: Nga ekitongole ekitali kya magoba, buli kaseera tunoonya engeri y'okuwagira omulimu gwaffe n'okugaziya obuweereza bwaffe. Newankubadde, okutambuza enkola y'okusonda ensimbi kiyinza okuba ekizibu ennyo.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing job market, it's essential to understand the various skills that can enhance employability. Many individuals seek to identify the specific vocational skills that are in demand across different industries.

eng_prompt: As an educator, I often reflect on the most effective methods for engaging my students. With various learning styles and needs in mind, I seek to understand the best approaches to facilitate their growth.

ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic wa owoto maber, pire tek tutwal ni dano weng ma gubedo tye omyero gulub cik me byek lim. Bedo ki ada ki tic maber I lok me lim bikelo gen ki winye ikin lutic.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna epurojekt wok, ejokuna noi itunga kere atupakinit aicoreta nuka ebajet. Aswam na ecai ka abeit kotoma akiro nuka ikapun ebuni aitopolor amunokina keda aiswamanara kanejaas etimu.
lgg_prompt: Otita amavileri ma drile suzu, eri orodriru 'ba dria fi'ba otita 'da ma alea 'diyi ma vuti obizu azita bajeti ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu. E'yo e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alea e'yo ada azini azi ngaza kililiru ri ni nga asi'baza azini ti icita ma omgbo otu amuti 'da eyi ma eselea.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and evaluations of the project's progress, the leadership team decided it was time to delegate oversight. As a result, process responsibility was handed over to the advocacy committee.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'okukebera enkulaakulana ya pulojekiti, abakulembeze baasalawo nti kye kiseera okugaba obuvunaanyizibwa. N'ekyavaamu, obuvunaanyizibwa bw'enkola bwakwasibwa akakiiko akalwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki ngiyo kit ma tic tye ka wot kwede, lutela gumoko ni kare dong oromo me weko tic me doro tic pa lutic mukene. Macalo adwogi ne kimiyo tic me doro lok eni bot dul ma doro lok kom gamente.

lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia azini e'yo otita 'da ni muzu drile ri ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti driceza ni 'diyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bo 'bani azi ma pamvu onezu 'ba azi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe azi e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma drileru ri komiti e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma drilea.

eng_prompt: Transparency in financial matters is crucial for building trust between schools and families. To ensure that parents feel confident in their investment, they must be informed about how school fees are allocated and spent.
lug_prompt: Obwerufu mu nsonga z'ebyensimbi bukulu nnyo mu kuzimba obwesige wakati w'amasomero n'amaka. Okukakasa nti abazadde bawulira obwesige mu nsimbi zaabwe, balina okumanyisibwa ku ngeri ebisale by'essomero gye bigabanyizibwamu n'okusaasaanyizibwamu.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki ada I lok me lim pire tek tutwal pi dongo gen ikin gangi kwan ki gangi. Me neno ni lunyodo gubedo ki tekcwiny I keto lim I gangi kwan gi, omyero ki niang gi i kom kit ma cente me cukul ki poko kwede ki kit ma kitiyo kwede kwede.

teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunetekosi napac, apotu sio etetemoto iwaitin lu igangitotor itunga luka atutubet ka awanyun ebe edumunete idwe kere asioman. Adiopet kotoma ipudesia luapotu sio ajenutu ngesi ationis na ikapun na ejaas ikalia lu ikokiok.
