nyn_prompt: Omu bantu abarikuhinduka juba, n'eky'omugasho kumanya emitwarize erikukwata aha mitwarize y'eminyeeto. Okugumizamu n'omusingye murungi gw'emitwarize n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho enkoragana n'obujunaanizibwa omu minyeeto.

ach_prompt: I kabedo me kwo me kare-ni, bulu nongo ngec mapol tutwal I kom bedo ki lurem ki butu imit, pol kare aa ki kama pe gene. Me neno ni gumoko tam maber, pire tek tutwal me miyo pwony matut I kom lok magi I gangi kwan.

eng_prompt: In many communities, traditional education systems often overlook essential topics like sexual health and relationships. To address this gap, local leaders can play a crucial role in providing comprehensive sex education.

eng_prompt: In many societies, discussions about human anatomy are often considered inappropriate. This cultural sensitivity can lead to discomfort and avoidance of certain topics.

ach_prompt: I kacokke pa lwak ma obedo cokcok-ki, lutedero gunyutu lworo gi I kom bedo peke pa ada I yub me gedo. Guwaco ni dongo lobo omyero oket miti ki dwon pa lutedero obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga, apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongosiokec kanu amamus aica kotoma ainapeta nuka aitemonokin. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ebe ibusakinit aitopol iboro luka atutubet aisingarenit ipudesia keda iporotoi luka itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini o'diru ri ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo ada koko otita 'da ma alea ri ma dria. Eyi 'ba asi kini le 'ba ma 'ba e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyini le 'diyi ma dria okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ekyanga, abatuuragye bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'eibura ry'oburingaaniza omu nteekateeka. Bakashoboorora ngu entunguuka y'ebyombeko eshemereire kwebembeza ebyetengo n'amahurire g'abantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent developments and community discussions, officials have outlined the benefits of the initiative. To ensure its success and sustainability, the public is advised to embrace the project.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu kitundu, abakungu balaze emigaso gy'enteekateeka eno. Okukakasa obuwanguzi bwayo n'okuwangaala, abantu bakubirizibwa okwaniriza pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki nywako lok ma obedo tye ikin lwak, ludito guwaco ber pa yub eni. Me neno ni yub eni owoto maber dok orii pi kare malac, ki lego lwak me jolo yub eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuiswamasi pac keda ineresinei luka itunga, apotu eswamak kitetemoto ajokisio nuka ainapeta ngun. Kanu awanyun ebe ejai akerianut keda angetakin, icorakitai itunga acamun epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo o'yoza ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie, azi'ba eyi ece orodri e'yo 'di ni 'diyi ra. Otita 'di ma drile suzaru tualu ewu drile ri be, 'ba fe o'bi eyini imbata otita 'di atizu.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha ntunguuka eyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okuhanuura kw'abantu, abakuru boorekire emigasho y'ekigyendererwa. Okureeba ngu purogyekiti egumizemu, abantu nibahaburwa kugiikiriza.

eng_prompt: In light of the upcoming construction projects in the area, community leaders are emphasizing the importance of collaboration. To ensure a smooth process and address any concerns, effective communication is essential.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku pulojekiti z'okuzimba ezijja mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu bassa essira ku bukulu bw'okukolagana. Okukakasa enkola ennungi n'okugonjoola ensonga zonna, empuliziganya ennungi ya mugaso.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki yub me gedo matye kabino anyim I kabedo eni, lutela me kabedo eni tye ka cuko cwiny dano me ribe. Pi neno ni tic owoto maber ki tyeko peko mo keken, lok maber pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ipurojektin lu aduko lu ebunit aiboisit, isinyikokitos engarenok luka atutubet ajokis naka aimorikikina. Kanu awanyun ebe ejai ainapeta nuejokuka ka aitemokin atiokisio, erai einer loajokan ibore yenepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Otita afa sizu angu 'da ma alea ogogo 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi okpo 'ba e'yo ti icita ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru azini e'yo eyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emirimo y'okwombeka eriho omu kyanga, abeebembezi b'ebyanga nibashagika omugasho gw'okukwatanisa. Okuhamya ngu engyenderwaho neetambura kurungi n'okugonjoora oburemeezi bwona, empurizagana nungi n'ey'omugasho.

eng_prompt: As urban populations continue to grow, the need for new infrastructure has become increasingly urgent. City planners have proposed several projects to address these challenges.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu bibuga gweyongera okukula, obwetaavu bw'ebizimbe ebipya bweyongedde. Abategesi b'ebibuga bateesezza pulojekiti ez'enjawulo okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kuno.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano tye ka medde I boma madongo, miti me gedo manyen tye ka mede oyot-oyot tutwal. Luyub boma madit gukati ki tam mapat-pat me tyeko peko magi.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga kotoma oibuga, ejai eipud loka aduketait naitetet. Etemonokinak lu aiboisio apotu itolomutu ipurojektin luegelegela kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba eyini aa'zu aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea ri ni mu drile tu, le 'ba ma si afa ayuzaru o'diru 'diyi mbeleru. Ba aku ambo eyi otupi 'diyi o'ba otita karakara eyi e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu omu ndembo nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, ekyetengo ky'okwombeka ebintu ebisya kigumizemu kweyongyera. Abateekateeki b'endembo bateireho purogyekiti nyingi z'okukora aha buremeezi obu.

eng_prompt: The project is set to begin next month, and the team has finalized their plans. To prepare the site, they will start construction by clearing trees.
lug_prompt: Pulojekiti eyo egenda kutandika omwezi ogujja era ttiimu emalirizza enteekateeka zaayo. Okusobola okuteekateeka ekifo, bajja kutandika okuzimba nga basala emiti.
ach_prompt: Yub eni obucako I dwe mabino, dok lutic ne dong gutyeko yubu yubgi. Me yubu kabedo eni, gubi cako gedo ki tongo yadi.
teo_prompt: Ebeit epurojekt ageun olap ngol, ido adau etimu angetakin aitemonokineta kec. Kanu aitemonokin aiboisit, epote kesi ageun aiduk kowai lo alemar ikito.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da ni mu e'do imba drusirisi, dika amuti 'da de otita eyivile 'diyi 'bo. Angu 'da otuzu, eyi nga e'do afa eyi si pati eyi ma ogaza si.
nyn_prompt: Purogyekiti neeza kutandika okwezi okurikwija, kandi tiimu eherize kukora enteekateeka zaayo. Okutebeekanisa omwanya, nibaza kutandika kwombeka barikutema emiti.

eng_prompt: The city council has approved the budget for infrastructure improvements. As part of this initiative, the money will be used for road projects.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko k'ekibuga kayisizza embalirira y'okutumbula ebizimbe. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, ssente zijja kukozesebwa ku pulojekiti z'enguudo.
ach_prompt: Kancil me boma madit omoko byek lim me yubu jami ma mite pi boma. Macalo but yub man, kibi tiyo ki cente ne me yubu gudi.
teo_prompt: Acamaki ekansulo loka eibuga ebajet kanu aitojokar iboro. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eponio aitwasam ikapun kanu ipurojektin lu irotin.
lgg_prompt: Kanisulu aku ambu city niri niri ai bajeti afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga robia 'da ayu otita nzila ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko rw'orurembo rwikiriize embaririra y'okutunguura ebyombeko. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, esente niziija kukoresibwa omu purogyekiti z'enguuto.

eng_prompt: After months of mounting pressure from parents and staff, the headmaster finally decided it was time to step down. He gathered his thoughts and prepared to deliver the news to the school board.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okunyigirizibwa okuva mu bazadde n'abakozi, omukulu w'essomero yasalawo nti kye kiseera alekulire. Yakungaanya ebirowoozo bye n'ateekateeka okutuusa amawulire eri akakiiko k'essomero.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me keto lyeto I kom lunyodo ki lutic, lacen ladit gang kwan omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me weko tic. En ocoko tamme dok oyubbe me cwalo lok angea ne bot dul madoro gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka ainingosit kama ejaasi auriak keda eswamak, abu apolon esomero koseu ajalakin aswam. Abu ngesi kodum aomisioke kosodi aitemonokin alimor akiro ngun mama ejai atukot naka esomero.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia okpo tupi engazu tipika eyi vu azini azi'ba eyi vu 'bo, dricere 'da asizu 'du e'yo kini sa'wa 'di ca i azi kuzu ja. Eri tra egata ivile 'diyi azini otu i o'duko 'da idrizu 'ba sukulu ma driceza ni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi maingi y'okuteganisibwa abazaire n'abakozi, mukuru w'eishomero akacwamu ngu n'obwire bw'okurekura omurimo. Akakoranya ebiteekateeko bye yaayetebekanisa kuhisya amahurire aha kakiiko k'eishomero.

eng_prompt: During the budget meeting, the committee members presented their proposals for the upcoming school year. As the discussion progressed, it became clear that their priorities were not aligned.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'embalirira, bammemba b'akakiiko baayanjudde ebiteeso byabwe eby'omwaka gw'essomero ogujja. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo bwe kwagenda mu maaso, kyalabika bulungi nti ebintu bye baali bakulembeza byali tebikwatagana.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke me byek me lim, lumemba me committee gumiyo tam gi pi mwaka me kwan matye kabino ni. I kare ma nywako lok ne omedde, nen atyer kamaleng ni miti gi pe orwate.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka ebajet, apotu imeeban luka ekomiti itodiasi aomisiokec nuka ekaru loka esomero lo ebunit. Neautar aitetem akiro ngun, apotu kojenutu ebe mam akiro nuepolok kesi eputosi.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi bajeti niri ma alea, memba committee ni 'diyi e'da egata yini eli sukulu ni emupi ri ma dria 'diyi. E'yo onzeza ni muzu drile, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo yini okporu 'diyi awini yi eci ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'embaririra, ba memba b'akakiiko bakaheereza ebiteiso byabo eby'omwaka gw'eishomero ogurikwija. Okugaaniira ku kwagyendeire omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu ebikuru byabo bikaba bitarikukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: After months of investigation, the authorities uncovered a web of deceit involving several key players. Evidence revealed that the organization had been engaging in unethical financial practices.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyezi egiwerako nga banoonyereza, ab'obuyinza baazudde obulimba obwali buzingiramu abantu bangi abakulu. Obujulizi bulaga nti ekibiina kibadde kyeyingiza mu nkola z'ebyensimbi ezitali za mpisa.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok pi dwe mapol, lutela guyubu kwo ma obedo tye I kin ludito mapol. Caden onyuto ni dul ne obedo katimo tim me cente ma pe ber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aingic, apotu apedorosio odumutu akiro nuka akoko nuimoriarit itunga luipu. Apotu aitogogongoret itodutu ebe ajai erionget ngol toma aswamisio nuarokok nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Mba vuti ondaza ma vutia, 'ba okpo e'ipi 'diyi esu e'yo onzi 'yepi 'ba okporu 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi. Afa ecetaru 'diyi ece kini amuti 'da ebi e'yo robia ni 'diyi 'ye geri kililiru ku 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okucondooza, ab'obushoborozi bakajumbura oburugo bw'obushomankuzi oburimu abazaani b'amaani baingi. Obujurizi bukashoboorora ngu ekitongore kitwire nikikora emirimo y'esente etari y'emitwarize mirungi.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, the authorities found evidence of a violation of local regulations. As a result, they were requested to pay a fine.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu, ab'obuyinza baazuula obujulizi obulaga okumenya amateeka g'ekitundu. N'ekyavaamu, baasabibwa okusasula engassi.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut, lutela gunongo caden me turu cik me tedero. Macalo adwogi ne, ki lego gi me culu pwod.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu apedorosio odumutu aitogogongoret ebe ebilibilete ikisila luka atutubet. Kanuka ngun, aponi kolimokinai kes aitac ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, drice'ba eyi esu afa ecetaru e'yo 'bani azita angu 'da ma alea 'diyi nyozu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai eyi panga ofezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, ab'obushoborozi bakashanga obuhame oburikworeka okuhenda ebiragiro by'ekyaro. N'ekyarugiremu, bakashabwa kushashura omutango.

eng_prompt: During the investigation, it was discovered that several individuals had been misusing the intellectual property associated with the initiative. As a result, legal action was deemed necessary to address the situation.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonyereza, kyazuulibwa nti abantu bangi baali bakozesezza bubi obuyinza bw'obuntu obukwatagana n'enteekateeka. N'ekyavaamu, okutwalibwa mu mateeka kwalabisibwa nga okwetaagisa okugonjoola embeera.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kwed, kinongo ni dano mapol gubedo katic ki jami me ryeko ma kubbe ki yub eni I yoo marac. Macalo adwogi ne, kimoko ni omyero ki tii ki cik me tyeko peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic, aponi kodumunai ebe itunga luipu itwasamaete aomisio nuikamunitos ainapeta ngun. Kanuka ngun, aponi kowanyunai ebe ibusakinit aitolot akiro nuka ikisila kanu aitemokin ejautene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ma alea, 'ba esu kini 'ba karakara eyi e'bi e'yo onita ni 'diyi ayu geri onzi si. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'du e'yo 'duza azita palaa ri orodriru e'yo 'da ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kucondooza, kikashangwa ngu abantu baingi bakaba nibakoresa kubi obugabe bw'obwengye oburikukwata aha nteekateeka egyo. N'ekyarugiremu, okutwarira ebiragiro omu maisho kikareebwa nk'eky'omugasho kukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the budget and confirming the necessary funds, the committee has approved the allocation. Once the paperwork is finalized, the money will be transferred to the school account.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embalirira n'okukakasa ensimbi ezeetaagisa, akakiiko kakkirizza engaba y'ensimbi. Bwe bamala okukola empapula, ssente zijja kutwalibwa ku akawunta y'essomero.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo byek me lim ki moko cente ma mite, dul ne omoko cente ma kimiyo. Ka tic me karatac otum, kibicwalo cente I account me gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ebajet ka aitigogongor ikapun lu ekotoi, abu ekomiti itigogong aikor ikapun. Akaulo na angetakin aswam naka apapula, eponio aijukar ikapun toma akaunta naka esomero.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita ajeni 'diyi ma ale andrizu azini robia 'bani lele 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'da ai robia 'da ra. Ba ka karatasi 'da eyi de 'bo, 'ba nga robia 'da oja okporo sukulu niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embaririra hamwe n'okuhamya esente ezirikwetengwa, akakiiko kakaikiriza obuheereza. Empapura ku zirikumara kukorwa, esente niziija kutwarwa aha akawunti y'eishomero.

eng_prompt: After hours of heated discussion, the team found themselves at an impasse. Each member had a different opinion on the best course of action for the financial transfer.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okumala essaawa eziwera, ttiimu yeesanga mu kattu. Buli mmemba yalina endowooza ya njawulo ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okutambuzaamu ssente.
ach_prompt: Ingee laro lok matek tutwal pi cawa malac, dul tuku ne gunongo gi I peko madit tutwal. Lamemba acel-acel obedo ki tam mapat-pat I kom yoo maber loyo me kobo lim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi adaun isawan luipu, apotu etimu odumutu kesi toma ationis. Kangolitunganan ejaasi keda aomisio nuegelegela nuikamunitos epone loajokan kakere loka aijulakin ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani agbatara okporu 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esu eyi e'yo ewaru ma alea. Memba alu alu ma egata ndundu geri kililiru 'bani ecozu robia ojazu ri ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga kumara eshaaha nyingi, tiimu ekeeshangira omu kabi. Buri memba akaba aine ekiteekateeko kye ekitarikushushana aha nkora nungi y'okuhindura esente.

eng_prompt: As the population in the region continued to grow, local officials recognized the urgent need for improved infrastructure. Community leaders held meetings to discuss the benefits of expanding the road network to accommodate increasing traffic and support economic development.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu kitundu gweyongera okweyongera, abakungu b'ebyalo baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'ebikozesebwa okulongooka. Abakulembeze b'ekitundu baatuuza enkiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku miganyulo egiri mu kugaziya enguudo okusobola okutambuza entambula y'ebidduka okweyongera n'okuwagira enkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano tye ka mede i twok piny eni, lutic me tedero guniang ni mitte tutwal me yubu jami ma mite pi lwak. Lutela me tedero gubedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom ber pa yubu gudi wek gutii I kom motoka ma dwong dok bene okony dongo lobo I tenge me lim.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor enaba loka itunga aiboisit kangin, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kojenutu eipud loka aitojokar adukena. Apotu engarenok lu atutubet iriamunos kanu aitemitem ajokis naka aitanyanyar irotin kanu aitodolikin amotokan nuipu ka aitopolor edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe angu 'da ma alea ri ni mu drile tuzu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo 'bani lezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu mbeleru ri ra. Drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'ye mitingi eyi agbatara gbazu orodri nzila ma omgbo otuzu eyini ani nzila eyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu omu kyanga ku gwagumire nigweyongyera, abakungu b'ebyaro bakareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutunguura ebyombeko. Abeebembezi b'ebyaro bakakora enkiiko z'okuhanuura aha migasho y'okushanjuura enguuto, kugira ngu zitambure ebiiruka ebirikweyongyera, n'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising in the school after several incidents of misinformation circulated among the students. In a recent meeting, the faculty expressed their frustration over the situation and sought to address the issue.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde mu ssomero oluvannyuma lw'amawulire ag'obulimba okusaasaana mu bayizi. Mu lukiiko olwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, abasomesa baalaga obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'embeera era ne bagezaako okukola ku nsonga eyo.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I gang kwan ne I ngee lok goba mapol ma okato I kin lutino kwan. I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, lupwonye gunyutu cwer cwiny gi i kom ngo matye katimme dok bene guyenyo yoo me cobo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi aiyalongong kosomero ngol akaulo na akiro nuarokok aisiarakin kanejaas esisiak. Kotoma airiamunet napac, apotu esisiak itodutu amamut aiyalama kec kanuka ejautene kangol kosodete aitam aitemokin akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni ri e'bi tu sukulu 'da ma alea e'yo 'bani e'yo onzi 'diyi erezu sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea 'bori ma vutia. Mitingi azi ngapi eturisi ri ma alea, imba'ba eyi e'da e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi e'yo 'di ma dria dika eyi nda e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba bweyongyeire omu eishomero ahanyima y'amahurire g'ebishobobo omu beegi. Omu rukiiko orwabaireho juba, abeegyesa bo boorekire obusaasi bwabo ahabw'embeera egyo, reero basherura eky'okukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: Despite receiving a generous budget for the school year, the administration struggled to allocate resources effectively. Concerns began to arise among the staff and parents regarding the financial decisions being made.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baafuna embalirira ey'omutima omugabi ey'omwaka gw'essomero, abaddukanya essomero baazibuwalirwa okugabanya obulungi ebyetaago. Okweraliikirira kwatandika okuva mu bakozi n'abazadde ku nsonga z'ebyensimbi ezaali zisalibwawo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gunongo byek me lim maber pi mwaka me kwan eni, ludito me gang kwan ne gubedo ki peko me poko lim maber. Lworo ocake ikin lutic ki lunyodo I kom moko tam me lim ma kitye katimo.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu kodumutu ebajet loejok noi loka ekaru loka esomero, abu eyaitene konger aikor iboro ejok. Apotu lu eswamak keda auriak kogeutu aiyalongong kanuikamunitos aseununeta nu ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro otita ajeni eli sukulu niri esuzu drilebaru ra ti, driceza sukulu niri esu e'yo ewaru afa ayuzaru 'diyi awazu geri kililiru si. Asi otiza e'do efu azi'ba eyi ma eselea tipika eyi pie e'yo 'bani e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okutunga embaririra nungi y'omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese, abebembezi b'eishomero bakaremwa kugaba kurungi eby'okukozesa. Okwerarikirira kukatandika kubaho omu bakozi n'abazaire aha bikwatiraine n'okusharamu kw'esente okwabaire nikukorwa.

eng_prompt: After receiving a letter outlining the concerns of several parents, the parent decided to approach the headteacher directly. They felt strongly that the recent policy changes were detrimental to the students' well-being.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna ebbaluwa eraga ebiruma abazadde abawerako, omuzadde yasalawo okutuukirira omukulu w'essomero butereevu. Baalowooza nnyo nti enkyukakyuka mu nkola ezaakolebwa gye buvuddeko zaali za bulabe eri obulamu bw'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo waraga ma nyutu peko pa lunyodo mapol, lanyodo ne omoko tamme me lok ki ladit gangkwan atir. Guwinyo matek ni aloka-loka me cik ma okato cokcok-ki pe ber pi lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun ebaluwa lo elimonorete aiyalongongo naka auriak luipu, abu auriak koseu einer keda apolon esomero. Apotu kesi opupoto noi ebe aijulanakineta nuka ikisila nupac eraas nueroko noi mama ejaasi esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Erini waraga esuzu e'yo asi otiza tipika karakara eyini 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, tipika 'da pe e'yo nzezu dricere eyi be. Eyi ega okporu kini ojata o'diru e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi onzi sukulu anzi eyi ma edri ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga ebaruha erikworeka okwerarikirira kw'abazaire baingi, omuzaire akasharamu kuhika aha mukuru w'eishomero. Bakaba nibateekateeka ngu empindahinduka y'ebiragiro eyabaireho juba, ekaba eri ey'akabi aha magara g'abeegi.

eng_prompt: In order to improve the overall efficiency and effectiveness of the school, it is essential to address the current staffing challenges. Increased personnel can lead to enhanced support for both students and teachers, ultimately fostering a more productive learning environment.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula obulungi n'obwangu bw'essomero okutwalira awamu, kya mugaso okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kw'abakozi mu kiseera kino. Okweyongera kw'abakozi kusobola okuleetawo obuyambi obwongezeddwayo eri abayizi n'abasomesa, mu nkomerero okutumbula embeera y'okusoma ennungi.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me tic pa gang kwan, pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko me tic pa lutic matye kombedi. Medde pa lutic twero weko lutino kwan ki lupwonye nongo kony ma mite dok man weko kwan bedo ber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eswamae loajokan kosomero, ibusakinit aitemokin atiokisio nuka eswamak. Aiyatakinio naka eswamak epedori ayangaun agangat naepol noi mama ejaasi esisiak keda esisianakinak.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza sukulu niri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru e'yo ewaru azi'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu. Azi'ba eyi ma omgbo otuzuri eco fe atita angiri sukulu anzi eyini tualu imba'ba eyini 'diyi dri, dika eri nga angu onita ni muke ndeni ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura omutindo gw'eishomero, n'eky'omugasho kumaraho oburemeezi bw'abakozi oburiho hati. Okwongyera abakozi nikibaasa kureetaho obuhwezi bw'abeegi hamwe n'abegyesa, ekirikureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega.

eng_prompt: Local authorities conducted a surprise inspection of the emergency services fleet. During the audit, they discovered that several ambulances had outstanding tax liabilities.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza mu byalo baakola okukebera okw'ekikangabwa ku bibinja by'abakozi b'amangu. Mu kubala ebitabo, baakizuula nti emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde nnyingi zaali tezisasuddwa misolo.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gutimo tic me ngiyo kit ma lutic me yot kom tye kawot kwede. Ikare me ngiyo kor tic ki lim, gunongo ni mutoka ambulance mapol tye ki mucoro mapud pe kiculu gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet ongicata iboro lu engeso. Kotoma apak naka aingic ikapun, apotu kesi kodumutu ebe ipu amotokan nuadekis lu mam ejaas keda isolosinei luibusakinit aitac.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi andri 'ba azakoma e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma pamvu ra. Sawa 'bani e'yo ndundu eyi ma ale andrizu risi, eyi esu ra kini ambulansi karakara eyi ma dria musoro 'bani ofe ku 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakakora okucondooza okw'omutaano ahabw'obuheereza bw'eby'ahonaaho. Omu kushwijuma, bakashanga ngu za ambyurensi nyingi zikaba ziine emishoro y'okushashura.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of maternal health emergencies, the local health department decided to enhance their emergency services. As part of this initiative, they allocated funds to acquire specialized ambulances.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo ogweyongera ogw'ebyobulamu eby'amangu eri bamaama, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu mu kitundu kyasalawo okwongera ku buweereza bwakyo obw'amangu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, baateekawo ensimbi okugula emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel mon matye ka nongo peko me yot kom ikare me nywal, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom I tedero gumoko tamgi me medo rwom me kony me yot kom ikare me nywal. Macalo but yub man, guketo lim me wilo ambulances mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka adekasinei nu engeso nu angor nu epotiete, abu ewai lo angaleu kotoma atutubet kitogogong ejanakine lo engeso. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, apotu kesi ijaikisi ikapun kanu agwel amotokan nuadekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ayia eyini 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, arakala alata ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du eyi ma azakoma e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, eyi 'ba robia ambulansi wura ndu 'diyi jezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'eby'amagara g'abakazi abaine enda ogweyongyeire, ekitongore ky'eby'amagara kikacwamu kwongyera aha buheereza bwakyo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, bakataho esente z'okugura za ambyurensi ez'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure compliance with local regulations, all vehicle owners must adhere to specific tax obligations. This includes those who operate ambulances, which serve a critical role in emergency services.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa okugobererwa kw'ebiragiro by'ekitundu, bannannyini mmotoka bonna balina okugoberera emisolo egy'enjawulo. Kino kizingiramu abo abaddukanya emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde, ezikola omulimu omukulu mu buweereza bw'amangu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni lutic ki mutoka lubu cik me tedero, wegi mutoka weng omyero gulub cik me mucoro. Man kwako lutic ambulance, ma gitiyo tic mapire tek tutwal I kare me peko ma opoto atura.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe etupitai ikisila luka atutubet, ibusakinit ikulepek amotokan kere atupakinit ikisila luka isolosinei. Imoriaritos ngul lu itolosete amotokan nuadekis, lu iswamaete aswam naepol noi kotoma aijaanakinio naka engeso.
lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini 'ba ma obi azita angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma vuti, le 'ba dria mutukari ipika ru 'diyi ma obi azita musoro ni 'diyi ma vuti. Di ma alia 'ba ambulansi onzupi 'diyi, azi okporu ngapi azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi indi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu ebiragiro by'omubyaro nibikuratirwa, bakama b'ebiiruka boona bashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro by'emishoro. Eki nikitwariramu abo abarikukoresa za ambyurensi, ezirikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu buheereza oburikwetengwa juba.

eng_prompt: In an effort to increase government funding, new regulations have been implemented regarding consumer purchases. As a result, the revenue authority requires a fifty per cent tax from the amount used during purchase.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwongera ku nsimbi gavumenti z'ewaayo, amateeka amapya gateekeddwawo ku bikwata ku bintu abantu bye bagula. N'ekivuddemu, ekitongole ekiwooza ky'omusolo kyetaaga omusolo gwa bitundu ataano ku buli kikumi ku ssente ezikozesebwa mu kugula.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo lim pa gamente, kiketo cik manyen I tic malube ki wilo jami pa luwil. Macalo adwogi ne, dul me revenue authority mito mucoro ma obedo pyer abic iwi miya I kom wel cente ma kitiyo kwede I kare me wilo jami.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aiyatakin apiyai nuka apugan, aponi ibwaikinai ikisila luitetiak nuikamunitos agwel iboro. Kanuka ngun, ekoto erionget loka ikapun isolosinei akaisakany kotoma akwatat luka isirigin luegwelete itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu robia gameteni fe ri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba 'ba azita o'diru 'diyi afa jeza 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, amuti musoro trapi omvele revenue authority ruri le musoro kali towi turu alu dria engazu ongmbo 'bani ayu afa jezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera esente za gavumenti, ebiragiro ebisya bitandikirweho aha bikwatiraine n'okugura ebintu. N'ekyarugiremu, ekitongore ky'emishoro nikishaba omushoro gwa makumi ataano ahari igana kuruga aha sente ezirikukoresibwa omu kugura ebintu.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the budget for the upcoming fiscal year, he inquired about potential savings on essential equipment. The financial advisor explained the various tax exemptions available for emergency services.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embalirira y'omwaka gw'ebyensimbi ogujja, yabuuza ku ngeri y'okukekkereza ku bintu ebikulu. Omuwabuzi w'ebyensimbi yannyonnyodde ku kusonyiyibwa emisolo egy'enjawulo egiriwo ku buweereza obw'amangu.
ach_prompt: Inge ngiyo byek me lim pi mwaka me lim mabino, en openyo pi yoo me gwoko lim I kom jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano. Lamii tam i kom lim otito kit ma gimiyo kwede mucoro mapol ki lutic ma can opoto atura.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ebajet loka ekaru lo ebunit, abu ngesi ingit nuikamunitos aimono ikapun kanu iboro lu itwasamao. Abu ecoran loka ikapun kitetem nuikamunitos ailem isolosinei lu ejaas kanu aijaanakinio na engeso.
lgg_prompt: Erini bajeti eli robiani emupi ri ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri zi geri ecozu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ta mbazu ra 'diyi ma dria. Ba embata fepi e'yo robia ni ma dria ri ece e'yo 'bani 'ba ofezu musoro eyi ma dria ku 'diyi ma dria e'yo azakoma e'yo mbeleru 'diyiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embaririra y'omwaka gw'eby'esente ogurikwija, akabuuza oku barikubaasa kukyendeeza aha byoma ebikuru. Omuhabuzi w'eby'empiiha, akashoboorora emishoro etari emwe n'emwe erikuhebwa obuheereza oburikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: The local authorities have been in discussions with the hospital to address the backlog of emergency vehicles. As a result, they are working on having the ambulances released.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza mu kitundu babadde mu nteeseganya n'eddwaliro okusobola okumalawo ebbula ly'emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde ab'amangu. N'ekyavaamu, bakola okulaba nga ambyulensi zifulumizibwa.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gubedo ka lok ki ot yat me nongo yoo me tic i kom mutoka ma odong angec. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka yele me gonyo ambulance.
teo_prompt: Ineresinei apedorosio nuka atutubet keda adekis aitemokin ationis naka amotokan nu engeso. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aswam kanu alacakin amotokan nuadekis.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'bi e'yo nze arojo eyi pie mutukari azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo esizu. E'yo 'disi, eyi azi nga ambulansi 'da eyi ofuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro, babaire nibagamba n'eirwariro, kugira ngu babaase kukora aha nshonga y'emotoka ezirikurabura abarwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, bariyo nibakora munonga okurekura za ambyurensi.

eng_prompt: After reviewing his financial situation, he realized the importance of settling his debts. Determined to start fresh, he made a commitment to address his obligations.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera ye ey'ebyensimbi, yakitegeera obukulu bw'okusasula amabanja ge. Ng'amaliridde okutandika obuggya, yeewaddeyo okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwe.
ach_prompt: Inge ngiyo kit ma cente mege tye kwede, en oniang ber pa culu banya mege. Macalo ngat ma omoko tamme me cako kwo manyen, en ocikke me timo ticce.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ejauteneke loka ikapun, abu ngesi koany ajokis naka aitac apesenin ke. Keda apodokinit ageunet naitetet, abu ngesi kiswama ainakina aitodolikin aswamuke.
lgg_prompt: Erini i vile e'yo robianiri ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri esu orodri mari erini 'diyi ofezu ra. E'yo asi 'bazu e'dozu o'diru risi, eri owi i e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embeera ye y'esente, akeetegyereza omugasho gw'okushashura amabanja gye. Ahabw'okumariirira kutandika busya, akeehayo kuhikiiriza obujunanizibwa bwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing demand for medical services, the local health department has decided to expand its coverage. As part of this initiative, the ambulances will be taken to rural areas.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu mu kitundu kisazeewo okugaziya obujjanjabi bwakyo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde zijja kutwalibwa mu byalo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me kony me yot kom, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom I tedero omoko tamgi me medo rwom me kony gi. Macalo but yub man, kibicwalo ambulance ne icaro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin eipuda lo amukian, abu erionget loka angaleu kocam aitanyanyar aiboisio ke. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eponio ayangar amotokan nuadekis ocaaloi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu ri ma e'yosi, arakala alatani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga ambulansi 'da eyi ji angu caloru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara, ekitongore ky'eby'amagara omu byaro kyasharamu kwongyera aha buheereza bwakyo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, za ambyurensi niziija kutwarwa omu myanya y'ebyaro.

eng_prompt: In many remote regions, emergency medical services are severely limited, leaving residents vulnerable in critical situations. As a result, timely access to healthcare can become a matter of life and death.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo bingi, obujjanjabi obw'amangu bukendedde nnyo, ne buleka abatuuze mu mbeera embi. N'ekivuddemu, okufuna obujjanjabi mu budde kiyinza okufuuka ensonga y'obulamu n'okufa.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, kony me yot kom me atura nok tutwal, weko lutedero bedo ma goro ikare me peko. Macalo adwogi ne, nongo kony me yot kom con twero doko lok me kwo onyo too.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu nu ocaalo, ikidioko noi amukian na engeso, ijalakini itunga ationis kotoma ojautene loetiono noi. Kanuka ngun, adumunun amukian kotoma apak erai ationis naka aijar keda atwanare.
lgg_prompt: Angu caloru karakara 'diyi ma alia, azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi mbeleru 'diyi ma ongmbo ca ku, erini fezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aa'zu e'yo ewaru ma alea. E'yo 'disi, aro esuzu sa'wa dria ri eco eca e'yo idri ni azini dra niri ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ebingi, obuheereza bw'eby'amagara bukye munonga, ekirikureetera abatuuragye kuba abatarikwebaasa omu mbeera mbi. N'ekyarugiremu, okutunga obujanjabi bukiri kare nikibaasa kuba enshonga y'amagara n'okufa.

eng_prompt: Determined to make a difference in her community, she sought ways to improve emergency services. After researching the needs of local hospitals, she realized that more ambulances were essential for saving lives.
lug_prompt: Ng'amaliridde okuleetawo enjawulo mu kitundu kye, yanoonya engeri y'okutumbula obuweereza bw'amangu. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ku byetaago by'amalwaliro g'omu kitundu, yakizuula nti ambyulensi endala zaali za mugaso mu kutaasa obulamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo ngat ma omoko tamme me kelo aloka-loka I kabedo ne, en oyenyo yoo me ilo malo rwom me miyo kony ma mitte pi peko ma poto atura. Inge kwedo miti pa odi yadi me tedero, en oniang ni ambulance mapol obedo gin ma pire tek me laro kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Apodokinit aitolomun aijulanakineta kotoma atutubeteke, abu ngesi komo iwaitin lu itojokarere ejanakine lo engeso. Akaulo naka aingic ipudesia luka adekisia nuka atutubet, abu ngesi kojen ebe ejokuka noi amotokan nuadekis kanu ayuwar aijar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini lezu ojata ejizu ongulumu erivileri ma alea risi, eri nda geri ecozu azakoma e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo vuti ondaza arojo angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri ma vutia, eri esu ra kini ambulansi eyi ma kalafe angiri ri eri orodriru 'ba eyi ma edri pazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumariirira kukora empindahinduka omukyanga kye, akaronda oburyo bw'okutunguura obuheereza oburikukwata ahaburwaire. Bwanyima y'okucondooza ahabyetaago by'amarwariro g'omubyaro, akeetegyereza ngu za ambyurensi ezindi zikaba ziri ez'omugasho omu kucungura amagara.

eng_prompt: The city officials have finalized the budget for emergency services. As a result, the ambulances will be released before the next year.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ekibuga bamalirizza embalirira y'obuweereza obw'amangu. N'ekinaavaamu, emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde zijja kufulumizibwa omwaka ogujja nga tegunnatuuka.
ach_prompt: Lutela me boma madit gutyeko tyeko byek me lim pi kony ma mitte pi peko ma opoto atura. Macalo adwogi ne, kibi gonyo ambulance mapud mwaka manyen pe oromo.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka esite kongetakisi ebajet loka aijanakino na engeso. Kanuka ngun, eponio alacakin amotokan nuadekis eringa ekaru ngol.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba aku ambu city ni 'diyi de otita ajeni azakoma e'yo mbeleru 'diyiniri 'bo. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga ambulansi 'da eyi ofu de nga po'di eli drusirisi ecani ku.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu rurembo baherize kukora embaririra y'obuheereza oburikwetengwa. Ekyarugiremu, za ambyurensi niziija kushohora omwaka ogurikwija gutakahikire.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the latest regulations regarding emergency vehicles, the committee held a meeting to discuss potential tax exemptions. Following their deliberations, they reached a consensus on the matter.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya amateeka agasembyeyo agakwata ku mmotoka ez'amangu, akakiiko kaatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kusonyiyibwa emisolo. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo kwabwe, baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku nsonga.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo cik manyen makwako motoka ma gitye ka tic i kom peko ma poto atura, dul ne gubedo ki kacoke me nyamo lok me kwanyo mucoro. Ingee tam gi, guwinye I kom lok ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ikisila luitetiak luikamunitos amotokan nu engeso, abu ekomiti iriamunos kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos isolosinei. Akaulo naka ipegeta kec, apotu kesi opotu kanuikamunitos akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: Azita o'diru mutukari azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'da 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'bani ecozu musoro ofeza ma dria ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo yini o'yozu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu ti ecita e'yo nde ma dria ra.

eng_prompt: Concerns have been raised about the transparency of the financial reports. Many stakeholders feel that critical information is being kept from the public.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku bwerufu mu lipoota z'ebyensimbi. Abakwatibwako bangi bawulira nti amawulire amakulu gakwekebwa abantu.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye I kom lok ada I kom adwoki me tic ki lim. Dano mapol gitye ki tam ni ki kano ngec mapigi tego ki bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Aponi itodunai aiyalongong kanu aica naka iripotan luka ikapun. Eomitos itunga luipu ebe ingadao akiro nuepolok kanejaas itunga.

eng_prompt: Active civic engagement is essential for a healthy democracy. One of the most impactful ways individuals can make their voices heard is by voting.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu bujjuvu mu bantu kya nkizo mu demokulasiya omulungi. Engeri emu abantu gye bayinza okuwulirwamu eddoboozi lyabwe kwe kulonda.
ach_prompt: Bedo tye pa lwak obedo gin ma pire tek pi loc alwak. Yo acel maber loyo ma dano acel acel twero weko dwon gi owinye obedo bolo kwir.

lgg_prompt: E'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu Geri azi alu 'ba eyini ecozu o'duko eyivile 'diyi erizu ri voti 'bezuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Okwejumba omu by'obuhangwa n'eky'omugasho omu by'obutegyeki. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kuhwera abantu kuhurikiriza eiraka ryabo n'okuteera akaruuru.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a more inclusive and representative decision-making environment, it is essential to engage all stakeholders in meaningful discussions. Active participation from the government can help facilitate these dialogues and ensure that diverse voices are heard.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula embeera erimu abantu bonna era abakiikirirwa mu kukola okusalawo, kya mugaso okuyingiza abakwatibwako bonna mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amakulu. Okwenyigiramu kwa gavumenti mu bujjuvu kusobola okuyamba okwanguyiza enteeseganya zino n'okukakasa nti amaloboozi ag'enjawulo gawulirwa.
ach_prompt: Me kelo kabedo ma dano weng twero bedo iye ka gitye ka moko tam, pire tek tutwal me weko dano weng gubed tye I nyamo lok matye ki tyen lok. Bedo tye pa gamente twero konyo me neno ni lok mapat-pat weng owinyre.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aiboisit na imoriarit itunga kere kotoma aitolomun aseununeta, ejokuna noi aimorikikin itunga kere toma oineresinei luejokuka. Aswam naepol noi kama ejai apugan epedori aingarakin aitemitem akiro ngun ka awanyun ebe epupokino iporotoi luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Lezu angu 'ba dria ni azini 'ba pa tupi e'yo pezu 'diyi ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru 'ba dria e'yo nze'baa 'diyi 'bazu e'yo nzeza orodriru 'diyi ma alia. E'yo gameteni 'diyi ma azi ngaza okporu ri eco azakoma fe e'yo nzeza 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini nezu ra kini 'ba o'duko ndundu 'diyi eri ra.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kureetaho obusingye oburikworeka abantu boona, n'eky'omugasho kwejumba omu kuhanuura kurungi. Gavumenti okwejumbamu munonga nikibaasa kuhwera omu kugamba n'okureeba ngu eiraka ry'abantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe rihurirwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing conflicts and divisions within the country, leaders from various factions gathered for a crucial summit. Their discussions centered around finding common ground to address the pressing issues facing their nation.
lug_prompt: Olw'obukuubagano n'enjawukana ezigenda mu maaso mu ggwanga, abakulembeze okuva mu bibiina eby'enjawulo baakuŋŋaana mu lukungaana olukulu. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo kwabwe kwazingiramu okunoonya engeri y'okukwatamu ensonga ez'amangu eggwanga lyabwe ze lyolekaganye nazo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lweny ki apoka-poka matye kawot anyim I lobo Uganda, lutela ma aa ki I dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat gugure pi coko mo ma pire tek tutwal. Nywako lok meggi obedo I kom nongo yoo me cobo peko matye I lobo gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta keda atiakatiaka kotoma akwapuwok, apotu engarenok luka atukona nuegelegela kotukokinos kanu airiamunet naepol noi. Apotu kesi kinerata nuikamunitos adumun epone ediope loka aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok nuetereikina keda akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri azini esele coza mupi drile kari ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba engapi amuti ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tra eyi mitingi okporu ni ma alea. E'yo nzeza yiniri 'ba asi e'yo ti icita esuzu e'yo okporu kari yini dri fuzu yi be 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko n'okwebaganisamu ebirikugyenda omu maisho omu ihanga, abeebembezi kuruga omu bibiina bitari bimwe baketeeranira hamwe omu rukiiko rw'amaani. Okuhanuura kwabo kukaba kukwatiraine n'okusherura oburyo bw'okukora aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa eihanga ryabo.

eng_prompt: Empowering women in society is crucial for achieving gender equality. One important way to foster this empowerment is by encouraging their active involvement in decision-making activities, such as voting and running for office.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula abakyala mu kitundu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutuukiriza omwenkanonkano mu kikula ky'abantu. Engeri emu ey'okutumbula enkulaakulana eno kwe kubakubiriza okwenyigira mu kukola okusalawo, nga okulonda n'okwesimbawo.
ach_prompt: Miyo twero ki mon obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni mon ki coo tye marom. Yo acel ma pire tek me medo kero man obedo cuku cwiny gi me bedo tye ikare me moko tam, calo bolo kwir ki cung I yer.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong angor kotoma atutubet erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin airiamara naka ikiliok keda angor. Epone ediope loajokan loka aitopolor apedor na ngesi aisinyikokit kesi ajaut toma aswamisinei nuiswamaete, kwape aseo keda aibwo.
lgg_prompt: Okpo feza oku eyini ongulumu eyi ma alea ri eri orodriru e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri esuzu. Geri azi okporu 'bani ecozu okpo fezu 'diri ma omgbo otuzu ri eri yini ava fezu fizu e'yo peta pezu 'diyi ma alia ekile voti 'bezu azini pa tuzu ofisi eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura abakazi omu byanga n'eky'omugasho omu kuhikiiriza oburinganiza. Omuringo gumwe ogw'omugasho gw'okureetaho amaani n'okubahiga kwejumba omu by'okucwamu, nk'okuteera akaruuru n'okwesimbaho.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous discussions and meetings, the team struggled to reach a consensus on their goals. As a result, they didn't get accountability for the dialogue.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'enkiiko ennyingi, ttiimu yafuba okutuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku bigendererwa byayo. N'ekyavaamu, tebaafuna mbalirira y'enteeseganya.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ka lok ki kacokke mapol, dul ne onongo tek tutwal me winye i kom miti gi. Macalo adwogi ne, pe gunongo kor tic pi lok ma obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu ineresinei keda airiamununeta nuipu, apotu etimu kongicata adolokin acamanar kanu apeleikinata kec. Kanuka ngun, mam kesi apotu odumutu eipone lo itwasamatere nuka aineranara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini mitingi karakara 'diyi ma talasi, amuti 'da esu ewaru ti ecizu e'yo eyini lele 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi awini geri 'bani e'yo nzezu eyi ma eselea ri esu kuye.
nyn_prompt: Oyihireho okuhanuura n'enkiiko nyingi, tiimu ekaremwa kwikirizana aha bigyendererwa byayo. N'ekyarugiremu, tibaratungire embaririra y'okuteisa.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and change, it is crucial for institutions to guide and support their communities. Effective governance can foster collaboration and innovation across various sectors.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'enkyukakyuka, kikulu nnyo ebitongole okulambika n'okuwagira ebitundu byabwe. Enfuga ennungi esobola okutumbula enkolagana n'obuyiiya mu bitongole eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki aloka-loka, pire tek tutwal ki dul mapat-pat me miyo tira ki kony bot lwak gi. Tela maber twero kelo ribbe ki diro manyen I tenge mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus ajenanut keda aijulanakineta, erai ibore yenepol noi kanu iriongeta aingarenikin ka aigang itunga kec. Epedori epugae loajokan aitopolor aiswamanara keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak kotoma atutubena nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini ojata ni 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru amuti eyini imbata fezu azini atita fezu ongulumu eyivile 'diyini. Driceza kililiru ri eco ti ecita azini ondua o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo otu esele ndundu eyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutegyendesereza n'empinduka, nikikuru ebitongore kuhabura n'okuhagira abantu baabo. Obwebembezi burungi nibubaasa kureetaho okukwatanisa n'okujumbura omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing economic crisis, officials have convened to discuss potential solutions. After extensive deliberation, they have concluded that immediate financial support is necessary.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyenfuna obugenda mu maaso, abakungu batuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ensonga. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, batuuse ku kusalawo nti obuyambi bw'ensimbi obw'amangu bwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me can lim matye kawot anyim, lutic gubedo ka lok me neno yoo me tyeko peko eni. Ingee tam matut, gumoko ni kony me lim mite oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka ikapun nu elosi akonye, apotu eswamak iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itemokinet. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu kesi ongetakisi ebe ekotoi agangat na ikapun katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani mupi drile 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu egata kini atita robia ni mbeleru ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya oburiho hati, abakuru bakwatanise kuhanuura aha nshonga ezirikubaasa kugonjoorwa. Bwanyima y'okuteesa munonga, baherize kuhendera ngu obuhwezi bw'esente nibwetaagwa.

eng_prompt: As the crisis unfolded, political leaders struggled to find common ground on how to address the growing concerns. Tensions escalated as various factions pointed fingers at each other for the lack of effective solutions.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera, abakulembeze b'ebyobufuzi baafuba okulaba engeri y'okukwataganamu ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu okweraliikirira okwali kweyongera. Obunkenke bweyongedde ng'ebiwayi eby'enjawulo bisonga engalo ku birala olw'obutaba na ngeri nnungi ya kugonjoolamu nsonga.
ach_prompt: I kare ma peko ne tye ka time, lutela me cungu iwi-bye gubedo ka yele me nongo yoo me cobo peko matye kamede. Lworo omede ikare ma dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat gucako lok i kom luwotgi pi peko me nongo yoo me cobo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Neautar ationis ngin atakanun, apotu engarenok luka politikis kongetakisi adumun acamanar kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuapolok. Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai apotu igurupun luegelegela kitoronata luce kanu amamus na aitemokin ationis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'da ni i e'doria, drice'ba politiki ni 'diyi 'ye e'yo eyi ma eselea geri eyini ecozu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu ri esuzu. E'yo erita ako ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu amuti ndundu eyi ma eselea eyini eyi ma dria e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kililiru ri ma ako si.
nyn_prompt: Obutabanguko ku bwabaire nibweyongyera, abebembezi b'eby'obutegyeki bakarwana kuronda oburyo bw'okukora aha nshonga ezirikweyongyera. Obunkenke bukongyera ahabw'ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebitarikushushana okwetomboita ahabwa obutabaho oburyo burungi bw'okutereeza oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: As political campaigns ramp up and candidates begin to announce their intentions, the nation is bracing for a pivotal moment in its democratic process. Voter engagement and key issues are already becoming hot topics of discussion among citizens and analysts alike.
lug_prompt: Kampeyini z'ebyobufuzi bwe zigenda zeeyongera era abeesimbyewo ne batandika okulangirira ebigendererwa byabwe, eggwanga lyetegekera akaseera akakulu mu nkola yaayo eya demokulasiya. Okukwataganya abalonzi n'ensonga enkulu zaakubaganyizibwako ebirowoozo mu bannansi n'abakugu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma bito kwir me cungu iwi bye tye kawot anyim ki lucungu me cako tito miti gi, lobo man tye ka yubbe pi kare ma pire tek tutwal I tela pa lwak. Bedo tye pa lubol kwir kacel ki lok mapigi tego dong odoko lok ma anywali kacel ki ludiro tye ka lok iye tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape eutasi ikampeins aibwo kosodete abwoak alimor apeleikinata kec, euta akwap aitemonokin kanuka apakio nuepolok noi nuka aseo naka itunga. Aitolomio naka aseak keda akiro nuepolok eraas nu ineritere itunga keda angicak.
lgg_prompt: Ti odaza politiki ni 'diyi ni e'doria azini 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ni e'doria e'yo yini lele 'diyi ecezu, kari 'di ni i otuta 'ye e'yo okporu ni ma alia. E'yo 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma ti ojizu azini e'yo okporu 'diyi e'do curu'do e'yo nze 'ba kari anzi eyi ma eselea 'ba e'yo ama'baa 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oburuuru bw'eby'obutegyeki ku burikugyenda omu maisho kandi abetsimbireho batandika kurangirira ebigyendererwa byabo, eihanga nireteekateekyera obwire bukuru omu by'obugabe bw'okusharamu. Okukwatanisa kw'abateezi b'akaruuru hamwe n'eshonga nkuru zitandikire kugambwaho munonga abatuuragye hamwe n'abacencuzi.

eng_prompt: In light of the numerous irregularities reported during the recent elections, the panel convened to assess the situation. After thorough deliberation, the Court advised that the electoral process is revised.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutali bwenkanya obw'amaanyi obwaliwo mu kulonda okwakaggwa, akakiiko kaatuula okwekenneenya embeera. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, kkooti yawa amagezi nti enkola y'okulonda erina okuddamu okwetegerezebwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tim maraco mapol ma otimme I kare me yer ma okato cokcok-ki, dul enoni obedo tye me neno ngo matye katimme. Ingee tam matut, court omiyo tam ni myero kilok yoo me yer odoco.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuarokok nuipu lu elimonorio kotoma aseo napac, apotu itunga luingaranakinete luce iriamunos airereor ejautene. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, abu ekooti kicorak ebe ibusakinit airereor ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo e'yo onzi 'bani olu opeta ebipi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma e'yosi, amuti 'da tra i e'yo nde ma ale andrizu. E'yo nzeza dria ma vutia, dwani fe imbata kini 'ba ma oja geri opetaa ni 'diyi ma ale dika.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obushomankuzi bwingi obwarangirwe omu karuuru akahweireho, akakiiko kaketaba kushwijuma embeera. Bwanyima y'okuteesa munonga, kooti ekahabura ngu enkora y'eby'oburuuru egarukiremu.

eng_prompt: In light of the upcoming elections, local officials are emphasizing the importance of civic engagement. Active participation in the democratic process is crucial for ensuring that every voice is heard.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kulonda okubindabinda, abakungu b'ebyalo bassa essira ku bukulu bw'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu. Okwenyigira ennyo mu nkola ya demokulasiya kya nkizo okulaba nti buli ddoboozi liwulirwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki yer matye kabino anyim, lutic me tedero tye ka cuko cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa bedo tye pa lwak. Bedo tye I yub me tela pa lwak pire tek tutwal me neno ni dwon pa dano weng ki winyo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aseo naebunit, isinyikokitos eswamak luka atutubet ajokis naka aiswamanar keda itunga. Ajaut toma ainapeta nuka aseo erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe epupio iporotoi kere.
lgg_prompt: Opeta emupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi okpo 'ba e'yo o'bi eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'bani fizu e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma alea okporu ri eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba dria ma o'duko eri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburuuru oburikwija, abakuru b'ebyaro nibashagika omugasho gw'okwejumba omu by'obutegyeki. Okwejumba omu by'obugabe bw'abantu n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu buri jwi ryahurirwa.

eng_prompt: The direction and values of a community are shaped by those in power. Effective leadership can inspire progress, while poor leadership can lead to stagnation and decline.
lug_prompt: Abo abali mu buyinza be bakola enkola n'empisa z'ekitundu. Obukulembeze obulungi busobola okuleetawo enkulaakulana, ate obukulembeze obubi busobola okuleetawo okuyimirira n'okukendeera.
ach_prompt: Joo matye ki twero aye giyubu yoo me kwo ki ber bedo pa lwak. Lutela mabeco twero kelo dongo lobo, ento tela marac twero kelo poto pa lobo.
teo_prompt: Aingarenikinio keda iponesio luka itunga kes itolomunenete ngul luejaasi toma apugan. Epedori engarenone loajokan ayangaun apol, konye epedori engarenone loaronon ayangaun aibiror keda aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Ba opi dria 'diyi driceza ongulumu ni azini e'yo onyiru ongulumu ni 'diyi o'ba ni. Driceza kililiru ri eco angu ezoma eji ra, te driceza onzi ri eco fe e'deta azini e'deta ni.
nyn_prompt: Obuhabuzi n'emitwarize y'abantu nibikorwa abo abari omu bwebembezi. Obwebembezi burungi nibubaasa kureeta entunguuka, kwonka obwebembezi bubi nibubaasa kurugwamu okugwa.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the power to influence governance lies in the hands of the citizens. By participating in the electoral process, individuals can hold their leaders accountable and drive positive change.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obuyinza okukyusa enfuga buli mu mikono gya bannansi. Abantu kinnoomu bwe beetaba mu kulonda, basobola okuvunaana abakulembeze baabwe n'okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ennungi.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, twero me doro tela tye I cing anywali. Ki bedo tye I yub me bolo kwir, dano acel acel twero penyo lutela gi pi adwogi tic gi ki kelo aloka loka maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, apedor naka aijulakin epugae ejai toma akanin nuka itunga. Kowai lo ajaikina toma ainapeta nuka aseo, epedorete itunga aingitun engarenok kec aitodolikin aijulakineta.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, okpo e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ojazu ri kari anzi eyi ma dria. E'yo fizu e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea risi, 'ba eyi eco drice'ba eyivile 'diyi 'du e'yo eyi ma dria ra dika eyi eco ojata kililiru 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, obushoborozi bw'okuhindura obwebembezi buri omu mikono y'abatuuragye. Abantu nibeejumba omu by'oburuuru, nibabaasa kureetera abebembezi baabo kukora empindahinduka nungi.

eng_prompt: In a democratic system, it is essential for leaders to operate with transparency and integrity. This ensures that they uphold the principles of fair governance and public trust.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola ya demokulasiya, kikulu nnyo abakulembeze okukola mu bwerufu n'obwesimbu. Kino kikakasa nti bakuuma emisingi gy'obukulembeze obw'obwenkanya n'obwesige bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: I tela pa lwak, pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero gutii ki ada. Man weko gigwoko cik me tela maber ki gen pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apugan naka itunga, ejokuna noi engarenok aswam koipone kalo ecai. Einakini ngin kesi awanyun ebe etupitos kesi ainapeta nuka epugae loajokan keda amuno naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo democracia niri ma alea, eri orodriru drice'ba eyini azi ngazu e'yo ada be azini e'yo ada be. Diri ne ra kini yi e'yo driceza kililiru azini asi'baza o'biyini 'diyi ma ta mba.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, niky'omugasho abebembezi kukoresa amazima n'obwesigwa. Eki nikihamya ngu nibakuratira emisingye y'obwebembezi burungi hamwe n'obwesigye bw'abantu.

eng_prompt: In any organization, the success of a team relies on the contributions of each individual. This collective effort highlights a fundamental truth about leadership dynamics.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, obuwanguzi bwa ttiimu businziira ku ebyo buli omu by'akola. Kaweefube ono ow'awamu alaga amazima amakulu agakwata ku nkulaakulana y'obukulembeze.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, loc pa dul tic jenge I kom tic pa ngat acel acel. Tute pa lwak man nyutu lok ada ma pire tek I kom tela.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget ediokere, akerianut naka etimu itodunit aswam naka nginitunganan. Aswam na naka aimorikikina itodunit abeit naepol noi naikamunit eipone lo engarenone.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria ma alea, drile suza amuti ni 'diyi niri ati e'yo 'ba alu alu ni 'diyi ni 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Okpo ti icita ni 'diri e'da e'yo azi okporu e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona, obusinguzi bwa tiimu nibwegamira aha buheereza bwa buri omwe. Omurimo ogu ogw'okukorera hamwe, nigureeta amazima agarikukwata aha ntwaza y'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy hearing, the judge decided to consider the circumstances surrounding the case. As a result, the officials were granted bail.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira omusango okumala ekiseera ekiwanvu, omulamuzi yasalawo okulowooza ku nsonga ezaali zeetoolodde omusango. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu baateebwa ku kakalu ka kkooti.
ach_prompt: Ingee winyo lok pi kare malac, langol kop omoko tamme me neno ngo ma otimme I kom lok ne. Macalo adwogi ne, ki yee ki lutic ne me bedo mabuc mawoko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apupio na apak naepol, abu ekatubon koseu airereor akiro nuikamunitos emusago ngol. Kanuka ngun, aponi kolacakinai eswamak alacakinio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erizuri ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri asi e'yo 'du e'yo kesi 'da ma driari ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ofu azi'ba 'da eyi arujoa risi.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuhurira omushango kumara obwire buraingwa,omuramuzi akasharamu kushwijuma embeera eyabaire eriho omu mushango. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru bakemerezibwa kwemerererwa.

eng_prompt: During their investigation into the mysterious financial transactions, the team uncovered a series of documents that hinted at the banker’s true identity. As they delved deeper, they realized that the clues pointed to a surprising origin.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonyereza kwabwe ku nkolagana y'ensimbi ez'ekyama, ttiimu yazuula ebiwandiiko ebiwerako ebiraga omuntu wa bbanka omutuufu. Nga bwebasima mu buziba, bakitegedde nti obujulizi bulaga ensibuko eyewunyisa.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kwedgi I kom lok me lim ma pe niange, dul ne gunongo karatac mapol ma onyuto ngat ma lagwok lim enoni obedo. I kare ma gudonyo matut tutwal, guniang ni lanyut ne onyuto kama aa ki ie.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic kec nuikamunitos akiro nuka ikapun, apotu etimu kodumutu apapulai nuipu nuelimonokinete nuikamunitos akiro nuka abeit nuka aingadis naka ikapun. Neautar kesi aingic, apotu kesi kojenutu ebe apotu akiro ngun itodunitos ageunet na itegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Sawa eyini e'yo vuti ondazu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria, amuti 'da esu kokobi karakara eyi e'dapi 'ba ero robia ta mbapi 'da ma e'yo a'da ri ma dria. Yi ni ecaria aliru, eyi esu ra kini e'yo 'da eyi e'da e'yo ndundu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kucondooza kwabo, tiimu ekatunga ebihandiiko bingi ebirikworeka omuntu w'omukozi wa banka. Kubarayeyongyeire kucondooza, bakareeba ngu obuhame bukareetaho oburugo oburikutangaaza.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, a group of masked assailants stormed the financial district. The city was on high alert as rumors of a planned kidnapping began to circulate.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri ey'entiisa, ekibinja ky'abamenyi b'amateeka abaali bambadde masiki baalumba disitulikiti y'ebyensimbi. Ekibuga kyali ku bunkenke ng'olugambo olukwata ku kuwamba abantu lutandise okusaasaana.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, gurup pa lunek ma oruko labo dog ki um omonyo dictrik me lim. Lobo ne obedo ma wanggi twolo tutwal I kare ma lok angeya me mako dano ocako wot.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka iboro, abu egurupu loka itunga luapotu ikumes keda aituk kolukutu aiboisit naka ikapun. Ajaasi esite keda acoa naepol noi naarai apotu akiro nuikamunitos aikamanario naka itunga kogeutu alosit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alia, ongulumu 'ba osu'ba afa andreti a'buzuri be 'diyi fi distrikiti robianiri ma alia. Aku ambo 'da ri mile be e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi oguzu ri ma dria ri ni e'doria.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, guruupu y'abantu abarikukoresa za masiki bakatahirira disiturikiti y'eby'empiiha. Orurembo rukaba rweteekateekire munonga ahabw'orugambo rw'okubuzaho abantu.

eng_prompt: In order to proceed with the loan application, the borrowers were informed of the necessary requirements. After reviewing their financial history, the bank officials determined that additional measures were needed to mitigate risk.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okugenda mu maaso n'okusaba looni, abeewola baategeezebwa ku byetaago ebyetaagisa. Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza ebyafaayo by'ensimbi zaabwe, abakungu ba bbanka baasalawo nti waliwo ebirala ebyetaaga okukolebwa okukendeeza ku bulabe.
ach_prompt: Pi mede ki penyo pi den, ki niango joo ma odeno lim I kom jami ma mite. Ingee ngiyo lok kom limgi, lutic me beng gumoko ni omyero kimed jami mukene me dwoko piny rwom me peko ma twero bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kanu ainyikokin ailip ilonin, aponi olimokinai lu ekopunai iboro lu ekotoi. Akaulo naka airereor akiro nuikamunitos ikapunukec, apotu eswamak luka aingadis naka ikapun kotemasi ebe ibusakinit kesi aitikitik ationis.
lgg_prompt: Bani ani muzu drile e'yo mari a'izuri be, 'ba lu 'ba mari 'dupi 'diyi dri e'yo 'bani lele 'diyi ma dria ra. Azi'ba ero robia ta mbazu 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma 'du e'yo azi eyi dika ecozu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kugumizamu n'okushaba za rooni, abarikweguza bakamanyisibwa ebirikwetengwa. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyafaayo by'esente zaabo, abakuru omu banka bakasharamu ngu hariho ebindi ebirikwetengwa kukyendeeza akabi.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation into corruption and bribery, law enforcement officials executed a series of raids at the government offices. Evidence gathered during the operation led to the shocking arrests of several high-ranking officials.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene ku buli bw'enguzi n'okugulirira, abakwasisa amateeka baakola ebikwekweto ebiwerako ku woofiisi za gavumenti. Obujulizi obwakung'aanyiziddwa mu kikwekweto kyaviirako okukwatibwa kw'abakungu ab'oku ntikko ab'enjawulo mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac I kom camcana ki bito dano, lutic me cik gutimo mony mapol I opic pa gamente. Caden ma onongo ikare me tic man oweko kimako lutic madongo mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic apak naepol noi nuikamunitos amidicio naka apiyai keda ecamusana, apotu ipolisin kiswamata iboro luipu kotoma oyapesin luka apugan. Ajenanut naetukunitai kotoma aswamisioit ngin abu koyangau aikamanario naka eswamak luapolok luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza sawa ezu e'yo anyamgbolo ni azini ti raza niri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi 'ye amvuta karakara eyi ofisi gamete ni 'diyi ma alea. Eꞌyo ꞌbani esu sawa ꞌbani eꞌyo ꞌyezu ꞌda ma alea ꞌdiyi fe ꞌbani ꞌba karakara azi ngapi uru ꞌdiyi obizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kumara obwire buraingwa aha bushomankuzi n'enguzi, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakakora embundu nyingi aha ofiisi za gavumenti. Obujurizi obwarundainwe omu kikwekweto, bukareetera okukwatwa kw'abakungu baingi ab'amaani.

eng_prompt: Despite the ongoing investigation into their activities, the legal team has determined that the bankers followed all necessary protocols upon their arrival. As a result, the bankers can't be charged with illegal entry into the country.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'okunoonyereza ku bikolwa byabwe kugenda mu maaso, ab'amateeka bakizudde nti aba bbanka baagoberera emitendera gyonna egyetaagisa nga batuuse. N'ekyavaamu, abakozi ba bbanka tebasobola kuvunaanibwa gwa kuyingira mu ggwanga mu bumenyi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kwed tye kawot anyim i kom tic gi, dul pa lupilida gumoko ni lutic me bank gu lubu cik weng ma mite ikare ma guo. Macalo adwogi ne, pe kitwero ngolo kop iwi lutic me bank pi donyo ilobo man iwi alii.
teo_prompt: Karaida elosi akonye aingic aswamisinei kec, etodunit etimu loka ikisila ebe apotu itunga luka aingadis naka ikapun kotupata ainapeta kere nuibusakinit kesi aitup akaulo na adolere. Kanuka ngun, mam epedorio aitepesen eswamak luka aingadis naka ikapun kanu alomar toma akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza yini mu drile 'yeta yini ma dria ra ti, amuti azitani 'diyi esu ra kini 'ba ero robia ta mbazani 'diyi obi azita dria lele 'diyi ma vuti yini ecazu 'bori ma vutia. E'yo 'disi, 'ba econi 'ba azi ngapi erojo'a 'diyi ombe e'yo yini fizu kari ma alia azita palaa ku 'diyisi ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho okucondooza okurikugyenda omu maisho aha mirimo yaabo, ab'ebiragiro bashangire ngu abakozi ba banka bakagyendera aha biragiro ku baahikire. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozi ba banka tibarikubaasa kujunaanwa okutaaha omu ihanga bataine rusa.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations and legal proceedings, the ownership of the estate was finally resolved. As a result, the property has been transferred to the banker's name.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'enteeseganya n'okutwalibwa mu kkooti, obwannannyini ku ttaka bwasembayo okugonjoolwa. N'ekyavaamu, eby'obugagga bikyusiddwa ne bitwalibwa mu linnya lya bbanka.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me winye ki winyo lok pa lupilida, kimoko ni ngom eni obedo pa anga. Macalo adwogi ne, jami ne kikobo I nying latic me bank.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ipegeta keda imusagon luka ikisila, aponi kongicunai ikulepek alupok. Kanuka ngun, aponi ijularai iboro ngun toma okiror loka aingadis naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia e'yo otuzu azini e'yo liza azita palaa 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba asi 'bo e'yo angu 'da ma eipika niri ma aza ko. E'yo 'disi, 'ba oja lonyi 'da eyi agu erojo ni 'da ma rusi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteisa hamwe n'okuteisa omu biragiro, obugabe bw'eitaka bukakorwaho. N'ekyarugiremu, eitaka rihindwirwe omu maziina ga banka.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the project requirements, the team gathered all necessary paperwork. They ensured everything was in order before submission.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyetaago bya pulojekiti, ttiimu yakuŋŋaanyizza ebiwandiiko byonna ebyetaagisa. Baakakasizza nti buli kimu kiri mu nteeko nga tebannaba kuwaayo.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor iboro lu ekotoi kanu epurojekt, apotu etimu kitukokinos apapulai kere nu ekotoi. Apotu kesi koanyutu ebe ejokuna akiro kere eringa einakina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita 'da ni le 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra kokobi dria lele 'diyi. Eyi ndre ra kini e'yo dria 'diyi otuta ma alea raka de nga po'di eyi awini eyi fe ku.

eng_prompt: Authorities have been monitoring the suspect's activities for weeks. Evidence has surfaced indicating that he has violated several local laws.

eng_prompt: As the storm approached, the townspeople gathered around their radios, anxiously awaiting updates. Suddenly, the static cleared, and the familiar voice of the announcer filled the air.
lug_prompt: Omuyaga bwe gwasembera, abantu b'omu kibuga baakuŋŋaanira ku laadiyo zaabwe nga balindirira amawulire. Amangu ago, akasattiro kaggwaawo, era eddoboozi erimanyiddwa ery'omulangira lyajjula empewo.

teo_prompt: Neyapiete ekwam, apotu itunga luka eibuga kimorikikinos aiboisio nuka iredionukec, aidar akiro nuitetiak. Apotu itunga luka atutubet kotwakiasi katipet, ido apotu iporotoi luka einer kilelebunos kokwam kere.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'di ni ecaria, 'ba tawuni 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi ma radio eyi ma ageyia, eyini te e'yo eyi ma dria asi driasi. Sawa 'disi, o'duko e'dapi 'da ma o'duko 'ba e'yo nzepi 'da ma o'duko ni ri ga angu ma alea dria.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the agenda and the participants involved, it became clear that proper protocols had not been followed. Consequently, the scheduled meeting was deemed illegal.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enteekateeka n'abo abeenyigiddemu, kyazuuka nti emitendera emituufu tegyagobererwa. N'ekyavaamu, olukungaana olwali lutegekeddwa lwatwalibwa ng'olutali mu mateeka.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo jami ma omyero kitim ki joo ma obedo tye, onen atyer kamaleng ni pe ki lubu cik ma mite. Macalo adwogi ne, kacokke ma onongo kiyubu ni kitero calo ma turu cik.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ainapeta keda itunga luejaas toma, aponi kojenunai ebe mam atupakinitai ainapeta. Kanuka ngun, aponi oyangarai airiamunet ngin kwape namam ekisil ecamunit.

eng_prompt: During the recent school board meeting, several concerns were raised regarding the current state of administration. As a result, a communication was prepared to inform parents about the situation.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'olukiiko olufuzi olw'essomero olwaliwo gyebuvuddeko awo, okweraliikirira kungi kwaleetebwa ku mbeera y'obukulembeze eriwo kati. N'ekyavaamu, obubaka bwateekebwawo okutegeeza abazadde ku mbeera.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke pa dul madoro gang kwan ma okato cokcok-ki, lok mapol okatti I kom kit ma gamente tye kawot kwede kombedi. Macalo adwogi ne, kiyubu lok mo me niango lunyodo i kom ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka atukot naka esomero napac, aponi kitodiarai aiyalongongo naepol kanuikamunitos ejautene loka eyaitene loakwana. Kanuka ngun, aponi kitemokinai einer kanu aitijenikin auriak nuikamunitos ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi sukulu ma driceza ni o'diru ri ma alea, 'ba nze asi otiza karakara eyi e'yo driceza ni curu'do ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ede e'yo nzeza 'ba eyi ma tipika eyini e'yo 'da ma dria.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated during the negotiation, leading to heated arguments among the participants. When one party felt threatened, they decided to involve law enforcement to ensure their safety.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde mu nteeseganya, ekiviiriddeko okukaayana okw'amaanyi mu beetabye mu nteeseganya. Ekibiina ekimu bwe kyawulira nga kitiisibwatiisibwa, kyasalawo okuyingizaamu abakuumaddembe okukakasa obukuumi bwakyo.
ach_prompt: Lworo omede ikare me winye ma okelo daa ikin joo ma obedo tye. I kare ma dul me cungu iwi-bye acel owinyo lworo, gumoko tamgi me tic ki abili me gwoko ber bedo gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos kapak naka ipegeta, ido abu koyangau engunget loepol noi kanejaas itunga. Neapupia ediopetunganan ebe ekuriaka, apotu kesi itolomutu ipolisin kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ma omgbo tu sa'wa 'bani e'yo otuzu ri ma alea, erini fezu agbatara okporu 'ba fi'ba 'diyi ma eselea. Amuti alu ni e'yo erizurisi, eyi ai 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi nezu ra kini eyi ma agei tema ci.

eng_prompt: In light of recent concerns regarding student performance and resource allocation, the members of the school management committee felt it was essential to convene. They believed that a meeting would provide an opportunity to address these pressing issues collaboratively.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira okwaliwo gye buvuddeko ku bikwata ku nkola y'abayizi n'okugaba eby'obugagga, abakiise ku kakiiko akaddukanya essomero baalowooza nti kyali kyetaagisa okutuula. Baalowooza nti olukungaana lwandiwadde omukisa okukola ku nsonga zino ez'amangu nga bakolagana.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lworo ma obedo tye cokcok-ki I kom kit ma lutino tye katimo kwede ki kit ma ki poko kwede lim, lumemba me dul madoro gang kwan guwinyo ni pire tek tutwal me bedo tye. Gin onongo gitye ki niyee ni kacoke eni obi kelo gum me tic i kom peko magi kacel.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos eswamae loajokan lo esisiak keda aikor iboro, apotu imeeban luka ekomiti loka eyaitene loka esomero kowomitos ebe ibusakinit airiamun. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ebuni airiamunet ainakin arereng naka aitemokin atiokisio nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza o'diru sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma dria azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma awaza ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, komiti sukulu ma driceza ni 'diyi ega kini eri orodriru eyi trazu. Yi a'i ra kini mitingi ni nga drileba fe e'yo okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu tualu.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into the recent security breach, it became clear that several key personnel had neglected their responsibilities. As a result, the decision was made to take immediate action against those involved.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku bubbi bw'eby'okwerinda obwaliwo gye buvuddeko, kyazuuka nti abantu abakulu bangi baali balagajjalidde obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe. N'ekyavaamu, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu ku abo abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut I kom bal me gwoko kuc ma otime cokcok-ki, onen atyer kamaleng ni ludito mapol gu cayo tic gi. Macalo adwogi ne kimoko tam me timo gin mo I kom joo ma otimo bal eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuikamunitos abilibilio naka ayuwara, aponi kojenunai ebe apotu itunga luipu luapolok apalunit aswamukec. Kanuka ngun, aponi kitolomunai aseunet naka aswam katipet mama ejaasi ngul luejaasi toma.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru e'yo ewaru e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini 'ba okporu karakara eyi adi azi eyivile 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'du e'yo 'duzu 'ba e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma rua indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga ebyabaireho omu by'okwerinda, kikarebeka butunu ngu abantu abakuru abaingi bakaba barekyeire aho obujunanizibwa bwabo. N'ekyarugiremu,ekiteiso kikakorwa kukora ahonaaho ahari abo abaabaire bejumbiremu.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have uncovered troubling financial discrepancies within the district. Whistleblowers have come forward with allegations of mismanagement and misuse of resources.

ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka me lim matye I district. Jo ma cwalo lok angeya bot gamente gukelo adot me nywaro tic ki lim.
