ach_prompt: Dul ne onongo peko me lim madit tutwal ma oweko pe obedo ki kero me tic maber. Macalo adwogi ne, lumemba gunyuto lworo I kom kero gi me cobo tic gi.
teo_prompt: Abu erionget kodum atiokisio nu ikapun nu abu kimik aswam ke ejok. Kanuka ngun, apotu imeban itodutu aiyalongongikec kanu aitodolikin aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da esu e'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi erini ecozu azi ngazu kililiru ku 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, memba eyi ece asi otiza eyini ecozu eyi ma azi eyi 'yezu ra ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kikashanga oburemeezi bwingi omu by'empiiha, ekyaremesize emirimo yakyo kukora kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu, ba memba bakoreka okwerarikirira ahabw'okubaasa kwabo kuhikiiriza obujunanizibwa bwabo.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the financial records, the auditors discovered several discrepancies. They noted that a significant sum had been taken from the account without any corresponding documentation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko by'ebyensimbi, ababalirizi b'ebitabo baazuula ebikyamu bingi. Baategedde nti ssente nnyingi zaali ziggyiddwa ku akawunta nga tewali biwandiiko bikwatagana.
ach_prompt: I ngee ngiyo rekod me lim, ludiro ma ngiyo kor tic ki lim gunongo jami mapol ma pe tye kakare. Guwaco ni kikwanyo cente madit tutwal ki I account enoni labongo coc mo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun, apotu engican kodumutu iboro luipu lumam iswamaete ejok. Apotu kesi kowanyutu ebe aponi kolemunai ikapun luipu kotoma aingadis naka ikapun komamei aiwadikaeta nuikamunitos ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andri'baa 'diyi esu e'yo eyi ma esele cozu ku 'diyi karakara. Eyi esu kini 'ba enze robia angiri engazu akawunti 'da ma alea kokobi e'dapi e'yo nde ma dria 'diyi kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko by'esente, ababazi b'ebitabo bakareeba ebitarikuhikaana. Bakareeba ngu esente nyingi zikaba zaihirwe aha akawunti bateine bihandiiko ebirikuhikaana nabyo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments and ongoing concerns within the community, the leadership team has decided to convene. This gathering aims to address pressing matters affecting our region.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira okugenda mu maaso mu kitundu, ttiimu y'obukulembeze esazeewo okutuula. Olukungaana luno lugendererwamu kukola ku nsonga ez'amangu eziruma ekitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki peko matye ikin lwak, lutela gumoko tamgi me rwatte. Kacokke man tye ki miti me lok I kom peko matye I twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuiswamasi pac keda aiyalongongo naka itunga, abu etimu loka engarenok ocam airiamun. Alosikinet naka airiamunet kana erai aitemitem akiro nuepolok nuetiroritos aiboisit wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu asi otiza ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie, amuti driceza ni 'diyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu ra. Dri fuza 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo okporu angu amavile 'diyi bipi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiherize kubaho hamwe n'eby'okwerarikirira ebirikugyenda omu maisho omu bantu, tiimu y'obwebembezi eshaziremu kubugana. Orukiiko oru nirugyenderera okukora aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa ekyanga kyaitu.

eng_prompt: As the new school year approached, the administration announced several changes to the tuition structure. This news quickly spread through the community, sparking concern among families.
lug_prompt: Ng'omwaka gw'essomero omupya gusembera, abaddukanya essomero baalangirira enkyukakyuka nnyingi mu nsengeka y'ebisale by'essomero. Amawulire gano gaasaasaana mangu mu kitundu, ne galeetawo okweraliikirira mu maka.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma mwaka me kwan manyen cok cok, ludito me gang kwan guwaco aloka-loka mapol I yub me culu kwan. Lok angea man onya oyot ikin lwak, ma okelo lworo ikin gangi.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete ekaru lo esomero loitetet, abu eyaitene kolimo aijulanakineta nuipu kotoma ainapeta nuka esomero. Apotu iyemuto lu isiarakisi katipet kotoma atutubet, ido abu koyangau aiyalongong kanejaas ikalia.
lgg_prompt: Eli sukulu ni o'diruri ni ecaria, driceza sukulu niri azi ojata karakara eyi sukulu fizi ma alea. E'yo 'di ere i ongulumu eyi ma alea mbeleru, erini asi otiza ejizu familia eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka gw'eishomero ogutsya ku gwahikire, abarikukurira eishomero bakarangirira empindahinduka nyingi omu bishare by'eishomero. Amahurire gakajanjaara juba omu bantu, ekyareteire amaka okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: In the early 19th century, a growing need for educational institutions in the community became evident. To address this need, local leaders sought the support of religious figures to establish a new school.
lug_prompt: Ku ntandikwa y'ekyasa ky'ekkumi n'omwenda, obwetaavu bw'amatendekero mu kitundu bweyongera. Okusobola okukola ku bwetaavu buno, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baanoonya obuyambi bw'abakulembeze b'eddiini okuzimba essomero eppya.
ach_prompt: I acaki me cencwari me apar wiye 19, miti me gangi kwan omede I kabedo mapatpat. Me tyeko miti man, lutela me tedero guyenyo kony ki bot lutela dini me cako gang kwan manyen.
teo_prompt: Kageunet naka ekaru ilukumin itomonakanyaongon, apolor eipud loka isomeroi kotoma atutubet. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kongicata agangat kama ejaasi itunga lu ediini kanu adukun esomero loitetet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eli alifu mudri drini oromisi ni e'doria, e'yo lezu angu onita ni 'diyi ma ovu ongulumu eyi ma alea ci. Lezu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi nda atita engazu 'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi vu sukulu o'diru ni sizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutandika kw'ekyasha kya 19, ekyetengo ky'amatendekyero omu byanga kikarebeka. Okukora ahabyetaago ebi, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakashaba obuhwezi bw'abebembezi b'ediini kutandikaho eishomero risya.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, a large protest erupted in the city center. Law enforcement quickly intervened to maintain order, leading to multiple detentions.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, okwekalakaasa okunene kwabalukawo mu kibuga wakati. Abakuumaddembe baayingirawo mangu okukuuma emirembe, ekyaviirako abantu bangi okukwatibwa.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, jemo madit tutwal ocake I dye boma madit. Lugwok cik gudonyo oyotoyot me gwoko kuc, ma oweko kimako dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, abu aidiya naepol kojaikin kiding na esite. Apotu ipolisin kiswamata katipet kanu aidar ainapakina, ido abu koyangau aikamanario naka itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi 'yepi osutaru 'diyi ma alia, ngiringiri ongmbo angiri ni e'do aku ambu cityniri ma agadria. Ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi fi e'yo 'da ma alea mbeleru e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi obizu 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, obwesharingo bw'amaani bukarugaho ahagati y'orurembo. Abakuumi b'ebiragiro bakahonaaho kutaho obusingye, ekyarugiremu okukomwa kw'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: After months of legal battles and public outcry, the court finally reached a decision regarding the fate of the inmates. In a surprising turn of events, five prisoners were released yesterday.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'entalo z'amateeka n'okukaaba kw'abantu, kkooti yatuuka ku kusalawo ku bikwata ku nkomerero y'abasibe. Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, abasibe bataano baateereddwa eggulo.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny me cik ma obedo pi dwe mapol ki koko pa lwak, kot dong omoko tamgi I kom ngo ma omyero otimme I kom mabuc. I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, ki gonyo mabuc abic laworo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ijisinei keda aimony naka itunga, abu adieket kodolok aseunet naikamunit ejautene loka iwenan. Koipone kalo itegelikina, aponi kolacakinai iwenan ikany bian.
lgg_prompt: Mba yini a'di 'dizu azita palaa azini o'bi yini owuzu 'bori ma vutia, dwani asizu e'yo li e'yo 'ba aru ru 'diyi ma drata ma dria ra. E'yo azi osutaru ni ma alia, 'ba ofu mabuso towi yi aje ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okurwana omu biragiro hamwe n'okwetomboita kw'abantu, kooti ekahendera yaahika aha kusharamu aha bikwatiraine n'ekigyendererwa ky'abasibe. Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, abasibe bataano barekwirwe nyomwebazyo.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic forced businesses to close and incomes to dwindle, individuals sought financial assistance to navigate the uncertain economic landscape. In response to these challenges, financial institutions saw a surge in loan applications.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyawaliriza bizinensi okuggalawo n'enyingiza okukendeera, abantu baanoonya obuyambi bw'ensimbi okutambuza embeera y'ebyenfuna etali nnambulukufu. Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa kuno, ebitongole by'ebyensimbi byalabye okweyongerayongera mu kusaba okwewola.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two korona oweko biyacara oloro woko ki cente odok piny, dano acel-acel guyenyo kony me lim me lweny i kom peko me lim matye. Macalo adwogi me peko magi, dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok kom lim gunongo wel dano mapol ma openyo lim adena.
teo_prompt: Kwape abu adeka koinak ibiasaran agolokin kosodi ikapun aitidisiar, apotu itunga kongicata agangat na ikapun kanu aitodolikin ejautene loetiono noi loka ikapun. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, apotu iriongeta luka ikapun kowanyutu aiyatakinio naka ailip ilonin.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni tujari eyi ma ti opizu azini robia eyini esu ri ma omgbo esizu risi, 'ba eyi nda azakoma robia niri ecozu aa'zu e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi ma alea. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti e'yo robia ni 'diyi ni 'diyi ndre e'yo 'ba eyini loni eyi aizu ri ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikureetera bizinesi kukinga kandi n'entaasya zikakyendeera, abantu bakasherura obuhwezi bw'esente okureeberera embeera y'eby'entaasya etarikwetegyerezibwa. Ahabw'oburemeezi obu, ebitongore by'esente bikareeba okweyongyera kw'okushaba za rooni.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating protests, law enforcement increased their presence in the city. Tensions rose as demonstrators clashed with police, leading to a series of confrontations.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okwekalakaasa okweyongera, abakuumaddembe beeyongedde okubeera mu kibuga. Obunkenke bwalinnya nga abekalakaasi balwanagana ne poliisi, ekyaviirako okulwanagana okw'omuddiring'anwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me jemo matye kamede, abili omedo rwom me bedo tye gi I boma ne. Lworo omede ikare ma lujemo gubedo ka lweny ki abili, ma okelo lweny mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aidiya na iyata, apotu ipolisin iyatakisi ajaut kec koibuga. Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai apotu ediyak ogiroto keda ipolisin, ido abu koyangau ingungeta luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi otu yi ma omgbo aku ambu cityniri ma alia ra. E'yo asi otiza niri tu 'ba ngiringiri 'ye'baa 'diyi ni e'yo 'yezu polisi eyi pie eyini ani e'yo eyi 'yezu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obwesharingo obweyongyeire, ab'eby'obutegyeki bongyeire amaani omu rurembo. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'abeshaaringi kurwanagana na poriisi, ekyarugiremu okurwanagana kwingi.

eng_prompt: Residents have expressed growing concerns about the recent disturbances in the area. After several complaints, the community decided to take action.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze balaze obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku butabanguko obubaddewo mu kitundu gyebuvuddeko. Oluvannyuma lw'okwemulugunya okungi, abantu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gunyutu lworo madit tutwal I kom lweny matye katimme I kabedo eni. Ingee koko mapol, lwak gumoko tam gi me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu amumu na ajai atutubet. Akaulo naka angurian nuipu, apotu itunga koseutu aswam.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo ngiringiri ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo onuza karakara eyi ma vutia, ongulumu eyi 'du e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'obutabanguko obwabaireho omu kyanga kyabo. Ahanyima y'okwetomboitwa kwingi, abantu bakasharamu kukoraho.

eng_prompt: Despite their desperate pleas for help, the inmates felt increasingly hopeless as their voices echoed off the cold, concrete walls. They knew that their cries for justice would fall on deaf ears.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde baasaba obuyambi, abasibe beeyongera okuwulira nga tebalina ssuubi ng'amaloboozi gaabwe gawuuma ku bisenge bya seminti ebinyogovu. Baali bakimanyi nti okukaaba kwabwe olw'obwenkanya tekwandiwuliddwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ka lega matek pi kony, mabuc ne gubedo ka winyo calo gipe ki gen pien dwon gi obedo ka winyo I kom kor ot ma ngic. Onongo gingeo ni koko gi me nongo ngol matir pe biwinyo.
teo_prompt: Karaida ilipitos kesi noi aingarakinio, apotu iwenan opupoto emamete amuno naarai apotu iporotoi kec kotoma arwatatin nuelilim. Ajenete kesi ebe mam eponio aipup aimony kec naka ailip etube loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma o'duko e'yo aza kozaniri ma talasi ra ti, aru'ba 'da eyi ma asi 'baza zo eyini o'duko eyivile 'diyi erizu abi ambizaru simiti ru 'diyi ma dria. Eyi nii ra kini 'ba eyi ma o'duko e'yo liza kililiru ri ma dria ri nga e'de bile kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okushaba kwabo kw'obuhwezi, abasibe bakaguma nibahurira bataine matsiko, amahurire gaabo garikugarukwamu aha bishengye bya simenti ebirikufukiirira. Bakaba nibamanya ngu okurira kwabo kw'oburingaaniza tikurahurwe.

eng_prompt: After years of searching for the perfect piece of property, the villagers finally found a plot that seemed to hold promise. With a determined spirit, they pooled their resources, but in the end, it was the old man who stepped forward to make the purchase.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga banoonya ettaka eddungi, abatuuze b'oku kyalo baasobola okufuna ettaka eryali lirabika okuba ery'omugaso. Olw'omwoyo ogw'obumalirivu, baakungaanya eby'obugagga byabwe, naye ku nkomerero, omusajja omukadde ye yavaayo okugula.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me yenyo ngom maber tutwal, dano me caro gunongo ngom ma nen calo tye ki gen. Ki cwiny me moko tamgi, gu ribo jami gi, ento I agiki ne, laco ma otii en aye okato anyim me wilo jami ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aimo alupok nuejokuka, apotu itunga luka ecalo kodumutu alupok nuejokuka noi. Keda apodokinit, apotu kesi kimorikikinos iborokec, konye kangetakinet, arai epolon ngol loabu kogeu agwel iboro.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma vutia angu onyiru ndeni ri ndazu 'bo, 'ba calo 'da ma alea 'diyi esu asizu angu azi ecopi e'dapi onyiru ni i. Asi 'baza be, eyi tra eyi ma lonyi tualu, te asizu, agu dezari ndra 'ba drile afa jezu ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi barikuronda eitaka eririkwetengwa, abatuuragye bakahendera bashanga eitaka eririkureebeka nk'ery'omugasho. N'omutima gw'amaani, bakagaita eby'obugaiga byabo, kwonka ahamuheru, omugurusi niwe yaagyenda omu maisho kugura ebintu.

eng_prompt: The local community had been eagerly awaiting the outcome of several ongoing disputes. Tensions were high as residents gathered outside the courthouse, hoping for a resolution.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu kitundu babadde balindirira n'essanyu ebyava mu nkaayana eziwerako ezigenda mu maaso. Obunkenke bwali bungi ng'abatuuze bakungaanidde wabweru wa kkooti nga basuubira okugonjoolwa.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gubedo kakuru adwogi me tele ma obedo tye. Lworo obedo tye ikin lwak I kare ma gucokke I nyim ot kot, ki gen me nongo lagam.
teo_prompt: Autasi itunga luka atutubet aidar akiro nuelomunete kotoma ingungeta luegelegela. Apol noi aiyalongongo naarai apotu itunga kotukokinos kinga na adieket, aomitos ebe eponio aitemokin ationis.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi e'yo efu'ba ngiringiri karakara eyi ma alea 'diyi te avasi. E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi ndra uru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini eyi trazu kotia amve asi 'baza be e'yo 'da ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omubyaro babaire bategyereize ebireije kuruga omu ntongane nyingi ezabaire ziriho. Obunkenke bukaba buri ahaiguru ahabw'okuba abatuuragye baketeerana aheeru y'enju ya kooti, barikwesiga ngu nibaza kukorwaho.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous negotiations and attempts at mediation, tensions between the communities continue to escalate. As a result, the land conflict has not been resolved yet.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enteeseganya nnyingi n'okugezaako okutabaganya, obunkenke wakati w'ebitundu bweyongedde. N'ekyavaamu, enkaayana z'ettaka tezinnagonjoolwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni winye ki laro lok obedo tye, telle ikin lwak tye ka mede. Macalo adwogi ne, laro lok me ngom pwod pe otum.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ipegeta luipu keda aitam naka aimorikikin, inyikokinitos ingungeta kiding atekerin ngun aiyatakin. Kanuka ngun, mam itemokitai engunget lo alupok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otuta ni karakara 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo 'ba eselea 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni mu drile tu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba otuni nga e'yo nyaku ma dria 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteesa kwingi n'okugyezaho kutabaganisa, obunkenke ahagati y'abantu nibuguma nibweyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu, entongane z'eitaka tizikakorwaho.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the political landscape in the region has become increasingly complex. As a result, various nations have found themselves involved in cross-border military collaborations.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, embeera y'ebyobufuzi mu kitundu yeeyongedde okuba enzibu. N'ekivuddemu, amawanga ag'enjawulo geesanga nga geenyigidde mu nkolagana z'amagye ezitali zimu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lok me cung iwibye I but lobo man odoko tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lobe mapol gunongo ni gitye ka tic kacelo ki mony ma aa ki I lobo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etiono noi akiro nuka epolitikis kotoma aiboisit kana. Kanuka ngun, apotu akwapin nuipu odumutu ebe ejaasi kesi toma aiswamanara naka isirikaalei.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo politiki ni angu 'di ma alea ri eca curu'do kongolokoru. E'yo 'disi, kari karakara eyi esu eyi azi nga tualu e'yo marani ni kari eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, eby'obutegyeki omu kyanga byeyongyeire kugumizamu. N'ekyarugiremu, amahanga maingi gashangire gaine enkoragana y'amahe erikuhingura ensharo.

eng_prompt: In an era of increasing financial scrutiny, the public demands greater accountability from financial institutions. To build trust and foster customer loyalty, banks need to be transparent.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe guno ogw'okwongera okukebera ebyensimbi, abantu baagala embalirira ey'amaanyi okuva mu bitongole by'ensimbi. Okusobola okuzimba obwesige n'okutumbula obwesigwa bwa bakasitoma, bbanka zeetaaga okubeera ennambulukufu.
ach_prompt: I kare man me ngiyo kor tic ki lim matye kamede, lwak mito ni dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok kom lim omed kor tic gi. Me dongo gen ki gen pa luwil, beng omyero gubed ki ada.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu eyatakinor aingic naka ikapun, ekotosi itunga aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun kama ejaasi iriongeta luka ikapun. Kanu adukun amunokina ka aitojokar amunokina naka ikasitomas, ekot aingadisia nuka ikapun araut lu ecaete.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'bani e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu tutu ri ma alea, o'bi eyi le geri robia ni 'diyi ma e'yo nzezu ri ma omgbo ma tu engazu amuti robia ni 'diyi vu. Asi'baza sizu azini aje'ba eyi ma asi'baza otuzu, le erojo eyi ma aa e'yo ada be.
nyn_prompt: Omu murembe gw'okweyongyera kw'okushwijuma eby'empiiha, abantu nibenda embaririra nungi kuruga omu bitongore by'empiiha. Okureetaho obwesigye n'okureetaho obwesigwa omu bakasitoma, za banka zishemereire kugira amazima.

eng_prompt: In today's increasingly interconnected world, having a reliable form of identification is essential for accessing various services and participating fully in society. A national identity card serves as a crucial tool for establishing one's identity and citizenship.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero eyeeyongedde okukwatagana, okubeera n'endagamuntu eyeesigika kyetaagisa okufuna obuweereza obw'enjawulo n'okwenyigiramu mu bujjuvu mu bantu. Endagamuntu y'eggwanga ekola ng'ekintu ekikulu mu kuteekawo endagamuntu y'omuntu n'obutuuze.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni matye ka kube matek tutwal, bedo ki lanyut ma gene pire tek tutwal me nongo kony mapat-pat ki bedo tye I kabedo mapat-pat. Kad me lanyut mamegi nyo ID obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me nyutu ni in ibedo dano me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naerucokina noi, ajaut keda apapula na itodunit ebe ejokuna kanu adumunun aijanakino ka ajaut keda aswam naejok kotoma atutubet. Iswamai akaadi naka akwap kwape ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodun akirot naka itunganan keda akwapuke.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia e'yo yi ecipi yi ma eselea tu 'diyi ma alia, ovuzu geri 'bani ecozu e'dazu kililiru ri be ri eri orodriru azakoma ndundu eyi esuzu azini aa'zu o'bi eyi ma eselea sa'wa driasi. eng_prompt: As the new year approached, he gathered his friends and family to share his thoughts on personal growth and transformation. Inspired by the fresh start that a new year brings, he encouraged them to embrace change and seek new beginnings.
lug_prompt: Omwaka omuggya bwe gwasembera, yakungaanya mikwano gye n'ab'omu maka ge okugabana ebirowoozo bye ku nkulaakulana y'omuntu n'enkyukakyuka. Ng'akubirizibwa entandikwa empya omwaka omuggya gye guleeta, yabakubiriza okukkiriza enkyukakyuka n'okunoonya entandikwa empya.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma mwaka manyen cok cok, en olwongo lureme ki luganggi me nywako tamme I kom dongo pa dano ki aloka loka. Ki cuku cwinygi I kom acaki manyen ma mwaka manyen kelo, en ocuku cwinygi me jolo aloka-loka ki yenyo acaki manyen.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete ekaru loitetet, abu ngesi kitukok ipaperoke keda lukokaleke kanu aimor aomisioke nuikamunitos apol keda aijulakin. Aponi isinyikokinai kesi ageunet naitetet na eyauni ekaru loitetet, abu ngesi isinyikok kes acamun aijulakineta ka aimo ageuneta nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Eli o'diruri ni ecaria, eri tra i ma agyipi azini familia 'diyi yi ma eselea e'yo i ma egata zota ma dria azini ojata ma dria 'diyi awazu. Erini ava esuzu e'dota o'diru eli o'diruri ni ejile risi, eri eka eyi ojata ai'zu azini e'dota o'diru eyi ndazu.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka omutsya ku gwahikire, akarundaana banywani be hamwe n'ab'omuka yaabo okubagana ebiteekateeko bye aha ntunguuka hamwe n'empinduka. Ahabw'okuhuumurizibwa entandikwa nsya ei omwaka omutsya gurikureeta,akabahiga kwikiriza empinduka n'okuronda entandikwa nsya.

eng_prompt: As social gatherings have become more common again, many are seeking out places to unwind. The nightlife scene is experiencing a noticeable resurgence.
lug_prompt: Nga enkungaana z'awamu bwe zeeyongedde okubeera eza bulijjo, bangi banoonya ebifo aw'okuwummulira. Obulamu bw'ekiro bweyongedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma gure pa dano odoko dwong tutwal, dano mapol tye ka yenyo kabedo me yweyo. Kwo me dyewor tye ka dongo tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape etapit airiamunun na itunga, eutasi luipu aimo aiboisio nu epedoriata kesi aiyengun. Apolor noi aijar naka kware.
lgg_prompt: Okuta 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu dika risi, 'ba karakara eyi angu nda eyini ecozu ava lizu ra. E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu angu 'da ma alea inisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku enteerane z'okushemerererwa zigarukire kuba eza buriijo, abantu baingi nibaronda emyanya y'okushemerererwamu. Eby'okushemererwa nyekiro biriyo nibyeyongyera.

eng_prompt: As the year draws to a close, many people begin to feel the excitement in the air. The anticipation of holiday gatherings brings a sense of warmth and togetherness.
lug_prompt: Omwaka bwe gugenda guggwaako, abantu bangi batandika okuwulira essanyu mu bbanga. Okusuubira enkuŋŋaana z'ennaku enkulu kuleeta okuwulira kw'ebbugumu n'obumu.

lgg_prompt: Eli ni ecaria i deria, 'ba karakara eyi e'do ayiko esu oli ma alea. Okuta o'du lifu ni 'diyi ma e'yo egazu drile ri ni ava eji tualu tualu tualu tualu.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka ku gurikuza kuhwa, abantu baingi nibatandika kuhurira okushemererwa okuri omu mwanya. Okutegyereza enteerane z'ebiro bikuru, nikireetaho okushemererwa n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Music has a profound impact on our emotions and experiences. It often serves as a backdrop to significant moments in our lives.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and anticipation, the team gathered to finalize the details of the upcoming event. In a recent meeting, they decided it was time to share the financial aspects with the stakeholders.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateekateeka n'okusuubira, ttiimu yakungaana okumaliriza ebikwata ku mukolo ogubadde gugenda okubaawo. Mu lukiiko olwaliwo gye buvuddeko, baasalawo nti kye kiseera okugabana ensonga z'ebyensimbi n'abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki byek, joo ne gugure me tyeko lok matut I kom yub matye kabino ni. I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, gumoko ni kare dong oromo me nywako lok me lim ki joo ma lok tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitemonokin keda aomisio, apotu etimu kimorikikinos kanu angetakin akiro nuikamunitos epucit lo ebunit. Kotoma airiamunet napac, apotu kesi ocamutu ebe erai apak na aimor akiro nuka ikapun keda itunga.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuteekateeka, tiimu ekakorana kuhendera ebirikukwata aha mukoro oguri kwija. Omu rukiiko orwabaireho juba, bakasharamu ngu hati n'obwire bw'okubagana enshonga z'esente n'abu kirikukwataho.

eng_prompt: As the weekend approaches, excitement builds for the upcoming teen events in the area. Parents and organizers prepare for the influx of attendees, knowing that the streets will soon be bustling with activity.
lug_prompt: Wiikendi bw'esembera, essanyu lyeyongera olw'emikolo gy'abavubuka egijja mu kitundu. Abazadde n'abategesi beetegekera okuyingira kw'abantu, nga bakimanyi nti enguudo zijja kuba zijjudde abantu.

teo_prompt: Neyapiete esabiti, ejai aiyalama naepol noi kanuka epucit loka atumunak kotoma aiboisit. Auriak keda lu itemonokinete itemonokinete kanuka itunga luipu, ejenete ebe epote irotin ailelebikin keda aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti ni i deria, ayiko ni tu e'yo emupi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni. Tipika eyi tualu 'ba e'yo otupi 'diyi pie eyi otu 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma omgbo ni eyini ani nizu ra kini nzila eyi mu adri 'yeta eyi pie mbeleru.

eng_prompt: The excitement in the air was palpable as the community prepared for the highly anticipated festival. Flyers had been distributed throughout the neighborhood, sparking interest among the younger crowd.
lug_prompt: Essanyu mu bbanga lyali lirabika ng'abantu beetegekera ekivvulu ekyabadde kisuubirwa ennyo. Ebipapula byali bigabiddwa mu kitundu kyonna, ekyaleetawo obwagazi mu bantu abato.
ach_prompt: Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma lwak tye ka yubbe pi kwer ma kibyeko ni obi bedo tye. Kipoko waraga ma cwalo lok angeya I kabedo weng ma orumuwa, man okelo miti ikin jo matino.
teo_prompt: Aponi kowanyunai aiyalama kotoma aiboisit najaar itunga aitemonokin kanuka epucit loewomitai ebe ebunit. Aponi okorakinai aiwadikaeta aiboisio kere, ido abu kiteleka eipud loka atumunak.

eng_prompt: The gallery opening attracted a diverse crowd, drawing in art enthusiasts and collectors from all over the city. In addition to the attendees, several artists turned up for the event as well.

ach_prompt: Yabo ot nyuto cal ne okelo dano mapol ma gubedo lumar cal ki jo ma coko cal ki I boma ne weng. Medo i kom joo ma obedo tye, lugoo wee mapol bene gubino I yub eni.

eng_prompt: When planning an event, it's essential to consider the overall atmosphere and aesthetic. One of the key elements that can significantly impact the experience is the decoration.

teo_prompt: Arai itemonokini ijo epucit, ibusakinit ijo aomoom nuikamunitos ejautene keda ajokis naka epucit. Adiopet koboro luepedorete aitojokar akiro ngun ngesi aitubus.

eng_prompt: As the evening approached, we prepared for a modest gathering of friends and family. However, the excitement in the air hinted that our guest list might be underestimated.
lug_prompt: Olweggulo bwe lwasembera, twetegekera olukungaana lw'emikwano n'ab'enganda. Kyokka, essanyu eryali mu bbanga lyasonga ku ky'okuba nti olukalala lw'abagenyi baffe lwali lusuuliddwa wansi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma otyeno dong cok, wayubbe pi gure pa lurem ki lugang. Kadi bed kumeno, yom-cwiny ma obedo I yamo onyuto ni nying wele megwa pe kimaro.

nyn_prompt: Omumwebazyo ku gwahikire, tuketeekateekyera enteerane y'abanywani n'ab'eka yaitu. Kwonka, okushemererwa okwabaire kuri omumwanya, kukareetaho ekiteekateeko ngu orukarara rwaitu rw'abagyenyi rukaba niruza kutwarwa nk'orutari rw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, vibrant decorations adorned every corner of the garden. Laughter and music filled the air, setting the stage for an unforgettable celebration.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, eby'okuyooyoota ebitangaavu byayooyoota buli kanyomero k'olusuku. Enseko n'omuziki byajjula empewo, ne biteekawo omutendera gw'okujaguza okutayinza kwerabirwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng ocako poto, deyo ma beco obedo I gul ducu me poto. Nyero ki wer opong I yamo, ma oweko yub me kwero ma wi dano pe biwil I komgi obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu aiboisio nuibusiak noi kibusakisi aiboisio nuka amisiri. Apotu akwena keda ikososinei kilelebunos kokwam, ido abu kitemok ainumunum na mam imurokini.
lgg_prompt: E'yo etuka ni e'doria 'boria, afa edeza ndrizaru 'diyi ede amvu ma kona dria. A'ya azini ongo ga angu ma alea tre, e'yo ayiko zuza 'bani ecozu avizu ku 'diyi e'dozu.

eng_prompt: The atmosphere was filled with laughter and excitement as friends and family gathered together. Everyone was eager to participate in the activities planned for the day.
lug_prompt: Embeera yali ejjudde enseko n'okusanyuka ng'emikwano n'ab'omu maka bakungaanidde wamu. Buli omu yali ayagala nnyo okwenyigira mu mirimu egyali gitegekeddwa olunaku.
ach_prompt: Kabedo ne opong ki nyero ki yom-cwiny I kare ma lurem ki lugang gugure kacel. Dano weng gubedo ki miti me bedo tye I yub ma obedo tye pi nino enuni.

nyn_prompt: Embeera ekaba eijwire okusheka hamwe n'okushemererwa ahabw'abanywani hamwe n'ab'eka okuteeranira hamwe. Buri omwe akaba aine ekihika ky'okwejumba omu mirimo eyabaire etebekanisiibwe eizooba eryo.

eng_prompt: As the guests arrived, they were greeted by a team of uniformed guards stationed at the entrance. Rumors had circulated about potential disruptions, prompting the organizers to take extra precautions.
lug_prompt: Abagenyi bwe baatuuka, baayaniriziddwa abakuumi abaali bambadde yunifoomu ku mulyango oguyingira. Olugambo lwali lutambula ku kutaataaganyizibwa okuyinza okubaawo, ekyaletera abategesi okwegendereza ennyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wele gu oo, lumony ma guruko unifom ma ki keto I doggola aye gumotogi. Lok angea obedo ka wot I kom peko ma onongo twero bedo tye, ma oweko luyub obedo ki gwok mapol tutwal.

lgg_prompt: Omu eyini ecazu 'boria, 'ba azi ageitema ni yunifomu be 'diyi fe eyini awa'difo angu eyini fizu ri ma alea. E'yo onzi eyi aci e'yo ecopi 'ba otupi 'diyi ezapi ra 'diyi ma dria, eyini ani 'ba otupi 'diyi ma 'du e'yo eyi ma tambazu drile.
